53 extern pEffect SpellEffects[MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS];
54 
55 class PrioritizeManaUnitWraper
56 {
57  public:
58  explicit PrioritizeManaUnitWraper(Unit* unit) : i_unit(unit)
59  {
60  uint32 maxmana = unit->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA);
61  i_percent = maxmana ? unit->GetPower(POWER_MANA) * 100 / maxmana : 101;
62  }
63  Unit* getUnit() const { return i_unit; }
64  uint32 getPercent() const { return i_percent; }
65  private:
66  Unit* i_unit;
67  uint32 i_percent;
68 };
69 
70 struct PrioritizeMana
71 {
72  int operator()(PrioritizeManaUnitWraper const& x, PrioritizeManaUnitWraper const& y) const
73  {
74  return x.getPercent() > y.getPercent();
75  }
76 };
77 
78 typedef std::priority_queue<PrioritizeManaUnitWraper, std::vector<PrioritizeManaUnitWraper>, PrioritizeMana> PrioritizeManaUnitQueue;
79 
80 class PrioritizeHealthUnitWraper
81 {
82  public:
83  explicit PrioritizeHealthUnitWraper(Unit* unit) : i_unit(unit)
84  {
85  i_percent = unit->GetHealthPercent();
86  }
87  Unit* getUnit() const { return i_unit; }
88  uint32 getPercent() const { return i_percent; }
89  private:
90  Unit* i_unit;
91  uint32 i_percent;
92 };
93 
94 struct PrioritizeHealth
95 {
96  int operator()(PrioritizeHealthUnitWraper const& x, PrioritizeHealthUnitWraper const& y) const
97  {
98  return x.getPercent() > y.getPercent();
99  }
100 };
101 
102 typedef std::priority_queue<PrioritizeHealthUnitWraper, std::vector<PrioritizeHealthUnitWraper>, PrioritizeHealth> PrioritizeHealthUnitQueue;
103 
104 bool IsQuestTameSpell(uint32 spellId)
105 {
106  SpellEntry const* spellproto = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellId);
107  if (!spellproto)
108  return false;
109 
110  return spellproto->Effect[EFFECT_INDEX_0] == SPELL_EFFECT_THREAT
111  && spellproto->Effect[EFFECT_INDEX_1] == SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AURA && spellproto->EffectApplyAuraName[EFFECT_INDEX_1] == SPELL_AURA_DUMMY;
112 }
113 
114 // SpellCastTargets class
115 // **********************
116 
117 SpellCastTargets::SpellCastTargets()
118 {
119  m_unitTarget = nullptr;
120  m_itemTarget = nullptr;
121  m_GOTarget = nullptr;
122  m_CorpseTarget = nullptr;
123 
124  m_itemTargetEntry = 0;
125 
126  m_strTarget.clear();
127  m_targetMask = 0;
128  m_elevation = 0.0f;
129  m_speed = 0.0f;
130 
131  m_mapId = UINT32_MAX;
132 }
133 
134 SpellCastTargets::~SpellCastTargets()
135 {
136 }
137 
138 void SpellCastTargets::setUnitTarget(Unit* target)
139 {
140  if (!target)
141  return;
142 
143  m_destPos = target->GetPosition();
144  m_unitTarget = target;
145  m_unitTargetGUID = target->GetObjectGuid();
146  m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_UNIT;
147 }
148 
149 void SpellCastTargets::setDestination(float x, float y, float z)
150 {
151  m_destPos.x = x;
152  m_destPos.y = y;
153  m_destPos.z = z;
154  m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION;
155 }
156 
157 void SpellCastTargets::setDestination(Position position)
158 {
159  m_destPos = position;
160  m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION;
161 }
162 
163 void SpellCastTargets::setSource(float x, float y, float z)
164 {
165  m_srcPos.x = x;
166  m_srcPos.y = y;
167  m_srcPos.z = z;
168  m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION;
169 }
170 
171 void SpellCastTargets::setGOTarget(GameObject* target)
172 {
173  m_GOTarget = target;
174  m_GOTargetGUID = target->GetObjectGuid();
175  // m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_GAMEOBJECT;
176 }
177 
178 void SpellCastTargets::setItemTarget(Item* item)
179 {
180  if (!item)
181  return;
182 
183  m_itemTarget = item;
184  m_itemTargetGUID = item->GetObjectGuid();
185  m_itemTargetEntry = item->GetEntry();
186  m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_ITEM;
187 }
188 
189 void SpellCastTargets::setTradeItemTarget(Player* caster)
190 {
191  m_itemTargetGUID = ObjectGuid(uint64(TRADE_SLOT_NONTRADED));
192  m_itemTargetEntry = 0;
193  m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM;
194 
195  Update(caster);
196 }
197 
198 void SpellCastTargets::setCorpseTarget(Corpse* corpse)
199 {
200  m_CorpseTarget = corpse;
201  m_CorpseTargetGUID = corpse->GetObjectGuid();
202 }
203 
204 void SpellCastTargets::Update(WorldObject* caster)
205 {
206  m_GOTarget = m_GOTargetGUID ? caster->GetMap()->GetGameObject(m_GOTargetGUID) : nullptr;
207  m_unitTarget = m_unitTargetGUID ?
208  (m_unitTargetGUID == caster->GetObjectGuid() ? static_cast<Unit*>(caster) : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*caster, m_unitTargetGUID)) :
209  nullptr;
210 
211  m_itemTarget = nullptr;
212  m_CorpseTarget = ObjectAccessor::GetCorpseInMap(m_CorpseTargetGUID, caster->GetMapId());
213  if (caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
214  {
215  Player* player = ((Player*)caster);
216 
217  if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_ITEM)
218  m_itemTarget = player->GetItemByGuid(m_itemTargetGUID);
219  else if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM)
220  {
221  if (TradeData* pTrade = player->GetTradeData())
222  if (m_itemTargetGUID.GetRawValue() < TRADE_SLOT_COUNT)
223  m_itemTarget = pTrade->GetTraderData()->GetItem(TradeSlots(m_itemTargetGUID.GetRawValue()));
224  }
225 
226  if (m_itemTarget)
227  m_itemTargetEntry = m_itemTarget->GetEntry();
228  }
229 
230  if (m_srcTransportGUID)
231  {
232  if (GenericTransport* transport = caster->GetMap()->GetTransport(m_srcTransportGUID))
233  {
234  Position temp = m_srcTransportPos;
235  transport->CalculatePassengerPosition(temp.x, temp.y, temp.z, &temp.o);
236  m_srcPos = temp;
237  }
238  }
239 
240  if (m_destTransportGUID)
241  {
242  if (GenericTransport* transport = caster->GetMap()->GetTransport(m_destTransportGUID))
243  {
244  Position temp = m_destTransportPos;
245  transport->CalculatePassengerPosition(temp.x, temp.y, temp.z, &temp.o);
246  m_destPos = temp;
247  }
248  }
249 }
250 
251 void SpellCastTargets::read(ByteBuffer& data, Unit* caster)
252 {
253  data >> m_targetMask;
254 
255  if (m_targetMask == TARGET_FLAG_SELF)
256  return;
257 
258  // TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_MINIPET is used for non-combat pets, maybe other?
259  if (m_targetMask & (TARGET_FLAG_UNIT | TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_MINIPET | TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_ENEMY))
260  data >> m_unitTargetGUID.ReadAsPacked();
261 
262  if (m_targetMask & (TARGET_FLAG_GAMEOBJECT | TARGET_FLAG_LOCKED))
263  data >> m_GOTargetGUID.ReadAsPacked();
264 
265  if ((m_targetMask & (TARGET_FLAG_ITEM | TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM)) && caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
266  data >> m_itemTargetGUID.ReadAsPacked();
267 
268  if (m_targetMask & (TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_ALLY | TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_ENEMY))
269  data >> m_CorpseTargetGUID.ReadAsPacked();
270 
271  if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION)
272  {
273  data >> m_srcTransportGUID.ReadAsPacked();
274  if (m_srcTransportGUID)
275  {
276  data >> m_srcTransportPos.x >> m_srcTransportPos.y >> m_srcTransportPos.z;
277  m_srcPos = m_srcTransportPos;
278  if (GenericTransport* transport = caster->GetMap()->GetTransport(m_srcTransportGUID))
279  transport->CalculatePassengerPosition(m_srcPos.x, m_srcPos.y, m_srcPos.z, &m_srcPos.o);
280  }
281  else
282  data >> m_srcPos.x >> m_srcPos.y >> m_srcPos.z;
283  if (!MaNGOS::IsValidMapCoord(m_srcPos.x, m_srcPos.y, m_srcPos.z))
284  throw ByteBufferException(false, data.rpos(), 0, data.size());
285  }
286 
287  if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
288  {
289  data >> m_destTransportGUID.ReadAsPacked();
290  if (m_destTransportGUID)
291  {
292  data >> m_destTransportPos.x >> m_destTransportPos.y >> m_destTransportPos.z;
293  m_destPos = m_destTransportPos;
294  if (GenericTransport* transport = caster->GetMap()->GetTransport(m_destTransportGUID))
295  transport->CalculatePassengerPosition(m_destPos.x, m_destPos.y, m_destPos.z, &m_destPos.o);
296  }
297  else
298  data >> m_destPos.x >> m_destPos.y >> m_destPos.z;
299  if (!MaNGOS::IsValidMapCoord(m_destPos.x, m_destPos.y, m_destPos.z))
300  throw ByteBufferException(false, data.rpos(), 0, data.size());
301  }
302 
303  if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_STRING)
304  data >> m_strTarget;
305 
306  // find real units/GOs
307  Update(caster);
308 }
309 
310 void SpellCastTargets::write(ByteBuffer& data) const
311 {
312  data << uint32(m_targetMask);
313 
314  if (m_targetMask & (TARGET_FLAG_UNIT | TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_ENEMY | TARGET_FLAG_GAMEOBJECT | TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_ALLY | TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_MINIPET))
315  {
316  if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_UNIT)
317  {
318  if (m_unitTarget)
319  data << m_unitTarget->GetPackGUID();
320  else
321  data << uint8(0);
322  }
323  else if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_GAMEOBJECT)
324  {
325  if (m_GOTarget)
326  data << m_GOTarget->GetPackGUID();
327  else
328  data << uint8(0);
329  }
330  else if (m_targetMask & (TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_ALLY | TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_ENEMY))
331  data << m_CorpseTargetGUID.WriteAsPacked();
332  else
333  data << uint8(0);
334  }
335 
336  if (m_targetMask & (TARGET_FLAG_ITEM | TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM))
337  {
338  if (m_itemTarget)
339  data << m_itemTarget->GetPackGUID();
340  else
341  data << uint8(0);
342  }
343 
344  if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION)
345  {
346  data << m_srcTransportGUID.WriteAsPacked();
347  data << m_srcPos.x << m_srcPos.y << m_srcPos.z;
348  }
349 
350  if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
351  {
352  data << m_destTransportGUID.WriteAsPacked();
353  data << m_destPos.x << m_destPos.y << m_destPos.z;
354  }
355 
356  if (m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_STRING)
357  data << m_strTarget;
358 }
359 
360 // SpellLog class
361 // **************
362 
363 void SpellLog::Initialize()
364 {
365  m_spellLogData.Initialize(SMSG_SPELLLOGEXECUTE);
366  //m_spellLogData << m_spell->GetCaster()->GetPackGUID();
367  m_spellLogData.appendPackGUID(m_spell->GetTrueCaster()->GetObjectGuid().GetRawValue());
368  m_spellLogData << uint32(m_spell->m_spellInfo->Id);
369  m_spellLogDataEffectsCounterPos = m_spellLogData.wpos();
370  m_spellLogData << uint32(0); //placeholder
371  m_spellLogDataEffectsCounter = 0;
372 }
373 
374 void SpellLog::FinalizePrevious()
375 {
376  if (m_currentEffect < uint32(MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS))
377  {
378  // not first effect processed so we have to finalize the previous one by putting correct amount of targets
379  m_spellLogData.put<uint32>(m_spellLogDataTargetsCounterPos, m_spellLogDataTargetsCounter);
380  m_currentEffect = uint32(MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS);
381  }
382 }
383 
384 void SpellLog::SetCurrentEffect(uint32 effect)
385 {
386  // check if its same effect so we don't have to put header
387  if (effect == m_currentEffect)
388  {
389  ++m_spellLogDataTargetsCounter;
390  return;
391  }
392 
393  FinalizePrevious();
394 
395  m_spellLogData << effect;
396  m_spellLogDataTargetsCounterPos = m_spellLogData.wpos();
397  m_spellLogData << uint32(0); // placeholder for target counter
398  m_currentEffect = effect;
399  m_spellLogDataTargetsCounter = 1;
400 }
401 
402 void SpellLog::SendToSet()
403 {
404  if (!m_spellLogDataEffectsCounter)
405  return;
406 
407  // check if one of previous target is not finalized
408  FinalizePrevious();
409 
410  // put total effect counter in packet
411  m_spellLogData.put<uint32>(m_spellLogDataEffectsCounterPos, m_spellLogDataEffectsCounter);
412  m_spell->GetTrueCaster()->SendMessageToSet(m_spellLogData, true);
413 
414  // make it ready for another log if need
415  Initialize();
416 }
417 
418 // Spell class
419 // ***********
420 
421 Spell::Spell(WorldObject* caster, SpellEntry const* info, uint32 triggeredFlags, ObjectGuid originalCasterGUID, SpellEntry const* triggeredBy) :
422  m_partialApplicationMask(0), m_spellScript(SpellScriptMgr::GetSpellScript(info->Id)), m_auraScript(SpellScriptMgr::GetAuraScript(info->Id)),
423  m_spellEvent(nullptr), m_spellLog(this), m_param1(0), m_param2(0), m_trueCaster(caster)
424 {
425  MANGOS_ASSERT(caster != nullptr && info != nullptr);
426  MANGOS_ASSERT(info == sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(info->Id) && "`info` must be pointer to sSpellTemplate element");
427 
428  if (info->SpellDifficultyId && caster->IsInWorld() && caster->GetMap()->IsDungeon())
429  {
430  if (SpellEntry const* spellEntry = GetSpellEntryByDifficulty(info->SpellDifficultyId, caster->GetMap()->GetDifficulty(), caster->GetMap()->IsRaid()))
431  m_spellInfo = spellEntry;
432  else
433  m_spellInfo = info;
434  }
435  else
436  m_spellInfo = info;
437 
438  m_triggeredBySpellInfo = triggeredBy;
439  m_caster = dynamic_cast<Unit*>(caster);
440  m_referencedFromCurrentSpell = false;
441  m_executedCurrently = false;
442  m_delayStart = 0;
443  m_delayAtDamageCount = 0;
444 
445  m_applyMultiplierMask = 0;
446 
447  // Get data for type of attack
448  m_attackType = GetWeaponAttackType(m_spellInfo);
449 
450  m_spellSchoolMask = GetSpellSchoolMask(info); // Can be override for some spell (wand shoot for example)
451 
452  // wand case
453  if (m_attackType == RANGED_ATTACK && m_caster)
454  if (!!(m_caster->getClassMask() & CLASSMASK_WAND_USERS) && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
455  m_spellSchoolMask = m_caster->GetRangedDamageSchoolMask();
456 
457  // Set health leech amount to zero
458  m_healthLeech = 0;
459 
460  m_originalCasterGUID = originalCasterGUID ? originalCasterGUID : m_trueCaster->GetObjectGuid();
461 
462  UpdateOriginalCasterPointer();
463 
464  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
465  m_currentBasePoints[i] = m_spellInfo->CalculateSimpleValue(SpellEffectIndex(i));
466 
467  m_spellState = SPELL_STATE_CREATED;
468 
469  m_castPositionX = m_castPositionY = m_castPositionZ = 0;
470  m_TriggerSpells.clear();
471  m_preCastSpells.clear();
472  m_IsTriggeredSpell = triggeredFlags & TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED;
473  // m_AreaAura = false;
474  m_CastItem = nullptr;
475  m_itemCastSpell = false;
476 
477  unitTarget = nullptr;
478  itemTarget = nullptr;
479  gameObjTarget = nullptr;
480  corpseTarget = nullptr;
481  m_eventTarget = nullptr;
482  m_cast_count = 0;
483  m_glyphIndex = 0;
484  m_triggeredByAuraSpell = nullptr;
485  m_spellAuraHolder = nullptr;
486 
487  // Auto Shot & Shoot (wand)
488  m_autoRepeat = IsAutoRepeatRangedSpell(m_spellInfo);
489 
490  m_runesState = 0;
491  m_runesStateAfterCast = 0;
492  m_powerCost = 0; // setup to correct value in Spell::prepare, don't must be used before.
493  m_casttime = 0; // setup to correct value in Spell::prepare, don't must be used before.
494  m_timer = 0; // will set to cast time in prepare
495  m_creationTime = m_trueCaster->GetMap()->GetCurrentMSTime();
496  m_updated = false;
497  m_duration = 0;
498  m_maxRange = 0.f;
499 
500  m_needAliveTargetMask = 0;
501 
502  m_ignoreHitResult = (triggeredFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_HIT_CALCULATION) != 0;
503  m_ignoreUnselectableTarget = m_IsTriggeredSpell || ((triggeredFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_UNSELECTABLE_FLAG) != 0);
504  m_ignoreCastTime = (triggeredFlags & TRIGGERED_INSTANT_CAST) != 0;
505  m_ignoreUnattackableTarget = (triggeredFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_UNATTACKABLE_FLAG) != 0;
506  m_triggerAutorepeat = (triggeredFlags & TRIGGERED_AUTOREPEAT) != 0;
507  m_doNotProc = (triggeredFlags & TRIGGERED_DO_NOT_PROC) != 0;
508  m_petCast = (triggeredFlags & TRIGGERED_PET_CAST) != 0;
509  m_notifyAI = (triggeredFlags & TRIGGERED_NORMAL_COMBAT_CAST) != 0;
510  m_ignoreGCD = m_IsTriggeredSpell || ((triggeredFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_GCD) != 0);
511  m_ignoreCosts = m_IsTriggeredSpell || ((triggeredFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_COSTS) != 0);
512  m_ignoreCooldowns = m_IsTriggeredSpell || ((triggeredFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_COOLDOWNS) != 0);
513  m_ignoreConcurrentCasts = m_IsTriggeredSpell || ((triggeredFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CURRENT_CASTED_SPELL) != 0) || m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX4_ALLOW_CAST_WHILE_CASTING);
514  m_ignoreCasterAuraState = m_IsTriggeredSpell || ((triggeredFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CASTER_AURA_STATE) != 0 || m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_IGNORE_CASTER_REQUIREMENTS));
515  m_hideInCombatLog = (m_IsTriggeredSpell && !IsAutoRepeatRangedSpell(m_spellInfo)) || ((triggeredFlags & TRIGGERED_HIDE_CAST_IN_COMBAT_LOG) != 0);
516  m_resetLeash = (triggeredFlags & TRIGGERED_DO_NOT_RESET_LEASH) == 0;
517  m_channelOnly = (triggeredFlags & TRIGGERED_CHANNEL_ONLY) != 0;
518 
519  m_clientCast = false;
520 
521  m_reflectable = IsReflectableSpell(m_spellInfo);
522  m_spellFlags = SPELL_FLAG_NORMAL;
523 
524  m_affectedTargetCount = m_spellInfo->MaxAffectedTargets;
525  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
526  m_chainTargetCount[i] = m_spellInfo->EffectChainTarget[SpellEffectIndex(i)];
527 
528  m_jumpRadius = SpellTargetMgr::GetJumpRadius(m_spellInfo->Id);
529  memcpy(m_filteringScheme, SpellTargetMgr::GetSpellTargetingData(m_spellInfo->Id).filteringScheme, sizeof(m_filteringScheme));
530 
531  m_scriptValue = 0;
532 
533  memset(m_effectTriggerChance, -1, sizeof(m_effectTriggerChance));
534  memset(damagePerEffect, 0, sizeof(damagePerEffect));
535 
536  CleanupTargetList();
537 
538  m_spellLog.Initialize();
539  m_needSpellLog = (m_spellInfo->Attributes & (SPELL_ATTR_DO_NOT_LOG | SPELL_ATTR_DO_NOT_DISPLAY)) == 0;
540 
541  m_travellingStart = UINT32_MAX;
542 
543  m_targetlessMask = 0;
544 
545  m_overrideSpeed = false;
546 
547  m_ignoreRoot = IsIgnoreRootSpell(m_spellInfo);
548  m_ignoreOwnerLevel = false;
549 
550  if (m_caster)
551  {
552  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_ORIGINATE_FROM_CONTROLLER))
553  {
554  if (Player* controllingPlayer = const_cast<Player*>(m_caster->GetControllingPlayer()))
555  {
556  m_caster = controllingPlayer;
557  m_trueCaster = controllingPlayer;
558  }
559  }
560  }
561 
562  OnInit();
563 }
564 
565 Spell::~Spell()
566 {
567  if (m_CastItem)
568  m_CastItem->SetUsedInSpell(false);
569 }
570 
571 template<typename T>
572 WorldObject* Spell::FindCorpseUsing()
573 {
574  // non-standard target selection
575  SpellRangeEntry const* srange = sSpellRangeStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->rangeIndex);
576  float max_range = GetSpellMaxRange(srange);
577 
578  WorldObject* result = nullptr;
579 
580  T u_check(m_caster, max_range);
581  MaNGOS::WorldObjectSearcher<T> searcher(result, u_check);
582 
583  Cell::VisitGridObjects(m_caster, searcher, max_range);
584 
585  if (!result)
586  Cell::VisitWorldObjects(m_caster, searcher, max_range);
587 
588  return result;
589 }
590 
591 void Spell::FillTargetMap()
592 {
593  TempTargetingData targetingData;
594  uint8 effToIndex[MAX_EFFECT_INDEX] = {0, 1, 2}; // Helper array, to link to another tmpUnitList, if the targets for both effects match
595 
596  if (m_trueCaster->IsUnit())
597  {
598  auto const& mod = m_caster->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_MAX_AFFECTED_TARGETS);
599  for (Aura* aura : mod)
600  {
601  if (!aura->isAffectedOnSpell(m_spellInfo))
602  continue;
603  m_affectedTargetCount += aura->GetModifier()->m_amount;
604  }
605  }
606 
607  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
608  {
609  // not call for empty effect.
610  // Also some spells use not used effect targets for store targets for dummy effect in triggered spells
611  if (m_spellInfo->Effect[i] == SPELL_EFFECT_NONE)
612  continue;
613 
614  auto& data = SpellTargetMgr::GetSpellTargetingData(m_spellInfo->Id);
615  SpellTargetImplicitType effectTargetType = data.implicitType[i]; // prefilled data on load
616  auto& targetMask = data.targetMask[i];
617  auto& ignoredTargets = data.ignoredTargets[i];
618  auto& filterScheme = m_filteringScheme[i];
619  targetingData.chainTargetCount[i] = m_chainTargetCount[i];
620 
621  if (effectTargetType == TARGET_TYPE_SPECIAL_UNIT) // area auras need custom handling
622  {
623  uint32 targetA = m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[i];
624  uint32 targetB = m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetB[i];
625  bool hadTarget = false;
626  // need to pick a single unit target if existant and use it for area aura owner
627  if (targetA && !ignoredTargets.first)
628  {
629  if (SpellTargetInfoTable[targetA].type == TARGET_TYPE_UNIT && SpellTargetInfoTable[targetA].enumerator == TARGET_ENUMERATOR_SINGLE)
630  hadTarget = true;
631  SetTargetMap(SpellEffectIndex(i), targetA, false, targetingData);
632  }
633  if (targetB && !ignoredTargets.second)
634  {
635  if (SpellTargetInfoTable[targetB].type == TARGET_TYPE_UNIT && SpellTargetInfoTable[targetB].enumerator == TARGET_ENUMERATOR_SINGLE)
636  hadTarget = true;
637  if (SpellTargetInfoTable[targetB].enumerator != TARGET_ENUMERATOR_AOE)
638  SetTargetMap(SpellEffectIndex(i), targetB, true, targetingData);
639  }
640  if (!hadTarget && m_caster) // if no single targeting available use caster as default
641  targetingData.data[i].tmpUnitList[false].push_back(m_caster);
642  }
643  else
644  {
645  uint32 targetA = m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[i];
646  uint32 targetB = m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetB[i];
647  if (targetA == TARGET_NONE && targetB == TARGET_NONE)
648  {
649  // if no targeting available, attempt to use entry mask
650  if (m_spellInfo->Targets && SpellTargetMgr::CanEffectBeFilledWithMask(m_spellInfo->Id, i, m_spellInfo->Targets))
651  FillFromTargetFlags(targetingData, SpellEffectIndex(i));
652  else if (uint32 defaultTarget = SpellEffectInfoTable[m_spellInfo->Effect[i]].defaultTarget) // else resort to default effect type if it exists
653  SetTargetMap(SpellEffectIndex(i), defaultTarget, false, targetingData);
654  }
655  else // normal case, use existing spell data
656  {
657  if (targetA && !ignoredTargets.first)
658  SetTargetMap(SpellEffectIndex(i), targetA, false, targetingData);
659  if (targetB && !ignoredTargets.second)
660  SetTargetMap(SpellEffectIndex(i), targetB, true, targetingData);
661  if (effectTargetType == TARGET_TYPE_UNIT_DEST) // special case - no unit target, but need to check for valid units
662  if (SpellTargetInfoTable[targetA].type != TARGET_TYPE_UNIT && SpellTargetInfoTable[targetB].type != TARGET_TYPE_UNIT) // no fill for unit out of targets
663  FillFromTargetFlags(targetingData, SpellEffectIndex(i)); // inefficient call, very rare, less code duplicity
664  if (effectTargetType == TARGET_TYPE_LOCATION_TRAJ && (m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION) == 0)
665  if (WorldObject* caster = GetCastingObject())
666  m_targets.setSource(caster->GetPositionX(), caster->GetPositionY(), caster->GetPositionZ());
667  }
668  }
669 
670  bool processedUnits = false; // TODO: Review area aura packet fills for area auras with AOE targets
671  bool processedGOs = false; // likely purpose - animations
672  switch (effectTargetType)
673  {
674  case TARGET_TYPE_NONE:
675  m_targetlessMask |= (1 << i);
676  break;
677  case TARGET_TYPE_LOCATION_DEST:
678  case TARGET_TYPE_SPECIAL_DEST:
679  case TARGET_TYPE_LOCATION_TRAJ:
680  OnDestTarget();
681  AddDestExecution(SpellEffectIndex(i));
682  if (effectTargetType == TARGET_TYPE_SPECIAL_DEST)
683  if (!FillUnitTargets(targetingData, data, i))
684  return;
685  break;
686  case TARGET_TYPE_CORPSE: // can be unit and corpse
687  if (!targetingData.data[i].tempCorpseList.empty())
688  {
689  CorpseList& corpseTargetList = targetingData.data[i].tempCorpseList;
690  uint8 effectMask = targetMask[0] | targetMask[1];
691  for (Corpse* corpse : corpseTargetList)
692  AddCorpseTarget(corpse, effectMask);
693  }
694  case TARGET_TYPE_UNIT:
695  case TARGET_TYPE_UNIT_DEST:
696  case TARGET_TYPE_PLAYER: // for now player handled here
697  case TARGET_TYPE_SPECIAL_UNIT:
698  if (effectTargetType == TARGET_TYPE_UNIT_DEST)
699  OnDestTarget();
700  processedUnits = true;
701  if (!FillUnitTargets(targetingData, data, i))
702  return;
703  break;
704  case TARGET_TYPE_LOCK:
705  case TARGET_TYPE_ITEM:
706  if (targetingData.data[i].tempItemList.size() > 0) // Item case
707  for (Item* item : targetingData.data[i].tempItemList)
708  AddItemTarget(item, targetMask[0]); // no spell in all of vanilla through wotlk has item target in B
709  if (effectTargetType == TARGET_TYPE_ITEM)
710  break;
711  // [[fallthrough]]
712  case TARGET_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT:
713  processedGOs = true;
714  for (uint8 rightTarget = 0; rightTarget < 2; ++rightTarget) // need to process target A and B separately due to effect masks
715  {
716  bool ignored = rightTarget ? ignoredTargets.second : ignoredTargets.first;
717  if (ignored)
718  continue;
719  GameObjectList& goTargetList = targetingData.data[i].tmpGOList[rightTarget];
720  uint8 effectMask = targetMask[rightTarget];
721  if (!goTargetList.empty()) // GO case
722  {
723  for (auto iter = goTargetList.begin(); iter != goTargetList.end();)
724  {
725  if (OnCheckTarget(*iter, SpellEffectIndex(i)))
726  ++iter;
727  else
728  iter = goTargetList.erase(iter);
729  }
730  if (m_affectedTargetCount && goTargetList.size() > m_affectedTargetCount)
731  {
732  // remove random units from the map
733  while (goTargetList.size() > m_affectedTargetCount)
734  {
735  uint32 poz = urand(0, goTargetList.size() - 1);
736  for (auto itr = goTargetList.begin(); itr != goTargetList.end(); ++itr, --poz)
737  {
738  if (!*itr) continue;
739 
740  if (!poz)
741  {
742  goTargetList.erase(itr);
743  break;
744  }
745  }
746  }
747  }
748  for (GameObject* go : goTargetList)
749  AddGOTarget(go, effectMask);
750  }
751  }
752  break;
753  default:
754  break;
755  }
756  }
757 
758  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_FAIL_ON_ALL_TARGETS_IMMUNE))
759  {
760  bool allImmune = true;
761  for (auto& ihit : m_UniqueTargetInfo)
762  {
763  if (ihit.missCondition != SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE && ihit.missCondition != SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE2)
764  {
765  allImmune = false;
766  break;
767  }
768  }
769 
770  if (allImmune)
771  {
772  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_IMMUNE); // guessed error
773  finish(false);
774  }
775  }
776 
777  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_REQUIRE_ALL_TARGETS))
778  {
779  for (auto& ihit : m_UniqueTargetInfo)
780  {
781  if (ihit.targetGUID == m_targets.getUnitTargetGuid() && ihit.missCondition != SPELL_MISS_NONE)
782  {
783  for (auto& ihit : m_UniqueTargetInfo)
784  {
785  ihit.effectHitMask = 0;
786  ihit.effectMask = 0;
787  }
788  return;
789  }
790  }
791  }
792 }
793 
794 bool Spell::FillUnitTargets(TempTargetingData& targetingData, SpellTargetingData& data, uint32 i)
795 {
796  auto& targetMask = data.targetMask[i];
797  auto& ignoredTargets = data.ignoredTargets[i];
798  auto& filterScheme = m_filteringScheme[i];
799  for (uint8 rightTarget = 0; rightTarget < 2; ++rightTarget) // need to process target A and B separately due to effect masks
800  {
801  bool ignored = rightTarget ? ignoredTargets.second : ignoredTargets.first;
802  if (ignored)
803  continue;
804  UnitList& unitTargetList = targetingData.data[i].tmpUnitList[rightTarget];
805  uint8 effectMask = targetMask[rightTarget];
806  SpellTargetFilterScheme scheme = filterScheme[rightTarget];
807  uint32 target = rightTarget ? m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetB[i] : m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[i];
808  SpellTargetImplicitType type = SpellTargetInfoTable[target].type;
809  if (!unitTargetList.empty()) // Unit case
810  {
811  for (auto itr = unitTargetList.begin(); itr != unitTargetList.end();)
812  {
813  if (!CheckTarget(*itr, SpellEffectIndex(i), bool(rightTarget), CheckException(targetingData.magnet)))
814  itr = unitTargetList.erase(itr);
815  else
816  ++itr;
817  }
818 
819  // Special target filter before adding targets to list
820  FilterTargetMap(unitTargetList, scheme, targetingData.chainTargetCount[i]);
821 
822  if (m_trueCaster->IsPlayer())
823  {
824  Player* me = static_cast<Player*>(m_trueCaster);
825  for (auto itr = unitTargetList.begin(); itr != unitTargetList.end(); ++itr)
826  {
827  Player* targetOwner = (*itr)->GetBeneficiaryPlayer();
828  if (targetOwner && targetOwner != me && targetOwner->IsPvP() && !me->IsInDuelWith(targetOwner))
829  {
830  me->UpdatePvP(true);
831  me->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_PVP_ACTIVE_CANCELS);
832  break;
833  }
834  }
835  }
836  }
837 
838  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_REQUIRE_ALL_TARGETS) &&
839  (type == TARGET_TYPE_UNIT || type == TARGET_TYPE_PLAYER))
840  {
841  // spells which should only be cast if a target was found
842  if (unitTargetList.size() <= 0)
843  {
844  SendCastResult(m_spellInfo->Id == 51690 ? SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE : SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS);
845  finish(false);
846  return false;
847  }
848  }
849 
850  for (Unit* unit : unitTargetList)
851  AddUnitTarget(unit, effectMask);
852  }
853 
854  return true;
855 }
856 
857 void Spell::prepareDataForTriggerSystem()
858 {
859  //==========================================================================================
860  // Now fill data for trigger system, need know:
861  // an spell trigger another or not ( m_canTrigger )
862  // Create base triggers flags for Attacker and Victim ( m_procAttacker and m_procVictim)
863  //==========================================================================================
864  // Fill flag can spell trigger or not
865  // TODO: possible exist spell attribute for this
866  m_canTrigger = true;
867 
868  if ((m_CastItem && m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags == nullptr) || m_doNotProc)
869  m_canTrigger = false; // Do not trigger from item cast spell
870 
871  // some negative spells have positive effects to another or same targets
872  // avoid triggering negative hit for only positive targets
873  m_negativeEffectMask = 0x0;
874  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
875  if (!IsPositiveEffect(m_spellInfo, SpellEffectIndex(i)))
876  m_negativeEffectMask |= (1 << i);
877 }
878 
879 void Spell::PrepareMasksForProcSystem(uint8 effectMask, uint32& procAttacker, uint32& procVictim, WorldObject* caster, WorldObject* target)
880 {
881  // Get data for type of attack and fill base info for trigger
882  switch (m_spellInfo->DmgClass)
883  {
884  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE:
885  procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DEAL_MELEE_ABILITY;
886  if (m_attackType == BASE_ATTACK)
887  procAttacker |= PROC_FLAG_MAIN_HAND_WEAPON_SWING;
888  if (m_attackType == OFF_ATTACK)
889  procAttacker |= PROC_FLAG_OFF_HAND_WEAPON_SWING;
890  procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKE_MELEE_ABILITY;
891  break;
892  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED:
893  // Auto attack
894  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_AUTO_REPEAT))
895  {
896  procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DEAL_RANGED_ATTACK;
897  procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKE_RANGED_ATTACK;
898  }
899  else // Ranged spell attack
900  {
901  procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DEAL_RANGED_ABILITY;
902  procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKE_RANGED_ABILITY;
903  }
904  break;
905  default:
906  if (IsPositiveEffectMask(m_spellInfo, effectMask, caster, target)) // Check for positive spell
907  {
908  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_IS_ABILITY))
909  {
910  procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DEAL_HELPFUL_ABILITY;
911  procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKE_HELPFUL_ABILITY;
912  }
913  else
914  {
915  procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DEAL_HELPFUL_SPELL;
916  procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKE_HELPFUL_SPELL;
917  }
918  }
919  else if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_AUTO_REPEAT)) // Wands auto attack
920  {
921  procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DEAL_RANGED_ATTACK;
922  procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKE_RANGED_ATTACK;
923  }
924  else // Negative spell
925  {
926  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_IS_ABILITY))
927  {
928  procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DEAL_HARMFUL_ABILITY;
929  procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKE_HARMFUL_ABILITY;
930  }
931  else
932  {
933  procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DEAL_HARMFUL_SPELL;
934  procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKE_HARMFUL_SPELL;
935  }
936  }
937  break;
938  }
939 
940  // Hunter traps spells (for Entrapment trigger)
941  // Gives your Immolation Trap, Frost Trap, Explosive Trap, and Snake Trap ....
942  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER && m_spellInfo->IsFitToFamilyMask(uint64(0x000020000000001C), uint32(0x00040000)))
943  procAttacker |= PROC_FLAG_ON_TRAP_ACTIVATION;
944 
945  if (IsNextMeleeSwingSpell(m_spellInfo))
946  {
947  procAttacker |= PROC_FLAG_DEAL_MELEE_SWING;
948  procVictim |= PROC_FLAG_TAKE_MELEE_SWING;
949  }
950 
951  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_TREAT_AS_PERIODIC))
952  {
953  procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DEAL_HARMFUL_PERIODIC;
954  procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKE_HARMFUL_PERIODIC;
955  }
956 
957  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_SUPPRESS_CASTER_PROCS))
958  procAttacker = 0;
959 
960  // in wotlk SPELL_ATTR_EX3_SUPPRESS_TARGET_PROCS must be done in proc system due to SPELL_ATTR_EX7_CAN_PROC_FROM_SUPPRESSED_TARGET_PROCS
961  //if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_SUPPRESS_TARGET_PROCS))
962  // procVictim = 0;
963 }
964 
965 void Spell::CleanupTargetList()
966 {
967  m_UniqueTargetInfo.clear();
968  m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.clear();
969  m_UniqueItemInfo.clear();
970  m_delayMoment = 0;
971 }
972 
973 void Spell::AddUnitTarget(Unit* target, uint8 effectMask, CheckException exception)
974 {
975  if (m_trueCaster != target)
976  m_targets.m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_UNIT; // all spells with unit target must have this flag
977 
978  effectMask &= (~m_partialApplicationMask); // remove partially immuned out effects
979 
980  uint8 executionlessMask = 0;
981  auto& data = SpellTargetMgr::GetSpellTargetingData(m_spellInfo->Id);
982  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
983  if (data.implicitType[i] == TARGET_TYPE_SPECIAL_DEST)
984  executionlessMask |= (1 << i);
985 
986  // Check for effect immune skip if immuned
987  uint8 notImmunedMask = 0;
988  for (uint8 effIndex = 0; effIndex < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++effIndex)
989  if ((effectMask & (1 << effIndex)) != 0)
990  if (!target->IsImmuneToSpellEffect(m_spellInfo, SpellEffectIndex(effIndex), target == m_trueCaster))
991  notImmunedMask |= (1 << effIndex);
992 
993  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX4_NO_PARTIAL_IMMUNITY) && notImmunedMask != effectMask)
994  notImmunedMask = 0; // if one effect immunes out, whole target immunes out
995 
996  ObjectGuid targetGUID = target->GetObjectGuid();
997 
998  // Lookup target in already in list
999  for (auto& ihit : m_UniqueTargetInfo)
1000  {
1001  if (targetGUID == ihit.targetGUID) // Found in list
1002  {
1003  ihit.effectMask |= (effectMask &~ executionlessMask);
1004  ihit.effectHitMask |= (notImmunedMask &~ executionlessMask);
1005  return;
1006  }
1007  }
1008 
1009  // This is new target calculate data for him
1010 
1011  // Get spell hit result on target
1012  TargetInfo targetInfo;
1013  targetInfo.targetGUID = targetGUID; // Store target GUID
1014  targetInfo.effectHitMask = exception != EXCEPTION_MAGNET ? notImmunedMask : effectMask; // Store not immuned effects
1015  targetInfo.effectMask = effectMask; // Store index of effect
1016  targetInfo.effectMaskProcessed = 0;
1017  targetInfo.processed = false; // Effects not applied on target
1018  targetInfo.magnet = (exception == EXCEPTION_MAGNET);
1019  targetInfo.procReflect = false;
1020  targetInfo.isCrit = false;
1021  targetInfo.heartbeatResistChance = 0;
1022  targetInfo.effectDuration = CalculateSpellDuration(m_spellInfo, m_caster, target, m_auraScript);
1023  targetInfo.diminishDuration = targetInfo.effectDuration;
1024  targetInfo.diminishLevel = DIMINISHING_LEVEL_1;
1025  targetInfo.diminishGroup = DIMINISHING_NONE;
1026  targetInfo.executionless = false;
1027  targetInfo.timeDelay = 0;
1028 
1029  // Calculate hit result
1030  targetInfo.missCondition = m_ignoreHitResult ? SPELL_MISS_NONE : Unit::SpellHitResult(m_trueCaster, target, m_spellInfo, targetInfo.effectMask, m_reflectable, false, &targetInfo.heartbeatResistChance);
1031 
1032  if ((executionlessMask & targetInfo.effectMask) != 0)
1033  {
1034  targetInfo.effectMask &= ~executionlessMask;
1035  targetInfo.effectHitMask &= ~executionlessMask;
1036  targetInfo.executionless = true;
1037  }
1038 
1039  // spell fly from visual cast object
1040  WorldObject* affectiveObject = GetAffectiveCasterObject();
1041 
1042  // Spell have speed (possible inherited from triggering spell) - need calculate incoming time
1043  float baseSpeed = GetSpellSpeed();
1044  if (baseSpeed > 0.0f && affectiveObject && target != affectiveObject)
1045  {
1046  WorldObject const* missileSource = affectiveObject;
1047 
1048  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX4_BOUNCY_CHAIN_MISSILES))
1049  {
1050  auto previousTargetItr = std::find_if(m_UniqueTargetInfo.rbegin(), m_UniqueTargetInfo.rend(), [effectMask](TargetInfo const& target)
1051  {
1052  return (target.effectMask & effectMask) != 0;
1053  });
1054  if (previousTargetItr != std::rend(m_UniqueTargetInfo))
1055  {
1056  if (WorldObject* previousTarget = m_caster->GetMap()->GetWorldObject(previousTargetItr->targetGUID))
1057  missileSource = previousTarget;
1058 
1059  targetInfo.timeDelay += previousTargetItr->timeDelay;
1060  }
1061  }
1062 
1063  // calculate spell incoming interval
1064  float dist = missileSource->GetDistance(target->GetPositionX(), target->GetPositionY(), target->GetPositionZ(), DIST_CALC_NONE);
1065  dist = sqrt(dist); // default distance calculation is raw, apply sqrt before the next step
1066 
1067  float speed;
1068  if (m_targets.getSpeed() > 0.0f)
1069  speed = m_targets.getSpeed() * cos(m_targets.getElevation());
1070  else
1071  {
1072  speed = baseSpeed;
1073 
1074  if (dist < 5.0f)
1075  dist = 5.0f;
1076  }
1077  targetInfo.timeDelay += (uint64)floor(dist / speed * 1000.0f);
1078 
1079  // Calculate minimum incoming time
1080  if (m_delayMoment == 0 || m_delayMoment > targetInfo.timeDelay)
1081  m_delayMoment = targetInfo.timeDelay;
1082  }
1083  else
1084  targetInfo.timeDelay = uint64(0);
1085 
1086  // If target reflect spell back to caster
1087  if (targetInfo.missCondition == SPELL_MISS_REFLECT)
1088  {
1089  // Objects vs units case: traps and similar
1090  // TBC+: Reflect simply negates the spell
1091  if (!m_originalCasterGUID.IsUnit())
1092  {
1093  Unit::ProcDamageAndSpell(ProcSystemArguments(nullptr, target, PROC_FLAG_NONE, PROC_FLAG_TAKE_HARMFUL_SPELL, PROC_EX_REFLECT, 1, BASE_ATTACK, m_spellInfo));
1094  targetInfo.reflectResult = SPELL_MISS_REFLECT;
1095  }
1096  else
1097  {
1098  // need to recheck reflect immuned effects
1099  notImmunedMask = 0;
1100  for (uint8 effIndex = 0; effIndex < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++effIndex)
1101  if ((effectMask & (1 << effIndex)) != 0)
1102  if (!target->IsImmuneToSpellEffect(m_spellInfo, SpellEffectIndex(effIndex), target == m_trueCaster))
1103  notImmunedMask |= (1 << effIndex);
1104 
1105  targetInfo.effectHitMask = notImmunedMask;
1106  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX7_REFLECTION_ONLY_DEFENDS))
1107  targetInfo.reflectResult = SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE;
1108  // Calculate reflected spell result on caster
1109  else if (m_caster)
1110  targetInfo.reflectResult = Unit::SpellHitResult(m_caster, m_caster, m_spellInfo, targetInfo.effectMask, m_reflectable, true, &targetInfo.heartbeatResistChance);
1111  // Caster reflects back spell which was already reflected by victim
1112  if (targetInfo.reflectResult == SPELL_MISS_REFLECT || !m_caster)
1113  // Full circle: it's impossible to reflect further, "Immune" shows up
1114  targetInfo.reflectResult = SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE;
1115 
1116  // Store time interval so we know how fast to return it back
1117  targetInfo.initialDelay = targetInfo.timeDelay;
1118  targetInfo.procReflect = true;
1119  if (targetInfo.timeDelay == 0) // if no time delay, proc reflect procs immediately
1120  ProcReflectProcs(targetInfo);
1121  }
1122  m_spellFlags |= SPELL_FLAG_REFLECTED;
1123  }
1124  else
1125  targetInfo.reflectResult = SPELL_MISS_NONE;
1126 
1127  // only check DR for units and unit owned GOs
1128  if (Unit* realCaster = GetAffectiveCasterOrOwner())
1129  {
1130  bool isReflected = targetInfo.missCondition == SPELL_MISS_REFLECT && targetInfo.reflectResult == SPELL_MISS_NONE;
1131  Unit* targetForDiminish = isReflected ? m_caster : target;
1132  if (IsAuraApplyEffects(m_spellInfo, SpellEffectIndexMask(targetInfo.effectHitMask)))
1133  targetInfo.effectDuration = targetForDiminish->CalculateAuraDuration(m_spellInfo, effectMask, targetInfo.effectDuration, realCaster);
1134  if ((targetInfo.missCondition == SPELL_MISS_NONE || isReflected) && CanSpellDiminish())
1135  {
1136  targetInfo.diminishGroup = GetDiminishingReturnsGroupForSpell(m_spellInfo, m_triggeredByAuraSpell != nullptr || (m_IsTriggeredSpell && m_CastItem));
1137  targetInfo.diminishLevel = targetForDiminish->GetDiminishing(targetInfo.diminishGroup);
1138 
1139  if (targetInfo.effectDuration > 0)
1140  {
1141  int32 duration = targetInfo.effectDuration;
1142  targetForDiminish->ApplyDiminishingToDuration(targetInfo.diminishGroup, duration, realCaster, targetInfo.diminishLevel, isReflected, m_spellInfo, m_auraScript);
1143  targetInfo.diminishDuration = duration;
1144  if (targetInfo.diminishDuration == 0 && targetInfo.diminishLevel == DIMINISHING_LEVEL_IMMUNE)
1145  targetInfo.effectHitMask &= ~GetAuraEffectMask(m_spellInfo);
1146  }
1147  }
1148  }
1149 
1150  // Add target to list
1151  m_UniqueTargetInfo.push_back(targetInfo);
1152 }
1153 
1154 void Spell::AddGOTarget(GameObject* target, uint8 effectMask)
1155 {
1156  m_targets.m_targetMask |= TARGET_FLAG_GAMEOBJECT; // all spells with GO target must have this flag TODO: do this based on target type
1157 
1158  ObjectGuid targetGUID = target->GetObjectGuid();
1159 
1160  // Lookup target in already in list
1161  for (auto& ihit : m_UniqueGOTargetInfo)
1162  {
1163  if (targetGUID == ihit.targetGUID) // Found in list
1164  {
1165  ihit.effectMask |= effectMask; // Add only effect mask
1166  return;
1167  }
1168  }
1169 
1170  // This is new target calculate data for him
1171 
1172  GOTargetInfo targetInfo;
1173  targetInfo.targetGUID = targetGUID;
1174  targetInfo.effectMask = effectMask;
1175  targetInfo.processed = false; // Effects not apply on target
1176 
1177  // spell fly from visual cast object
1178  WorldObject* affectiveObject = GetAffectiveCasterObject();
1179 
1180  // Spell can have speed - need calculate incoming time
1181  float baseSpeed = GetSpellSpeed();
1182  if (baseSpeed > 0.0f && affectiveObject && target != affectiveObject)
1183  {
1184  // calculate spell incoming interval
1185  float dist = affectiveObject->GetDistance(target->GetPositionX(), target->GetPositionY(), target->GetPositionZ(), DIST_CALC_NONE);
1186  dist = sqrt(dist); // default distance calculation is raw, apply sqrt before the next step
1187  float speed;
1188  if (m_targets.getSpeed() > 0.0f)
1189  speed = m_targets.getSpeed() * cos(m_targets.getElevation());
1190  else
1191  {
1192  speed = baseSpeed;
1193 
1194  if (dist < 5.0f)
1195  dist = 5.0f;
1196  }
1197  targetInfo.timeDelay = (uint64)floor(dist / speed * 1000.0f);
1198  if (m_delayMoment == 0 || m_delayMoment > targetInfo.timeDelay)
1199  m_delayMoment = targetInfo.timeDelay;
1200  }
1201  else
1202  targetInfo.timeDelay = uint64(0);
1203 
1204  // Add target to list
1205  m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.push_back(targetInfo);
1206 }
1207 
1208 void Spell::AddCorpseTarget(Corpse* target, uint8 effectMask)
1209 {
1210  m_targets.m_targetMask |= m_spellInfo->Targets;
1211 
1212  // Lookup target in already in list
1213  for (auto& ihit : m_uniqueCorpseTargetInfo)
1214  {
1215  if (target->GetObjectGuid() == ihit.corpseGUID) // Found in list
1216  {
1217  ihit.effectMask |= effectMask; // Add only effect mask
1218  return;
1219  }
1220  }
1221 
1222  CorpseTargetInfo info;
1223  info.corpseGUID = target->GetObjectGuid();
1224  info.effectMask = effectMask;
1225 
1226  m_uniqueCorpseTargetInfo.push_back(info);
1227 }
1228 
1229 void Spell::AddItemTarget(Item* item, uint8 effectMask)
1230 {
1231  // Lookup target in already in list
1232  for (auto& ihit : m_UniqueItemInfo)
1233  {
1234  if (item == ihit.item) // Found in list
1235  {
1236  ihit.effectMask |= effectMask; // Add only effect mask
1237  return;
1238  }
1239  }
1240 
1241  // This is new target add data
1242 
1243  ItemTargetInfo target;
1244  target.item = item;
1245  target.effectMask = effectMask;
1246  m_UniqueItemInfo.push_back(target);
1247 }
1248 
1249 void Spell::AddDestExecution(SpellEffectIndex effIndex)
1250 {
1251  if (m_destTargetInfo.effectMask == 0)
1252  {
1253  m_destTargetInfo.timeDelay = CalculateDelayMomentForDst();
1254  if (GetSpellSpeed() > 0.f)
1255  if (m_delayMoment == 0 || m_delayMoment > m_destTargetInfo.timeDelay)
1256  m_delayMoment = m_destTargetInfo.timeDelay;
1257  }
1258  uint32 effectMask = (1 << effIndex);
1259 
1260  effectMask &= (~m_partialApplicationMask);
1261 
1262  m_destTargetInfo.effectMask |= effectMask;
1263 }
1264 
1265 uint64 Spell::CalculateDelayMomentForDst() const
1266 {
1267  if (m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
1268  {
1269  Position dest = m_targets.getDestination();
1270  if (m_targets.getSpeed() > 0.0f)
1271  {
1272  Position src = m_targets.getSource();
1273  float speed = m_targets.getSpeed() * cos(m_targets.getElevation());
1274  if (speed > 0.0f)
1275  return (uint64)floor(sqrt(src.GetDistance2d(dest)) / speed * 1000.0f);
1276  }
1277  else if (m_spellInfo->speed > 0.0f)
1278  {
1279  WorldObject* affectiveObject = GetAffectiveCasterObject();
1280  Position src = affectiveObject->GetPosition();
1281  // We should not subtract caster size from dist calculation (fixes execution time desync with animation on client, eg. Malleable Goo cast by PP)
1282  float dist = src.GetDistance(dest);
1283  return (uint64)std::floor(sqrt(dist) / m_spellInfo->speed * 1000.0f);
1284  }
1285  }
1286 
1287  return 0;
1288 }
1289 
1290 void Spell::RecalculateDelayMomentForDest()
1291 {
1292  m_delayMoment = CalculateDelayMomentForDst();
1293  m_trueCaster->m_events.ModifyEventTime(m_spellEvent, GetDelayStart() + m_delayMoment);
1294 }
1295 
1296 void Spell::DoAllEffectOnTarget(TargetInfo* target)
1297 {
1298  if (target->processed || target->effectMask == 0) // Check target
1299  return;
1300  target->processed = true; // Target checked in apply effects procedure
1301 
1302  // Get mask of effects for target
1303  uint32 effectMask = target->effectHitMask &~ target->effectMaskProcessed;
1304 
1305  Unit* unit = m_trueCaster->GetObjectGuid() == target->targetGUID ? m_caster : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_trueCaster, target->targetGUID);
1306  if (!unit)
1307  return;
1308 
1309  // Get original caster (if exist) and calculate damage/healing from him data
1310  Unit* affectiveCaster = GetAffectiveCasterOrOwner();
1311  // FIXME: in case wild GO heal/damage spells will be used target bonuses
1312  WorldObject* caster = affectiveCaster ? affectiveCaster : m_trueCaster;
1313 
1314  SpellMissInfo missInfo = target->missCondition;
1315  // Need init unitTarget by default unit (can changed in code on reflect)
1316  // Or on missInfo!=SPELL_MISS_NONE unitTarget undefined (but need in trigger subsystem)
1317  unitTarget = unit;
1318  Unit* reflectTarget = nullptr;
1319 
1320  // Reset damage/healing counter
1321  ResetEffectDamageAndHeal();
1322 
1323  // Fill base trigger info
1324  uint32 procAttacker;
1325  uint32 procVictim;
1326  uint32 procEx = PROC_EX_NONE;
1327  PrepareMasksForProcSystem(target->effectMask, procAttacker, procVictim, caster, unitTarget);
1328  if (target->magnet)
1329  procEx |= PROC_EX_MAGNET;
1330 
1331  // drop proc flags in case target not affected negative effects in negative spell
1332  // for example caster bonus or animation,
1333  // except miss case where will assigned PROC_EX_* flags later
1334  if (((procAttacker | procVictim) & NEGATIVE_TRIGGER_MASK) &&
1335  !(target->effectHitMask & m_negativeEffectMask) && missInfo == SPELL_MISS_NONE)
1336  {
1337  procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_NONE;
1338  procVictim = PROC_FLAG_NONE;
1339  }
1340 
1341  m_damage = target->damage;
1342  m_healing = target->healing;
1343 
1344  if (missInfo == SPELL_MISS_NONE) // In case spell hit target, do all effect on that target
1345  DoSpellHitOnUnit(unit, effectMask, target);
1346  else if (missInfo != SPELL_MISS_EVADE)
1347  {
1348  if (missInfo == SPELL_MISS_REFLECT) // In case spell reflect from target, do all effect on caster (if hit)
1349  {
1350  if (target->reflectResult == SPELL_MISS_NONE) // If reflected spell hit caster -> do all effect on him
1351  {
1352  DoSpellHitOnUnit(m_caster, effectMask, target, true);
1353  reflectTarget = unit;
1354  unitTarget = m_caster;
1355  }
1356  }
1357 
1358  // Failed hostile spell hits count as attack made against target (if detected)
1359  if (affectiveCaster && affectiveCaster != unit)
1360  m_caster->CasterHitTargetWithSpell(affectiveCaster, unit, m_spellInfo, m_IsTriggeredSpell, false);
1361  }
1362 
1363  if (!unit->IsPlayer() && m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX7_CAN_CAUSE_INTERRUPT))
1364  m_caster->CastSpell(unit, SPELL_INTERRUPT_NONPLAYER, TRIGGERED_IGNORE_GCD | TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CURRENT_CASTED_SPELL);
1365 
1366  // All calculated do it!
1367  // Do healing and triggers
1368  if (m_healing && affectiveCaster) // does not support GO casts atm
1369  {
1370  uint32 addhealth = m_healing;
1371  if (target->isCrit)
1372  {
1373  procEx |= PROC_EX_CRITICAL_HIT;
1374  addhealth = affectiveCaster->CalculateCritAmount(nullptr, addhealth, m_spellInfo, true);
1375  }
1376  else
1377  procEx |= PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT;
1378 
1379  uint32 absorb = 0;
1380  unitTarget->CalculateHealAbsorb(addhealth, &absorb);
1381  addhealth -= absorb;
1382 
1383  m_healing = addhealth; // update value so that script handler has access
1384  OnHit(missInfo); // TODO: After spell damage calc is moved to proper handler - move this before the first if
1385 
1386  int32 gain = affectiveCaster->DealHeal(unitTarget, addhealth, m_spellInfo, target->isCrit, absorb);
1387 
1388  if (affectiveCaster)
1389  unitTarget->getHostileRefManager().threatAssist(affectiveCaster, float(gain) * 0.5f * sSpellMgr.GetSpellThreatMultiplier(m_spellInfo), m_spellInfo, false, m_IsTriggeredSpell);
1390 
1391  // Do triggers for unit (reflect triggers passed on hit phase for correct drop charge)
1392  if (m_canTrigger && missInfo != SPELL_MISS_REFLECT)
1393  Unit::ProcDamageAndSpell(ProcSystemArguments(affectiveCaster, unitTarget, affectiveCaster ? procAttacker : uint32(PROC_FLAG_NONE), procVictim, procEx, addhealth, m_attackType, m_spellInfo, this, gain, true));
1394  }
1395  // Do damage and triggers
1396  else if (m_damage)
1397  {
1398  // Fill base damage struct (unitTarget - is real spell target)
1399  SpellNonMeleeDamage spellDamageInfo(caster, unitTarget, m_spellInfo->Id, m_spellSchoolMask, this);
1400 
1401  spellDamageInfo.damage = m_damage;
1402  spellDamageInfo.HitInfo = target->HitInfo;
1403  if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_IGNORE_CASTER_MODIFIERS))
1404  {
1405  if (target->isCrit) // GOs cant crit
1406  {
1407  spellDamageInfo.HitInfo |= SPELL_HIT_TYPE_CRIT;
1408  spellDamageInfo.damage = affectiveCaster->CalculateCritAmount(unitTarget, spellDamageInfo.damage, m_spellInfo);
1409  }
1410 
1411  // damage mitigation
1412  if (spellDamageInfo.damage > 0)
1413  {
1414  // physical damage => armor
1415  if (m_spellSchoolMask & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL)
1416  spellDamageInfo.damage = Unit::CalcArmorReducedDamage(affectiveCaster ? affectiveCaster : m_trueCaster, unitTarget, spellDamageInfo.damage);
1417  }
1418  }
1419 
1420  unitTarget->CalculateAbsorbResistBlock(affectiveCaster, &spellDamageInfo, m_spellInfo);
1421 
1422  Unit::DealDamageMods(affectiveCaster, spellDamageInfo.target, spellDamageInfo.damage, &spellDamageInfo.absorb, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE, m_spellInfo);
1423 
1424  m_absorb = spellDamageInfo.absorb;
1425  m_damage = spellDamageInfo.damage; // update value so that script handler has access
1426  OnHit(missInfo); // TODO: After spell damage calc is moved to proper handler - move this before the first if
1427 
1428  // Send log damage message to client
1429  Unit::SendSpellNonMeleeDamageLog(&spellDamageInfo);
1430 
1431  procEx |= createProcExtendMask(&spellDamageInfo, missInfo);
1432  procVictim |= PROC_FLAG_TAKE_ANY_DAMAGE;
1433 
1434  if (reflectTarget)
1435  Unit::DealSpellDamage(affectiveCaster, &spellDamageInfo, true, m_resetLeash);
1436  else
1437  Unit::DealSpellDamage(affectiveCaster, &spellDamageInfo, true, m_resetLeash);
1438 
1439  // Do triggers for unit (reflect triggers passed on hit phase for correct drop charge)
1440  if (m_canTrigger && missInfo != SPELL_MISS_REFLECT)
1441  Unit::ProcDamageAndSpell(ProcSystemArguments(affectiveCaster, unitTarget, affectiveCaster ? procAttacker : uint32(PROC_FLAG_NONE), procVictim, procEx, spellDamageInfo.damage, m_attackType, m_spellInfo, this));
1442 
1443  // Haunt (NOTE: for avoid use additional field damage stored in dummy value (replace unused 100%)
1444  // apply before deal damage because aura can be removed at target kill
1445  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK && m_spellInfo->SpellIconID == 3172 &&
1446  (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0004000000000000)))
1447  if (Aura* dummy = unitTarget->GetDummyAura(m_spellInfo->Id))
1448  dummy->GetModifier()->m_amount = spellDamageInfo.damage;
1449  }
1450  // Passive spell hits/misses or active spells only misses (only triggers if proc flags set)
1451  else if (procAttacker || procVictim)
1452  {
1453  OnHit(missInfo); // TODO: After spell damage calc is moved to proper handler - move this before the first if
1454  // Fill base damage struct (unitTarget - is real spell target)
1455  SpellNonMeleeDamage damageInfo(caster, unitTarget, m_spellInfo->Id, m_spellSchoolMask);
1456  procEx = createProcExtendMask(&damageInfo, missInfo);
1457  // Do triggers for unit (reflect triggers passed on hit phase for correct drop charge)
1458  if (m_canTrigger && missInfo != SPELL_MISS_REFLECT)
1459  // traps need to be procced at trap triggerer
1460  Unit::ProcDamageAndSpell(ProcSystemArguments(affectiveCaster, procAttacker & PROC_FLAG_ON_TRAP_ACTIVATION ? m_targets.getUnitTarget() : unit, affectiveCaster ? procAttacker : uint32(PROC_FLAG_NONE), procVictim, procEx, 0, m_attackType, m_spellInfo, this));
1461  }
1462 
1463  OnAfterHit();
1464 
1465  if (unit->IsCreature())
1466  // cast at creature (or GO) quest objectives update at successful cast finished (+channel finished)
1467  // ignore pets or autorepeat/melee casts for speed (not exist quest for spells (hm... )
1468  if (affectiveCaster && !static_cast<Creature*>(unit)->IsPet() && !IsAutoRepeat() && !IsNextMeleeSwingSpell(m_spellInfo) && !IsChannelActive())
1469  if (Player* p = affectiveCaster->GetBeneficiaryPlayer())
1470  p->RewardPlayerAndGroupAtCast(unit, m_spellInfo->Id);
1471 
1472  // Call scripted function for AI if this spell is casted upon a creature
1473  if (unit->AI())
1474  unit->AI()->SpellHit(m_caster, m_spellInfo);
1475 
1476  // Call scripted function for AI if this spell is casted by a creature
1477  if (m_trueCaster->IsCreature() && static_cast<Creature*>(m_trueCaster)->AI())
1478  static_cast<Creature*>(m_trueCaster)->AI()->SpellHitTarget(unit, m_spellInfo, missInfo);
1479  if (affectiveCaster && affectiveCaster != m_caster && affectiveCaster->IsCreature() && static_cast<Creature*>(affectiveCaster)->AI())
1480  static_cast<Creature*>(affectiveCaster)->AI()->SpellHitTarget(unit, m_spellInfo, missInfo);
1481 
1482  if (m_spellAuraHolder && m_caster)
1483  {
1484  if (m_caster->IsSpellProccingHappening())
1485  m_caster->AddDelayedHolderDueToProc(m_spellAuraHolder);
1486  else
1487  m_spellAuraHolder->SetState(SPELLAURAHOLDER_STATE_READY);
1488  }
1489 }
1490 
1491 void Spell::DoSpellHitOnUnit(Unit* unit, uint32 effectMask, TargetInfo* target, bool isReflected)
1492 {
1493  if (!unit)
1494  return;
1495 
1496  const bool traveling = m_spellState == SPELL_STATE_TRAVELING;
1497 
1498  // Recheck immune (only for delayed spells)
1499  if (traveling && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_NO_IMMUNITIES))
1500  {
1501  uint8 notImmunedMask = 0;
1502  for (uint8 effIndex = 0; effIndex < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++effIndex)
1503  if ((target->effectHitMask & (1 << effIndex)) != 0)
1504  if (!unit->IsImmuneToSpellEffect(m_spellInfo, SpellEffectIndex(effIndex), unit == m_trueCaster))
1505  notImmunedMask |= (1 << effIndex);
1506  effectMask = notImmunedMask & ~target->effectMaskProcessed;
1507  if (!notImmunedMask ||
1508  unit->IsImmuneToDamage(GetSpellSchoolMask(m_spellInfo)) ||
1509  unit->IsImmuneToSpell(m_spellInfo, unit == m_trueCaster, effectMask, m_trueCaster))
1510  {
1511  Unit::SendSpellMiss(m_trueCaster, unit, m_spellInfo->Id, SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE);
1512 
1513  ResetEffectDamageAndHeal();
1514  return;
1515  }
1516  }
1517 
1518  if (unit->IsPlayer())
1519  {
1520  static_cast<Player*>(unit)->GetAchievementMgr().UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BE_SPELL_TARGET, m_spellInfo->Id);
1521  static_cast<Player*>(unit)->GetAchievementMgr().UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BE_SPELL_TARGET2, m_spellInfo->Id);
1522  }
1523 
1524  if (m_trueCaster->IsPlayer())
1525  static_cast<Player*>(m_trueCaster)->GetAchievementMgr().UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_CAST_SPELL2, m_spellInfo->Id, 0, unit);
1526 
1527  if (traveling && m_trueCaster != unit)
1528  {
1529  if (m_trueCaster->CanAttackSpell(unit, m_spellInfo, !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_IGNORE_AREA_EFFECT_PVP_CHECK)))
1530  {
1531  // for delayed spells ignore not visible explicit target, if caster is dead, nothing is visible for him
1532  if (unit == m_targets.getUnitTarget() && ((m_trueCaster->IsGameObject() && !unit->IsAlive()) || !unit->IsVisibleForOrDetect(m_caster, m_caster, false, false, true, true, m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_IGNORE_PHASE_SHIFT))))
1533  {
1534  ResetEffectDamageAndHeal();
1535  return;
1536  }
1537  }
1538  else
1539  {
1540  // for delayed spells ignore negative spells (after duel end) for friendly targets
1541  if (!IsPositiveSpell(m_spellInfo->Id, m_trueCaster, unit))
1542  {
1543  Unit::SendSpellMiss(m_trueCaster, unit, m_spellInfo->Id, SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE);
1544  ResetEffectDamageAndHeal();
1545  return;
1546  }
1547  }
1548  }
1549 
1550  // Apply additional spell effects to target
1551  CastPreCastSpells(unit);
1552 
1553  Unit* affectiveCaster = GetAffectiveCasterOrOwner();
1554  if (IsSpellAppliesAura(m_spellInfo, effectMask))
1555  {
1556  if (affectiveCaster)
1557  {
1558  if (traveling) // if travelling, need to recalculate diminishing level and duration
1559  {
1560  target->diminishLevel = unit->GetDiminishing(target->diminishGroup);
1561  if (target->effectDuration > 0)
1562  {
1563  int32 duration = target->effectDuration;
1564  unit->ApplyDiminishingToDuration(target->diminishGroup, duration, m_caster, target->diminishLevel, isReflected, m_spellInfo, m_auraScript);
1565  target->diminishDuration = duration;
1566  }
1567  }
1568 
1569  if (m_duration != target->diminishDuration && target->diminishDuration == 0 && target->diminishLevel > DIMINISHING_LEVEL_1 && !IsSpellWithNonAuraEffect(m_spellInfo))
1570  {
1571  Unit::SendSpellMiss(m_trueCaster, unit, m_spellInfo->Id, SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE);
1572  ResetEffectDamageAndHeal();
1573  return;
1574  }
1575 
1576  const bool pvp = (unit->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED) && affectiveCaster->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED));
1577  // Increase Diminishing on unit, actual durations are already calculated
1578  if (IsSubjectToDiminishingLevels(target->diminishGroup, pvp))
1579  unit->IncrDiminishing(target->diminishGroup, pvp);
1580  }
1581 
1582  // Only unit caster to be passed here
1583  m_spellAuraHolder = CreateSpellAuraHolder(m_spellInfo, unit, m_trueCaster, m_CastItem, m_triggeredBySpellInfo);
1584  m_spellAuraHolder->setDiminishGroup(target->diminishGroup);
1585  }
1586  else
1587  m_spellAuraHolder = nullptr;
1588 
1589  ExecuteEffects(unit, nullptr, nullptr, effectMask);
1590 
1591  if (affectiveCaster && affectiveCaster != unit && m_caster)
1592  Unit::CasterHitTargetWithSpell(affectiveCaster, unit, m_spellInfo, m_IsTriggeredSpell);
1593 
1594  // now apply all created auras
1595  if (m_spellAuraHolder)
1596  {
1597  // normally shouldn't happen
1598  if (!m_spellAuraHolder->IsEmptyHolder())
1599  {
1600  int32 duration = m_spellAuraHolder->GetAuraMaxDuration();
1601  int32 originalDuration = duration;
1602 
1603  if (duration > 0 && target->diminishGroup > DIMINISHING_NONE)
1604  {
1605  duration = target->diminishDuration;
1606  // Fully diminished
1607  if (duration == 0)
1608  {
1609  delete m_spellAuraHolder;
1610  m_spellAuraHolder = nullptr;
1611  return;
1612  }
1613  }
1614 
1615  if (duration != originalDuration)
1616  {
1617  m_spellAuraHolder->SetAuraMaxDuration(duration);
1618  m_spellAuraHolder->SetAuraDuration(duration);
1619  }
1620 
1621  if (originalDuration > 0 && target && target->heartbeatResistChance && !m_spellAuraHolder->IsPositive())
1622  {
1623  // TBC+: do not set heartbeat in pvp
1624  if (bool heartbeat = !(m_trueCaster->IsControlledByPlayer() && unit->IsPlayerControlled()))
1625  m_spellAuraHolder->SetHeartbeatResist(target->heartbeatResistChance, originalDuration, uint32(target->diminishLevel));
1626  }
1627 
1628  if (!unit->AddSpellAuraHolder(m_spellAuraHolder))
1629  {
1630  delete m_spellAuraHolder;
1631  m_spellAuraHolder = nullptr;
1632  }
1633  }
1634  else
1635  {
1636  delete m_spellAuraHolder;
1637  m_spellAuraHolder = nullptr;
1638  }
1639  }
1640 }
1641 
1642 void Spell::DoAllTargetlessEffects(bool dest)
1643 {
1644  uint32 procAttacker;
1645  uint32 procVictim;
1646  uint32 procEx = PROC_EX_NONE;
1647 
1648  uint32 effectMask;
1649  if (dest) // can have delay
1650  {
1651  effectMask = m_destTargetInfo.effectMask &~ m_destTargetInfo.effectMaskProcessed;
1652  m_destTargetInfo.effectMaskProcessed = m_destTargetInfo.effectMask;
1653  for (uint32 j = 0; j < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++j)
1654  {
1655  if ((effectMask & (1 << j)) != 0)
1656  HandleEffect(nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, SpellEffectIndex(j));
1657  }
1658  }
1659  else // always immediate
1660  {
1661  effectMask = m_targetlessMask;
1662  for (uint32 j = 0; j < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++j)
1663  {
1664  if ((effectMask & (1 << j)) != 0)
1665  HandleEffect(nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, SpellEffectIndex(j));
1666  }
1667 
1668  // dest effects that are immediate
1669  uint32 destMaskImmediate = m_destTargetInfo.effectMask;
1670  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
1671  if (!IsEffectHandledImmediatelySpellLaunch(m_spellInfo, SpellEffectIndex(i)))
1672  destMaskImmediate &= ~(destMaskImmediate & (1 << i));
1673 
1674  for (uint32 j = 0; j < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++j)
1675  {
1676  if ((destMaskImmediate & (1 << j)) != 0)
1677  HandleEffect(nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, SpellEffectIndex(j));
1678  }
1679  m_destTargetInfo.effectMaskProcessed = destMaskImmediate;
1680  }
1681 
1682  if (effectMask)
1683  {
1684  OnHit(SPELL_MISS_NONE);
1685 
1686  if (m_caster)
1687  {
1688  PrepareMasksForProcSystem(effectMask, procAttacker, procVictim, m_trueCaster, unitTarget);
1689  Unit::ProcDamageAndSpell(ProcSystemArguments(m_caster, procAttacker & PROC_FLAG_ON_TRAP_ACTIVATION ? m_targets.getUnitTarget() : nullptr, m_caster ? procAttacker : uint32(PROC_FLAG_NONE), procVictim, procEx, 0, m_attackType, m_spellInfo, this));
1690  }
1691  }
1692 }
1693 
1694 void Spell::DoAllEffectOnTarget(GOTargetInfo* target)
1695 {
1696  if (target->processed) // Check target
1697  return;
1698  target->processed = true; // Target checked in apply effects procedure
1699 
1700  uint32 effectMask = target->effectMask;
1701  if (!effectMask)
1702  return;
1703 
1704  GameObject* go = m_trueCaster->GetMap()->GetGameObject(target->targetGUID);
1705  if (!go)
1706  return;
1707 
1708  gameObjTarget = go; // redundant but for safety against future change for hook functionality
1709 
1710  ExecuteEffects(nullptr, nullptr, go, effectMask);
1711 
1712  OnHit(SPELL_MISS_NONE);
1713 
1714  // cast at creature (or GO) quest objectives update at successful cast finished (+channel finished)
1715  // ignore autorepeat/melee casts for speed (not exist quest for spells (hm... )
1716  if (!IsAutoRepeat() && !IsNextMeleeSwingSpell(m_spellInfo) && !IsChannelActive() && m_caster)
1717  {
1718  if (Player* p = m_caster->GetBeneficiaryPlayer())
1719  p->RewardPlayerAndGroupAtCast(go, m_spellInfo->Id);
1720  }
1721 }
1722 
1723 void Spell::DoAllEffectOnTarget(ItemTargetInfo* target)
1724 {
1725  uint32 effectMask = target->effectMask;
1726  if (!target->item || !effectMask)
1727  return;
1728 
1729  itemTarget = target->item; // redundant but for safety against future change for hook functionality
1730 
1731  ExecuteEffects(nullptr, target->item, nullptr, effectMask);
1732 
1733  OnHit(SPELL_MISS_NONE);
1734 }
1735 
1736 void Spell::DoAllEffectOnTarget(CorpseTargetInfo* target)
1737 {
1738  uint32 effectMask = target->effectMask;
1739  if (!target->corpseGUID || !effectMask)
1740  return;
1741 
1742  Corpse* corpse = ObjectAccessor::GetCorpseInMap(target->corpseGUID, m_trueCaster->GetMapId());
1743  if (!corpse)
1744  return;
1745 
1746  corpseTarget = corpse;
1747  ExecuteEffects(nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, effectMask);
1748 }
1749 
1750 void Spell::HandleImmediateEffectExecution(TargetInfo* target)
1751 {
1752  if (target->effectMask == 0)
1753  return;
1754 
1755  // Get mask of effects for target
1756  uint32 mask = target->effectHitMask;
1757 
1758  Unit* unit = m_trueCaster->GetObjectGuid() == target->targetGUID ? m_caster : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_trueCaster, target->targetGUID);
1759  if (!unit)
1760  return;
1761 
1762  // Get original caster (if exist) and calculate damage/healing from him data
1763  Unit* affectiveCaster = GetAffectiveCaster();
1764  // FIXME: in case wild GO heal/damage spells will be used target bonuses
1765  Unit* caster = affectiveCaster ? affectiveCaster : m_caster;
1766 
1767  SpellMissInfo missInfo = target->missCondition;
1768  // Need init unitTarget by default unit (can changed in code on reflect)
1769  // Or on missInfo!=SPELL_MISS_NONE unitTarget undefined (but need in trigger subsystem)
1770  unitTarget = unit;
1771 
1772  // Reset damage/healing counter
1773  m_damage = 0;
1774  m_absorb = 0;
1775  m_healing = 0; // healing maybe not needed at this point
1776 
1777  // keep damage amount for reflected spells
1778  if (missInfo == SPELL_MISS_NONE || (missInfo == SPELL_MISS_REFLECT && target->reflectResult == SPELL_MISS_NONE))
1779  {
1780  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
1781  if (!IsEffectHandledImmediatelySpellLaunch(m_spellInfo, SpellEffectIndex(i)))
1782  mask &= ~(mask & (1 << i));
1783  ExecuteEffects(unit, nullptr, nullptr, mask);
1784  }
1785 
1786  target->damage = m_damage;
1787  target->healing = m_healing;
1788  target->HitInfo = 0;
1789  target->effectMaskProcessed = mask;
1790  if (m_damage > 0 || m_healing > 0)
1791  target->isCrit = Unit::RollSpellCritOutcome(affectiveCaster, unit, m_spellSchoolMask, m_spellInfo);
1792 }
1793 
1794 bool Spell::CanSpellDiminish() const
1795 {
1796  return m_caster && m_caster->IsPlayerControlled() || IsCreatureDRSpell(m_spellInfo);
1797 }
1798 
1799 void Spell::InitializeDamageMultipliers()
1800 {
1801  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
1802  {
1803  if (m_spellInfo->Effect[i] == 0)
1804  continue;
1805 
1806  uint32 EffectChainTarget = m_spellInfo->EffectChainTarget[i];
1807  if (Unit* realCaster = GetAffectiveCaster())
1808  if (Player* modOwner = realCaster->GetSpellModOwner())
1809  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_JUMP_TARGETS, EffectChainTarget);
1810 
1811  m_damageMultipliers[i] = 1.0f;
1812  if ((m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[i] == TARGET_UNIT_ENEMY || m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[i] == TARGET_UNIT_FRIEND_CHAIN_HEAL) && (EffectChainTarget > 1))
1813  m_applyMultiplierMask |= (1 << i);
1814  }
1815 }
1816 
1817 bool Spell::IsAliveUnitPresentInTargetList()
1818 {
1819  // Not need check return true
1820  if (m_needAliveTargetMask == 0)
1821  return true;
1822 
1823  uint8 channelTargetEffectMask = m_needAliveTargetMask;
1824  uint8 channelAuraMask = 0;
1825  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
1826  if (m_spellInfo->Effect[i] == SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AURA)
1827  channelAuraMask |= 1 << i;
1828 
1829  channelAuraMask &= channelTargetEffectMask;
1830 
1831  for (TargetList::const_iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
1832  {
1833  if (ihit->missCondition == SPELL_MISS_NONE && (channelAuraMask & ihit->effectHitMask))
1834  {
1835  Unit* unit = m_trueCaster->GetObjectGuid() == ihit->targetGUID ? m_caster : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_trueCaster, ihit->targetGUID);
1836 
1837  if (!unit)
1838  continue;
1839 
1840  // either unit is alive and normal spell, or unit dead and deathonly-spell
1841  if (IsValidDeadOrAliveTarget(unit))
1842  channelAuraMask &= ~ihit->effectHitMask; // remove from need alive mask effect that have alive target
1843  }
1844  }
1845 
1846  // is all effects from m_needAliveTargetMask have alive targets
1847  return channelAuraMask == 0;
1848 }
1849 
1850 bool Spell::IsValidDeadOrAliveTarget(Unit const* target) const
1851 {
1852  if (target->IsAlive())
1853  return !IsDeathOnlySpell(m_spellInfo);
1854  if (IsAllowingDeadTarget(m_spellInfo))
1855  return true;
1856  return false;
1857 }
1858 
1859 // Helper for Chain Healing
1860 // Spell target first
1861 // Raidmates then descending by injury suffered (MaxHealth - Health)
1862 // Other players/mobs then descending by injury suffered (MaxHealth - Health)
1863 struct ChainHealingOrder
1864 {
1865  const Unit* MainTarget;
1866  ChainHealingOrder(Unit const* Target) : MainTarget(Target) {};
1867  // functor for operator ">"
1868  bool operator()(Unit const* _Left, Unit const* _Right) const
1869  {
1870  return (ChainHealingHash(_Left) < ChainHealingHash(_Right));
1871  }
1872  int32 ChainHealingHash(Unit const* Target) const
1873  {
1874  if (Target == MainTarget)
1875  return 0;
1876  if (Target->IsInGroup(MainTarget))
1877  {
1878  if (Target->GetHealth() == Target->GetMaxHealth())
1879  return 40000;
1880  return 20000 - Target->GetMaxHealth() + Target->GetHealth();
1881  }
1882  return 40000 - Target->GetMaxHealth() + Target->GetHealth();
1883  }
1884 };
1885 
1886 class ChainHealingFullHealth
1887 {
1888  public:
1889  const Unit* MainTarget;
1890  ChainHealingFullHealth(const Unit* Target) : MainTarget(Target) {};
1891 
1892  bool operator()(const Unit* Target)
1893  {
1894  return (Target != MainTarget && Target->GetHealth() == Target->GetMaxHealth());
1895  }
1896 };
1897 
1898 bool Spell::CheckAndAddMagnetTarget(Unit* target, SpellEffectIndex effIndex, bool targetB, TempTargetingData& data)
1899 {
1900  if (Unit* magnetTarget = m_caster->SelectMagnetTarget(target, this))
1901  {
1902  // Found. Push totem as target instead.
1903  m_targets.setUnitTarget(magnetTarget);
1904  data.data[effIndex].tmpUnitList[targetB].push_back(magnetTarget);
1905  data.magnet = true;
1906  return true;
1907  }
1908 
1909  return false;
1910 }
1911 
1912 void Spell::SetTargetMap(SpellEffectIndex effIndex, uint32 targetMode, bool targetB, TempTargetingData& targetingData)
1913 {
1914  TempTargetData& data = targetingData.data[effIndex];
1915  float radius;
1916  uint32 unMaxTargets = m_affectedTargetCount; // Get spell max affected targets
1917 
1918  GetSpellRangeAndRadius(effIndex, radius, targetB, targetingData.chainTargetCount[effIndex]);
1919 
1920  float cone = GetCone();
1921 
1922  UnitList& tempUnitList = data.tmpUnitList[targetB];
1923  GameObjectList& tempGOList = data.tmpGOList[targetB];
1924 
1925  switch (targetMode)
1926  {
1927  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_RANDOM_SIDE:
1928  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_RANDOM_SIDE:
1929  // special case for Fatal Attraction (BT, Mother Shahraz)
1930  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 40869)
1931  radius = 30.0f;
1932 
1933  // Get a random point in circle. Use sqrt(rand) to correct distribution when converting polar to Cartesian coordinates.
1934  radius *= sqrtf(rand_norm_f());
1935  // no 'break' expected since we use code in case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_RANDOM_CIRCUMFERENCE!!!
1936  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_RANDOM_CIRCUMFERENCE:
1937  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_RANDOM_CIRCUMFERENCE:
1938  {
1939  WorldObject* target;
1940  switch (targetMode)
1941  {
1942  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_RANDOM_SIDE:
1943  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_RANDOM_CIRCUMFERENCE:
1944  target = m_targets.getUnitTarget() ? m_targets.getUnitTarget() : m_trueCaster; break;
1945  default:
1946  target = m_trueCaster; break;
1947  }
1948  // Get a random point AT the circumference
1949  float angle = 2.0f * M_PI_F * rand_norm_f();
1950  Position pos = target->GetFirstRandomAngleCollisionPosition(radius, angle);
1951  m_targets.setDestination(pos.x, pos.y, pos.z);
1952  break;
1953  }
1954  case TARGET_LOCATION_RANDOM_CIRCUMFERENCE:
1955  case TARGET_LOCATION_RANDOM_SIDE:
1956  {
1957  if (radius > 0.0f) // Get a random point in the circle around current dest target
1958  {
1959  // Use sqrt(rand) to correct distribution when converting polar to Cartesian coordinates.
1960  radius *= sqrtf(rand_norm_f());
1961  float angle = 2.0f * M_PI_F * rand_norm_f();
1962  Position pos = m_targets.getDestination();
1963  m_trueCaster->MovePositionToFirstCollision(pos, radius, angle);
1964  m_targets.setDestination(pos.x, pos.y, pos.z);
1965  }
1966  break;
1967  }
1968  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_MINION_POSITION: // unknown how pet summon is different - maybe some formation support?
1969  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_FRONT_RIGHT:
1970  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_BACK_RIGHT:
1971  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_BACK_LEFT:
1972  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_FRONT_LEFT:
1973  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_FRONT:
1974  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_BACK:
1975  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_LEFT:
1976  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_RIGHT:
1977  {
1978  WorldObject* caster = m_trueCaster;
1979  float angle = m_trueCaster->GetOrientation();
1980  switch (targetMode)
1981  {
1982  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_FRONT_LEFT: angle += M_PI_F * 0.25f; break;
1983  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_BACK_LEFT: angle += M_PI_F * 0.75f; break;
1984  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_BACK_RIGHT: angle += M_PI_F * 1.25f; break;
1985  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_FRONT_RIGHT: angle += M_PI_F * 1.75f; break;
1986  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_FRONT: break;
1987  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_BACK: angle += M_PI_F; break;
1988  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_MINION_POSITION: caster = GetCastingObject(); // projected from original caster if necessary
1989  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_LEFT: angle += M_PI_F / 2; break;
1990  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_RIGHT: angle -= M_PI_F / 2; break;
1991  }
1992 
1993  Position pos;
1994  caster->GetFirstCollisionPosition(pos, radius, angle);
1995  m_targets.setDestination(pos.x, pos.y, pos.z);
1996  break;
1997  }
1998  case TARGET_LOCATION_CURRENT_REFERENCE:
1999  // Uses destination supplied to spell or fill caster position
2000  if ((m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION) == 0)
2001  {
2002  float x, y, z;
2003  m_trueCaster->GetPosition(x, y, z, m_trueCaster->GetTransport());
2004  m_targets.setDestination(x, y, z);
2005  }
2006  break;
2007  case TARGET_LOCATION_CHANNEL_TARGET_DEST:
2008  // if parent spell create dynamic object extract area from it
2009  if (WorldObject* channelObject = m_caster->GetChannelObject())
2010  m_targets.setDestination(channelObject->GetPositionX(), channelObject->GetPositionY(), channelObject->GetPositionZ());
2011  break;
2012  case TARGET_LOCATION_NORTH:
2013  case TARGET_LOCATION_SOUTH:
2014  case TARGET_LOCATION_EAST:
2015  case TARGET_LOCATION_WEST:
2016  case TARGET_LOCATION_NE:
2017  case TARGET_LOCATION_NW:
2018  case TARGET_LOCATION_SE:
2019  case TARGET_LOCATION_SW:
2020  {
2021  if (m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION) // takes current dest and offsets it
2022  {
2023  WorldObject* currentTarget = m_targets.getUnitTarget() ? m_targets.getUnitTarget() : m_trueCaster;
2024  float angle = currentTarget != m_trueCaster ? currentTarget->GetAngle(m_trueCaster) : m_trueCaster->GetOrientation();
2025 
2026  switch (targetMode)
2027  {
2028  case TARGET_LOCATION_NORTH: break;
2029  case TARGET_LOCATION_SOUTH: angle += M_PI_F; break;
2030  case TARGET_LOCATION_EAST: angle -= M_PI_F / 2; break;
2031  case TARGET_LOCATION_WEST: angle += M_PI_F / 2; break;
2032  case TARGET_LOCATION_NE: angle -= M_PI_F / 4; break;
2033  case TARGET_LOCATION_NW: angle += M_PI_F / 4; break;
2034  case TARGET_LOCATION_SE: angle -= 3 * M_PI_F / 4; break;
2035  case TARGET_LOCATION_SW: angle += 3 * M_PI_F / 4; break;
2036  }
2037 
2038  Position pos = m_targets.getDestination();
2039  currentTarget->MovePositionToFirstCollision(pos, radius, angle);
2040  m_targets.setDestination(pos.x, pos.y, pos.z);
2041  }
2042  break;
2043  }
2044  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_DEST:
2045  {
2046  if (!(m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION))
2047  if (WorldObject* caster = GetCastingObject())
2048  m_targets.setDestination(caster->GetPositionX(), caster->GetPositionY(), caster->GetPositionZ());
2049  break;
2050  }
2051  case TARGET_LOCATION_DATABASE:
2052  {
2053  if (SpellTargetPosition const* st = sSpellMgr.GetSpellTargetPosition(m_spellInfo->Id))
2054  {
2055  m_targets.setDestination(st->target_X, st->target_Y, st->target_Z);
2056  m_targets.m_destPos.o = st->target_Orientation;
2057  m_targets.m_mapId = st->target_mapId;
2058 
2059  // far-teleport spells are handled in SpellEffect, elsewise report an error about an unexpected map (spells are always locally)
2060  if (st->target_mapId != m_trueCaster->GetMapId() && m_spellInfo->Effect[effIndex] != SPELL_EFFECT_TELEPORT_UNITS && m_spellInfo->Effect[effIndex] != SPELL_EFFECT_BIND)
2061  sLog.outError("SPELL: wrong map (%u instead %u) target coordinates for spell ID %u", st->target_mapId, m_trueCaster->GetMapId(), m_spellInfo->Id);
2062  }
2063  else
2064  sLog.outError("SPELL: unknown target coordinates for spell ID %u", m_spellInfo->Id);
2065  break;
2066  }
2067  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_HOME_BIND:
2068  {
2069  if (m_trueCaster->IsPlayer())
2070  {
2071  float x, y, z;
2072  static_cast<Player*>(m_trueCaster)->GetHomebindLocation(x, y, z, m_targets.m_mapId);
2073  m_targets.setDestination(x, y, z);
2074  }
2075  break;
2076  }
2077  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_FRONT:
2078  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_BACK:
2079  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_RIGHT:
2080  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_LEFT:
2081  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_FRONT_RIGHT:
2082  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_BACK_RIGHT:
2083  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_BACK_LEFT:
2084  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_FRONT_LEFT:
2085  {
2086  Unit* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
2087  if (target)
2088  {
2089  float angle = target->GetOrientation();
2090 
2091  switch (targetMode)
2092  {
2093  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_FRONT: break;
2094  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_BACK: angle += M_PI_F; break;
2095  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_RIGHT: angle += -M_PI_F / 2; break;
2096  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_LEFT: angle += M_PI_F / 2; break;
2097  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_FRONT_RIGHT: angle += M_PI_F * 1.75f; break;
2098  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_BACK_RIGHT: angle += M_PI_F * 1.25f; break;
2099  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_BACK_LEFT: angle += M_PI_F * 0.75f; break;
2100  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_FRONT_LEFT: angle += M_PI_F * 0.25f; break;
2101  }
2102 
2103  Position pos;
2104  target->GetFirstCollisionPosition(pos, radius, angle);
2105  m_targets.setDestination(pos.x, pos.y, pos.z);
2106  }
2107  break;
2108  }
2109  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_FRONT_LEAP:
2110  {
2111  float dist = GetSpellRadius(sSpellRadiusStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->EffectRadiusIndex[effIndex]));
2112  const float IN_OR_UNDER_LIQUID_RANGE = 0.8f; // range to make player under liquid or on liquid surface from liquid level
2113 
2114  G3D::Vector3 prevPos, nextPos;
2115  float orientation = m_caster->GetOrientation();
2116 
2117  prevPos.x = m_caster->GetPositionX();
2118  prevPos.y = m_caster->GetPositionY();
2119  prevPos.z = m_caster->GetPositionZ();
2120 
2121  float groundZ = prevPos.z;
2122  bool isPrevInLiquid = false;
2123 
2124  // falling case
2125  if (!m_caster->GetMap()->GetHeightInRange(m_caster->GetPhaseMask(), prevPos.x, prevPos.y, groundZ, 3.0f) && m_caster->m_movementInfo.HasMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_FALLING))
2126  {
2127  nextPos.x = prevPos.x + dist * cos(orientation);
