2128  nextPos.y = prevPos.y + dist * sin(orientation);
2129  nextPos.z = prevPos.z - 2.0f; // little hack to avoid the impression to go up when teleporting instead of continue to fall. This value may need some tweak
2130 
2131  //
2132  GridMapLiquidData liquidData;
2133  if (m_caster->GetMap()->GetTerrain()->IsInWater(nextPos.x, nextPos.y, nextPos.z, &liquidData))
2134  {
2135  if (fabs(nextPos.z - liquidData.level) < 10.0f)
2136  nextPos.z = liquidData.level - IN_OR_UNDER_LIQUID_RANGE;
2137  }
2138  else
2139  {
2140  // fix z to ground if near of it
2141  m_caster->GetMap()->GetHeightInRange(m_caster->GetPhaseMask(), nextPos.x, nextPos.y, nextPos.z, 10.0f);
2142  }
2143 
2144  if (fabs(prevPos.z - nextPos.z) > 40.f) // dont move too high - magical constant - might need verification
2145  {
2146  nextPos.x = prevPos.x;
2147  nextPos.y = prevPos.y;
2148  nextPos.z = prevPos.z - 2.0f;
2149  }
2150  else // check any obstacle and fix coords
2151  m_caster->GetMap()->GetHitPosition(prevPos.x, prevPos.y, prevPos.z + 0.5f, nextPos.x, nextPos.y, nextPos.z, m_caster->GetPhaseMask(), -0.5f);
2152  }
2153  else
2154  {
2155  // fix origin position if player was jumping and near of the ground but not in ground
2156  if (fabs(prevPos.z - groundZ) > 0.5f)
2157  prevPos.z = groundZ;
2158 
2159  //check if in liquid
2160  isPrevInLiquid = m_caster->GetMap()->GetTerrain()->IsInWater(prevPos.x, prevPos.y, prevPos.z);
2161 
2162  const float step = 2.0f; // step length before next check slope/edge/water
2163  const float maxSlope = 50.0f; // 50(degree) max seem best value for walkable slope
2164  const float MAX_SLOPE_IN_RADIAN = maxSlope / 180.0f * M_PI_F;
2165  float nextZPointEstimation = 1.0f;
2166  float destx = prevPos.x + dist * cos(orientation);
2167  float desty = prevPos.y + dist * sin(orientation);
2168  const uint32 numChecks = ceil(fabs(dist / step));
2169  const float DELTA_X = (destx - prevPos.x) / numChecks;
2170  const float DELTA_Y = (desty - prevPos.y) / numChecks;
2171 
2172  for (uint32 i = 1; i < numChecks + 1; ++i)
2173  {
2174  // compute next point average position
2175  nextPos.x = prevPos.x + DELTA_X;
2176  nextPos.y = prevPos.y + DELTA_Y;
2177  nextPos.z = prevPos.z + nextZPointEstimation;
2178 
2179  bool isInLiquid = false;
2180  bool isInLiquidTested = false;
2181  bool isOnGround = false;
2182  GridMapLiquidData liquidData = {};
2183 
2184  // try fix height for next position
2185  if (!m_caster->GetMap()->GetHeightInRange(m_caster->GetPhaseMask(), nextPos.x, nextPos.y, nextPos.z))
2186  {
2187  // we cant so test if we are on water
2188  if (!m_caster->GetMap()->GetTerrain()->IsInWater(nextPos.x, nextPos.y, nextPos.z, &liquidData))
2189  {
2190  // not in water and cannot get correct height, maybe flying?
2191  //sLog.outString("Can't get height of point %u, point value %s", i, nextPos.toString().c_str());
2192  nextPos = prevPos;
2193  break;
2194  }
2195  isInLiquid = true;
2196  isInLiquidTested = true;
2197  }
2198  else
2199  isOnGround = true; // player is on ground
2200 
2201  if (isInLiquid || (!isInLiquidTested && m_caster->GetMap()->GetTerrain()->IsInWater(nextPos.x, nextPos.y, nextPos.z, &liquidData)))
2202  {
2203  if (!isPrevInLiquid && fabs(liquidData.level - prevPos.z) > 2.0f)
2204  {
2205  // on edge of water with difference a bit to high to continue
2206  //sLog.outString("Ground vs liquid edge detected!");
2207  nextPos = prevPos;
2208  break;
2209  }
2210 
2211  if ((liquidData.level - IN_OR_UNDER_LIQUID_RANGE) > nextPos.z)
2212  nextPos.z = prevPos.z; // we are under water so next z equal prev z
2213  else
2214  nextPos.z = liquidData.level - IN_OR_UNDER_LIQUID_RANGE; // we are on water surface, so next z equal liquid level
2215 
2216  isInLiquid = true;
2217 
2218  float ground = nextPos.z;
2219  if (m_caster->GetMap()->GetHeightInRange(m_caster->GetPhaseMask(), nextPos.x, nextPos.y, ground))
2220  {
2221  if (nextPos.z < ground)
2222  {
2223  nextPos.z = ground;
2224  isOnGround = true; // player is on ground of the water
2225  }
2226  }
2227  }
2228 
2229  //unitTarget->SummonCreature(VISUAL_WAYPOINT, nextPos.x, nextPos.y, nextPos.z, 0, TEMPSPAWN_TIMED_DESPAWN, 15000);
2230  float hitZ = nextPos.z + 1.5f;
2231  if (m_caster->GetMap()->GetHitPosition(prevPos.x, prevPos.y, prevPos.z + 1.5f, nextPos.x, nextPos.y, hitZ, m_caster->GetPhaseMask(), -1.0f))
2232  {
2233  //sLog.outString("Blink collision detected!");
2234  nextPos = prevPos;
2235  break;
2236  }
2237 
2238  if (isOnGround)
2239  {
2240  // project vector to get only positive value
2241  float ac = fabs(prevPos.z - nextPos.z);
2242 
2243  // compute slope (in radian)
2244  float slope = atan(ac / step);
2245 
2246  // check slope value
2247  if (slope > MAX_SLOPE_IN_RADIAN)
2248  {
2249  //sLog.outString("bad slope detected! %4.2f max %4.2f, ac(%4.2f)", slope * 180 / M_PI_F, maxSlope, ac);
2250  nextPos = prevPos;
2251  break;
2252  }
2253  //sLog.outString("slope is ok! %4.2f max %4.2f, ac(%4.2f)", slope * 180 / M_PI_F, maxSlope, ac);
2254  }
2255 
2256  //sLog.outString("point %u is ok, coords %s", i, nextPos.toString().c_str());
2257  nextZPointEstimation = (nextPos.z - prevPos.z) / 2.0f;
2258  isPrevInLiquid = isInLiquid;
2259  prevPos = nextPos;
2260  }
2261  }
2262  m_targets.setDestination(nextPos.x, nextPos.y, nextPos.z);
2263  break;
2264  }
2265  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_POSITION:
2266  {
2267  if (Unit* currentTarget = m_targets.getUnitTarget())
2268  m_targets.setDestination(currentTarget->GetPositionX(), currentTarget->GetPositionY(), currentTarget->GetPositionZ());
2269  break;
2270  }
2271  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_FISHING_SPOT:
2272  {
2273  float x, y, z;
2274  // special code for fishing bobber (TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_FISHING_SPOT), should not try to avoid objects
2275  // nor try to find ground level, but randomly vary in angle
2276  float min_dis = GetSpellMinRange(sSpellRangeStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->rangeIndex));
2277  float max_dis = GetSpellMaxRange(sSpellRangeStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->rangeIndex));
2278  SpellCastResult result = SPELL_CAST_OK;
2279  for (uint32 i = 0; i < 10; ++i)
2280  {
2281  float dis = rand_norm_f() * (max_dis - min_dis) + min_dis;
2282  // calculate angle variation for roughly equal dimensions of target area
2283  float max_angle = (max_dis - min_dis) / (max_dis + m_caster->GetObjectBoundingRadius());
2284  float angle_offset = max_angle * (rand_norm_f() - 0.5f);
2285  m_caster->GetNearPoint2d(x, y, dis + m_caster->GetObjectBoundingRadius(), m_caster->GetOrientation() + angle_offset);
2286 
2287  GridMapLiquidData liqData;
2288  if (!m_caster->GetTerrain()->IsInWater(x, y, m_caster->GetTerrain()->GetWaterLevel(x, y, m_caster->GetPositionZ()) - 1.0f, &liqData))
2289  {
2290  result = SPELL_FAILED_NOT_FISHABLE;
2291  continue;
2292  }
2293 
2294  z = liqData.level;
2295  // finally, check LoS
2296  if (!m_caster->IsWithinLOS(x, y, z + 1.f))
2297  {
2298  result = SPELL_FAILED_LINE_OF_SIGHT;
2299  continue;
2300  }
2301  }
2302  if (result != SPELL_CAST_OK)
2303  {
2304  SendCastResult(result);
2305  finish(false);
2306  return;
2307  }
2308 
2309  m_targets.setDestination(x, y, z);
2310  break;
2311  }
2312  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_TARGET_POSITION:
2313  {
2314  Unit* currentTarget = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
2315  if (currentTarget)
2316  m_targets.setDestination(currentTarget->GetPositionX(), currentTarget->GetPositionY(), currentTarget->GetPositionZ());
2317  break;
2318  }
2319  case TARGET_LOCATION_TRAJECTORY:
2320  {
2321  if (!(m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION))
2322  {
2323  SpellRangeEntry const* rEntry = sSpellRangeStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->rangeIndex);
2324  float minRange = GetSpellMinRange(rEntry);
2325  float maxRange = GetSpellMaxRange(rEntry);
2326  float dist = minRange + rand_norm_f() * (maxRange - minRange);
2327 
2328  float _target_x, _target_y, _target_z;
2329  m_trueCaster->GetClosePoint(_target_x, _target_y, _target_z, m_trueCaster->GetObjectBoundingRadius(), dist);
2330  m_targets.setDestination(_target_x, _target_y, _target_z);
2331  }
2332  break;
2333  }
2334  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER:
2335  tempUnitList.push_back(m_caster);
2336  break;
2337  case TARGET_UNIT_ENEMY_NEAR_CASTER:
2338  case TARGET_UNIT_FRIEND_NEAR_CASTER:
2339  case TARGET_UNIT_NEAR_CASTER:
2340  {
2341  m_targets.m_targetMask = 0;
2342  float max_range = radius + unMaxTargets * m_jumpRadius;
2343 
2344  UnitList tempTargetUnitMap;
2345 
2346  switch (targetMode)
2347  {
2348  case TARGET_UNIT_ENEMY_NEAR_CASTER:
2349  {
2350  FillAreaTargets(tempTargetUnitMap, max_range, 0.f, PUSH_SELF_CENTER, SPELL_TARGETS_CHAIN_ATTACKABLE);
2351  break;
2352  }
2353  case TARGET_UNIT_NEAR_CASTER: // TODO: Rename TARGET_UNIT_NEAR_CASTER to something better and find real difference with TARGET_UNIT_FRIEND_NEAR_CASTER.
2354  {
2355  FillAreaTargets(tempTargetUnitMap, max_range, cone, PUSH_SELF_CENTER, SPELL_TARGETS_ALL);
2356  break;
2357  }
2358  case TARGET_UNIT_FRIEND_NEAR_CASTER:
2359  {
2360  FillAreaTargets(tempTargetUnitMap, max_range, cone, PUSH_SELF_CENTER, SPELL_TARGETS_ASSISTABLE);
2361  break;
2362  }
2363  }
2364 
2365  if (tempTargetUnitMap.empty())
2366  break;
2367 
2368  SQLMultiStorage::SQLMSIteratorBounds<SpellTargetEntry> bounds = sSpellScriptTargetStorage.getBounds<SpellTargetEntry>(m_spellInfo->Id);
2369  if (bounds.first != bounds.second)
2370  CheckSpellScriptTargets(bounds, tempTargetUnitMap, tempUnitList, effIndex);
2371  else
2372  tempUnitList.splice(tempUnitList.end(), tempTargetUnitMap);
2373  break;
2374  }
2375  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PET:
2376  {
2377  if (Pet* tmpUnit = m_caster->GetPet())
2378  tempUnitList.push_back(tmpUnit);
2379  else if (Unit* charm = m_caster->GetCharm())
2380  tempUnitList.push_back(charm);
2381  break;
2382  }
2383  case TARGET_UNIT:
2384  {
2385  Unit* newUnitTarget = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
2386  if (!newUnitTarget)
2387  break;
2388 
2389  if (!m_trueCaster->CanAssistSpell(newUnitTarget, m_spellInfo))
2390  {
2391  if (CheckAndAddMagnetTarget(newUnitTarget, effIndex, targetB, targetingData))
2392  break;
2393  }
2394 
2395  tempUnitList.push_back(newUnitTarget);
2396 
2397  // More than one target
2398  if (targetingData.chainTargetCount[effIndex] > 1)
2399  {
2400  // Getting spell casting distance
2401  float minRadiusCaster = 0, maxRadiusTarget = 0;
2402  GetChainJumpRange(m_spellInfo, effIndex, minRadiusCaster, maxRadiusTarget);
2403 
2404  // Filling target map
2405  UnitList tempAoeList;
2406  {
2407  FillAreaTargets(tempAoeList, maxRadiusTarget, cone, m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_CHAIN_FROM_CASTER) ? PUSH_SELF_CENTER : PUSH_TARGET_CENTER, SPELL_TARGETS_ALL);
2408  tempAoeList.erase(std::remove(tempAoeList.begin(), tempAoeList.end(), newUnitTarget), tempAoeList.end());
2409  }
2410 
2411  tempUnitList.splice(tempUnitList.end(), tempAoeList);
2412  }
2413  break;
2414  }
2415  case TARGET_UNIT_ENEMY:
2416  {
2417  Unit* newUnitTarget = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
2418  if (!newUnitTarget)
2419  break;
2420 
2421  // Check if target have Grounding Totem Aura(Magnet target). Check for physical school inside included.
2422  if (CheckAndAddMagnetTarget(newUnitTarget, effIndex, targetB, targetingData))
2423  break;
2424 
2425  tempUnitList.push_back(newUnitTarget);
2426 
2427  // More than one target
2428  if (targetingData.chainTargetCount[effIndex] > 1)
2429  {
2430  WorldObject* originalCaster = GetAffectiveCasterObject();
2431  if (!originalCaster)
2432  break;
2433 
2434  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2435  {
2436  Player* me = (Player*)m_caster;
2437  Player* targetOwner = newUnitTarget->GetBeneficiaryPlayer();
2438  if (targetOwner && targetOwner != me && targetOwner->IsPvP() && !me->IsInDuelWith(targetOwner))
2439  {
2440  me->UpdatePvP(true);
2441  me->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_PVP_ACTIVE_CANCELS);
2442  }
2443  }
2444 
2445  // Getting spell casting distance
2446  float minRadiusCaster = 0, maxRadiusTarget = 0;
2447  GetChainJumpRange(m_spellInfo, effIndex, minRadiusCaster, maxRadiusTarget);
2448 
2449  // Filling target map
2450  UnitList tempAoeList;
2451  {
2452  SpellNotifyPushType pushType = PUSH_TARGET_CENTER;
2453  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_CHAIN_FROM_CASTER))
2454  pushType = PUSH_SELF_CENTER;
2455  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_MELEE_CHAIN_TARGETING))
2456  pushType = PUSH_CONE;
2457  FillAreaTargets(tempAoeList, maxRadiusTarget, cone, pushType, SPELL_TARGETS_CHAIN_ATTACKABLE);
2458  tempAoeList.erase(std::remove(tempAoeList.begin(), tempAoeList.end(), newUnitTarget), tempAoeList.end());
2459 
2460  for (auto itr = tempAoeList.begin(); itr != tempAoeList.end();)
2461  {
2462  if (!(*itr)->IsVisibleForOrDetect(m_caster, m_originalCaster, false, false, true, false, m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_IGNORE_PHASE_SHIFT)))
2463  itr = tempAoeList.erase(itr);
2464  else
2465  ++itr;
2466  }
2467  }
2468 
2469  // No targets. No need to process.
2470  if (tempAoeList.empty())
2471  break;
2472 
2473  if (minRadiusCaster)
2474  {
2475  float x, y, z;
2476  m_caster->GetPosition(x, y, z);
2477  auto itr = tempAoeList.begin();
2478  ++itr; // start from 2nd
2479  for (; itr != tempAoeList.end();)
2480  {
2481  if ((*itr)->GetDistance(x, y, z, DIST_CALC_COMBAT_REACH) < minRadiusCaster)
2482  itr = tempAoeList.erase(itr);
2483  else
2484  ++itr;
2485  }
2486  }
2487  tempUnitList.splice(tempUnitList.end(), tempAoeList);
2488  }
2489  break;
2490  }
2491  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_ENEMY_AOE_AT_SRC_LOC:
2492  FillAreaTargets(tempUnitList, radius, cone, PUSH_SRC_CENTER, SPELL_TARGETS_AOE_ATTACKABLE);
2493  break;
2494  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_SCRIPT_AOE_AT_SRC_LOC:
2495  {
2496  UnitList tempTargetUnitMap;
2497  SQLMultiStorage::SQLMSIteratorBounds<SpellTargetEntry> bounds = sSpellScriptTargetStorage.getBounds<SpellTargetEntry>(m_spellInfo->Id);
2498 
2499  // fill real target list if no spell script target defined
2500  FillAreaTargets(bounds.first != bounds.second ? tempTargetUnitMap : tempUnitList,
2501  radius, cone, PUSH_SRC_CENTER, SPELL_TARGETS_ALL);
2502 
2503  if (!tempTargetUnitMap.empty())
2504  CheckSpellScriptTargets(bounds, tempTargetUnitMap, tempUnitList, effIndex);
2505 
2506  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
2507  {
2508  case 45339:
2509  {
2510  for (auto iter = tempUnitList.begin(); iter != tempUnitList.end();)
2511  {
2512  if ((*iter)->HasCharmer(m_caster->GetObjectGuid()))
2513  iter = tempUnitList.erase(iter);
2514  else
2515  ++iter;
2516  }
2517  break;
2518  }
2519  }
2520 
2521  break;
2522  }
2523  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_SCRIPT_AOE_AT_DEST_LOC:
2524  {
2525  UnitList tempTargetUnitMap;
2526  SQLMultiStorage::SQLMSIteratorBounds<SpellTargetEntry> bounds = sSpellScriptTargetStorage.getBounds<SpellTargetEntry>(m_spellInfo->Id);
2527  // fill real target list if no spell script target defined
2528  FillAreaTargets(bounds.first != bounds.second ? tempTargetUnitMap : tempUnitList, radius, cone, PUSH_DEST_CENTER, SPELL_TARGETS_ALL);
2529 
2530  if (!tempTargetUnitMap.empty())
2531  CheckSpellScriptTargets(bounds, tempTargetUnitMap, tempUnitList, effIndex);
2532 
2533  break;
2534  }
2535  case TARGET_ENUM_GAMEOBJECTS_SCRIPT_AOE_AT_SRC_LOC:
2536  case TARGET_ENUM_GAMEOBJECTS_SCRIPT_AOE_AT_DEST_LOC:
2537  case TARGET_ENUM_GAMEOBJECTS_IN_CONE:
2538  {
2539  float x, y, z;
2540 
2541  if (targetMode == TARGET_ENUM_GAMEOBJECTS_SCRIPT_AOE_AT_SRC_LOC && (m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION))
2542  m_targets.getSource(x, y, z);
2543  else if (targetMode == TARGET_ENUM_GAMEOBJECTS_SCRIPT_AOE_AT_DEST_LOC)
2544  m_targets.getDestination(x, y, z);
2545  else // can also happen for GO_AROUND_SOURCE without SOURCE_LOCATION
2546  m_trueCaster->GetPosition(x, y, z);
2547 
2548  std::set<uint32> entriesToUse;
2549 
2550  SQLMultiStorage::SQLMSIteratorBounds<SpellTargetEntry> bounds = sSpellScriptTargetStorage.getBounds<SpellTargetEntry>(m_spellInfo->Id);
2551  for (SQLMultiStorage::SQLMultiSIterator<SpellTargetEntry> i_spellST = bounds.first; i_spellST != bounds.second; ++i_spellST)
2552  {
2553  if (i_spellST->CanNotHitWithSpellEffect(effIndex))
2554  continue;
2555 
2556  if (i_spellST->type == SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT)
2557  entriesToUse.insert(i_spellST->targetEntry);
2558  }
2559 
2560  if (!entriesToUse.empty())
2561  {
2562  MaNGOS::AllGameObjectEntriesListInPosRangeCheck go_check(*m_trueCaster, x, y, z, entriesToUse, radius);
2563  MaNGOS::GameObjectListSearcher<MaNGOS::AllGameObjectEntriesListInPosRangeCheck> checker(tempGOList, go_check);
2564  Cell::VisitGridObjects(m_trueCaster, checker, radius);
2565  }
2566  else
2567  {
2568  // Generic handling for spells that require GO-type 33
2569  if (m_spellInfo->Effect[effIndex] == SPELL_EFFECT_WMO_DAMAGE || m_spellInfo->Effect[effIndex] == SPELL_EFFECT_WMO_REPAIR || m_spellInfo->Effect[effIndex] == SPELL_EFFECT_WMO_CHANGE)
2570  {
2571  MaNGOS::GameObjectTypeInPosRangeCheck go_check(*m_caster, GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_DESTRUCTIBLE_BUILDING, x, y, z, radius, m_spellInfo->Effect[effIndex] == SPELL_EFFECT_WMO_DAMAGE, m_spellInfo->Effect[effIndex] == SPELL_EFFECT_WMO_REPAIR);
2572  MaNGOS::GameObjectListSearcher<MaNGOS::GameObjectTypeInPosRangeCheck> checker(tempGOList, go_check);
2573  Cell::VisitGridObjects(m_trueCaster, checker, radius + GetSpellMaxRange(sSpellRangeStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->rangeIndex)));
2574  }
2575  }
2576 
2577  // Filter some targets for special target-type
2578  for (GameObjectList::iterator itr = tempGOList.begin(); itr != tempGOList.end();)
2579  {
2580  switch (targetMode)
2581  {
2582  case TARGET_ENUM_GAMEOBJECTS_IN_CONE:
2583  if (!m_trueCaster->HasInArc(*itr, M_PI_F / 2))
2584  {
2585  itr = tempGOList.erase(itr);
2586  continue;
2587  }
2588  // no break here
2589  case TARGET_ENUM_GAMEOBJECTS_SCRIPT_AOE_AT_SRC_LOC:
2590  case TARGET_ENUM_GAMEOBJECTS_SCRIPT_AOE_AT_DEST_LOC:
2591  default:
2592  ++itr;
2593  }
2594  }
2595  break;
2596  }
2597  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_ENEMY_AOE_AT_DEST_LOC:
2598  {
2599  // targets the ground, not the units in the area
2600  FillAreaTargets(tempUnitList, radius, cone, PUSH_DEST_CENTER, SPELL_TARGETS_AOE_ATTACKABLE);
2601  break;
2602  }
2603  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_PARTY_WITHIN_CASTER_RANGE:
2604  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_PARTY_AOE_AT_DEST_LOC:
2605  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_PARTY_AOE_AT_SRC_LOC:
2606  {
2607  FillRaidOrPartyTargets(tempUnitList, m_caster, m_caster, radius, false, true, true);
2608  break;
2609  }
2610  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_RAID_WITHIN_CASTER_RANGE:
2611  {
2612  FillRaidOrPartyTargets(tempUnitList, m_caster, m_caster, radius, true, true, IsPositiveSpell(m_spellInfo->Id));
2613  break;
2614  }
2615  case TARGET_UNIT_FRIEND:
2616  case TARGET_UNIT_RAID:
2617  {
2618  if (Unit* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget())
2619  {
2620  if (m_trueCaster->CanAssistSpell(target, m_spellInfo) && (targetMode != TARGET_UNIT_RAID || target->IsInGroup(m_caster)))
2621  tempUnitList.push_back(target);
2622  else
2623  {
2624  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_IMPLIED_TARGETING))
2625  {
2626  if (Unit* targetOfUnitTarget = target->GetTarget(m_trueCaster))
2627  {
2628  if (m_trueCaster->CanAssistSpell(targetOfUnitTarget, m_spellInfo) && (targetMode != TARGET_UNIT_RAID || targetOfUnitTarget->IsInGroup(m_caster)))
2629  tempUnitList.push_back(targetOfUnitTarget);
2630  }
2631  }
2632  }
2633  }
2634  break;
2635  }
2636  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_COMPANION:
2637  if (Unit* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget())
2638  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && ((Creature*)target)->IsPet() && ((Pet*)target)->getPetType() == MINI_PET)
2639  tempUnitList.push_back(target);
2640  break;
2641  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_SUMMONER:
2642  {
2643  WorldObject* caster = GetAffectiveCasterObject();
2644  if (!caster)
2645  return;
2646 
2647  if (caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && ((Creature*)caster)->IsTemporarySummon())
2648  tempUnitList.push_back(((Creature*)caster)->GetSpawner());
2649  else if (caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT && !((GameObject*)caster)->HasStaticDBSpawnData())
2650  tempUnitList.push_back(((GameObject*)caster)->GetOwner());
2651  else
2652  sLog.outError("SPELL: Spell ID %u with target ID %u was used by non temporary summon object %s.", m_spellInfo->Id, targetMode, caster->GetGuidStr().c_str());
2653  break;
2654  }
2655  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_VEHICLE:
2656  if (m_trueCaster->IsBoarded() && m_trueCaster->GetTransportInfo()->IsOnVehicle())
2657  tempUnitList.push_back(static_cast<Unit*>(m_trueCaster->GetTransportInfo()->GetTransport()));
2658  break;
2659  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_DRIVER:
2660  if (m_caster->IsVehicle())
2661  if (Unit* vehicleDriver = m_caster->GetCharmer())
2662  tempUnitList.push_back(vehicleDriver);
2663  break;
2664  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PASSENGER_0:
2665  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PASSENGER_1:
2666  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PASSENGER_2:
2667  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PASSENGER_3:
2668  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PASSENGER_4:
2669  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PASSENGER_5:
2670  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PASSENGER_6:
2671  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PASSENGER_7:
2672  if (m_caster->IsVehicle())
2673  if (Unit* passenger = m_caster->GetVehicleInfo()->GetPassenger(targetMode - TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PASSENGER_0))
2674  tempUnitList.push_back(passenger);
2675  break;
2676  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_SRC:
2677  {
2678  // Check original caster is GO - set its coordinates as src cast
2679  if (WorldObject* caster = GetCastingObject())
2680  m_targets.setSource(caster->GetPositionX(), caster->GetPositionY(), caster->GetPositionZ());
2681  break;
2682  }
2683  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_ENEMY_WITHIN_CASTER_RANGE:
2684  FillAreaTargets(tempUnitList, radius, cone, PUSH_SELF_CENTER, SPELL_TARGETS_AOE_ATTACKABLE);
2685  break;
2686  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_FRIEND_AOE_AT_SRC_LOC:
2687  // selected friendly units (for casting objects) around casting object
2688  FillAreaTargets(tempUnitList, radius, cone, PUSH_SELF_CENTER, SPELL_TARGETS_ASSISTABLE, GetCastingObject());
2689  break;
2690  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_FRIEND_AOE_AT_DEST_LOC:
2691  // Death Pact (in fact selection by player selection)
2692  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 48743)
2693  {
2694  // checked in Spell::CheckCast
2695  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2696  if (Unit* target = m_caster->GetMap()->GetPet(((Player*)m_caster)->GetSelectionGuid()))
2697  tempUnitList.push_back(target);
2698  }
2699  else
2700  FillAreaTargets(tempUnitList, radius, cone, PUSH_DEST_CENTER, SPELL_TARGETS_ASSISTABLE);
2701  break;
2702  // TARGET_UNIT_PARTY means that the spells can only be casted on a party member and not on the caster (some seals, fire shield from imp, etc..)
2703  case TARGET_UNIT_PARTY:
2704  {
2705  Unit* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
2706  // Those spells apparently can't be casted on the caster.
2707  if (target && target != m_caster)
2708  {
2709  // Can only be casted on group's members or its pets
2710  Group* pGroup = nullptr;
2711 
2712  Unit* owner = m_caster->GetMaster();
2713  Unit* targetOwner = target->GetMaster();
2714  if (owner)
2715  {
2716  if (owner->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2717  {
2718  if (target == owner)
2719  {
2720  tempUnitList.push_back(target);
2721  break;
2722  }
2723  pGroup = ((Player*)owner)->GetGroup();
2724  }
2725  }
2726  else if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2727  {
2728  if (targetOwner == m_caster && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && ((Creature*)target)->IsPet())
2729  {
2730  tempUnitList.push_back(target);
2731  break;
2732  }
2733  pGroup = ((Player*)m_caster)->GetGroup();
2734  }
2735 
2736  if (pGroup)
2737  {
2738  // Our target can also be a player's pet who's grouped with us or our pet. But can't be controlled player
2739  if (targetOwner)
2740  {
2741  if (targetOwner->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER &&
2742  target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && (((Creature*)target)->IsPet()) &&
2743  target->GetOwnerGuid() == targetOwner->GetObjectGuid() &&
2744  pGroup->IsMember(((Player*)targetOwner)->GetObjectGuid()))
2745  {
2746  tempUnitList.push_back(target);
2747  }
2748  }
2749  // 1Our target can be a player who is on our group
2750  else if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && pGroup->IsMember(((Player*)target)->GetObjectGuid()))
2751  {
2752  tempUnitList.push_back(target);
2753  }
2754  }
2755  }
2756  break;
2757  }
2758  case TARGET_GAMEOBJECT:
2759  if (GameObject* go = m_targets.getGOTarget())
2760  tempGOList.push_back(go);
2761  break;
2762  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_ENEMY_IN_CONE_24:
2763  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_ENEMY_IN_CONE_54:
2764  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_FRIEND_IN_CONE:
2765  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_SCRIPT_IN_CONE_60:
2766  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_ENEMY_IN_CONE_104:
2767  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_SCRIPT_IN_CONE_110:
2768  {
2769  SpellTargets targetType = SPELL_TARGETS_ALL;
2770  switch (targetMode)
2771  {
2772  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_ENEMY_IN_CONE_104:
2773  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_ENEMY_IN_CONE_24:
2774  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_ENEMY_IN_CONE_54: targetType = SPELL_TARGETS_AOE_ATTACKABLE; break;
2775  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_FRIEND_IN_CONE: targetType = SPELL_TARGETS_ASSISTABLE; break;
2776  }
2777 
2778  switch (targetMode)
2779  {
2780  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_SCRIPT_IN_CONE_60:
2781  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_SCRIPT_IN_CONE_110:
2782  {
2783  UnitList tempTargetUnitMap;
2784  SQLMultiStorage::SQLMSIteratorBounds<SpellTargetEntry> bounds = sSpellScriptTargetStorage.getBounds<SpellTargetEntry>(m_spellInfo->Id);
2785  // fill real target list if no spell script target defined
2786  FillAreaTargets(bounds.first != bounds.second ? tempTargetUnitMap : tempUnitList, radius, cone, PUSH_CONE, targetType);
2787  if (!tempTargetUnitMap.empty())
2788  CheckSpellScriptTargets(bounds, tempTargetUnitMap, tempUnitList, effIndex);
2789  break;
2790  }
2791  default:
2792  FillAreaTargets(tempUnitList, radius, cone, PUSH_CONE, targetType);
2793  break;
2794  }
2795  break;
2796  }
2797  case TARGET_LOCKED:
2798  if (GameObject* go = m_targets.getGOTarget())
2799  tempGOList.push_back(go);
2800  else if (Item* item = m_targets.getItemTarget())
2801  data.tempItemList.push_back(item);
2802  break;
2803  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_MASTER:
2804  if (Unit* owner = m_caster->GetMaster())
2805  tempUnitList.push_back(owner);
2806  break;
2807  case TARGET_ENUM_UNITS_ENEMY_AOE_AT_DYNOBJ_LOC:
2808  // targets the ground, not the units in the area
2809  FillAreaTargets(tempUnitList, radius, cone, PUSH_DEST_CENTER, SPELL_TARGETS_AOE_ATTACKABLE);
2810  break;
2811  case TARGET_UNIT_CHANNEL_TARGET:
2812  {
2813  if (Unit* target = dynamic_cast<Unit*>(m_caster->GetChannelObject()))
2814  if (!CheckAndAddMagnetTarget(target, effIndex, targetB, targetingData))
2815  tempUnitList.push_back(target);
2816  break;
2817  }
2818  case TARGET_UNIT_FRIEND_AND_PARTY:
2819  {
2820  Unit* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
2821  if (!target || !m_trueCaster->CanAssistSpell(target, m_spellInfo))
2822  break;
2823 
2824  tempUnitList.push_back(target);
2825 
2826  Player* pTarget = const_cast<Player*>(target->GetControllingPlayer());
2827  if (!pTarget)
2828  break;
2829 
2830  if (pTarget != target)
2831  tempUnitList.push_back(pTarget);
2832 
2833  Group* pGroup = pTarget->GetGroup();
2834 
2835  if (pGroup)
2836  {
2837  uint8 subgroup = pTarget->GetSubGroup();
2838 
2839  for (GroupReference* itr = pGroup->GetFirstMember(); itr != nullptr; itr = itr->next())
2840  {
2841  Player* groupTarget = itr->getSource();
2842 
2843  if (groupTarget == target || groupTarget == pTarget)
2844  continue;
2845 
2846  // CanAssist check duel and controlled by enemy
2847  if (groupTarget && groupTarget->GetSubGroup() == subgroup && m_caster->CanAssistSpell(groupTarget, m_spellInfo))
2848  {
2849  if (pTarget->IsWithinDistInMap(groupTarget, radius))
2850  tempUnitList.push_back(groupTarget);
2851 
2852  if (Pet* pet = groupTarget->GetPet())
2853  if (pTarget->IsWithinDistInMap(pet, radius))
2854  tempUnitList.push_back(pet);
2855  }
2856  }
2857  }
2858  else if (pTarget)
2859  {
2860  if (Pet* pet = pTarget->GetPet())
2861  if (m_trueCaster->IsWithinDistInMap(pet, radius))
2862  tempUnitList.push_back(pet);
2863  }
2864  break;
2865  }
2866  case TARGET_UNIT_FRIEND_CHAIN_HEAL:
2867  {
2868  Unit* unitTarget = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
2869  if (!unitTarget)
2870  break;
2871 
2872  if (!m_caster->CanAssistSpell(unitTarget, m_spellInfo))
2873  break;
2874 
2875  tempUnitList.push_back(unitTarget);
2876 
2877  if (targetingData.chainTargetCount[effIndex] > 1)
2878  {
2879  float max_range = targetingData.chainTargetCount[effIndex] * m_jumpRadius;
2880  Group* group = nullptr;
2881 
2882  //if target and caster are members in the same group then apply member only filtering
2883  //in regards to mc by player concerns the mc'ed player has simple toolbar thus chain heal not available
2884  //TODO: in regards to mc by npc concerns this is something that needs to be answered
2885  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2886  {
2887  if (Group* casterGroup = static_cast<Player*>(m_caster)->GetGroup())
2888  {
2889  switch (unitTarget->GetTypeId())
2890  {
2891  case TYPEID_PLAYER:
2892  {
2893  if (casterGroup == static_cast<Player*>(unitTarget)->GetGroup())
2894  group = casterGroup;
2895 
2896  break;
2897  }
2898  case TYPEID_UNIT:
2899  {
2900  Creature* creature = static_cast<Creature*>(unitTarget);
2901 
2902  if (Unit* owner = creature->GetOwner(nullptr, true))
2903  {
2904  if (owner->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && casterGroup == static_cast<Player*>(owner)->GetGroup())
2905  {
2906  group = casterGroup;
2907  }
2908  }
2909 
2910  break;
2911  }
2912  }
2913 
2914  }
2915  }
2916 
2917  UnitList tempAoeList;
2918  MaNGOS::AnyFriendlyOrGroupMemberUnitInUnitRangeCheck u_check(m_caster, unitTarget, group, m_spellInfo, max_range);
2919  MaNGOS::UnitListSearcher<MaNGOS::AnyFriendlyOrGroupMemberUnitInUnitRangeCheck> searcher(tempAoeList, u_check);
2920  Cell::VisitAllObjects(m_caster, searcher, max_range);
2921  tempAoeList.erase(std::remove(tempAoeList.begin(), tempAoeList.end(), unitTarget), tempAoeList.end());
2922  if (!tempAoeList.empty())
2923  tempUnitList.splice(tempUnitList.end(), tempAoeList);
2924  }
2925  break;
2926  }
2927  case TARGET_UNIT_RAID_AND_CLASS:
2928  {
2929  Player* targetPlayer = m_targets.getUnitTarget() && m_targets.getUnitTarget()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER
2930  ? (Player*)m_targets.getUnitTarget() : nullptr;
2931 
2932  Group* pGroup = targetPlayer ? targetPlayer->GetGroup() : nullptr;
2933  if (pGroup)
2934  {
2935  float x, y, z;
2936  targetPlayer->GetPosition(x, y, z);
2937  for (GroupReference* itr = pGroup->GetFirstMember(); itr != nullptr; itr = itr->next())
2938  {
2939  Player* target = itr->getSource();
2940 
2941  // CanAssist check duel and controlled by enemy
2942  if (target)
2943  {
2944  if (target->GetDistance(x, y, z, DIST_CALC_COMBAT_REACH) <= radius &&
2945  targetPlayer->getClass() == target->getClass() &&
2946  m_caster->CanAssistSpell(target, m_spellInfo))
2947  {
2948  tempUnitList.push_back(target);
2949  }
2950  if (Pet* pet = target->GetPet())
2951  {
2952  if (pet->GetDistance(x, y, z, DIST_CALC_COMBAT_REACH) <= radius &&
2953  targetPlayer->getClass() == pet->getClass() &&
2954  m_caster->CanAssistSpell(pet, m_spellInfo))
2955  tempUnitList.push_back(pet);
2956  }
2957  }
2958  }
2959  }
2960  else if (m_targets.getUnitTarget())
2961  tempUnitList.push_back(m_targets.getUnitTarget());
2962  break;
2963  }
2964  case TARGET_CORPSE_ENEMY_NEAR_CASTER:
2965  {
2966  WorldObject* result = FindCorpseUsing<MaNGOS::TauntFlagObjectCheck>();
2967  if (result)
2968  {
2969  switch (result->GetTypeId())
2970  {
2971  case TYPEID_UNIT:
2972  case TYPEID_PLAYER:
2973  tempUnitList.push_back(static_cast<Unit*>(result));
2974  break;
2975  case TYPEID_CORPSE:
2976  if (Player* owner = ObjectAccessor::FindPlayer(static_cast<Corpse*>(result)->GetOwnerGuid()))
2977  tempUnitList.push_back(owner);
2978  break;
2979  }
2980  }
2981  break;
2982  }
2983  case TARGET_UNIT_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER:
2984  case TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER:
2985  case TARGET_LOCATION_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER:
2986  {
2987  SpellCastResult result = CheckScriptTargeting(effIndex, targetingData.chainTargetCount[effIndex], radius, targetMode, tempUnitList, tempGOList);
2988  if (result != SPELL_CAST_OK)
2989  {
2990  SendCastResult(result);
2991  finish(false);
2992  return;
2993  }
2994  break;
2995  }
2996  default:
2997  // sLog.outError( "SPELL: Unknown implicit target (%u) for spell ID %u", targetMode, m_spellInfo->Id );
2998  break;
2999  }
3000 
3001  // remove caster from the list if required by attribute
3002  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_EXCLUDE_CASTER))
3003  if (targetMode != TARGET_UNIT_CASTER)
3004  tempUnitList.remove(m_caster);
3005 }
3006 
3007 SpellCastResult Spell::CheckScriptTargeting(SpellEffectIndex effIndex, uint32 chainTargets, float radius, uint32 targetMode, UnitList& tempUnitList, GameObjectList& tempGOList)
3008 {
3009  SQLMultiStorage::SQLMSIteratorBounds<SpellTargetEntry> bounds = sSpellScriptTargetStorage.getBounds<SpellTargetEntry>(m_spellInfo->Id);
3010 
3011  if (bounds.first == bounds.second)
3012  {
3013  if (m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[effIndex] == TARGET_UNIT_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER || m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetB[effIndex] == TARGET_UNIT_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER)
3014  sLog.outErrorDb("Spell entry %u, effect %i has EffectImplicitTargetA/EffectImplicitTargetB = TARGET_UNIT_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER, but creature are not defined in `spell_script_target`", m_spellInfo->Id, effIndex);
3015 
3016  if (m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[effIndex] == TARGET_LOCATION_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER || m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetB[effIndex] == TARGET_LOCATION_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER)
3017  sLog.outErrorDb("Spell entry %u, effect %i has EffectImplicitTargetA/EffectImplicitTargetB = TARGET_LOCATION_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER, but gameobject or creature are not defined in `spell_script_target`", m_spellInfo->Id, effIndex);
3018 
3019  if (m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[effIndex] == TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER || m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetB[effIndex] == TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER)
3020  sLog.outErrorDb("Spell entry %u, effect %i has EffectImplicitTargetA/EffectImplicitTargetB = TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER, but gameobject are not defined in `spell_script_target`", m_spellInfo->Id, effIndex);
3021 
3022  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
3023  }
3024 
3025  CreatureList foundScriptCreatureTargets;
3026  GameObjectList foundScriptGOTargets;
3027  std::set<uint32> entriesToUse;
3028  uint32 type = MAX_SPELL_TARGET_TYPE;
3029  bool foundButOutOfRange = false;
3030  // corrections for numerous spells missing it
3031  uint32 targetCount = std::max(chainTargets, uint32(1));
3032 
3033  for (SQLMultiStorage::SQLMultiSIterator<SpellTargetEntry> i_spellST = bounds.first; i_spellST != bounds.second; ++i_spellST)
3034  {
3035  if (i_spellST->CanNotHitWithSpellEffect(effIndex))
3036  continue;
3037 
3038  type = i_spellST->type;
3039  switch (i_spellST->type)
3040  {
3041  case SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT:
3042  case SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_CREATURE:
3043  case SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_DEAD:
3044  case SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_CREATURE_GUID:
3045  case SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT_GUID:
3046  default:
3047  entriesToUse.insert(i_spellST->targetEntry);
3048  break;
3049  }
3050  }
3051 
3052  if (radius == 50000.f)
3053  {
3054  if (type != SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_CREATURE_GUID && type != SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT_GUID)
3055  radius = 200.f;
3056  }
3057  else if (radius == 0.f)
3058  radius = m_trueCaster->GetMap()->IsDungeon() ? DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_INSTANCE : DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE;
3059 
3060  WorldObject* caster = GetAffectiveCasterObject();
3061 
3062  switch (type) // TODO: Unify logic with all other spell_script_target uses
3063  {
3064  case SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT:
3065  case SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT_GUID:
3066  {
3067  if (type == SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT_GUID)
3068  {
3069  for (uint32 guid : entriesToUse)
3070  if (GameObject* go = m_trueCaster->GetMap()->GetGameObject(guid))
3071  if (go->IsWithinDist(m_trueCaster, radius))
3072  foundScriptGOTargets.push_back(go);
3073  }
3074  else
3075  {
3076  MaNGOS::AllGameObjectEntriesListInObjectRangeCheck go_check(*m_trueCaster, entriesToUse, radius);
3077  MaNGOS::GameObjectListSearcher<MaNGOS::AllGameObjectEntriesListInObjectRangeCheck> checker(foundScriptGOTargets, go_check);
3078  Cell::VisitGridObjects(m_trueCaster, checker, radius);
3079  }
3080 
3081  break;
3082  }
3083  case SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_CREATURE:
3084  case SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_DEAD:
3085  case SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_CREATURE_GUID:
3086  {
3087  if (Unit* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget())
3088  {
3089  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && entriesToUse.find(type == SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_CREATURE_GUID ? target->GetDbGuid() : target->GetEntry()) != entriesToUse.end())
3090  {
3091  if ((type == SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_CREATURE && target->IsAlive()) ||
3092  (type == SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_DEAD && ((Creature*)target)->IsCorpse()))
3093  {
3094  if (target->IsWithinDistInMap(caster, radius) && OnCheckTarget(target, effIndex))
3095  foundScriptCreatureTargets.push_back((Creature*)target);
3096  else
3097  foundButOutOfRange = true;
3098  }
3099  }
3100  }
3101  if (foundScriptCreatureTargets.size() < targetCount)
3102  {
3103  if (radius == 50000.f) // only guid scripting
3104  {
3105  for (uint32 guid : entriesToUse)
3106  if (Creature* creature = m_trueCaster->GetMap()->GetCreature(guid))
3107  foundScriptCreatureTargets.push_back(creature);
3108  }
3109  else
3110  {
3111  MaNGOS::AllCreatureEntriesWithLiveStateInObjectRangeCheck u_check(*caster, entriesToUse, type != SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_DEAD, radius, type == SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_CREATURE_GUID, false, true);
3112  MaNGOS::CreatureListSearcher<MaNGOS::AllCreatureEntriesWithLiveStateInObjectRangeCheck> searcher(foundScriptCreatureTargets, u_check);
3113  Cell::VisitAllObjects(caster, searcher, radius); // Visit all, need to find also Pet* objects
3114  if (u_check.FoundOutOfRange())
3115  foundButOutOfRange = true;
3116  }
3117  }
3118  break;
3119  }
3120  case SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_STRING_ID:
3121  {
3122  for (uint32 stringId : entriesToUse)
3123  {
3124  auto creatures = m_trueCaster->GetMap()->GetCreatures(stringId);
3125  for (Creature* creature : *creatures)
3126  {
3127  if (creature->IsWithinCombatDistInMap(caster, radius, true))
3128  foundScriptCreatureTargets.push_back(creature);
3129  else
3130  foundButOutOfRange = true;
3131  }
3132  auto gameObjects = m_trueCaster->GetMap()->GetGameObjects(stringId);
3133  for (GameObject* gameObject : *gameObjects)
3134  {
3135  if (gameObject->IsWithinDist(caster, radius, true))
3136  foundScriptGOTargets.push_back(gameObject);
3137  else
3138  foundButOutOfRange = true;
3139  }
3140  }
3141  break;
3142  }
3143  default:
3144  break;
3145  }
3146 
3147  if (!foundScriptCreatureTargets.empty())
3148  {
3149  for (auto iter = foundScriptCreatureTargets.begin(); iter != foundScriptCreatureTargets.end();)
3150  {
3151  bool failed = false;
3152  if (!OnCheckTarget(*iter, effIndex))
3153  failed = true;
3154  else if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_EXCLUDE_CASTER) && m_trueCaster == (*iter))
3155  failed = true;
3156  if (failed)
3157  iter = foundScriptCreatureTargets.erase(iter);
3158  else
3159  ++iter;
3160  }
3161 
3162  foundScriptCreatureTargets.sort([=](const Creature* a, const Creature* b) -> bool
3163  {
3164  return caster->GetDistance(a, true, DIST_CALC_NONE) < caster->GetDistance(b, true, DIST_CALC_NONE);
3165  });
3166 
3167  if (foundScriptCreatureTargets.size() > targetCount) // if we have too many targets, we need to trim the list
3168  foundScriptCreatureTargets.resize(targetCount);
3169  }
3170 
3171  if (!foundScriptGOTargets.empty())
3172  {
3173  for (auto itr = foundScriptGOTargets.begin(); itr != foundScriptGOTargets.end();)
3174  {
3175  if (!OnCheckTarget(*itr, effIndex))
3176  itr = foundScriptGOTargets.erase(itr);
3177  else
3178  ++itr;
3179  }
3180  foundScriptGOTargets.sort([=](const GameObject* a, const GameObject* b) -> bool
3181  {
3182  return caster->GetDistance(a, true, DIST_CALC_NONE) < caster->GetDistance(b, true, DIST_CALC_NONE);
3183  });
3184 
3185  if (foundScriptGOTargets.size() > targetCount) // if we have too many targets, we need to trim the list
3186  foundScriptGOTargets.resize(targetCount);
3187  }
3188 
3189  if (!foundScriptCreatureTargets.empty())
3190  {
3191  // store coordinates for TARGET_LOCATION_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER
3192  if (targetMode == TARGET_LOCATION_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER)
3193  {
3194  Creature* creatureScriptTarget = foundScriptCreatureTargets.front(); // can only have one target in this case
3195  m_targets.setDestination(creatureScriptTarget->GetPositionX(), creatureScriptTarget->GetPositionY(), creatureScriptTarget->GetPositionZ());
3196  }
3197  // store explicit target for TARGET_UNIT_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER
3198  else
3199  for (Creature* creature : foundScriptCreatureTargets)
3200  tempUnitList.push_back(creature);
3201  }
3202  else if (!foundScriptGOTargets.empty())
3203  {
3204  // store coordinates for TARGET_LOCATION_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER
3205  if (targetMode == TARGET_LOCATION_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER)
3206  {
3207  GameObject* goScriptTarget = foundScriptGOTargets.front(); // can only have one target in this case
3208  m_targets.setDestination(goScriptTarget->GetPositionX(), goScriptTarget->GetPositionY(), goScriptTarget->GetPositionZ());
3209  }
3210  // store explicit target for TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER
3211  else
3212  tempGOList.splice(tempGOList.end(), foundScriptGOTargets);
3213  }
3214  // Missing DB Entry or targets for this spellEffect.
3215  else
3216  {
3217  /* For TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER makes DB targets optional not required for now
3218  * TODO: Makes more research for this target type
3219  */
3220  if (targetMode != TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER)
3221  {
3222  // not report target not existence for triggered spells
3223  return foundButOutOfRange ? SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE : SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
3224  }
3225  else if (foundButOutOfRange)
3226  return SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE;
3227  }
3228  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
3229 }
3230 
3231 void Spell::CheckSpellScriptTargets(SQLMultiStorage::SQLMSIteratorBounds<SpellTargetEntry>& bounds, UnitList& tempTargetUnitMap, UnitList& targetUnitMap, SpellEffectIndex effIndex)
3232 {
3233  for (UnitList::const_iterator iter = tempTargetUnitMap.begin(); iter != tempTargetUnitMap.end(); ++iter)
3234  {
3235  Unit* target = (*iter);
3236  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
3237  continue;
3238 
3239  for (SQLMultiStorage::SQLMultiSIterator<SpellTargetEntry> i_spellST = bounds.first; i_spellST != bounds.second; ++i_spellST)
3240  {
3241  SpellTargetEntry const* spellST = (*i_spellST);
3242  if (spellST->CanNotHitWithSpellEffect(effIndex))
3243  continue;
3244 
3245  // only creature entries supported for this target type
3246  if (spellST->type == SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT || spellST->type == SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT_GUID)
3247  continue;
3248 
3249  bool fail = false;
3250  switch (spellST->type)
3251  {
3252  case SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_CREATURE_GUID:
3253  fail = target->GetDbGuid() != spellST->targetEntry;
3254  break;
3255  case SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_STRING_ID:
3256  break;
3257  default:
3258  fail = target->GetEntry() != spellST->targetEntry;
3259  break;
3260  }
3261  if (fail)
3262  continue;
3263 
3264  switch (spellST->type)
3265  {
3266  case SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_DEAD:
3267  if (static_cast<Creature*>(target)->IsCorpse())
3268  targetUnitMap.push_back(target);
3269  break;
3270  case SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_CREATURE:
3271  if (target->IsAlive())
3272  targetUnitMap.push_back(target);
3273  break;
3274  case SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_CREATURE_GUID:
3275  targetUnitMap.push_back(target);
3276  break;
3277  case SPELL_TARGET_TYPE_STRING_ID:
3278  if (target->HasStringId(spellST->targetEntry))
3279  targetUnitMap.push_back(target);
3280  break;
3281  default:
3282  break;
3283  }
3284  break;
3285  }
3286  }
3287 }
3288 
3289 SpellCastResult Spell::PreCastCheck(Aura* triggeredByAura /*= nullptr*/)
3290 {
3291  SpellCastResult result = CheckCast(true);
3292  if (result != SPELL_CAST_OK && (!IsAutoRepeat() || m_triggerAutorepeat)) // always cast autorepeat dummy for triggering
3293  {
3294  if (triggeredByAura)
3295  {
3296  SendChannelUpdate(0);
3297  triggeredByAura->GetHolder()->SetAuraDuration(0);
3298  }
3299  return result;
3300  }
3301 
3302  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
3303 }
3304 
3305 SpellCastResult Spell::SpellStart(SpellCastTargets const* targets, Aura* triggeredByAura)
3306 {
3307  if (!m_trueCaster)
3308  m_trueCaster = m_caster;
3309  m_spellState = SPELL_STATE_TARGETING;
3310  m_targets = *targets;
3311 
3312  if (triggeredByAura)
3313  m_triggeredByAuraSpell = triggeredByAura->GetSpellProto();
3314 
3315  // create and add update event for this spell
3316  m_spellEvent = new SpellEvent(this);
3317  m_trueCaster->m_events.AddEvent(m_spellEvent, m_trueCaster->m_events.CalculateTime(1));
3318 
3319  if (!m_trueCaster->IsGameObject()) // gameobjects dont have a sense of already casting a spell
3320  {
3321  // Prevent casting at cast another spell (ServerSide check)
3322  if (m_caster->IsNonMeleeSpellCasted(false, true, true) && m_cast_count && !m_ignoreConcurrentCasts)
3323  {
3324  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_SPELL_IN_PROGRESS);
3325  finish(false);
3326  return SPELL_FAILED_SPELL_IN_PROGRESS;
3327  }
3328  }
3329 
3330  SpellCastResult result = PreCastCheck();
3331  if (result != SPELL_CAST_OK)
3332  {
3333  SendCastResult(result);
3334  finish(false);
3335  return result;
3336  }
3337  Prepare();
3338 
3339  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
3340 }
3341 
3342 void Spell::Prepare()
3343 {
3344  m_spellState = SPELL_STATE_CASTING;
3345 
3346  // Prepare data for triggers
3347  prepareDataForTriggerSystem();
3348 
3349  // calculate cast time (calculated after first CheckCast check to prevent charge counting for first CheckCast fail)
3350  if (!m_ignoreCastTime)
3351  {
3352  SpellModRAII spellModController(this, m_trueCaster->GetSpellModOwner(), false, true);
3353  m_casttime = GetSpellCastTime(m_spellInfo, m_trueCaster, this, true);
3354  }
3355 
3356  // set timer base at cast time
3357  ReSetTimer();
3358 
3359  if (!m_IsTriggeredSpell && !m_trueCaster->IsGameObject())
3360  {
3361  if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_NOT_AN_ACTION))
3362  m_caster->RemoveAurasOnCast(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_ACTION, m_spellInfo);
3363 
3364  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX7_RESET_SWING_TIMER_AT_SPELL_START))
3365  {
3366  if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_DOESNT_RESET_SWING_TIMER_IF_INSTANT) || m_casttime > 0)
3367  {
3368  m_caster->resetAttackTimer(BASE_ATTACK);
3369  if (m_caster->hasOffhandWeaponForAttack())
3370  m_caster->resetAttackTimer(OFF_ATTACK);
3371  }
3372  }
3373 
3374  // Orientation changes inside
3375  if (m_notifyAI && m_caster->AI())
3376  m_caster->AI()->OnSpellCastStateChange(this, true, m_targets.getUnitTarget());
3377  }
3378 
3379  m_castPositionX = m_trueCaster->GetPositionX();
3380  m_castPositionY = m_trueCaster->GetPositionY();
3381  m_castPositionZ = m_trueCaster->GetPositionZ();
3382  m_castOrientation = m_trueCaster->GetOrientation();
3383 
3384  OnSuccessfulStart();
3385 
3386  // add non-triggered (with cast time and without)
3387  if (!m_IsTriggeredSpell)
3388  {
3389  if (!m_trueCaster->IsGameObject())
3390  {
3391  // add to cast type slot
3392  if ((!m_ignoreConcurrentCasts || IsChanneledSpell(m_spellInfo)) && !m_triggerAutorepeat)
3393  m_caster->SetCurrentCastedSpell(this);
3394 
3395  // add gcd server side (client side is handled by client itself)
3396  m_caster->AddGCD(*m_spellInfo);
3397  }
3398 
3399  // will show cast bar
3400  SendSpellStart();
3401 
3402  // Execute instant spells immediate
3403  if (m_timer == 0 && !IsNextMeleeSwingSpell(m_spellInfo) && (!IsAutoRepeat() || m_triggerAutorepeat))
3404  cast();
3405  }
3406  // execute triggered without cast time explicitly in call point
3407  else
3408  {
3409  // Channeled spell is always one per caster and needs to be tracked and removed on death
3410  if (IsChanneledSpell(m_spellInfo)) // GO casters cant cast channeled spells
3411  m_caster->SetCurrentCastedSpell(this);
3412 
3413  if (m_timer == 0)
3414  cast(true);
3415  }
3416  // else triggered with cast time will execute execute at next tick or later
3417  // without adding to cast type slot
3418  // will not show cast bar but will show effects at casting time etc
3419 }
3420 
3421 void Spell::cancel()
3422 {
3423  if (m_spellState == SPELL_STATE_FINISHED)
3424  return;
3425 
3426  // channeled spells don't display interrupted message even if they are interrupted, possible other cases with no "Interrupted" message
3427  bool sendInterrupt = !(IsChanneledSpell(m_spellInfo) || m_autoRepeat);
3428 
3429  if (Player* player = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner()) // reset casting time mods
3430  if (player->GetSpellModSpell() != this && !m_usedAuraCharges.empty())
3431  player->ResetSpellModsDueToCanceledSpell(m_usedAuraCharges);
3432 
3433  m_autoRepeat = false;
3434  switch (m_spellState)
3435  {
3436  case SPELL_STATE_CREATED:
3437  case SPELL_STATE_TARGETING:
3438  case SPELL_STATE_CASTING:
3439  if (m_caster)
3440  m_caster->ResetGCD(m_spellInfo);
3441  // [[fallthrough]]
3442  case SPELL_STATE_TRAVELING:
3443  SendInterrupted(SPELL_FAILED_INTERRUPTED);
3444  if (sendInterrupt)
3445  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_INTERRUPTED);
3446  break;
3447  case SPELL_STATE_LANDING:
3448  sLog.outError("Spell [%u] is interrupted while processing", m_spellInfo->Id);
3449  // [[fallthrough]]
3450  case SPELL_STATE_CHANNELING:
3451  for (auto& ihit : m_UniqueTargetInfo)
3452  {
3453  if (ihit.missCondition == SPELL_MISS_NONE)
3454  {
3455  Unit* unit = m_caster->GetObjectGuid() == ihit.targetGUID ? m_caster : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, ihit.targetGUID);
3456  if (unit && unit->IsAlive())
3457  unit->RemoveAurasByCasterSpell(m_spellInfo->Id, m_caster->GetObjectGuid());
3458 
3459  // prevent other effects applying if spell is already interrupted
3460  // i.e. if effects have different targets and it was interrupted on one of them when
3461  // haven't yet applied to another
3462  ihit.processed = true;
3463  }
3464  }
3465  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_COOLDOWN_ON_EVENT))
3466  m_caster->RemoveSpellCooldown(*m_spellInfo, true); // need to clear cooldown in client
3467 
3468  SendChannelUpdate(0);
3469  SendInterrupted(SPELL_FAILED_INTERRUPTED);
3470  if (sendInterrupt)
3471  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_INTERRUPTED);
3472  break;
3473  case SPELL_STATE_FINISHED: break; // should not occur
3474  }
3475 
3476  finish(false);
3477  if (m_caster)
3478  {
3479  m_caster->RemoveDynObject(m_spellInfo->Id);
3480  m_caster->RemoveGameObject(m_spellInfo->Id, true);
3481  m_caster->RemoveCreature(m_spellInfo->Id, true);
3482  }
3483 }
3484 
3485 SpellCastResult Spell::cast(bool skipCheck)
3486 {
3487  SetExecutedCurrently(true);
3488  SpellModRAII spellModController(this, m_trueCaster->GetSpellModOwner());
3489 
3490  if (!m_trueCaster->CheckAndIncreaseCastCounter())
3491  {
3492  if (m_triggeredByAuraSpell)
3493  sLog.outError("Spell %u triggered by aura spell %u too deep in cast chain for cast. Cast not allowed for prevent overflow stack crash.", m_spellInfo->Id, m_triggeredByAuraSpell->Id);
3494  else
3495  sLog.outError("Spell %u too deep in cast chain for cast. Cast not allowed for prevent overflow stack crash.", m_spellInfo->Id);
3496 
3497  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_ERROR);
3498  finish(false);
3499  SetExecutedCurrently(false);
3500  return SPELL_FAILED_ERROR;
3501  }
3502 
3503  // update pointers base at GUIDs to prevent access to already nonexistent object
3504  UpdatePointers();
3505 
3506  // cancel at lost main target unit
3507  if (!m_targets.getUnitTarget() && m_targets.getUnitTargetGuid() && m_targets.getUnitTargetGuid() != m_trueCaster->GetObjectGuid())
3508  {
3509  cancel();
3510  m_trueCaster->DecreaseCastCounter();
3511  SetExecutedCurrently(false);
3512  return SPELL_FAILED_ERROR;
3513  }
3514 
3515  if (m_trueCaster->IsCreature() && m_targets.getUnitTarget() && m_targets.getUnitTarget() != m_caster && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_AI_DOESNT_FACE_TARGET))
3516  {
3517  Unit* charmer = m_caster->GetCharmer();
3518  if (charmer && !(charmer->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && ((Player*)charmer)->GetCamera().GetBody() == m_caster)) // need to check if target doesnt have a player controlling it
3519  m_caster->SetInFront(m_targets.getUnitTarget());
3520  }
3521 
3522  // triggered cast called from Spell::prepare where it was already checked
3523  SpellCastResult castResult = SPELL_CAST_OK;
3524  if (!skipCheck)
3525  {
3526  castResult = CheckCast(false);
3527  if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
3528  {
3529  StopCast(castResult);
3530  return castResult;
3531  }
3532  }
3533 
3534  // different triggered (for caster and main target after main cast) and pre-cast (casted before apply effect to each target) cases
3535  switch (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
3536  {
3537  case SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC:
3538  {
3539  // Bandages
3540  if (m_spellInfo->Mechanic == MECHANIC_BANDAGE)
3541  AddPrecastSpell(11196); // Recently Bandaged
3542  // Stoneskin
3543  else if (m_spellInfo->Id == 20594)
3544  AddTriggeredSpell(65116); // Stoneskin - armor 10% for 8 sec
3545  // Chaos Bane strength buff
3546  else if (m_spellInfo->Id == 71904)
3547  AddTriggeredSpell(73422);
3548  // Weak Alcohol
3549  else if (m_spellInfo->SpellIconID == 1306 && m_spellInfo->SpellVisual[0] == 11359)
3550  AddTriggeredSpell(51655); // BOTM - Create Empty Brew Bottle
3551  break;
3552  }
3553  case SPELLFAMILY_MAGE:
3554  {
3555  // Ice Block
3556  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000008000000000))
3557  AddPrecastSpell(41425); // Hypothermia
3558  // Icy Veins
3559  else if (m_spellInfo->Id == 12472)
3560  {
3561  if (m_caster->HasAura(56374)) // Glyph of Icy Veins
3562  {
3563  // not exist spell do it so apply directly
3564  m_caster->RemoveSpellsCausingAura(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DECREASE_SPEED);
3565  m_caster->RemoveSpellsCausingAura(SPELL_AURA_HASTE_SPELLS);
3566  }
3567  }
3568  break;
3569  }
3570  case SPELLFAMILY_WARRIOR:
3571  {
3572  // Shield Slam
3573  if ((m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000020000000000)) && m_spellInfo->Category == 1209)
3574  {
3575  if (m_caster->HasAura(58375)) // Glyph of Blocking
3576  AddTriggeredSpell(58374); // Glyph of Blocking
3577  }
3578  // Bloodrage
3579  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000000100))
3580  {
3581  if (m_caster->HasAura(70844)) // Item - Warrior T10 Protection 4P Bonus
3582  AddTriggeredSpell(70845); // Stoicism
3583  }
3584  // Bloodsurge (triggered), Sudden Death (triggered)
3585  else if (m_spellInfo->Id == 46916 || m_spellInfo->Id == 52437)
3586  // Item - Warrior T10 Melee 4P Bonus
3587  if (Aura* aur = m_caster->GetAura(70847, EFFECT_INDEX_0))
3588  if (roll_chance_i(aur->GetModifier()->m_amount))
3589  AddTriggeredSpell(70849); // Extra Charge!
3590  break;
3591  }
3592  case SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST:
3593  {
3594  // Power Word: Shield
3595  if (m_spellInfo->Mechanic == MECHANIC_SHIELD &&
3596  (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000000001)))
3597  AddPrecastSpell(6788); // Weakened Soul
3598 
3599  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
3600  {
3601  case 15237: AddTriggeredSpell(23455); break;// Holy Nova, rank 1
3602  case 15430: AddTriggeredSpell(23458); break;// Holy Nova, rank 2
3603  case 15431: AddTriggeredSpell(23459); break;// Holy Nova, rank 3
3604  case 27799: AddTriggeredSpell(27803); break;// Holy Nova, rank 4
3605  case 27800: AddTriggeredSpell(27804); break;// Holy Nova, rank 5
3606  case 27801: AddTriggeredSpell(27805); break;// Holy Nova, rank 6
3607  case 25331: AddTriggeredSpell(25329); break;// Holy Nova, rank 7
3608  case 48077: AddTriggeredSpell(48075); break;// Holy Nova, rank 8
3609  case 48078: AddTriggeredSpell(48076); break;// Holy Nova, rank 9
3610  default: break;
3611  }
3612  break;
3613  }
3614  case SPELLFAMILY_DRUID:
3615  {
3616  // Faerie Fire (Feral)
3617  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 16857 && m_caster->GetShapeshiftForm() != FORM_CAT)
3618  AddTriggeredSpell(60089);
3619  // Clearcasting
3620  else if (m_spellInfo->Id == 16870)
3621  {
3622  if (m_caster->HasAura(70718)) // Item - Druid T10 Balance 2P Bonus
3623  AddPrecastSpell(70721); // Omen of Doom
3624  }
3625  // Berserk (Bear Mangle part)
3626  else if (m_spellInfo->Id == 50334)
3627  AddTriggeredSpell(58923);
3628  break;
3629  }
3630  case SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE:
3631  // Fan of Knives (main hand)
3632  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 51723 && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_caster->hasOffhandWeaponForAttack())
3633  {
3634  AddTriggeredSpell(52874); // Fan of Knives (offhand)
3635  }
3636  break;
3637  case SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER:
3638  {
3639  // Deterrence
3640  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 19263)
3641  AddPrecastSpell(67801);
3642  break;
3643  }
3644  case SPELLFAMILY_PALADIN:
3645  {
3646  // Divine Illumination
3647  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 31842)
3648  {
3649  if (m_caster->HasAura(70755)) // Item - Paladin T10 Holy 2P Bonus
3650  AddPrecastSpell(71166); // Divine Illumination
3651  }
3652  // Hand of Reckoning
3653  else if (m_spellInfo->Id == 62124)
3654  {
3655  if (!m_targets.getUnitTarget() || !m_targets.getUnitTarget()->HasTarget(m_caster->GetObjectGuid()))
3656  AddPrecastSpell(67485); // Hand of Rekoning (no typos in name ;) )
3657  }
3658  // Divine Shield, Divine Protection or Hand of Protection
3659  else if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000400080))
3660  {
3661  AddPrecastSpell(25771); // Forbearance
3662  AddPrecastSpell(61987); // Avenging Wrath Marker
3663  }
3664  // Lay on Hands
3665  else if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000008000))
3666  {
3667  // only for self cast
3668  if (m_caster == m_targets.getUnitTarget())
3669  AddPrecastSpell(25771); // Forbearance
3670  }
3671  // Avenging Wrath
3672  else if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000200000000000))
3673  AddPrecastSpell(61987); // Avenging Wrath Marker
3674  break;
3675  }
3676  case SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN:
3677  {
3678  // Bloodlust
3679  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 2825)
3680  AddPrecastSpell(57724); // Sated
3681  // Heroism
3682  else if (m_spellInfo->Id == 32182)
3683  AddPrecastSpell(57723); // Exhaustion
3684  // Spirit Walk
3685  else if (m_spellInfo->Id == 58875)
3686  AddPrecastSpell(58876);
3687  // Totem of Wrath
3688  else if (m_spellInfo->Effect[EFFECT_INDEX_0] == SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AREA_AURA_RAID && m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000004000000))
3689  // only for main totem spell cast
3690  AddTriggeredSpell(30708); // Totem of Wrath
3691  break;
3692  }
3693  case SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT:
3694  {
3695  // Chains of Ice
3696  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 45524)
3697  AddTriggeredSpell(55095); // Frost Fever
3698  break;
3699  }
3700  default:
3701  break;
3702  }
3703 
3704  // traded items have trade slot instead of guid in m_itemTargetGUID
3705  // set to real guid to be sent later to the client
3706  m_targets.updateTradeSlotItem();
3707 
3708  m_duration = CalculateSpellDuration(m_spellInfo, m_caster, nullptr, m_auraScript);
3709  if (m_trueCaster->IsPlayer())
3710  {
3711  if (!m_IsTriggeredSpell && m_CastItem)
3712  static_cast<Player*>(m_caster)->GetAchievementMgr().UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_USE_ITEM, m_CastItem->GetEntry());
3713 
3714  static_cast<Player*>(m_caster)->GetAchievementMgr().UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_CAST_SPELL, m_spellInfo->Id);
3715  }
3716 
3717  FillTargetMap();
3718 
3719  if (m_spellState == SPELL_STATE_FINISHED) // stop cast if spell marked as finish somewhere in FillTargetMap
3720  {
3721  m_trueCaster->DecreaseCastCounter();
3722  SetExecutedCurrently(false);
3723  return SPELL_FAILED_ERROR; // currently not propagating right error here but it should not be needed
3724  }
3725 
3726  spellModController.SetSuccess();
3727 
3728  if (Unit* unitCaster = dynamic_cast<Unit*>(m_trueCaster))
3729  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_DISMISS_PET_FIRST))
3730  if (Pet* pet = unitCaster->GetPet())
3731  pet->Unsummon(PET_SAVE_NOT_IN_SLOT, unitCaster);
3732 
3733  // CAST SPELL
3734  SendSpellCooldown();
3735  if (m_notifyAI && m_caster && m_caster->AI())
3736  m_caster->AI()->OnSpellCooldownAdded(m_spellInfo);
3737 
3738  TakePower();
3739  TakeReagents(); // we must remove reagents before HandleEffects to allow place crafted item in same slot
3740  TakeAmmo();
3741 
3742  SendCastResult(castResult);
3743  SendSpellGo(); // we must send smsg_spell_go packet before m_castItem delete in TakeCastItem()...
3744 
3745  InitializeDamageMultipliers();
3746 
3747  OnCast();
3748 
3749  if (!m_IsTriggeredSpell && !m_trueCaster->IsGameObject() && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_NOT_AN_ACTION))
3750  m_caster->RemoveAurasOnCast(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_ACTION_LATE, m_spellInfo);
3751 
3752  // process immediate effects (items, ground, etc.) also initialize some variables
3753  _handle_immediate_phase();
3754 
3755  Unit* procTarget = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
3756  if (!procTarget)
3757  procTarget = m_caster;
3758 
3759  // Okay, everything is prepared. Now we need to distinguish between immediate and evented delayed spells
3760  if (IsDelayedSpell())
3761  {
3762  // For channels, delay starts at channel end
3763  if (m_spellState != SPELL_STATE_CHANNELING)
3764  {
3765  // Okay, maps created, now prepare flags
3766  m_spellState = SPELL_STATE_TRAVELING;
3767  SetDelayStart(0);
3768  SetSpellStartTravelling(m_caster->GetMap()->GetCurrentMSTime());
3769 
3770  if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_NO_THREAT) &&
3771  !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_THREAT_ONLY_ON_MISS) &&
3772  !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_NO_INITIAL_THREAT)) // attribute checks
3773  {
3774  if (m_caster && m_caster->IsPlayerControlled()) // only player casters
3775  {
3776  if (Unit* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget())
3777  {
3778  for (auto const& ihit : m_UniqueTargetInfo)
3779  {
3780  if (target->GetObjectGuid() == ihit.targetGUID) // Found in list
3781  {
3782  if (m_caster->CanAttack(target)) // can attack
3783  if ((!IsPositiveEffectMask(m_spellInfo, ihit.effectMask, m_caster, target)
3784  && m_caster->IsVisibleForOrDetect(target, target, false)
3785  && m_caster->CanEnterCombat() && target->CanEnterCombat())) // can see and enter combat
3786  {
3787  m_caster->SetInCombatWithVictim(target);
3788  m_caster->GetCombatManager().TriggerCombatTimer(uint32(ihit.timeDelay + 500));
3789  }
3790  break;
3791  }
3792  }
3793  }
3794  }
3795  }
3796  }
3797 
3798  // on spell cast end proc,
3799  // critical hit related part is currently done on hit so proc there,
3800  // 0 damage since any damage based procs should be on hit
3801  // 0 victim proc since there is no victim proc dependent on successfull cast for caster
3802  Unit::ProcDamageAndSpell(ProcSystemArguments(m_caster, procTarget, PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT, 0, PROC_EX_CAST_END, 0, m_attackType, m_spellInfo));
3803  }
3804  else
3805  {
3806  Unit::ProcDamageAndSpell(ProcSystemArguments(m_caster, procTarget, PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT, 0, PROC_EX_CAST_END, 0, m_attackType, m_spellInfo));
3807 
3808  // Immediate spell, no big deal
3809  handle_immediate();
3810  }
3811 
3812  m_trueCaster->DecreaseCastCounter();
3813  SetExecutedCurrently(false);
3814  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
3815 }
3816 
3817 void Spell::handle_immediate()
3818 {
3819  // AOE caps implementation - only works for non-travelling spells
3820  ProcessAOECaps();
3821 
3822  for (auto& ihit : m_UniqueTargetInfo)
3823  DoAllEffectOnTarget(&ihit);
3824 
3825  for (auto& ihit : m_uniqueCorpseTargetInfo)
3826  DoAllEffectOnTarget(&ihit);
3827 
3828  for (auto& ihit : m_UniqueGOTargetInfo)
3829  DoAllEffectOnTarget(&ihit);
3830 
3831  // spell is finished, perform some last features of the spell here
3832  _handle_finish_phase();
3833 
3834  if (m_spellState != SPELL_STATE_CHANNELING)
3835  finish(); // successfully finish spell cast (not last in case autorepeat or channel spell)
3836 }
3837 
3838 uint64 Spell::handle_delayed(uint64 t_offset)
3839 {
3840  SpellModRAII spellModController(this, m_trueCaster->GetSpellModOwner(), true);
3841 
3842  uint64 next_time = 0;
3843 
3844  if (m_destTargetInfo.effectMaskProcessed != m_destTargetInfo.effectMask)
3845  {
3846  if (m_destTargetInfo.timeDelay <= t_offset)
3847  DoAllTargetlessEffects(true);
3848  else if (next_time == 0 || m_destTargetInfo.timeDelay < next_time)
3849  next_time = m_destTargetInfo.timeDelay;
3850  }
3851 
3852  // now recheck units targeting correctness (need before any effects apply to prevent adding immunity at first effect not allow apply second spell effect and similar cases)
3853  for (auto& ihit : m_UniqueTargetInfo)
3854  {
3855  if (!ihit.processed)
3856  {
3857  if (ihit.timeDelay <= t_offset)
3858  {
3859  if (ihit.procReflect)
3860  {
3861  ihit.timeDelay = ihit.initialDelay / 2; // return it at twice the speed
3862  ihit.procReflect = false;
3863  ProcReflectProcs(ihit);
3864  if (next_time == 0 || ihit.timeDelay < next_time)
3865  next_time = ihit.timeDelay;
3866  }
3867  else
3868  DoAllEffectOnTarget(&ihit);
3869  }
3870  else if (next_time == 0 || ihit.timeDelay < next_time)
3871  next_time = ihit.timeDelay;
3872  }
3873  }
3874 
3875  // now recheck gameobject targeting correctness
3876  for (auto& ighit : m_UniqueGOTargetInfo)
3877  {
3878  if (!ighit.processed)
3879  {
3880  if (ighit.timeDelay <= t_offset)
3881  DoAllEffectOnTarget(&ighit);
3882  else if (next_time == 0 || ighit.timeDelay < next_time)
3883  next_time = ighit.timeDelay;
3884  }
3885  }
3886  // All targets passed - need finish phase
3887  if (next_time == 0)
3888  {
3889  // spell is finished, perform some last features of the spell here
3890  _handle_finish_phase();
3891 
3892  finish(); // successfully finish spell cast
3893 
3894  // return zero, spell is finished now
3895  return 0;
3896  }
3897  // spell is unfinished, return next execution time
3898  return next_time;
3899 }
3900 
3901 void Spell::_handle_immediate_phase()
3902 {
3903  m_spellState = SPELL_STATE_LANDING;
3904 
3905  if (m_caster && IsMeleeAttackResetSpell() && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX7_RESET_SWING_TIMER_AT_SPELL_START))
3906  {
3907  if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_DOESNT_RESET_SWING_TIMER_IF_INSTANT) || GetCastTime() != 0)
3908  {
3909  if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_DO_NOT_RESET_COMBAT_TIMERS))
3910  {
3911  m_caster->resetAttackTimer(BASE_ATTACK);
3912  if (m_caster->hasOffhandWeaponForAttack())
3913  m_caster->resetAttackTimer(OFF_ATTACK);
3914  }
3915  }
3916  }
3917 
3918  // handle some immediate features of the spell here
3919  HandleThreatSpells();
3920 
3921  // handle none targeted effects
3922  DoAllTargetlessEffects(false);
3923 
3924  // process items
3925  for (auto& ihit : m_UniqueItemInfo)
3926  DoAllEffectOnTarget(&ihit);
3927 
3928  // take cast item after processing items
3929  TakeCastItem();
3930 
3931  // fill initial spell damage from caster for immediate effects
3932  for (auto& ihit : m_UniqueTargetInfo)
3933  HandleImmediateEffectExecution(&ihit);
3934 
3935  // process self immediately
3936  for (auto& ihit : m_UniqueTargetInfo)
3937  {
3938  if (ihit.targetGUID == m_trueCaster->GetObjectGuid())
3939  {
3940  DoAllEffectOnTarget(&ihit);
3941  break;
3942  }
3943  }
3944 
3945  // must be after self
3946  if (!IsDelayedSpell())
3947  DoAllTargetlessEffects(true);
3948 
3949  ProcSpellAuraTriggers();
3950 
3951  // start channeling if applicable (after _handle_immediate_phase for get persistent effect dynamic object for channel target
3952  if (IsChanneledSpell(m_spellInfo) && m_duration)
3953  {
3954  m_spellState = SPELL_STATE_CHANNELING;
3955  SendChannelStart(m_duration);
3956  }
3957 }
3958 
3959 void Spell::_handle_finish_phase()
3960 {
3961  // spell log
3962  if (m_needSpellLog)
3963  m_spellLog.SendToSet();
3964 
3965  if (m_caster && m_caster->m_extraAttacks && IsSpellHaveEffect(m_spellInfo, SPELL_EFFECT_ADD_EXTRA_ATTACKS))
3966  {
3967  if (Unit* target = m_caster->GetVictim())
3968  m_caster->DoExtraAttacks(target);
3969  else
3970  m_caster->m_extraAttacks = 0;
3971  }
3972 }
3973 
3974 void Spell::ProcessAOECaps()
3975 {
3976  if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_SS_AOE_CAP))
3977  return;
3978 
3979  uint32 i;
3980  for (i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
3981  if (m_spellInfo->Effect[i] == SPELL_EFFECT_SCHOOL_DAMAGE)
3982  break;
3983 
3984  uint32 aggregatedDamage = 0;
3985  uint32 count = 0;
3986  for (auto& ihit : m_UniqueTargetInfo)
3987  {
3988  if (ihit.effectMask & (1 << i))
3989  {
3990  aggregatedDamage += ihit.damage;
3991  ++count;
3992  }
3993  }
3994 
3995  int32 value = CalculateSpellEffectValue(SpellEffectIndex(i), nullptr, true) * 10;
3996  if (int32(aggregatedDamage) > value)
3997  {
3998  for (auto& ihit : m_UniqueTargetInfo)
3999  ihit.damage = (value / count);
4000  }
4001 }
4002 
4003 void Spell::SetCastItem(Item* item)
4004 {
4005  m_CastItem = item;
4006  if (item)
4007  m_itemCastSpell = true;
4008 }
4009 
4010 void Spell::SendSpellCooldown()
4011 {
4012  bool permanent = m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_COOLDOWN_ON_EVENT);
4013  if (m_trueCaster->IsPlayer())
4014  {
4015  Player* casterPlayer = static_cast<Player*>(m_caster);
4016  uint32 category = m_spellInfo->Category;
4017  if (m_CastItem)
4018  {
4019  for (const auto& spell : m_CastItem->GetProto()->Spells)
4020  {
4021  if (spell.SpellId == m_spellInfo->Id && spell.SpellCategory)
4022  {
4023  category = spell.SpellCategory;
4024  break;
4025  }
4026  }
4027  }
4028  if (category)
4029  {
4030  if (SpellCategoryEntry const* categoryEntry = sSpellCategoryStore.LookupEntry(category))
4031  {
4032  if (categoryEntry->Flags & SPELL_CATEGORY_FLAG_EVENT_ON_LEAVE_COMBAT)
4033  {
4034  // need in some way provided data for Spell::finish SendCooldownEvent
4035  if (m_CastItem && m_CastItem->IsPotion())
4036  casterPlayer->SetLastPotionId(m_CastItem->GetEntry());
4037 
4038  permanent |= true;
4039  casterPlayer->SetCooldownEventOnLeaveCombatSpellId(m_spellInfo->Id);
4040  }
4041  }
4042  }
4043  }
4044 
4045  // (SPELL_ATTR_DISABLED_WHILE_ACTIVE) have infinity cooldown, (SPELL_ATTR_PASSIVE) passive cooldown at triggering
4046  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_PASSIVE) || m_channelOnly)
4047  return;
4048 
4049  m_trueCaster->AddCooldown(*m_spellInfo, m_CastItem ? m_CastItem->GetProto() : nullptr, permanent);
4050 }
4051 
4052 void Spell::update(uint32 difftime)
4053 {
4054  if (!m_updated)
4055  {
4056  m_updated = true;
4057  if (m_creationTime == m_trueCaster->GetMap()->GetCurrentMSTime()) // do not update in the same tick as created
4058  return;
4059  }
4060 
4061  // update pointers based at it's GUIDs
4062  UpdatePointers();
4063 
4064  if (m_targets.getUnitTargetGuid() && !m_targets.getUnitTarget())
4065  {
4066  cancel();
4067  return;
4068  }
4069 
4070  // check if the player or unit caster has moved before the spell finished (exclude casting on vehicles)
4071  if ((m_trueCaster->IsUnit() && m_timer != 0) &&
4072  (m_castPositionX != m_trueCaster->GetPositionX() || m_castPositionY != m_trueCaster->GetPositionY() || m_castPositionZ != m_trueCaster->GetPositionZ()) &&
4073  (m_spellInfo->Effect[EFFECT_INDEX_0] != SPELL_EFFECT_STUCK || !m_trueCaster->m_movementInfo.HasMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_FALLINGFAR)))
4074  {
4075  // always cancel for channeled spells
4076  if (m_spellState == SPELL_STATE_CHANNELING)
4077  {
4078  if (m_spellInfo->ChannelInterruptFlags & AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_MOVING && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_ALLOW_ACTIONS_DURING_CHANNEL))
4079  cancel();
4080  }
4081  // don't cancel for melee, autorepeat, triggered and instant spells
4082  else if (!IsNextMeleeSwingSpell(m_spellInfo) && !IsAutoRepeat() && !m_IsTriggeredSpell && (m_spellInfo->InterruptFlags & SPELL_INTERRUPT_FLAG_MOVEMENT))
4083  cancel();
4084  }
4085 
4086  switch (m_spellState)
4087  {
4088  case SPELL_STATE_CASTING:
4089  {
4090  if (m_timer)
4091  {
4092  if (difftime >= m_timer)
4093  m_timer = 0;
4094  else
4095  m_timer -= difftime;
4096  }
4097 
4098  if (m_timer == 0 && !IsNextMeleeSwingSpell(m_spellInfo) && !IsAutoRepeat())
4099  cast();
4100  } break;
4101  case SPELL_STATE_CHANNELING:
4102  {
4103  if (m_timer > 0)
4104  {
4105  if (m_trueCaster->IsUnit())
4106  {
4107  // check if player has jumped before the channeling finished
4108  if (m_caster->m_movementInfo.HasMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_FALLING))
4109  cancel();
4110 
4111  // check for incapacitating player states
4112  if (m_caster->IsCrowdControlled())
4113  {
4114  // certain channel spells are not interrupted
4115  if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_IS_CHANNELED) && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_IGNORE_CASTER_AND_TARGET_RESTRICTIONS))
4116  cancel();
4117  }
4118 
4119  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_SPECIAL_TAMING_FLAG)) // these fail on lost target attention (aggro)
4120  {
4121  if (Unit* target = dynamic_cast<Unit*>(m_caster->GetChannelObject()))
4122  {
4123  Unit* targetsTarget = target->GetTarget();
4124  if (targetsTarget && targetsTarget != m_caster)
4125  cancel();
4126  }
4127  }
4128 
4129  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_TRACK_TARGET_IN_CHANNEL) && m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin() != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end())
4130  {
4131  if (WorldObject* target = m_caster->GetChannelObject())
4132  {
4133  if (target != m_caster)
4134  {
4135  float orientation = m_caster->GetAngle(target);
4136  if (!m_caster->IsClientControlled())
4137  {
4138  m_caster->SetOrientation(orientation);
4139  m_caster->SetFacingTo(orientation);
4140  }
4141  m_castOrientation = orientation; // need to update cast orientation due to the attribute
4142  }
4143  }
4144  }
4145 
4146  // check if player has turned if flag is set
4147  if (m_spellInfo->ChannelInterruptFlags & AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_TURNING)
4148  {
4149  switch (m_caster->GetTypeId())
4150  {
4151  case TYPEID_UNIT:
4152  if (m_castOrientation != m_caster->GetOrientation())
4153  cancel();
4154  break;
4155  case TYPEID_PLAYER:
4156  {
4157  float targetOrientationDiff = 0.10f; // Diff due to client server mismatch
4158  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_TRACK_TARGET_IN_CHANNEL)) // On start, client turns player to face object, need leeway so that we dont break unnecessarily
4159  targetOrientationDiff += M_PI_F * (std::max(1200 - (m_duration - int32(m_timer)), 0) / 1200.f);
4160  if ((M_PI_F - std::abs(std::abs(m_castOrientation - m_caster->GetOrientation()) - M_PI_F)) > targetOrientationDiff)
4161  cancel();
4162  }
4163  }
4164  }
4165 
4166  // need check distance for channeled target only - but only when its set
4167  if (m_maxRange && !m_caster->HasChannelObject(m_caster->GetObjectGuid()))
4168  {
4169  if (WorldObject* channelTarget = m_caster->GetChannelObject())
4170  {
4171  if (!m_caster->IsWithinCombatDistInMap(channelTarget, m_maxRange * 1.5f))
4172  {
4173  cancel();
4174  }
4175  }
4176  }
4177  }
4178 
4179  // check if there are alive targets left
4180  if (!IsAliveUnitPresentInTargetList())
4181  {
4182  SendChannelUpdate(0);
4183  finish();
4184  }
4185 
4186  if (difftime >= m_timer)
4187  m_timer = 0;
4188  else
4189  m_timer -= difftime;
4190  }
4191 
4192  if (m_timer == 0)
4193  {
4194  SendChannelUpdate(0, difftime);
4195 
4196  // channeled spell processed independently for quest targeting
4197  // cast at creature (or GO) quest objectives update at successful cast channel finished
4198  // ignore autorepeat/melee casts for speed (not exist quest for spells (hm... )
4199  if (!IsAutoRepeat() && !IsNextMeleeSwingSpell(m_spellInfo))
4200  {
4201  if (Player* p = m_caster->GetBeneficiaryPlayer())
4202  {
4203  for (TargetList::const_iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
4204  {
4205  TargetInfo const& target = *ihit;
4206  if (!target.targetGUID.IsCreatureOrVehicle())
4207  continue;
4208 
4209  Unit* unit = m_trueCaster->GetObjectGuid() == target.targetGUID ? m_caster : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_trueCaster, target.targetGUID);
4210  if (unit == nullptr)
4211  continue;
4212 
4213  p->RewardPlayerAndGroupAtCast(unit, m_spellInfo->Id);
4214  }
4215 
4216  for (GOTargetList::const_iterator ihit = m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
4217  {
4218  GOTargetInfo const& target = *ihit;
4219 
4220  GameObject* go = m_trueCaster->GetMap()->GetGameObject(target.targetGUID);
4221  if (!go)
4222  continue;
4223 
4224  p->RewardPlayerAndGroupAtCast(go, m_spellInfo->Id);
4225  }
4226  }
4227  }
4228 
4229  if (GetSpellSpeed() > 0.0f)
4230  {
4231  // Okay, maps created, now prepare flags
4232  m_spellState = SPELL_STATE_TRAVELING;
4233  SetDelayStart(0);
4234  SetSpellStartTravelling(m_trueCaster->GetMap()->GetCurrentMSTime());
4235  }
4236  else
4237  finish();
4238  }
4239  } break;
4240  default:
4241  {
4242  } break;
4243  }
4244 }
4245 
4246 void Spell::finish(bool ok)
4247 {
4248  if (!m_trueCaster)
4249  return;
4250 
4251  if (m_spellState == SPELL_STATE_FINISHED)
4252  return;
4253 
4254  bool channeledChannel = m_spellState == SPELL_STATE_CHANNELING;
4255  m_spellState = SPELL_STATE_FINISHED;
4256 
4257  if (m_notifyAI && m_caster && m_caster->AI())
4258  m_caster->AI()->OnSpellCastStateChange(this, false);
4259 
4260  // other code related only to successfully finished spells
4261  if (!ok)
4262  return;
4263 
4264  // Heal caster for all health leech from all targets
4265  if (m_healthLeech)
4266  {
4267  uint32 absorb = 0;
4268  m_caster->CalculateHealAbsorb(uint32(m_healthLeech), &absorb);
4269  m_caster->DealHeal(m_caster, uint32(m_healthLeech) - absorb, m_spellInfo, false, absorb);
4270  }
4271 
4272  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_DISCOUNT_POWER_ON_MISS) || m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_FINISHING_MOVE_DAMAGE))
4273  {
4274  for (TargetList::const_iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
4275  {
4276  bool end = false;
4277  switch (ihit->missCondition)
4278  {
4279  case SPELL_MISS_MISS:
4280  case SPELL_MISS_DODGE:
4281  case SPELL_MISS_PARRY:
4282  case SPELL_MISS_DEFLECT:
4283  {
4284  float coeff = 0.8f;
4285  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_FINISHING_MOVE_DAMAGE)) // optimization in wotlk because no other utilize it
4286  {
4287  coeff = 1;
4288  if (Player* modOwner = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner())
4289  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_SPELL_COST_REFUND_ON_FAIL, coeff);
4290  coeff = 1 - coeff;
4291  }
4292  if (coeff > 0)
4293  m_caster->ModifyPower(Powers(m_spellInfo->powerType), int32(float(m_powerCost) * coeff));
4294  end = true;
4295  break;
4296  }
4297  default:
4298  break;
4299  }
4300  if (end)
4301  break;
4302  }
4303  }
4304 
4305  OnSuccessfulFinish();
4306 
4307  // Clear combo at finish state
4308  if (m_trueCaster->IsPlayer() && NeedsComboPoints(m_spellInfo))
4309  {
4310  // Not drop combopoints if negative spell and if any miss on enemy exist
4311  bool needDrop = true;
4312  if (!IsPositiveSpell(m_spellInfo->Id))
4313  {
4314  for (TargetList::const_iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
4315  {
4316  if (ihit->missCondition != SPELL_MISS_NONE && ihit->targetGUID != m_caster->GetObjectGuid())
4317  {
4318  needDrop = false;
4319  break;
4320  }
4321  }
4322  }
4323  if (needDrop)
4324  m_caster->ClearComboPoints();
4325  }
4326 
4327  // potions disabled by client, send event "not in combat" if need
4328  if (m_trueCaster->IsPlayer())
