4329  static_cast<Player*>(m_caster)->UpdatePotionCooldown(this);
4330 
4331  // call triggered spell only at successful cast (after clear combo points -> for add some if need)
4332  if (!m_TriggerSpells.empty())
4333  CastTriggerSpells();
4334 
4335  // Stop Attack for some spells
4336  if (m_caster && m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_CANCELS_AUTO_ATTACK_COMBAT))
4337  {
4338  if (IsRangedSpell()) // blizzlike order
4339  m_caster->InterruptSpell(CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL);
4340 
4341  m_caster->AttackStop();
4342 
4343  if (m_caster->IsClientControlled())
4344  const_cast<Player*>(m_caster->GetClientControlling())->SendAttackSwingCancelAttack();
4345  }
4346 
4347  // update encounter state if needed
4348  if (m_trueCaster->IsInWorld()) // some teleport spells put caster in between maps, need to check
4349  {
4350  Map* map = m_trueCaster->GetMap();
4351  if (map->IsDungeon())
4352  ((DungeonMap*)map)->GetPersistanceState()->UpdateEncounterState(ENCOUNTER_CREDIT_CAST_SPELL, m_spellInfo->Id);
4353  }
4354 }
4355 
4356 void Spell::SendCastResult(SpellCastResult result) const
4357 {
4358  if (m_triggeredByAuraSpell) // should not report these
4359  return;
4360 
4361  Player const* recipient;
4362  if (!m_trueCaster->IsPlayer())
4363  {
4364  if (m_petCast)
4365  {
4366  Player const* master = m_caster->GetControllingPlayer();
4367  if (!master)
4368  return;
4369 
4370  recipient = master;
4371  }
4372  else
4373  return;
4374  }
4375  else
4376  recipient = static_cast<Player*>(m_caster);
4377 
4378  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX7_REPORT_SPELL_FAILURE_TO_UNIT_TARGET))
4379  if (Unit* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget())
4380  if (target->IsPlayer())
4381  recipient = static_cast<Player*>(target);
4382 
4383  if (recipient->GetSession()->PlayerLoading()) // don't send cast results at loading time
4384  return;
4385 
4386  uint32 param1 = m_param1, param2 = m_param2;
4387  if (m_spellScript)
4388  m_spellScript->OnSpellCastResultOverride(result, param1, param2);
4389  SendCastResult(recipient, m_spellInfo, m_cast_count, result, m_petCast, param1, param2);
4390 }
4391 
4392 void Spell::SendCastResult(Player const* caster, SpellEntry const* spellInfo, uint8 cast_count, SpellCastResult result, bool isPetCastResult /*=false*/, uint32 param1 /*=0*/, uint32 param2 /*=0*/)
4393 {
4394  if (result == SPELL_CAST_OK)
4395  return;
4396 
4397  if (spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_DO_NOT_REPORT_SPELL_FAILURE))
4398  result = SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
4399 
4400  WorldPacket data(isPetCastResult ? SMSG_PET_CAST_FAILED : SMSG_CAST_RESULT, (4 + 1 + 2));
4401  data << uint8(cast_count); // single cast or multi 2.3 (0/1)
4402  data << uint32(spellInfo->Id);
4403  data << uint8(!IsPassiveSpell(spellInfo) ? result : SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT); // do not report failed passive spells
4404  switch (result)
4405  {
4406  case SPELL_FAILED_NOT_READY:
4407  if (spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_COOLDOWN_ON_EVENT))
4408  data << uint32(caster->IsSpellOnPermanentCooldown(*spellInfo));
4409  break;
4410  case SPELL_FAILED_REQUIRES_SPELL_FOCUS:
4411  data << uint32(spellInfo->RequiresSpellFocus); // SpellFocusObject.dbc id
4412  break;
4413  case SPELL_FAILED_REQUIRES_AREA:
4414  // hardcode areas limitation case
4415  switch (spellInfo->Id)
4416  {
4417  case 41617: // Cenarion Mana Salve
4418  case 41619: // Cenarion Healing Salve
4419  data << uint32(3905);
4420  break;
4421  case 41618: // Bottled Nethergon Energy
4422  case 41620: // Bottled Nethergon Vapor
4423  data << uint32(3842);
4424  break;
4425  case 45373: // Bloodberry Elixir
4426  data << uint32(4075);
4427  break;
4428  default: // default case (don't must be)
4429  data << uint32(0);
4430  break;
4431  }
4432  break;
4433  case SPELL_FAILED_TOTEMS:
4434  for (unsigned int i : spellInfo->Totem)
4435  if (i)
4436  data << uint32(i); // client needs only one id, not 2...
4437  break;
4438  case SPELL_FAILED_TOTEM_CATEGORY:
4439  for (unsigned int i : spellInfo->TotemCategory)
4440  if (i)
4441  data << uint32(i);// client needs only one id, not 2...
4442  break;
4443  case SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS:
4444  case SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS_MAINHAND:
4445  case SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS_OFFHAND:
4446  data << uint32(spellInfo->EquippedItemClass);
4447  data << uint32(spellInfo->EquippedItemSubClassMask);
4448  break;
4449  case SPELL_FAILED_PREVENTED_BY_MECHANIC:
4450  data << param1; // SpellMechanic.dbc id
4451  break;
4452  case SPELL_FAILED_CUSTOM_ERROR:
4453  data << param1; // custom error id (see enum SpellCastResultCustom)
4454  break;
4455  case SPELL_FAILED_NEED_EXOTIC_AMMO:
4456  data << uint32(spellInfo->EquippedItemSubClassMask);// seems correct...
4457  break;
4458  case SPELL_FAILED_REAGENTS:
4459  data << param1; // item id
4460  break;
4461  case SPELL_FAILED_NEED_MORE_ITEMS:
4462  data << param1;
4463  data << param2;
4464  break;
4465  case SPELL_FAILED_MIN_SKILL:
4466  data << uint32(0); // SkillLine.dbc id
4467  data << uint32(0); // required skill value
4468  break;
4469  case SPELL_FAILED_TOO_MANY_OF_ITEM:
4470  data << param1; // ItemLimitCategory.dbc id
4471  break;
4472  case SPELL_FAILED_FISHING_TOO_LOW:
4473  data << uint32(0); // required fishing skill
4474  break;
4475  default:
4476  break;
4477  }
4478  caster->GetSession()->SendPacket(data);
4479 }
4480 
4481 void Spell::SendSpellStart() const
4482 {
4483  if (!IsNeedSendToClient())
4484  return;
4485 
4486  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "Sending SMSG_SPELL_START id=%u", m_spellInfo->Id);
4487 
4488  uint32 castFlags = CAST_FLAG_UNKNOWN2;
4489  if (m_triggeredByAuraSpell || m_hideInCombatLog)
4490  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_HIDDEN_COMBATLOG;
4491 
4492  uint32 schoolImmunityMask = 0;
4493  uint32 mechanicImmunityMask = 0;
4494  if (m_trueCaster->IsUnit())
4495  {
4496  schoolImmunityMask = static_cast<Unit*>(m_caster)->GetSchoolImmunityMask();
4497  mechanicImmunityMask = static_cast<Unit*>(m_caster)->GetMechanicImmunityMask();
4498  }
4499 
4500  if (schoolImmunityMask || mechanicImmunityMask)
4501  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_IMMUNITY;
4502 
4503  if (IsSpellRequiringAmmo())
4504  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_AMMO;
4505 
4506  if (HasPersistentAuraEffect(m_spellInfo))
4507  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_PERSISTENT_AA;
4508 
4509  if (m_spellInfo->runeCostID && m_spellInfo->powerType == POWER_RUNE)
4510  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_NO_GCD; // not needed, but B sends it
4511 
4512  if ((m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION) && (m_targets.getSpeed() > 0.0f))
4513  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_ADJUST_MISSILE; // spell has trajectory
4514 
4515  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELL_START, (8 + 8 + 4 + 4 + 2));
4516  if (m_CastItem)
4517  data << m_CastItem->GetPackGUID();
4518  else
4519  data << m_trueCaster->GetPackGUID();
4520 
4521  if (m_trueCaster->IsGameObject()) // write empty guid if GO
4522  data << ObjectGuid().WriteAsPacked();
4523  else
4524  data << m_caster->GetPackGUID();
4525 
4526  data << uint8(m_cast_count); // pending spell cast
4527  data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id); // spellId
4528  data << uint32(castFlags); // cast flags
4529  data << uint32(m_timer); // delay?
4530 
4531  data << m_targets;
4532 
4533  if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_AMMO) // projectile info
4534  WriteAmmoToPacket(data);
4535 
4536  if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_IMMUNITY) // cast immunity
4537  {
4538  data << uint32(schoolImmunityMask); // used for SetCastSchoolImmunities
4539  data << uint32(mechanicImmunityMask); // used for SetCastImmunities
4540  }
4541 
4542  m_trueCaster->SendMessageToSet(data, true);
4543 }
4544 
4545 void Spell::SendSpellGo()
4546 {
4547  // not send invisible spell casting
4548  if (!IsNeedSendToClient())
4549  return;
4550 
4551  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "Sending SMSG_SPELL_GO id=%u", m_spellInfo->Id);
4552 
4553  uint32 castFlags = CAST_FLAG_UNKNOWN9;
4554  if (m_triggeredByAuraSpell || m_hideInCombatLog)
4555  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_HIDDEN_COMBATLOG;
4556 
4557  if (IsSpellRequiringAmmo())
4558  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_AMMO; // arrows/bullets visual
4559 
4560  if (m_CastItem)
4561  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_UNKNOWN7;
4562 
4563  if (m_trueCaster->IsPlayer() && m_caster->getClass() == CLASS_DEATH_KNIGHT && m_spellInfo->runeCostID)
4564  {
4565  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_NO_GCD; // same as in SMSG_SPELL_START
4566  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_PREDICTED_RUNES; // rune cooldowns list
4567  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_PREDICTED_POWER;
4568  }
4569 
4570  if (m_powerCost && m_spellInfo->powerType != POWER_HEALTH)
4571  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_PREDICTED_POWER; // all powerCost spells have this
4572 
4573  if ((m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION) && (m_targets.getSpeed() > 0.0f))
4574  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_ADJUST_MISSILE; // spell has trajectory
4575 
4576  if (!m_spellInfo->StartRecoveryTime)
4577  castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_NO_GCD;
4578 
4579  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELL_GO, 50); // guess size
4580 
4581  if (m_CastItem)
4582  data << m_CastItem->GetPackGUID();
4583  else if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_RETAIN_ITEM_CAST) && m_forwardedCastItemGuid)
4584  data << m_forwardedCastItemGuid.WriteAsPacked();
4585  else
4586  data << m_trueCaster->GetPackGUID();
4587 
4588  if (m_trueCaster->IsGameObject()) // write empty guid if GO
4589  data << ObjectGuid().WriteAsPacked();
4590  else
4591  data << m_caster->GetPackGUID();
4592 
4593  data << uint8(m_cast_count); // pending spell cast?
4594  data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id); // spellId
4595  data << uint32(castFlags); // cast flags
4596  data << uint32(m_trueCaster->GetMap()->GetCurrentMSTime()); // timestamp
4597 
4598  WriteSpellGoTargets(data);
4599 
4600  data << m_targets;
4601 
4602  if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_PREDICTED_POWER) // predicted power
4603  data << uint32(m_caster->GetPower((Powers)m_spellInfo->powerType));
4604 
4605  if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_PREDICTED_RUNES) // predicted runes
4606  {
4607  uint8 runeMaskInitial = GetOldRuneState();
4608  uint8 runeMaskAfterCast = GetNewRuneState();
4609  data << uint8(runeMaskInitial); // runes state before
4610  data << uint8(runeMaskAfterCast); // runes state after
4611  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_RUNES; ++i)
4612  {
4613  uint8 mask = (1 << i);
4614  if (mask & runeMaskInitial && (!(mask & runeMaskAfterCast))) // usable before...but on cooldown now...
4615  {
4616  // float casts ensure the division is performed on floats as we need float result
4617  float baseCd = float(static_cast<Player*>(m_caster)->GetRuneBaseCooldown(i));
4618  data << uint8((baseCd - float(static_cast<Player*>(m_caster)->GetRuneCooldown(i))) / baseCd * 255);
4619  }
4620  }
4621  }
4622 
4623  if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_ADJUST_MISSILE) // adjust missile trajectory duration
4624  {
4625  data << float(m_targets.getElevation());
4626  data << uint32(m_delayMoment);
4627  }
4628 
4629  if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_AMMO) // projectile info
4630  WriteAmmoToPacket(data);
4631 
4632  if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_VISUAL_CHAIN) // spell visual chain effect
4633  {
4634  data << uint32(0); // SpellVisual.dbc id?
4635  data << uint32(0); // overrides previous field if > 0 and violencelevel client cvar < 2
4636  }
4637 
4638  bool sendDestLoc = false;
4639  uint32 destLocCounter = 0;
4640  if (m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
4641  {
4642  sendDestLoc = true;
4643  destLocCounter = m_trueCaster->GetDestLocCounter();
4644  m_trueCaster->IncrementDestLocCounter();
4645  data << uint8(destLocCounter); // The value increase for each time, can remind of a cast count for the spell
4646  }
4647 
4648  if (m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_VISUAL_CHAIN) // probably used (or can be used) with CAST_FLAG_VISUAL_CHAIN flag
4649  {
4650  data << uint32(0); // count
4651 
4652  // for(int = 0; i < count; ++i)
4653  //{
4654  // // position and guid?
4655  // data << float(0) << float(0) << float(0) << uint64(0);
4656  //}
4657  }
4658 
4659  if (!sendDestLoc)
4660  m_trueCaster->SendMessageToSet(data, true);
4661  else
4662  {
4663  WorldPacket destLocData(SMSG_NOTIFY_DEST_LOC_SPELL_CAST);
4664  destLocData << m_trueCaster->GetObjectGuid();
4665  destLocData << m_targets.getDestTransportGuid();
4666  destLocData << m_spellInfo->Id;
4667  destLocData << m_targets.m_srcPos.x << m_targets.m_srcPos.y << m_targets.m_srcPos.z;
4668  destLocData << m_targets.m_destPos.x << m_targets.m_destPos.y << m_targets.m_destPos.z;
4669  destLocData << float(m_targets.getElevation());
4670  destLocData << float(m_targets.getSpeed());
4671  destLocData << uint32(m_delayMoment);
4672  destLocData << uint32(destLocCounter);
4673  if (m_cast_count > 0)
4674  destLocData << uint32(m_cast_count);
4675 
4676  MaNGOS::SpellMessageDestLocDeliverer notifier(*m_trueCaster, data); // broadcast around caster normal packet to those who see caster
4677  Cell::VisitAllObjects(m_trueCaster->GetPositionX(), m_trueCaster->GetPositionY(), m_trueCaster->GetMap(), notifier, m_trueCaster->GetVisibilityData().GetVisibilityDistance());
4678  notifier.StopAccumulating(); // broadcast around destination to those who dont see caster
4679  float destX = m_targets.m_destPos.x, destY = m_targets.m_destPos.y;
4680  // TODO: Add transport coords transformation to real space for grid search
4681  Cell::VisitAllObjects(destX, destY, m_trueCaster->GetMap(), notifier, m_trueCaster->GetVisibilityData().GetVisibilityDistance());
4682  }
4683 }
4684 
4685 void Spell::WriteAmmoToPacket(WorldPacket& data) const
4686 {
4687  uint32 ammoInventoryType = 0;
4688  uint32 ammoDisplayID = 0;
4689 
4690  if (m_trueCaster->IsPlayer())
4691  {
4692  Item* pItem = ((Player*)m_caster)->GetWeaponForAttack(RANGED_ATTACK);
4693  if (pItem)
4694  {
4695  ammoInventoryType = pItem->GetProto()->InventoryType;
4696  if (ammoInventoryType == INVTYPE_THROWN)
4697  ammoDisplayID = pItem->GetProto()->DisplayInfoID;
4698  else
4699  {
4700  uint32 ammoID = ((Player*)m_caster)->GetUInt32Value(PLAYER_AMMO_ID);
4701  if (ammoID)
4702  {
4703  ItemPrototype const* pProto = ObjectMgr::GetItemPrototype(ammoID);
4704  if (pProto)
4705  {
4706  ammoDisplayID = pProto->DisplayInfoID;
4707  ammoInventoryType = pProto->InventoryType;
4708  }
4709  }
4710  else if (m_caster->GetDummyAura(46699)) // Requires No Ammo
4711  {
4712  ammoDisplayID = 5996; // normal arrow
4713  ammoInventoryType = INVTYPE_AMMO;
4714  }
4715  }
4716  }
4717  }
4718  else
4719  {
4720  uint32 nonRangedAmmoDisplayID = 0;
4721  uint32 nonRangedAmmoInventoryType = 0;
4722  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_VIRTUAL_ITEM_SLOT; ++i)
4723  {
4724  if (uint32 item_id = m_caster->GetUInt32Value(UNIT_VIRTUAL_ITEM_SLOT_ID + i))
4725  {
4726  if (ItemEntry const* itemEntry = sItemStore.LookupEntry(item_id))
4727  {
4728  if (itemEntry->Class == ITEM_CLASS_WEAPON)
4729  {
4730  switch (itemEntry->SubClass)
4731  {
4732  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_THROWN:
4733  ammoDisplayID = itemEntry->DisplayId;
4734  ammoInventoryType = itemEntry->InventoryType;
4735  break;
4736  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_BOW:
4737  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_CROSSBOW:
4738  ammoDisplayID = 5996; // is this need fixing?
4739  ammoInventoryType = INVTYPE_AMMO;
4740  break;
4741  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_GUN:
4742  ammoDisplayID = 5998; // is this need fixing?
4743  ammoInventoryType = INVTYPE_AMMO;
4744  break;
4745  default:
4746  nonRangedAmmoDisplayID = itemEntry->DisplayId;
4747  nonRangedAmmoInventoryType = itemEntry->InventoryType;
4748  break;
4749  }
4750 
4751  if (ammoDisplayID)
4752  break;
4753  }
4754  }
4755  }
4756  }
4757 
4758  if (!ammoDisplayID && !ammoInventoryType)
4759  {
4760  ammoDisplayID = nonRangedAmmoDisplayID;
4761  ammoInventoryType = nonRangedAmmoInventoryType;
4762  }
4763  }
4764 
4765  data << uint32(ammoDisplayID);
4766  data << uint32(ammoInventoryType);
4767 }
4768 
4769 void Spell::WriteSpellGoTargets(WorldPacket& data)
4770 {
4771  size_t count_pos = data.wpos();
4772  data << uint8(0); // placeholder
4773 
4774  if (m_UniqueTargetInfo.size() > 255) // 53010 confirmed to do this legally
4775  sLog.outError("Spell ID %u cast by %s hit/missed too many unit targets %u. General warning. Only 255 sent", m_spellInfo->Id, m_caster->GetObjectGuid().GetString().c_str(), (uint32)m_UniqueTargetInfo.size());
4776  else if (m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.size() > 255)
4777  sLog.outError("Spell ID %u cast by %s hit/missed too many GO targets %u. General warning. Only 255 sent", m_spellInfo->Id, m_caster->GetObjectGuid().GetString().c_str(), (uint32)m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.size());
4778  else if (m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.size() + m_UniqueTargetInfo.size() > 255)
4779  sLog.outError("Spell ID %u cast by %s hit/missed too many targets %u. General warning. Only 255 sent", m_spellInfo->Id, m_caster->GetObjectGuid().GetString().c_str(), (uint32)(m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.size() + m_UniqueTargetInfo.size()));
4780 
4781  // This function also fill data for channeled spells:
4782  // m_needAliveTargetMask req for stop channeling if one target die
4783  uint32 hit = m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.size(); // Always hits on GO
4784  uint32 miss = 0;
4785 
4786  for (auto& ihit : m_UniqueTargetInfo)
4787  {
4788  if (ihit.effectHitMask == 0 && ihit.effectMask != 0) // No effect apply - all immuned add state
4789  {
4790  // possibly SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE2 for this??
4791  if (IsChanneledSpell(m_spellInfo) && ihit.targetGUID == m_targets.getUnitTargetGuid()) // can happen due to DR
4792  {
4793  m_duration = 0; // cancel aura to avoid visual effect continue
4794  ihit.effectDuration = 0;
4795  }
4796  ihit.missCondition = SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE2;
4797  ++miss;
4798  }
4799  else if (ihit.missCondition == SPELL_MISS_NONE) // Add only hits
4800  {
4801  if (hit < 255)
4802  {
4803  ++hit;
4804  data << ihit.targetGUID;
4805  m_needAliveTargetMask |= ihit.effectHitMask;
4806  }
4807  }
4808  else
4809  {
4810  if (IsChanneledSpell(m_spellInfo) && (ihit.missCondition == SPELL_MISS_RESIST || ihit.missCondition == SPELL_MISS_REFLECT))
4811  {
4812  m_duration = 0; // cancel aura to avoid visual effect continue
4813  ihit.effectDuration = 0;
4814  }
4815  ++miss;
4816  }
4817  }
4818 
4819  for (auto& ighit : m_UniqueGOTargetInfo)
4820  data << ighit.targetGUID; // Always hits
4821 
4822  hit = std::min(hit, 255u);
4823  data.put<uint8>(count_pos, hit);
4824 
4825  miss = std::min(miss, 255u);
4826  data << (uint8)miss;
4827 
4828  uint32 missCounter = 0;
4829  for (auto& ihit : m_UniqueTargetInfo)
4830  {
4831  if (ihit.missCondition != SPELL_MISS_NONE) // Add only miss
4832  {
4833  ++missCounter;
4834  data << ihit.targetGUID;
4835  data << uint8(ihit.missCondition);
4836  if (ihit.missCondition == SPELL_MISS_REFLECT)
4837  data << uint8(ihit.reflectResult);
4838 
4839  if (missCounter >= 255)
4840  break;
4841  }
4842  }
4843  // Reset m_needAliveTargetMask for non channeled spell
4844  if (!IsChanneledSpell(m_spellInfo))
4845  m_needAliveTargetMask = 0;
4846 }
4847 
4848 void Spell::SendInterrupted(SpellCastResult result) const
4849 {
4850  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELL_FAILURE, (8 + 4 + 1));
4851  data << m_trueCaster->GetPackGUID();
4852  data << uint8(m_cast_count);
4853  data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id);
4854  data << uint8(result);
4855  m_trueCaster->SendMessageToSet(data, true);
4856 
4857  data.Initialize(SMSG_SPELL_FAILED_OTHER, (8 + 4));
4858  data << m_trueCaster->GetPackGUID();
4859  data << uint8(m_cast_count);
4860  data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id);
4861  data << uint8(result);
4862  m_trueCaster->SendMessageToSet(data, true);
4863 }
4864 
4865 void Spell::SendChannelUpdate(uint32 time, uint32 lastTick) const
4866 {
4867  if (time == 0)
4868  {
4869  if (lastTick)
4870  {
4871  if (SpellAuraHolder* holder = m_caster->GetSpellAuraHolder(m_spellInfo->Id, m_caster->GetObjectGuid()))
4872  holder->UpdateHolder(lastTick);
4873  }
4874 
4875  bool stackable = m_spellInfo->StackAmount > 0;
4876 
4877  // Channel aura is removed during its update when channel ends properly
4878  if (stackable)
4879  m_caster->RemoveAuraStack(m_spellInfo->Id);
4880  else
4881  m_caster->RemoveAurasByCasterSpell(m_spellInfo->Id, m_caster->GetObjectGuid(), m_timer == 0 ? AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE : AURA_REMOVE_BY_CANCEL);
4882 
4883  if (!m_caster->HasChannelObject(m_caster->GetObjectGuid()))
4884  {
4885  if (Unit* target = dynamic_cast<Unit*>(m_caster->GetChannelObject()))
4886  {
4887  if (lastTick)
4888  {
4889  if (SpellAuraHolder* holder = target->GetSpellAuraHolder(m_spellInfo->Id, m_caster->GetObjectGuid()))
4890  holder->UpdateHolder(lastTick);
4891  }
4892 
4893  if (stackable)
4894  target->RemoveAuraStack(m_spellInfo->Id);
4895  else
4896  target->RemoveAurasByCasterSpell(m_spellInfo->Id, m_caster->GetObjectGuid(), m_timer == 0 ? AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE : AURA_REMOVE_BY_CANCEL);
4897  }
4898  }
4899 
4900  // Only finish channeling when latest channeled spell finishes
4901  if (m_caster->GetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_CHANNEL_SPELL) != m_spellInfo->Id)
4902  return;
4903 
4904  m_caster->SetChannelObject(nullptr);
4905  m_caster->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_CHANNEL_SPELL, 0);
4906  m_caster->clearUnitState(UNIT_STAT_CHANNELING);
4907  if (m_caster->AI())
4908  m_caster->AI()->OnChannelStateChange(this, false);
4909  }
4910 
4911  WorldPacket data(MSG_CHANNEL_UPDATE, 8 + 4);
4912  data << m_caster->GetPackGUID();
4913  data << uint32(time);
4914  m_caster->SendMessageToSet(data, true);
4915 }
4916 
4917 void Spell::SendChannelStart(uint32 duration)
4918 {
4919  WorldObject* target = nullptr;
4920 
4921  uint32 diminishDuration = duration;
4922  DiminishingGroup diminishGroup = DIMINISHING_NONE;
4923  DiminishingLevels diminishLevel = DIMINISHING_LEVEL_1;
4924 
4925  // select dynobject created by first effect if any
4926  if (m_spellInfo->Effect[EFFECT_INDEX_0] == SPELL_EFFECT_PERSISTENT_AREA_AURA)
4927  target = m_caster->GetDynObject(m_spellInfo->Id, EFFECT_INDEX_0);
4928  // select first not resisted target from target list for _0_ effect
4929  else if (!m_UniqueTargetInfo.empty())
4930  {
4931  for (TargetList::const_iterator itr = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); itr != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++itr)
4932  {
4933  if (((itr->effectHitMask & (1 << EFFECT_INDEX_0)) && itr->reflectResult == SPELL_MISS_NONE) || itr->targetGUID != m_caster->GetObjectGuid())
4934  {
4935  // when immune, duration is already 0, still need to fetch data for caster
4936  if (itr->diminishGroup > DIMINISHING_NONE && (itr->diminishDuration != duration || diminishLevel == DIMINISHING_LEVEL_IMMUNE))
4937  {
4938  diminishDuration = itr->diminishDuration;
4939  diminishGroup = itr->diminishGroup;
4940  diminishLevel = itr->diminishLevel;
4941  }
4942  target = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, itr->targetGUID);
4943  if (m_spellInfo->EffectRadiusIndex[EFFECT_INDEX_0] != 0 &&
4944  (m_spellInfo->EffectApplyAuraName[EFFECT_INDEX_0] == SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS || m_spellInfo->EffectApplyAuraName[EFFECT_INDEX_0] == SPELL_AURA_BIND_SIGHT))
4945  m_maxRange = GetSpellRadius(sSpellRadiusStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->EffectRadiusIndex[EFFECT_INDEX_0]));
4946  break;
4947  }
4948  }
4949  }
4950  else if (!m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.empty())
4951  {
4952  for (GOTargetList::const_iterator itr = m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.begin(); itr != m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.end(); ++itr)
4953  {
4954  if (itr->effectMask & (1 << EFFECT_INDEX_0))
4955  {
4956  target = m_caster->GetMap()->GetGameObject(itr->targetGUID);
4957  break;
4958  }
4959  }
4960  }
4961  else if (m_spellInfo->Id == 27360) // override for research - is not used in targeting but supplied as unittarget
4962  {
4963  target = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
4964  }
4965 
4966  // change channel duration to account for DR if neccessary, also store in caster's targetInfo to use later for setting aura duration
4967  if (diminishDuration != duration || diminishLevel == DIMINISHING_LEVEL_IMMUNE)
4968  {
4969  duration = diminishDuration;
4970  for (auto& target : m_UniqueTargetInfo)
4971  {
4972  if (target.targetGUID == m_caster->GetObjectGuid())
4973  {
4974  target.diminishDuration = diminishDuration;
4975  target.diminishGroup = diminishGroup;
4976  target.diminishLevel = diminishLevel;
4977  break;
4978  }
4979  }
4980  }
4981 
4982  WorldPacket data(MSG_CHANNEL_START, (8 + 4 + 4));
4983  data << m_caster->GetPackGUID();
4984  data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id);
4985  data << uint32(duration);
4986  m_caster->SendMessageToSet(data, true);
4987 
4988  m_timer = duration;
4989 
4990  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_IS_CHANNELED))
4991  {
4992  data.Initialize(SMSG_SPELL_UPDATE_CHAIN_TARGETS);
4993  data << m_caster->GetObjectGuid();
4994  data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id);
4995  size_t count_pos = data.wpos();
4996  data << uint32(0);
4997  uint32 hit = 0;
4998  for (TargetList::const_iterator itr = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); itr != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++itr)
4999  {
5000  if (((itr->effectHitMask & (1 << EFFECT_INDEX_0)) && itr->reflectResult == SPELL_MISS_NONE &&
5001  m_CastItem) || itr->targetGUID != m_caster->GetObjectGuid())
5002  {
5003  if (Unit* target = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, itr->targetGUID))
5004  {
5005  ++hit;
5006  data << target->GetObjectGuid();
5007  }
5008  }
5009  }
5010  if (hit)
5011  {
5012  data.put<uint32>(count_pos, hit);
5013  m_caster->SendMessageToSet(data, true);
5014  }
5015  }
5016 
5017  if (target)
5018  m_caster->SetChannelObject(target);
5019 
5020  m_caster->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_CHANNEL_SPELL, m_spellInfo->Id);
5021  m_caster->addUnitState(UNIT_STAT_CHANNELING);
5022 
5023  if (m_caster->AI())
5024  m_caster->AI()->OnChannelStateChange(this, true, target);
5025 }
5026 
5027 void Spell::TakeCastItem()
5028 {
5029  if (!m_CastItem || !m_trueCaster->IsPlayer())
5030  return;
5031 
5032  // not remove cast item at triggered spell (equipping, weapon damage, etc)
5033  if (m_IsTriggeredSpell && !(m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM))
5034  return;
5035 
5036  ItemPrototype const* proto = m_CastItem->GetProto();
5037 
5038  if (!proto)
5039  {
5040  // This code is to avoid a crash
5041  // I'm not sure, if this is really an error, but I guess every item needs a prototype
5042  sLog.outError("Cast item (%s) has no item prototype", m_CastItem->GetGuidStr().c_str());
5043  return;
5044  }
5045 
5046  // these effects change the item
5047  if (IsSpellHaveEffect(m_spellInfo, SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_CHANGE_ITEM))
5048  return;
5049 
5050  bool expendable = false;
5051  bool withoutCharges = false;
5052 
5053  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SPELLS; ++i)
5054  {
5055  if (proto->Spells[i].SpellId)
5056  {
5057  // item has limited charges
5058  if (proto->Spells[i].SpellCharges)
5059  {
5060  if (proto->Spells[i].SpellCharges < 0)
5061  expendable = true;
5062 
5063  int32 charges = m_CastItem->GetSpellCharges(i);
5064 
5065  // item has charges left
5066  if (charges)
5067  {
5068  (charges > 0) ? --charges : ++charges; // abs(charges) less at 1 after use
5069  if (proto->Stackable == 1)
5070  m_CastItem->SetSpellCharges(i, charges);
5071  m_CastItem->SetState(ITEM_CHANGED, static_cast<Player*>(m_caster));
5072  }
5073 
5074  // all charges used
5075  withoutCharges = (charges == 0);
5076  }
5077  }
5078  }
5079 
5080  if (expendable && withoutCharges)
5081  {
5082  if (m_CastItem)
5083  m_CastItem->SetUsedInSpell(false);
5084  uint32 count = 1;
5085  static_cast<Player*>(m_caster)->DestroyItemCount(m_CastItem, count, true);
5086 
5087  // prevent crash at access to deleted m_targets.getItemTarget
5088  ClearCastItem();
5089  }
5090 }
5091 
5092 void Spell::TakePower()
5093 {
5094  if (m_CastItem || m_triggeredByAuraSpell || !m_caster || m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_DO_NOT_CONSUME_RESOURCES))
5095  return;
5096 
5097  // health as power used
5098  if (m_spellInfo->powerType == POWER_HEALTH)
5099  {
5100  m_caster->ModifyHealth(-(int32)m_powerCost);
5101  return;
5102  }
5103 
5104  if (m_spellInfo->powerType >= MAX_POWERS)
5105  {
5106  sLog.outError("Spell::TakePower: Unknown power type '%d'", m_spellInfo->powerType);
5107  return;
5108  }
5109 
5110  Powers powerType = Powers(m_spellInfo->powerType);
5111 
5112  if (powerType == POWER_RUNE)
5113  {
5114  CheckOrTakeRunePower(true);
5115  return;
5116  }
5117 
5118  m_caster->ModifyPower(powerType, -(int32)m_powerCost);
5119 
5120  // Set the five second timer
5121  if (powerType == POWER_MANA && m_powerCost > 0 && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_DONT_BLOCK_MANA_REGEN))
5122  m_caster->SetLastManaUse();
5123 }
5124 
5125 SpellCastResult Spell::CheckOrTakeRunePower(bool take)
5126 {
5127  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5128  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
5129 
5130  Player* plr = (Player*)m_caster;
5131 
5132  if (plr->getClass() != CLASS_DEATH_KNIGHT)
5133  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
5134 
5135  SpellRuneCostEntry const* src = sSpellRuneCostStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->runeCostID);
5136 
5137  if (!src)
5138  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
5139 
5140  if (src->NoRuneCost() && (!take || src->NoRunicPowerGain()))
5141  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
5142 
5143  if (take)
5144  m_runesState = plr->GetRunesState(); // store previous state
5145 
5146  // at this moment for rune cost exist only no cost mods, and no percent mods
5147  int32 runeCostMod = 10000;
5148  if (Player* modOwner = plr->GetSpellModOwner())
5149  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_COST, runeCostMod);
5150 
5151  if (runeCostMod > 0)
5152  {
5153  int32 runeCost[NUM_RUNE_TYPES]; // blood, frost, unholy, death
5154 
5155  // init cost data and apply mods
5156  for (uint32 i = 0; i < RUNE_DEATH; ++i)
5157  runeCost[i] = runeCostMod > 0 ? src->RuneCost[i] : 0;
5158 
5159  runeCost[RUNE_DEATH] = 0; // calculated later
5160 
5161  // scan non-death runes (death rune not used explicitly in rune costs)
5162  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_RUNES; ++i)
5163  {
5164  RuneType rune = plr->GetCurrentRune(i);
5165  if (runeCost[rune] <= 0)
5166  continue;
5167 
5168  // already used
5169  if (plr->GetRuneCooldown(i) != 0)
5170  continue;
5171 
5172  if (take)
5173  plr->SetRuneCooldown(i, plr->GetRuneBaseCooldown(i)); // 5*2=10 sec
5174 
5175  --runeCost[rune];
5176  }
5177 
5178  // collect all not counted rune costs to death runes cost
5179  for (uint32 i = 0; i < RUNE_DEATH; ++i)
5180  if (runeCost[i] > 0)
5181  runeCost[RUNE_DEATH] += runeCost[i];
5182 
5183  // scan death runes
5184  if (runeCost[RUNE_DEATH] > 0)
5185  {
5186  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_RUNES && runeCost[RUNE_DEATH]; ++i)
5187  {
5188  RuneType rune = plr->GetCurrentRune(i);
5189  if (rune != RUNE_DEATH)
5190  continue;
5191 
5192  // already used
5193  if (plr->GetRuneCooldown(i) != 0)
5194  continue;
5195 
5196  if (take)
5197  plr->SetRuneCooldown(i, RUNE_COOLDOWN); // 5*2=10 sec
5198 
5199  --runeCost[rune];
5200 
5201  if (take)
5202  plr->RestoreBaseRune(i);
5203  }
5204  }
5205 
5206  if (!take && runeCost[RUNE_DEATH] > 0)
5207  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_POWER; // not sure if result code is correct
5208  }
5209 
5210  if (take)
5211  {
5212  // you can gain some runic power when use runes
5213  float rp = float(src->runePowerGain);
5214  rp *= sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_FLOAT_RATE_POWER_RUNICPOWER_INCOME);
5215  plr->ModifyPower(POWER_RUNIC_POWER, (int32)rp);
5216 
5217  m_runesStateAfterCast = plr->GetRunesState();
5218  }
5219 
5220  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
5221 }
5222 
5223 void Spell::TakeAmmo() const
5224 {
5225  if (m_attackType == RANGED_ATTACK && m_trueCaster->IsPlayer())
5226  {
5227  Player* player = static_cast<Player*>(m_trueCaster);
5228  Item* pItem = player->GetWeaponForAttack(RANGED_ATTACK, true, false);
5229 
5230  // wands don't have ammo
5231  if (!pItem || pItem->GetProto()->SubClass == ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_WAND)
5232  return;
5233 
5234  if (pItem->GetProto()->InventoryType == INVTYPE_THROWN)
5235  {
5236  if (pItem->GetMaxStackCount() == 1)
5237  {
5238  // decrease durability for non-stackable throw weapon
5239  player->DurabilityPointLossForEquipSlot(EQUIPMENT_SLOT_RANGED);
5240  }
5241  else
5242  {
5243  // decrease items amount for stackable throw weapon
5244  uint32 count = 1;
5245  player->DestroyItemCount(pItem, count, true);
5246  }
5247  }
5248  else if (uint32 ammo = player->GetUInt32Value(PLAYER_AMMO_ID)) {
5249  // some spells may be exempt from ammo cost (Wild Quiver talent for MM Hunters)
5250  for (const auto& aura : player->GetAurasByType(AuraType::SPELL_AURA_ABILITY_CONSUME_NO_AMMO)) {
5251  if (aura->isAffectedOnSpell(m_spellInfo)) {
5252  return;
5253  }
5254  }
5255  player->DestroyItemCount(ammo, 1, true);
5256  }
5257  }
5258 }
5259 
5260 
5261 void Spell::TakeReagents()
5262 {
5263  if (!m_trueCaster->IsPlayer() || m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_DO_NOT_CONSUME_RESOURCES))
5264  return;
5265 
5266  if (IgnoreItemRequirements()) // reagents used in triggered spell removed by original spell or don't must be removed.
5267  return;
5268 
5269  Player* p_caster = static_cast<Player*>(m_caster);
5270  if (p_caster->CanNoReagentCast(m_spellInfo))
5271  return;
5272 
5273  for (uint32 x = 0; x < MAX_SPELL_REAGENTS; ++x)
5274  {
5275  if (m_spellInfo->Reagent[x] <= 0)
5276  continue;
5277 
5278  uint32 itemid = m_spellInfo->Reagent[x];
5279  uint32 itemcount = m_spellInfo->ReagentCount[x];
5280 
5281  // if CastItem is also spell reagent
5282  if (m_CastItem)
5283  {
5284  ItemPrototype const* proto = m_CastItem->GetProto();
5285  if (proto && proto->ItemId == itemid)
5286  {
5287  for (int s = 0; s < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SPELLS; ++s)
5288  {
5289  // CastItem will be used up and does not count as reagent
5290  int32 charges = m_CastItem->GetSpellCharges(s);
5291  if (proto->Spells[s].SpellCharges < 0 && abs(charges) < 2)
5292  {
5293  ++itemcount;
5294  break;
5295  }
5296  }
5297 
5298  m_CastItem->SetUsedInSpell(false);
5299  m_CastItem = nullptr;
5300  }
5301  }
5302 
5303  // if getItemTarget is also spell reagent
5304  if (m_targets.getItemTargetEntry() == itemid)
5305  m_targets.setItemTarget(nullptr);
5306 
5307  p_caster->DestroyItemCount(itemid, itemcount, true);
5308  }
5309 }
5310 
5311 void Spell::HandleThreatSpells()
5312 {
5313  if (m_UniqueTargetInfo.empty())
5314  return;
5315 
5316  SpellThreatEntry const* threatEntry = sSpellMgr.GetSpellThreatEntry(m_spellInfo->Id);
5317 
5318  if (!threatEntry || (!threatEntry->threat && threatEntry->ap_bonus == 0.0f))
5319  return;
5320 
5321  Unit* affectiveCaster = GetAffectiveCasterOrOwner();
5322  if (!affectiveCaster) // GO cast spells do not need threat processing
5323  return;
5324 
5325  float threat = threatEntry->threat;
5326  if (threatEntry->ap_bonus != 0.0f)
5327  threat += threatEntry->ap_bonus * affectiveCaster->GetTotalAttackPowerValue(GetWeaponAttackType(m_spellInfo));
5328 
5329  bool positive = true;
5330  uint8 effectMask = 0;
5331  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
5332  if (m_spellInfo->Effect[i])
5333  effectMask |= (1 << i);
5334 
5335  if (m_negativeEffectMask & effectMask)
5336  {
5337  // can only handle spells with clearly defined positive/negative effect, check at spell_threat loading probably not perfect
5338  // so abort when only some effects are negative.
5339  if ((m_negativeEffectMask & effectMask) != effectMask)
5340  {
5341  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "Spell %u, rank %u, is not clearly positive or negative, ignoring bonus threat", m_spellInfo->Id, sSpellMgr.GetSpellRank(m_spellInfo->Id));
5342  return;
5343  }
5344  positive = false;
5345  }
5346 
5347  // since 2.0.1 threat from positive effects also is distributed among all targets, so the overall caused threat is at most the defined bonus
5348  threat /= m_UniqueTargetInfo.size();
5349 
5350  for (TargetList::const_iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
5351  {
5352  if (ihit->missCondition != SPELL_MISS_NONE)
5353  continue;
5354 
5355  Unit* target = m_trueCaster->GetObjectGuid() == ihit->targetGUID ? m_caster : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_trueCaster, ihit->targetGUID);
5356  if (!target)
5357  continue;
5358 
5359  // positive spells distribute threat among all units that are in combat with target, like healing
5360  if (positive)
5361  {
5362  target->getHostileRefManager().threatAssist(affectiveCaster, threat, m_spellInfo, false, true);
5363  }
5364  // for negative spells threat gets distributed among affected targets
5365  else
5366  {
5367  if (!target->CanHaveThreatList())
5368  continue;
5369 
5370  target->AddThreat(affectiveCaster, threat, false, GetSpellSchoolMask(m_spellInfo), m_spellInfo);
5371  }
5372  }
5373 
5374  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "Spell %u added an additional %f threat for %s " SIZEFMTD " target(s)", m_spellInfo->Id, threat, positive ? "assisting" : "harming", m_UniqueTargetInfo.size());
5375 }
5376 
5377 void Spell::ExecuteEffects(Unit* unitTarget, Item* itemTarget, GameObject* GOTarget, uint32 effectMask)
5378 {
5379  Unit* affectiveCaster = GetAffectiveCaster();
5380  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
5381  {
5382  if (effectMask & (1 << i))
5383  {
5384  HandleEffect(unitTarget, itemTarget, GOTarget, SpellEffectIndex(i), m_damageMultipliers[i]);
5385  if (m_applyMultiplierMask & (1 << i))
5386  {
5387  // Get multiplier
5388  float multiplier = m_spellInfo->DmgMultiplier[i];
5389  // Apply multiplier mods
5390  if (affectiveCaster)
5391  if (Player* modOwner = affectiveCaster->GetSpellModOwner())
5392  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_EFFECT_PAST_FIRST, multiplier);
5393  m_damageMultipliers[i] *= multiplier;
5394  }
5395  }
5396  }
5397 }
5398 
5399 void Spell::HandleEffect(Unit* pUnitTarget, Item* pItemTarget, GameObject* pGOTarget, SpellEffectIndex i, float DamageMultiplier)
5400 {
5401  if (m_effectTriggerChance[i] != -1)
5402  {
5403  if (m_effectTriggerChance[i] == 0 || irand(1, 100) > m_effectTriggerChance[i])
5404  return;
5405  }
5406 
5407  unitTarget = pUnitTarget;
5408  itemTarget = pItemTarget;
5409  gameObjTarget = pGOTarget;
5410 
5411  uint8 eff = m_spellInfo->Effect[i];
5412 
5413  if (IsEffectWithImplementedMultiplier(eff))
5414  {
5415  m_healingPerEffect[i] = 0;
5416  m_damagePerEffect[i] = 0;
5417  damage = CalculateSpellEffectValue(i, unitTarget);
5418  }
5419  else
5420  damage = int32(CalculateSpellEffectValue(i, unitTarget) * DamageMultiplier);
5421 
5422  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "Spell %u Effect%d : %u Targets: %s, %s, %s",
5423  m_spellInfo->Id, i, eff,
5424  unitTarget ? unitTarget->GetGuidStr().c_str() : "-",
5425  itemTarget ? itemTarget->GetGuidStr().c_str() : "-",
5426  gameObjTarget ? gameObjTarget->GetGuidStr().c_str() : "-");
5427 
5428  if (eff < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS)
5429  {
5430  OnEffectExecute(i);
5431  damagePerEffect[i] = damage;
5432  (*this.*SpellEffects[eff])(i);
5433  }
5434  else
5435  sLog.outError("WORLD: Spell FX %d > MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS ", eff);
5436 
5437  if (IsEffectWithImplementedMultiplier(eff))
5438  {
5439  if (m_healingPerEffect[i] > 0)
5440  m_healing += int32(m_healingPerEffect[i] * DamageMultiplier);
5441  else if (m_damagePerEffect[i] > 0)
5442  m_damage += int32(m_damagePerEffect[i] * DamageMultiplier);
5443  }
5444 }
5445 
5446 void Spell::AddTriggeredSpell(uint32 spellId)
5447 {
5448  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellId);
5449 
5450  if (!spellInfo)
5451  {
5452  sLog.outError("Spell::AddTriggeredSpell: unknown spell id %u used as triggred spell for spell %u)", spellId, m_spellInfo->Id);
5453  return;
5454  }
5455 
5456  m_TriggerSpells.push_back(spellInfo);
5457 }
5458 
5459 void Spell::AddPrecastSpell(uint32 spellId)
5460 {
5461  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellId);
5462 
5463  if (!spellInfo)
5464  {
5465  sLog.outError("Spell::AddPrecastSpell: unknown spell id %u used as pre-cast spell for spell %u)", spellId, m_spellInfo->Id);
5466  return;
5467  }
5468 
5469  m_preCastSpells.push_back(spellInfo);
5470 }
5471 
5472 void Spell::CastTriggerSpells()
5473 {
5474  for (SpellInfoList::const_iterator si = m_TriggerSpells.begin(); si != m_TriggerSpells.end(); ++si)
5475  {
5476  Spell* spell = new Spell(m_trueCaster, (*si), TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_originalCasterGUID);
5477  spell->SpellStart(&m_targets); // use original spell original targets
5478  }
5479 }
5480 
5481 void Spell::CastPreCastSpells(Unit* target)
5482 {
5483  for (SpellInfoList::const_iterator si = m_preCastSpells.begin(); si != m_preCastSpells.end(); ++si)
5484  m_caster->CastSpell(target, (*si), TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, m_CastItem);
5485 }
5486 
5487 Unit* Spell::GetPrefilledUnitTargetOrUnitTarget(SpellEffectIndex effIndex) const
5488 {
5489  for (const auto& itr : m_UniqueTargetInfo)
5490  if (itr.effectHitMask & (1 << effIndex))
5491  return m_trueCaster->GetMap()->GetUnit(itr.targetGUID);
5492 
5493  return m_targets.getUnitTarget();
5494 }
5495 
5496 SpellCastResult Spell::CheckCast(bool strict)
5497 {
5498  // check cooldowns to prevent cheating (ignore passive spells, that client side visual only)
5499  if (!m_ignoreCooldowns && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_PASSIVE)
5500  && !m_trueCaster->IsSpellReady(*m_spellInfo, m_CastItem ? m_CastItem->GetProto() : nullptr))
5501  {
5502  if (m_triggeredByAuraSpell)
5503  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
5504  else
5505  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_READY;
5506  }
5507 
5508  if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_PASSIVE))
5509  {
5510  if (m_trueCaster->IsPlayer())
5511  {
5512  // can cast triggered (by aura only?) spells while have this flag
5513  if (static_cast<Player*>(m_trueCaster)->HasFlag(PLAYER_FLAGS, PLAYER_ALLOW_ONLY_ABILITY) && m_clientCast)
5514  {
5515  bool found = false;
5516  for (Aura* aura : m_caster->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_ALLOW_ONLY_ABILITY))
5517  {
5518  if (aura->isAffectedOnSpell(m_spellInfo))
5519  {
5520  found = true;
5521  break;
5522  }
5523  }
5524 
5525  if (!found)
5526  return SPELL_FAILED_SPELL_IN_PROGRESS;
5527  }
5528  }
5529  }
5530 
5531  // check global cooldown
5532  if (strict && !m_ignoreGCD && m_trueCaster->HasGCD(m_spellInfo))
5533  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_READY;
5534 
5535  if (m_caster)
5536  {
5537  if (!m_caster->IsAlive() && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_ALLOW_CAST_WHILE_DEAD) && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_PASSIVE))
5538  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_DEAD;
5539 
5540  if (!m_IsTriggeredSpell && !m_caster->IsStandState() && m_caster->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED) && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_ALLOW_WHILE_SITTING))
5541  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_STANDING;
5542 
5543  if ((!m_IsTriggeredSpell || m_triggeredByAuraSpell) && IsNonCombatSpell(m_spellInfo) && m_caster->IsInCombat() && !m_caster->IsIgnoreUnitState(m_spellInfo, IGNORE_UNIT_COMBAT_STATE))
5544  return SPELL_FAILED_AFFECTING_COMBAT;
5545 
5546  // only allow triggered spells if at an ended battleground
5547  if (!m_IsTriggeredSpell && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5548  if (BattleGround* bg = ((Player*)m_caster)->GetBattleGround())
5549  if (bg->GetStatus() == STATUS_WAIT_LEAVE)
5550  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
5551 
5552  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !((Player*)m_caster)->IsGameMaster() &&
5553  sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_BOOL_VMAP_INDOOR_CHECK) &&
5554  VMAP::VMapFactory::createOrGetVMapManager()->isLineOfSightCalcEnabled())
5555  {
5556  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_ONLY_OUTDOORS) &&
5557  !m_caster->GetTerrain()->IsOutdoors(m_caster->GetPositionX(), m_caster->GetPositionY(), m_caster->GetPositionZ()))
5558  return SPELL_FAILED_ONLY_OUTDOORS; // TODO: If at least one effect is SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED return mounts not allowed
5559 
5560  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_ONLY_INDOORS) &&
5561  m_caster->GetTerrain()->IsOutdoors(m_caster->GetPositionX(), m_caster->GetPositionY(), m_caster->GetPositionZ()))
5562  return SPELL_FAILED_ONLY_INDOORS;
5563  }
5564 
5565  // only check at first call, Stealth auras are already removed at second call
5566  // for now, ignore triggered spells
5567  if (strict && !m_IsTriggeredSpell)
5568  {
5569  // Ignore form req aura
5570  if (!m_caster->HasAffectedAura(SPELL_AURA_MOD_IGNORE_SHAPESHIFT, m_spellInfo))
5571  {
5572  // Cannot be used in this stance/form
5573  SpellCastResult shapeError = GetErrorAtShapeshiftedCast(m_spellInfo, m_caster->GetShapeshiftForm());
5574  if (shapeError != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5575  return shapeError;
5576 
5577  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_ONLY_STEALTHED) && !(m_caster->HasStealthAura()))
5578  return SPELL_FAILED_ONLY_STEALTHED;
5579  }
5580  }
5581 
5582  if (m_caster->HasAuraTypeWithMiscvalue(SPELL_AURA_BLOCK_SPELL_FAMILY, m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName))
5583  return SPELL_FAILED_SPELL_UNAVAILABLE;
5584 
5585  // caster state requirements
5586  if (m_spellInfo->CasterAuraState && !m_caster->HasAuraState(AuraState(m_spellInfo->CasterAuraState)))
5587  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
5588 
5589  if (m_spellInfo->CasterAuraStateNot && m_caster->HasAuraState(AuraState(m_spellInfo->CasterAuraStateNot)))
5590  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
5591 
5592  // Caster aura req check if need
5593  if (m_spellInfo->casterAuraSpell && !m_caster->HasAura(m_spellInfo->casterAuraSpell))
5594  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
5595  if (m_spellInfo->excludeCasterAuraSpell)
5596  {
5597  // Special cases of non existing auras handling
5598  if (m_spellInfo->excludeCasterAuraSpell == 61988)
5599  {
5600  // Avenging Wrath Marker
5601  if (m_caster->HasAura(61987))
5602  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
5603  }
5604  else if (m_caster->HasAura(m_spellInfo->excludeCasterAuraSpell))
5605  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
5606  }
5607 
5608  if (!m_IsTriggeredSpell && NeedsComboPoints(m_spellInfo) && !m_caster->IsIgnoreUnitState(m_spellInfo, IGNORE_UNIT_TARGET_STATE) &&
5609  (!m_targets.getUnitTarget() || m_targets.getUnitTarget()->GetObjectGuid() != m_caster->GetComboTargetGuid()))
5610  // warrior not have real combo-points at client side but use this way for mark allow Overpower use
5611  return m_caster->getClass() == CLASS_WARRIOR ? SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE : SPELL_FAILED_NO_COMBO_POINTS;
5612 
5613  // Nefarian class calls spell failed
5614  switch (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
5615  {
5616  case SPELLFAMILY_DRUID:
5617  {
5618  if (IsSpellHaveAura(m_spellInfo, SPELL_AURA_MOD_SHAPESHIFT))
5619  if (m_caster->HasOverrideScript(3655))
5620  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_AURASTATE;
5621  break;
5622  }
5623  case SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST:
5624  case SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN:
5625  case SPELLFAMILY_PALADIN:
5626  {
5627  if (IsSpellHaveEffect(m_spellInfo, SPELL_EFFECT_HEAL) ||
5628  IsSpellHaveAura(m_spellInfo, SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL) ||
5629  IsSpellHaveEffect(m_spellInfo, SPELL_EFFECT_DISPEL))
5630  {
5631  if (m_caster->HasOverrideScript(4327))
5632  return SPELL_FAILED_FIZZLE;
5633  }
5634  break;
5635  }
5636  case SPELLFAMILY_WARRIOR:
5637  {
5638  if (IsSpellHaveAura(m_spellInfo, SPELL_AURA_MOD_SHAPESHIFT))
5639  if (m_caster->HasOverrideScript(3654))
5640  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_AURASTATE;
5641  break;
5642  }
5643  default:
5644  break;
5645  }
5646 
5647  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX7_DEBUG_SPELL) && !m_caster->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_ALLOW_CHEAT_SPELLS))
5648  {
5649  m_param1 = SPELL_FAILED_CUSTOM_ERROR_65;
5650  return SPELL_FAILED_CUSTOM_ERROR;
5651  }
5652  }
5653 
5654  Unit* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
5655  uint32 affectedMask = GetCheckCastEffectMask(m_spellInfo);
5656  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_IMPLIED_TARGETING) && target)
5657  {
5658  if (!(m_trueCaster->CanAssistSpell(target, m_spellInfo)))
5659  {
5660  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_IMPLIED_TARGETING))
5661  {
5662  if (Unit* targetOfUnitTarget = target->GetTarget(m_trueCaster))
5663  {
5664  if (m_trueCaster->CanAssistSpell(targetOfUnitTarget, m_spellInfo))
5665  target = targetOfUnitTarget;
5666  }
5667  }
5668  }
5669  }
5670 
5671  bool selfTargeting = false;
5672  if (!target)
5673  {
5674  uint32 selfImmuneMask = GetCheckCastSelfEffectMask(m_spellInfo);
5675  if (selfImmuneMask)
5676  {
5677  target = m_caster;
5678  affectedMask = selfImmuneMask;
5679  selfTargeting = true;
5680  }
5681  }
5682 
5683  if (target)
5684  {
5685  // TARGET_UNIT_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER fills unit target per client requirement but should not be checked against common things
5686  // TODO: Find a nicer and more efficient way to check for this
5687  if (!IsSpellWithScriptUnitTarget(m_spellInfo))
5688  {
5689  // target state requirements (not allowed state), apply to self also
5690  if (m_spellInfo->TargetAuraStateNot && target->HasAuraState(AuraState(m_spellInfo->TargetAuraStateNot)))
5691  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_AURASTATE;
5692 
5693  if (!m_IsTriggeredSpell && IsDeathOnlySpell(m_spellInfo) && target->IsAlive())
5694  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_NOT_DEAD;
5695 
5696  // Target aura req check if need
5697  if (m_spellInfo->targetAuraSpell && !target->HasAura(m_spellInfo->targetAuraSpell))
5698  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
5699  if (m_spellInfo->excludeTargetAuraSpell)
5700  {
5701  // Special cases of non existing auras handling
5702  if (m_spellInfo->excludeTargetAuraSpell == 61988)
5703  {
5704  // Avenging Wrath Marker
5705  if (target->HasAura(61987))
5706  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
5707  }
5708  else if (target->HasAura(m_spellInfo->excludeTargetAuraSpell))
5709  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
5710  }
5711 
5712  // totem immunity for channeled spells(needs to be before spell cast)
5713  // spell attribs for player channeled spells
5714  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_TRACK_TARGET_IN_CHANNEL) // TODO: Investigate this condition
5715  && m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_SPELL_HASTE_AFFECTS_PERIODIC)
5716  && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && ((Creature*)target)->IsTotem())
5717  return SPELL_FAILED_IMMUNE;
5718 
5719  bool non_caster_target = target != m_trueCaster && !IsSpellWithCasterSourceTargetsOnly(m_spellInfo);
5720 
5721  if (non_caster_target)
5722  {
5723  // target state requirements (apply to non-self only), to allow cast affects to self like Dirty Deeds
5724  if (m_trueCaster->IsUnit() && m_spellInfo->TargetAuraState && !target->HasAuraStateForCaster(AuraState(m_spellInfo->TargetAuraState), m_caster->GetObjectGuid()) &&
5725  !m_caster->IsIgnoreUnitState(m_spellInfo, m_spellInfo->TargetAuraState == AURA_STATE_FROZEN ? IGNORE_UNIT_TARGET_NON_FROZEN : IGNORE_UNIT_TARGET_STATE))
5726  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_AURASTATE;
5727 
5728  // Not allow casting on flying player
5729  if (target->IsTaxiFlying())
5730  {
5731  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
5732  {
5733  // Except some spells from Taxi Flying cast
5734  case 7720: // Ritual of Summoning Effect
5735  case 36573: // Vision Guide
5736  case 42316: // Alcaz Survey Credit
5737  case 42385: // Alcaz Survey Aura
5738  break;
5739  default:
5740  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5741  }
5742  }
5743 
5744  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_ALWAYS_LINE_OF_SIGHT) ||
5745  (!IsIgnoreLosSpellCast(m_spellInfo) && !m_IsTriggeredSpell))
5746  if (!m_trueCaster->IsWithinLOSInMap(target, true))
5747  return SPELL_FAILED_LINE_OF_SIGHT;
5748 
5749  if (m_trueCaster->IsPlayer())
5750  {
5751  // auto selection spell rank implemented in WorldSession::HandleCastSpellOpcode
5752  // this case can be triggered if rank not found (too low-level target for first rank)
5753  if (!m_CastItem && !m_IsTriggeredSpell && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_ALLOW_LOW_LEVEL_BUFF))
5754  // spell expected to be auto-downranking in cast handle, so must be same
5755  if (m_spellInfo != sSpellMgr.SelectAuraRankForLevel(m_spellInfo, target->GetLevel()))
5756  return SPELL_FAILED_LOWLEVEL;
5757 
5758  // Do not allow these spells to target creatures not tapped by us (Banish, Polymorph, many quest spells)
5759  // Checked here, for single target spells, checked in CheckTarget to take care of AoE spells
5760  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_CANNOT_CAST_ON_TAPPED) && !IsAreaOfEffectSpell(m_spellInfo))
5761  if (Creature const* targetCreature = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(target))
5762  if ((!targetCreature->GetLootRecipientGuid().IsEmpty()) && !targetCreature->IsTappedBy(static_cast<Player*>(m_trueCaster)))
5763  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_CAST_ON_TAPPED;
5764 
5765  // Do not allow spells to complete which are targeting players that are invisible to the caster since the time of cast start
5766  if (!m_trueCaster->IsGameObject() && target->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED) && !IsPositiveEffectMask(m_spellInfo, affectedMask, m_trueCaster, target) && !target->IsVisibleForOrDetect(m_caster, m_trueCaster, false, false, true, false, m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_IGNORE_PHASE_SHIFT)))
5767  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5768  }
5769 
5770  if (strict && m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_ONLY_ON_PLAYER) && target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER && !IsAreaOfEffectSpell(m_spellInfo))
5771  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5772 
5773  if (strict && m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_NOT_ON_PLAYER) && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !IsAreaOfEffectSpell(m_spellInfo))
5774  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5775 
5776  if (strict && m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_NOT_ON_PLAYER_CONTROLLED_NPC) && target->IsPlayerControlled() && target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER && !IsAreaOfEffectSpell(m_spellInfo))
5777  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5778  }
5779  else if (m_caster == target)
5780  {
5781  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_caster->IsInWorld())
5782  {
5783  // Additional check for some spells
5784  // If 0 spell effect empty - client not send target data (need use selection)
5785  // TODO: check it on next client version
5786  if (m_targets.m_targetMask == TARGET_FLAG_SELF &&
5787  m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[EFFECT_INDEX_1] == TARGET_UNIT_ENEMY)
5788  {
5789  target = m_caster->GetMap()->GetUnit(((Player*)m_caster)->GetSelectionGuid());
5790  if (!target)
5791  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5792 
5793  m_targets.setUnitTarget(target);
5794  }
5795  }
5796 
5797  // Some special spells with non-caster only mode
5798 
5799  // Fire Shield
5800  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK &&
5801  m_spellInfo->SpellIconID == 16)
5802  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5803 
5804  // Focus Magic (main spell)
5805  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 54646)
5806  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5807 
5808  // Lay on Hands (self cast)
5809  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_PALADIN &&
5810  m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000008000))
5811  {
5812  if (target->HasAura(25771)) // Forbearance
5813  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
5814  if (target->HasAura(61987)) // Avenging Wrath Marker
5815  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
5816  }
5817  }
5818 
5819  if (!selfTargeting && (m_targets.m_targetMask == TARGET_FLAG_SELF || m_trueCaster == target) && m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_EXCLUDE_CASTER))
5820  {
5821  if (IsOnlySelfTargeting(m_spellInfo))
5822  sLog.outCustomLog("Spell ID %u cast at self explicitly even though it has SPELL_ATTR_EX_EXCLUDE_CASTER", m_spellInfo->Id);
5823 
5824  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5825  }
5826 
5827  if (!selfTargeting && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_CAN_TARGET_UNTARGETABLE) && target->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_UNTARGETABLE))
5828  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5829 
5830  // check creature type
5831  // ignore self casts (including area casts when caster selected as target)
5832  if (non_caster_target)
5833  {
5834  if (!CheckTargetCreatureType(target, m_spellInfo))
5835  {
5836  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5837  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_IS_PLAYER;
5838  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5839  }
5840  }
5841 
5842  if (IsPositiveSpell(m_spellInfo->Id, m_trueCaster, target) && affectedMask)
5843  if (target->IsImmuneToSpell(m_spellInfo, target == m_trueCaster, affectedMask, m_trueCaster))
5844  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_AURASTATE;
5845 
5846  // Caster must be facing the targets back
5847  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_INITIATE_COMBAT_POST_CAST) && m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_INITIATES_COMBAT_ENABLES_AUTO_ATTACK) && !m_trueCaster->IsFacingTargetsBack(target))
5848  {
5849  // Exclusion for Pounce: Facing Limitation was removed in 2.0.1, but it still uses the same, old Ex-Flags
5850  // Exclusion for Mutilate:Facing Limitation was removed in 2.0.1 and 3.0.3, but they still use the same, old Ex-Flags
5851  // Exclusion for Throw: Facing limitation was added in 3.2.x, but that shouldn't be
5852  if (!m_spellInfo->IsFitToFamily(SPELLFAMILY_DRUID, uint64(0x0000000000020000)) &&
5853  !m_spellInfo->IsFitToFamily(SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE, uint64(0x0020000000000000)) &&
5854  m_spellInfo->Id != 2764)
5855  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_BEHIND;
5856  }
5857 
5858  // duplicate block to avoid previous block complex logic
5859  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_SS_FACING_BACK) && !m_trueCaster->IsFacingTargetsBack(target))
5860  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_BEHIND;
5861 
5862  // Caster must be facing the targets front
5863  if (((m_spellInfo->Attributes == (SPELL_ATTR_IS_ABILITY | SPELL_ATTR_NOT_SHAPESHIFT | SPELL_ATTR_DO_NOT_SHEATH | SPELL_ATTR_CANCELS_AUTO_ATTACK_COMBAT)) && !m_trueCaster->IsFacingTargetsFront(target)))
5864  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_INFRONT;
5865 
5866  // check if target is in combat
5867  if (non_caster_target && m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_ONLY_PEACEFUL_TARGETS) && target->IsInCombat())
5868  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_AFFECTING_COMBAT;
5869 
5870  // check if target is affected by Spirit of Redemption (Aura: 27827) unless death persistent
5871  if (target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_SPIRIT_OF_REDEMPTION) && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_ALLOW_AURA_WHILE_DEAD))
5872  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5873 
5874  // Check if more powerful spell applied on target (if spell only contains non-aoe auras)
5875  if (IsAuraApplyEffects(m_spellInfo, SpellEffectIndexMask(affectedMask)) && !IsAreaOfEffectSpell(m_spellInfo) && !HasAreaAuraEffect(m_spellInfo) && !selfTargeting && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX4_AURA_NEVER_BOUNCES))
5876  {
5877  bool computed = false; // optimization
5878  int32 amounts[MAX_EFFECT_INDEX];
5879  for (auto const& pair : target->GetSpellAuraHolderMap())
5880  {
5881  const SpellAuraHolder* existing = pair.second;
5882  const SpellEntry* existingSpell = existing->GetSpellProto();
5883 
5884  if (m_trueCaster->GetObjectGuid() != existing->GetCasterGuid())
5885  {
5886  if (sSpellMgr.IsSpellStackableWithSpellForDifferentCasters(m_spellInfo, existingSpell))
5887  continue;
5888  }
5889  else if (sSpellMgr.IsSpellStackableWithSpell(m_spellInfo, existingSpell))
5890  continue;
5891 
5892  if (!computed)
5893  {
5894  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
5895  {
5896  if (affectedMask & (1 << i))
5897  {
5898  amounts[i] = CalculateSpellEffectValue(SpellEffectIndex(i), target, true, false);
5899  amounts[i] = Aura::CalculateAuraEffectValue(m_caster, target, m_spellInfo, SpellEffectIndex(i), amounts[i]);
5900  if (m_auraScript)
5901  {
5902  AuraCalcData data(nullptr, m_caster, target, m_spellInfo, SpellEffectIndex(i));
5903  amounts[i] = m_auraScript->OnAuraValueCalculate(data, amounts[i]);
5904  }
5905  }
5906  }
5907  computed = true;
5908  }
5909 
5910  if (IsSimilarExistingAuraStronger(m_caster, m_spellInfo, existing, affectedMask, amounts))
5911  return SPELL_FAILED_AURA_BOUNCED;
5912 
5913  if (sSpellMgr.IsSpellAnotherRankOfSpell(m_spellInfo->Id, existingSpell->Id))
5914  if (sSpellMgr.IsSpellHigherRankOfSpell(existingSpell->Id, m_spellInfo->Id))
5915  return SPELL_FAILED_AURA_BOUNCED;
5916  }
5917  }
5918 
5919  if (m_spellInfo->MaxTargetLevel && target->GetLevel() > m_spellInfo->MaxTargetLevel)
5920  return SPELL_FAILED_HIGHLEVEL;
5921 
5922  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_NOT_ON_TRIVIAL) && target->IsTrivialForTarget(m_caster))
5923  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_IS_TRIVIAL;
5924  }
5925  }
5926 
5927  // check targets
5928  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
5929  {
5930  uint32 targetType = m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[i];
5931  switch (targetType)
5932  {
5933  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PASSENGER_0:
5934  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PASSENGER_1:
5935  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PASSENGER_2:
5936  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PASSENGER_3:
5937  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PASSENGER_4:
5938  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PASSENGER_5:
5939  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PASSENGER_6:
5940  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PASSENGER_7:
5941  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_VEHICLE:
5942  case TARGET_UNIT_ENEMY_NEAR_CASTER:
5943  case TARGET_UNIT_FRIEND_NEAR_CASTER:
5944  case TARGET_UNIT_NEAR_CASTER:
5945  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_MASTER:
5946  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER: break; // never check anything
5947  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PET: // special pet checks
5948  {
5949  Unit* pet = m_caster->GetPet();
5950  if (!pet)
5951  pet = m_caster->GetCharm();
5952  if (!pet)
5953  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_PET;
5954  else
5955  {
5956  if (!pet->IsAlive())
5957  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGETS_DEAD;
5958  if (!IsIgnoreLosSpellEffect(m_spellInfo, SpellEffectIndex(i)) && !m_caster->IsWithinLOSInMap(pet, true))
5959  return SPELL_FAILED_LINE_OF_SIGHT;
5960  }
5961  break;
5962  }
5963  default: // needs target
5964  {
5965  auto& data = SpellTargetInfoTable[targetType];
5966  WorldObject* originalCaster = GetCastingObject();
5967  if (!originalCaster)
5968  originalCaster = m_trueCaster;
5969  if (data.type == TARGET_TYPE_UNIT && data.filter != TARGET_SCRIPT && (data.enumerator == TARGET_ENUMERATOR_SINGLE || data.enumerator == TARGET_ENUMERATOR_CHAIN))
5970  {
5971  if (!target)
5972  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5973  switch (data.filter)
5974  {
5975  case TARGET_HARMFUL: if (!originalCaster->CanAttackSpell(target, m_spellInfo)) return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS; break;
5976  case TARGET_HELPFUL: if (!originalCaster->CanAssistSpell(target, m_spellInfo)) return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS; break;
5977  case TARGET_PARTY:
5978  case TARGET_GROUP: if (!m_trueCaster->CanAssistSpell(target, m_spellInfo) || !m_caster->IsInGroup(target, targetType == TARGET_UNIT_PARTY)) return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS; break;
5979  default: break;
5980  }
5981  }
5982  }
5983  }
5984  }
5985 
5986  // zone check
5987  uint32 zone, area;
5988  m_trueCaster->GetZoneAndAreaId(zone, area);
5989 
5990  SpellCastResult locRes = sSpellMgr.GetSpellAllowedInLocationError(m_spellInfo, m_trueCaster->GetMapId(), zone, area,
5991  m_caster ? m_caster->GetBeneficiaryPlayer() : nullptr);
5992  if (locRes != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5993  {
5994  if (!IsSpellDoNotReportFailure(m_spellInfo))
5995  return locRes;
5996  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
5997  }
5998 
5999 
6000  // not let players cast spells at mount (and let do it to creatures)
6001  if (m_trueCaster->IsPlayer() && m_caster->GetMountID() && !m_IsTriggeredSpell &&
6002  !IsPassiveSpell(m_spellInfo) && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_ALLOW_WHILE_MOUNTED))
6003  {
6004  if (m_caster->IsTaxiFlying())
6005  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_ON_TAXI;
6006  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_MOUNTED;
6007  }
6008 
6009  // always (except passive spells) check items
6010  if (!IsPassiveSpell(m_spellInfo))
6011  {
6012  SpellCastResult castResult = CheckItems();
6013  if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
6014  return castResult;
6015  }
6016 
6017  // check spell focus object
6018  if (m_spellInfo->RequiresSpellFocus)
6019  {
6020  GameObject* ok = nullptr;
6021  MaNGOS::GameObjectFocusCheck go_check(m_trueCaster, m_spellInfo->RequiresSpellFocus);
6022  MaNGOS::GameObjectSearcher<MaNGOS::GameObjectFocusCheck> checker(ok, go_check);
6023  Cell::VisitGridObjects(m_trueCaster, checker, m_trueCaster->GetMap()->GetVisibilityDistance());
6024 
6025  if (!ok)
6026  return SPELL_FAILED_REQUIRES_SPELL_FOCUS;
6027 
6028  m_eventTarget = ok; // game object found in range
6029  }
6030 
6031  if (!m_IsTriggeredSpell)
6032  {
6033  SpellCastResult castResult;
6034  if (!m_triggeredByAuraSpell)
6035  {
6036  castResult = CheckRange(strict);
6037  if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
6038  return castResult;
6039  }
6040  }
6041 
6042  if (!m_ignoreCosts)
6043  {
6044  SpellCastResult castResult = CheckPower(strict);
6045  if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
6046  return castResult;
6047 
6048  // triggered spell not affected by stun/etc
6049  castResult = CheckCasterAuras(m_param1);
6050  if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
6051  return castResult;
6052  }
6053 
6054  if (m_channelOnly)
6055  {
6056  m_partialApplicationMask = EFFECT_MASK_ALL; // no effects to be executed but spell needs to go through
6057  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
6058  }
6059 
6060  uint32 availableEffectMask = 0;
6061  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
6062  if (m_spellInfo->Effect[i])
6063  availableEffectMask |= (1 << i);
6064 
6065  auto partialApplication = [&](uint32 i) -> SpellCastResult
6066  {
6067  availableEffectMask &= (~(1 << i));
6068  if (availableEffectMask == 0)
6069  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6070  else
6071  m_partialApplicationMask |= (1 << i);
6072 
6073  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
6074  };
6075 
6076  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
6077  {
6078  // for effects of spells that have only one target
6079  switch (m_spellInfo->Effect[i])
6080  {
6081  case SPELL_EFFECT_INSTAKILL:
6082  // Death Pact
6083  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 48743)
6084  {
6085  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6086  return SPELL_FAILED_ERROR;
6087 
6088  if (!((Player*)m_caster)->GetSelectionGuid())
6089  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_IMPLICIT_TARGETS;
6090  Pet* target = m_caster->GetMap()->GetPet(((Player*)m_caster)->GetSelectionGuid());
6091 
6092  // alive
6093  if (!target || target->IsDead())
6094  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_IMPLICIT_TARGETS;
6095  // undead
6096  if (target->GetCreatureType() != CREATURE_TYPE_UNDEAD)
6097  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_IMPLICIT_TARGETS;
6098  // owned
6099  if (target->GetOwnerGuid() != m_caster->GetObjectGuid())
6100  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_IMPLICIT_TARGETS;
6101 
6102  float dist = GetSpellRadius(sSpellRadiusStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->EffectRadiusIndex[i]));
6103  if (!target->IsWithinDistInMap(m_caster, dist))
6104  return SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE;
6105 
6106  // will set in target selection code
6107  }
6108  break;
6109  case SPELL_EFFECT_DUMMY:
6110  {
6111  // By Spell ID
6112  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 19938) // Awaken Lazy Peon
6113  {
6114  Unit* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
6115  // 17743 = Lazy Peon Sleep | 10556 = Lazy Peon
6116  if (!target || !target->HasAura(17743) || target->GetEntry() != 10556)
6117  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6118  }
6119  else if (m_spellInfo->Id == 20577)
6120  {
6121  WorldObject* result = FindCorpseUsing<MaNGOS::CannibalizeObjectCheck>();
6122  if (result)
6123  {
6124  switch (result->GetTypeId())
6125  {
6126  case TYPEID_UNIT:
6127  case TYPEID_PLAYER:
6128  if (!CheckTarget(static_cast<Unit*>(result), SpellEffectIndex(i), false, EXCEPTION_NONE))
6129  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_EDIBLE_CORPSES;
6130  break;
6131  case TYPEID_CORPSE:
6132  if (Player* owner = ObjectAccessor::FindPlayer(static_cast<Corpse*>(result)->GetOwnerGuid()))
6133  if (!CheckTarget(owner, SpellEffectIndex(i), false, EXCEPTION_NONE))
6134  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_EDIBLE_CORPSES;
6135  break;
6136  }
6137  }
6138  else
6139  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_EDIBLE_CORPSES;
6140  }
6141  else if (m_spellInfo->Id == 51582) // Rocket Boots Engaged
6142  {
6143  if (m_caster->IsInWater() && (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || static_cast<Player*>(m_caster)->IsInHighLiquid()))
6144  return SPELL_FAILED_ONLY_ABOVEWATER;
6145  }
6146  else if (m_spellInfo->SpellIconID == 156) // Holy Shock
6147  {
6148  Unit* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
6149  if (!target)
6150  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6151 
6152  // Prevents usage when cant neither attack or assist and not in front for shock attack
6153  if (m_caster->CanAttack(target))
6154  {
6155  if (!m_caster->HasInArc(target))
6156  return SPELL_FAILED_UNIT_NOT_INFRONT;
6157  }
6158  else if (!m_caster->CanAssistSpell(target, m_spellInfo))
6159  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6160  }
6161  // Fire Nova
6162  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN && m_spellInfo->SpellIconID == 33)
6163  {
6164  // fire totems slot
6165  if (!m_caster->GetTotemGuid(TOTEM_SLOT_FIRE))
6166  return SPELL_FAILED_TOTEMS;
6167  }
6168  break;
6169  }
6170  case SPELL_EFFECT_DISTRACT: // All nearby enemies must not be in combat
6171  {
6172  if (m_targets.m_targetMask & (TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION | TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION))
6173  {
6174  UnitList targetsCombat;
6175  float radius = GetSpellRadius(sSpellRadiusStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->EffectRadiusIndex[i]));
6176 
6177  FillAreaTargets(targetsCombat, radius, 0.f, PUSH_DEST_CENTER, SPELL_TARGETS_AOE_ATTACKABLE);
6178 
6179  if (targetsCombat.empty())
6180  break;
6181 
6182  bool inCombat = true;
6183  for (auto& itr : targetsCombat)
6184  {
6185  if (!itr->IsInCombat())
6186  {
6187  inCombat = false;
6188  break;
6189  }
6190  }
6191 
6192  if (inCombat)
6193  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_IN_COMBAT;
6194  }
6195  break;
6196  }
6197  case SPELL_EFFECT_SCHOOL_DAMAGE:
6198  {
6199  // Hammer of Wrath
6200  if (m_spellInfo->SpellVisual[0] == 7250)
6201  {
6202  if (!m_targets.getUnitTarget())
6203  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_IMPLICIT_TARGETS;
6204 
6205  if (m_targets.getUnitTarget()->GetHealth() > m_targets.getUnitTarget()->GetMaxHealth() * 0.2)
6206  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6207  }
6208  break;
6209  }
6210  case SPELL_EFFECT_CREATE_ITEM:
6211  {
6212  if (Unit* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget())
6213  {
6214  if (!target->IsPlayer() && m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[i] != TARGET_UNIT_CASTER && m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetB[i] != TARGET_UNIT_CASTER)
6215  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6216 
6217  if (!target->IsPlayer())
6218  target = m_caster;
6219 
6220  if (i != EFFECT_INDEX_0) // TODO: Partial application
6221  break;
6222 
6223  uint32 count = CalculateSpellEffectValue(SpellEffectIndex(i), target);
6224  ItemPosCountVec dest;
6225  uint32 no_space = 0;
6226  InventoryResult msg = static_cast<Player*>(target)->CanStoreNewItem(NULL_BAG, NULL_SLOT, dest, m_spellInfo->EffectItemType[i], count, &no_space);
6227  if (msg != EQUIP_ERR_OK)
6228  {
6229  ItemPrototype const* proto = sObjectMgr.GetItemPrototype(m_spellInfo->EffectItemType[i]);
6230  if (proto && proto->ItemLimitCategory)
6231  m_param1 = proto->ItemLimitCategory;
6232  return SPELL_FAILED_TOO_MANY_OF_ITEM;
6233  }
6234  }
6235 
6236  break;
6237  }
6238  case SPELL_EFFECT_TAMECREATURE:
6239  {
6240  // Spell can be triggered, we need to check original caster prior to caster
6241  Unit* caster = GetAffectiveCaster();
6242  Unit* tameTarget;
6243 
6244  bool gmmode = m_triggeredBySpellInfo == nullptr;
6245  if (gmmode)
6246  tameTarget = caster->GetTarget();
6247  else
6248  tameTarget = dynamic_cast<Unit*>(m_caster->GetChannelObject());
6249 
6250  if (!caster || caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER ||
6251  !tameTarget || tameTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
6252  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6253 
6254  Player* plrCaster = (Player*)caster;
6255 
6256  if (gmmode && !ChatHandler(plrCaster).FindCommand("npc tame"))
6257  {
6258  plrCaster->SendPetTameFailure(PETTAME_UNKNOWNERROR);
6259  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6260  }
6261 
6262  if (plrCaster->getClass() != CLASS_HUNTER && !gmmode)
6263  {
6264  plrCaster->SendPetTameFailure(PETTAME_UNITSCANTTAME);
6265  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6266  }
6267 
6268  Creature* target = (Creature*)tameTarget;
6269 
6270  if (target->IsPet() || target->HasCharmer())
6271  {
6272  plrCaster->SendPetTameFailure(PETTAME_CREATUREALREADYOWNED);
6273  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6274  }
6275 
6276  if (target->GetLevel() > plrCaster->GetLevel() && !gmmode)
6277  {
6278  plrCaster->SendPetTameFailure(PETTAME_TOOHIGHLEVEL);
6279  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6280  }
6281 
6282  if (target->GetCreatureInfo()->IsExotic() && !plrCaster->CanTameExoticPets() && !gmmode)
6283  {
6284  plrCaster->SendPetTameFailure(PETTAME_CANTCONTROLEXOTIC);
6285  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6286  }
6287 
6288  if (!target->GetCreatureInfo()->isTameable(plrCaster->CanTameExoticPets()))
6289  {
6290  plrCaster->SendPetTameFailure(PETTAME_NOTTAMEABLE);
6291  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6292  }
6293 
6294  if (plrCaster->GetPetGuid() || plrCaster->HasCharm())
6295  {
6296  plrCaster->SendPetTameFailure(PETTAME_ANOTHERSUMMONACTIVE);
6297  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6298  }
6299 
6300  break;
6301  }
6302  case SPELL_EFFECT_LEARN_SPELL:
6303  {
6304  if (m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[i] != TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PET)
6305  break;
6306 
6307  Pet* pet = m_caster->GetPet();
6308 
6309  if (!pet)
6310  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_PET;
6311 
6312  SpellEntry const* learn_spellproto = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(m_spellInfo->EffectTriggerSpell[i]);
6313 
6314  if (!learn_spellproto)
6315  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_KNOWN;
6316 
6317  if (learn_spellproto->spellLevel > pet->GetLevel())
6318  return SPELL_FAILED_LOWLEVEL;
6319 
6320  break;
6321  }
6322  case SPELL_EFFECT_LEARN_PET_SPELL:
6323  {
6324  Pet* pet = m_caster->GetPet();
6325 
6326  if (!pet)
6327  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_PET;
6328 
6329  SpellEntry const* learn_spellproto = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(m_spellInfo->EffectTriggerSpell[i]);
6330 
6331  if (!learn_spellproto)
6332  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_KNOWN;
6333 
6334  if (learn_spellproto->spellLevel > pet->GetLevel())
6335  return SPELL_FAILED_LOWLEVEL;
6336 
6337  break;
6338  }
6339  case SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_GLYPH:
6340  {
6341  uint32 glyphId = m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[i];
6342  if (GlyphPropertiesEntry const* gp = sGlyphPropertiesStore.LookupEntry(glyphId))
6343  if (m_caster->HasAura(gp->SpellId))
6344  return SPELL_FAILED_UNIQUE_GLYPH;
6345  break;
6346  }
6347  case SPELL_EFFECT_FEED_PET:
6348  {
6349  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6350  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6351 
6352  Item* foodItem = m_targets.getItemTarget();
6353  if (!foodItem)
6354  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6355 
6356  Pet* pet = m_caster->GetPet();
6357 
6358  if (!pet)
6359  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_PET;
6360 
6361  if (!pet->HaveInDiet(foodItem->GetProto()))
6362  return SPELL_FAILED_WRONG_PET_FOOD;
6363 
6364  if (!pet->GetCurrentFoodBenefitLevel(foodItem->GetProto()->ItemLevel))
6365  return SPELL_FAILED_FOOD_LOWLEVEL;
6366 
6367  if (pet->IsInCombat())
6368  return SPELL_FAILED_AFFECTING_COMBAT;
6369 
6370  break;
6371  }
6372  case SPELL_EFFECT_POWER_BURN:
6373  case SPELL_EFFECT_POWER_DRAIN:
6374  {
6375  // Can be area effect, Check only for players and not check if target - caster (spell can have multiply drain/burn effects)
6376  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
6377  if (Unit* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget())
6378  if (target != m_caster && int32(target->GetPowerType()) != m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[i])
6379  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6380  break;
6381  }
6382  case SPELL_EFFECT_CHARGE:
6383  case SPELL_EFFECT_JUMP:
6384  case SPELL_EFFECT_CHARGE_DEST:
6385  case SPELL_EFFECT_JUMP_DEST:
6386  {
6387  if (!m_ignoreRoot && m_caster->hasUnitState(UNIT_STAT_ROOT))
6388  return SPELL_FAILED_ROOTED;
6389 
6390  Position pos;
6391  bool check = false;
6392  switch (m_spellInfo->Effect[i])
6393  {
6394  case SPELL_EFFECT_CHARGE:
6395  case SPELL_EFFECT_JUMP:
6396  if (Unit* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget())
6397  {
6398  target->GetFirstCollisionPosition(pos, target->GetCombatReach(), target->GetAngle(m_caster));
6399  check = true;
6400  }
6401  break;
6402  case SPELL_EFFECT_CHARGE_DEST:
6403  case SPELL_EFFECT_JUMP_DEST:
6404  if (m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
6405  {
6406  pos = m_targets.getDestination();
6407  check = true;
6408  }
6409  break;
6410  }
6411 
6412  if (check && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_NO_JUMP_PATHING))
6413  {
6414  float range = GetSpellMaxRange(sSpellRangeStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->rangeIndex));
6415 
6416  PathFinder pathFinder(m_caster);
6417  pathFinder.setPathLengthLimit(range * 1.5f);
6418  bool result = pathFinder.calculate(pos.x, pos.y, pos.z);
6419 
6420  if (pathFinder.getPathType() & PATHFIND_SHORT)
6421  return SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE;
6422  if (!result || pathFinder.getPathType() & PATHFIND_NOPATH)
6423  return SPELL_FAILED_NOPATH;
6424  }
6425  break;
6426  }
6427  case SPELL_EFFECT_SKINNING:
6428  {
6429  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || !m_targets.getUnitTarget() || m_targets.getUnitTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
6430  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6431 
6432  if (!m_targets.getUnitTarget()->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_SKINNABLE))
6433  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_UNSKINNABLE;
6434 
6435  Creature* creature = (Creature*)m_targets.getUnitTarget();
6436 
6437  if (creature->IsAlive())
6438  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_NOT_DEAD;
6439 
6440  if (creature->GetLootStatus() != CREATURE_LOOT_STATUS_LOOTED)// || creature->GetCreatureType() != CREATURE_TYPE_CRITTER)
6441  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_NOT_LOOTED;
6442 
6443  uint32 skill = creature->GetCreatureInfo()->GetRequiredLootSkill();
6444 
6445  int32 skillValue = ((Player*)m_caster)->GetSkillValue(skill);
6446  int32 TargetLevel = m_targets.getUnitTarget()->GetLevel();
6447  int32 ReqValue = (skillValue < 100 ? (TargetLevel - 10) * 10 : TargetLevel * 5);
6448  if (ReqValue > skillValue)
6449  return SPELL_FAILED_LOW_CASTLEVEL;
6450 
6451  break;
6452  }
6453  case SPELL_EFFECT_OPEN_LOCK:
6454  {
6455  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER) // only players can open locks, gather etc.
6456  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6457 
6458  // we need a go target in case of TARGET_GAMEOBJECT (for other targets acceptable GO and items)
6459  if (m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[i] == TARGET_GAMEOBJECT)
6460  {
6461  if (!m_targets.getGOTarget())
6462  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6463  }
6464 
6465  // get the lock entry
6466  uint32 lockId;
6467  if (GameObject* go = m_targets.getGOTarget())
6468  {
6469  // In BattleGround players can use only flags and banners
6470  if (((Player*)m_caster)->InBattleGround() &&
6471  !((Player*)m_caster)->CanUseBattleGroundObject())
6472  return SPELL_FAILED_TRY_AGAIN;
6473 
6474  lockId = go->GetGOInfo()->GetLockId();
6475  if (!lockId)
6476  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_OPEN;
6477 
6478  // check if its in use only when cast is finished (called from spell::cast() with strict = false)
6479  if (!strict && go->IsInUse())
6480  return SPELL_FAILED_CHEST_IN_USE;
6481 
6482  if (!strict && go->HasFlag(GAMEOBJECT_FLAGS, GO_FLAG_IN_USE))
6483  return SPELL_FAILED_CHEST_IN_USE;
6484 
6485  // done in client but we need to recheck anyway
6486  if (go->GetGOInfo()->CannotBeUsedUnderImmunity() && m_caster->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE))
6487  return SPELL_FAILED_DAMAGE_IMMUNE;
6488  }
6489  else if (Item* item = m_targets.getItemTarget())
6490  {
6491  // not own (trade?)
6492  if (item->GetOwner() != m_caster)
6493  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_GONE;
6494 
6495  lockId = item->GetProto()->LockID;
6496 
6497  // if already unlocked
6498  if (!lockId || item->HasFlag(ITEM_FIELD_FLAGS, ITEM_DYNFLAG_UNLOCKED))
6499  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_OPEN;
6500  }
6501  else
6502  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6503 
6504  // check lock compatibility
6505  SpellEffectIndex effIdx = SpellEffectIndex(i);
6506  SpellCastResult res = CanOpenLock(effIdx, lockId, m_effectSkillInfo[effIdx].skillId, m_effectSkillInfo[effIdx].reqSkillValue, m_effectSkillInfo[effIdx].skillValue);
6507  if (res != SPELL_CAST_OK)
6508  return res;
6509 
6510  // Failing gathering attempt for mining and herbalism was removed in patch 3.1.0: http://wowwiki.wikia.com/wiki/Patch_3.1.0
6511  // chance for fail at orange LockPicking gathering attempt
