6512  // second check prevent fail at rechecks
6513  if (!strict && m_effectSkillInfo[effIdx].skillId != SKILL_NONE && m_effectSkillInfo[effIdx].skillId != SKILL_HERBALISM && m_effectSkillInfo[effIdx].skillId != SKILL_MINING)
6514  {
6515  bool canFailAtMax = m_effectSkillInfo[effIdx].skillId != SKILL_HERBALISM && m_effectSkillInfo[effIdx].skillId != SKILL_MINING;
6516 
6517  // chance for failure in orange gather / lockpick (gathering skill can't fail at maxskill)
6518  if ((canFailAtMax || m_effectSkillInfo[effIdx].skillValue < sWorld.GetConfigMaxSkillValue())
6519  && m_effectSkillInfo[effIdx].reqSkillValue > irand(m_effectSkillInfo[effIdx].skillValue - 25, m_effectSkillInfo[effIdx].skillValue + 37))
6520  return SPELL_FAILED_TRY_AGAIN;
6521  }
6522  if (m_CastItem)
6523  m_effectSkillInfo[effIdx].skillId = SKILL_NONE;
6524  break;
6525  }
6526  case SPELL_EFFECT_PICKPOCKET:
6527  {
6528  // should always fail above if not exists
6529  Unit* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
6530  if (!target->IsCreature())
6531  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6532 
6533  Creature* creatureTarget = static_cast<Creature*>(target);
6534  if (!creatureTarget->GetCreatureInfo()->PickpocketLootId)
6535  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_NO_POCKETS;
6536  break;
6537  }
6538  case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_DEAD_PET:
6539  {
6540  Creature* pet = m_caster->GetPet();
6541  if (!pet)
6542  {
6543  SpellCastResult result = Pet::TryLoadFromDB(m_caster);
6544  if (result == SPELL_FAILED_NO_PET)
6545  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_PET;
6546 
6547  if (result == SPELL_CAST_OK)
6548  {
6549  ((Player*)m_caster)->SendPetTameFailure(PETTAME_NOTDEAD);
6550  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6551  }
6552 
6553  if (result != SPELL_FAILED_TARGETS_DEAD)
6554  return SPELL_FAILED_UNKNOWN;
6555  }
6556  else if (pet->IsAlive())
6557  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_SUMMON;
6558 
6559  break;
6560  }
6561  // This is generic summon effect
6562  case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON:
6563  {
6564  if (SummonPropertiesEntry const* summon_prop = sSummonPropertiesStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValueB[i]))
6565  {
6566  if (summon_prop->Group == SUMMON_PROP_GROUP_PETS && m_caster)
6567  {
6568  if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_DISMISS_PET_FIRST) && m_caster->GetPetGuid())
6569  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_SUMMON;
6570 
6571  if (m_caster->HasCharm())
6572  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_CHARM;
6573  }
6574  }
6575 
6576  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_DISMISS_PET_FIRST))
6577  if (m_caster->FindGuardianWithEntry(m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[i]))
6578  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_SUMMON;
6579 
6580  break;
6581  }
6582  case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_PET:
6583  {
6584  if (m_caster->HasCharm())
6585  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_CHARM;
6586 
6587  uint32 plClass = m_caster->getClass();
6588  if (plClass == CLASS_HUNTER)
6589  {
6590  if (Creature* pet = m_caster->GetPet())
6591  {
6592  if (!pet->IsAlive())
6593  {
6594  ((Player*)m_caster)->SendPetTameFailure(PETTAME_DEAD);
6595  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6596  }
6597  else if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_DISMISS_PET_FIRST))
6598  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_SUMMON;
6599  }
6600  SpellCastResult result = Pet::TryLoadFromDB(m_caster);
6601  if (result == SPELL_FAILED_TARGETS_DEAD)
6602  {
6603  ((Player*)m_caster)->SendPetTameFailure(PETTAME_DEAD);
6604  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6605  }
6606  if (result != SPELL_CAST_OK)
6607  return result;
6608  }
6609  else if (m_caster->GetPetGuid())
6610  {
6611  if (plClass == CLASS_WARLOCK) // let warlock do a replacement summon
6612  {
6613  if (strict) // Summoning Disorientation, trigger pet stun (cast by pet so it doesn't attack player)
6614  if (Pet* pet = ((Player*)m_caster)->GetPet())
6615  pet->CastSpell(pet, 32752, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, pet->GetObjectGuid());
6616  }
6617  else if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_DISMISS_PET_FIRST))
6618  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_SUMMON;
6619  }
6620 
6621  break;
6622  }
6623  case SPELL_EFFECT_TRIGGER_SPELL_2:
6624  {
6625  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6626  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6627 
6628  Player* caster = static_cast<Player*>(m_caster);
6629  if (!caster->GetSelectionGuid())
6630  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6631 
6632  Player* target = sObjectMgr.GetPlayer(caster->GetSelectionGuid());
6633  if (!target || caster == target || !target->IsInGroup(m_caster))
6634  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6635 
6636 #ifdef PRENERF_2_3
6637  // pre 2.4 - could not summon to netherstorm
6638  if (m_caster->GetZoneId() == 3523)
6639  return SPELL_FAILED_FIZZLE;
6640 
6641  uint32 mapId = m_caster->GetMapId();
6642  const MapEntry* map = sMapStore.LookupEntry(mapId);
6643  if (map->IsDungeon())
6644  {
6645  // pre 2.4 - could not summon to instance
6646  if (target->GetMapId() != mapId)
6647  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_NOT_IN_INSTANCE;
6648  }
6649  break;
6650 #endif
6651  }
6652  case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_PLAYER:
6653  {
6654  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6655  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6656  Player* caster = static_cast<Player*>(m_caster);
6657  if (!caster->GetSelectionGuid())
6658  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6659 
6660  Player* target = sObjectMgr.GetPlayer(caster->GetSelectionGuid());
6661  if (!target || caster == target || !target->IsInGroup(m_caster))
6662  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6663 
6664  // check if our map is dungeon
6665  uint32 mapId = m_caster->GetMapId();
6666  const MapEntry* map = sMapStore.LookupEntry(mapId);
6667  if (map->IsDungeon())
6668  {
6669 #ifdef PRENERF_2_3
6670  // pre 2.4 - could not summon to instance
6671  if (target->GetMapId() != mapId)
6672  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_NOT_IN_INSTANCE;
6673 #endif
6674 
6675  InstanceTemplate const* instance = ObjectMgr::GetInstanceTemplate(mapId);
6676  if (!instance)
6677  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_NOT_IN_INSTANCE;
6678  if (instance->levelMin > target->GetLevel())
6679  return SPELL_FAILED_LOWLEVEL;
6680  if (instance->levelMax && instance->levelMax < target->GetLevel())
6681  return SPELL_FAILED_HIGHLEVEL;
6682 
6683  Difficulty difficulty = m_caster->GetMap()->GetDifficulty();
6684  if (InstancePlayerBind* targetBind = target->GetBoundInstance(mapId, difficulty))
6685  if (InstancePlayerBind* casterBind = caster->GetBoundInstance(mapId, difficulty))
6686  if (targetBind->perm && targetBind->state != casterBind->state)
6687  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_LOCKED_TO_RAID_INSTANCE;
6688 
6689  if (AreaTrigger const* at = sObjectMgr.GetMapEntranceTrigger(mapId))
6690  {
6691  uint32 miscRequirement;
6692  if (AREA_LOCKSTATUS_OK != target->GetAreaTriggerLockStatus(at, difficulty, miscRequirement))
6693  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS; // TODO: Verify this result
6694  }
6695  }
6696  break;
6697  }
6698  case SPELL_EFFECT_RESURRECT:
6699  case SPELL_EFFECT_RESURRECT_NEW:
6700  {
6701  if (m_targets.m_targetMask & (TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_ALLY | TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_ENEMY))
6702  {
6703  if (Corpse* corpse = m_caster->GetMap()->GetCorpse(m_targets.getCorpseTargetGuid()))
6704  {
6705  if (Player* owner = ObjectAccessor::FindPlayer(corpse->GetOwnerGuid()))
6706  {
6707  if (owner->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_PREVENT_RESURRECTION))
6708  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_CANNOT_BE_RESURRECTED;
6709  }
6710  else
6711  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_CANNOT_BE_RESURRECTED;
6712  }
6713  else
6714  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_CANNOT_BE_RESURRECTED;
6715  }
6716  else if (m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_UNIT)
6717  {
6718  Unit* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
6719  if (!target || target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_PREVENT_RESURRECTION))
6720  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_CANNOT_BE_RESURRECTED;
6721  }
6722  else
6723  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_CANNOT_BE_RESURRECTED;
6724 
6725  break;
6726  }
6727  case SPELL_EFFECT_SELF_RESURRECT:
6728  {
6729  if (m_caster->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_PREVENT_RESURRECTION))
6730  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_CANNOT_BE_RESURRECTED;
6731 
6732  break;
6733  }
6734  case SPELL_EFFECT_LEAP:
6735  case SPELL_EFFECT_TELEPORT_UNITS_FACE_CASTER:
6736  {
6737  if (!m_caster || m_caster->IsTaxiFlying())
6738  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_ON_TAXI;
6739 
6740  if (!m_ignoreRoot && m_caster->hasUnitState(UNIT_STAT_ROOT))
6741  return SPELL_FAILED_ROOTED;
6742 
6743  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
6744  {
6745  if (((Player*)m_caster)->HasMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_ONTRANSPORT))
6746  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_ON_TRANSPORT;
6747 
6748  // not allow use this effect at battleground until battleground start
6749  if (BattleGround const* bg = ((Player*)m_caster)->GetBattleGround())
6750  if (bg->GetStatus() != STATUS_IN_PROGRESS)
6751  return SPELL_FAILED_TRY_AGAIN;
6752  }
6753 
6754  break;
6755  }
6756  case SPELL_EFFECT_STEAL_BENEFICIAL_BUFF:
6757  {
6758  if (m_targets.getUnitTarget() == m_caster)
6759  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6760  break;
6761  }
6762  case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_RAF_FRIEND:
6763  {
6764  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6765  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6766 
6767  Player* caster = static_cast<Player*>(m_caster);
6768  if (!caster->GetSession()->GetRecruitingFriendId())
6769  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6770  break;
6771  }
6772  case SPELL_EFFECT_CREATE_PET:
6773  {
6774  if (m_targets.getUnitTarget())
6775  {
6776  if (m_targets.getUnitTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6777  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6778  if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_DISMISS_PET_FIRST) && m_targets.getUnitTarget()->GetPetGuid())
6779  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_SUMMON;
6780  }
6781  break;
6782  }
6783  default: break;
6784  }
6785  }
6786 
6787  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
6788  {
6789  // Do not check in case of junk in DBC
6790  if (!IsAuraApplyEffect(m_spellInfo, SpellEffectIndex(i)))
6791  continue;
6792 
6793  // Possible Unit-target for the spell
6794  Unit* expectedTarget = GetPrefilledUnitTargetOrUnitTarget(SpellEffectIndex(i));
6795 
6796  switch (m_spellInfo->EffectApplyAuraName[i])
6797  {
6798  case SPELL_AURA_DUMMY:
6799  {
6800  // custom check
6801  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
6802  {
6803  case 34026: // Kill Command
6804  if (!m_caster->GetPet())
6805  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_PET;
6806  break;
6807  case 61336: // Survival Instincts
6808  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || !m_caster->IsNoWeaponShapeShift())
6809  return SPELL_FAILED_ONLY_SHAPESHIFT;
6810  break;
6811  default:
6812  break;
6813  }
6814  break;
6815  }
6816  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS:
6817  {
6818  if (!m_trueCaster->IsPlayer())
6819  return SPELL_FAILED_UNKNOWN;
6820 
6821  if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_DISMISS_PET_FIRST) && m_caster->HasCharm())
6822  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_CHARM;
6823 
6824  if (m_caster->HasCharmer())
6825  return SPELL_FAILED_CHARMED;
6826 
6827  if (expectedTarget) // target may not be known at CheckCast time - TODO: add support for these checks on CheckTarget
6828  {
6829  if (expectedTarget == m_caster)
6830  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6831 
6832  if (expectedTarget->HasCharmer())
6833  return SPELL_FAILED_CHARMED;
6834 
6835  if (int32(expectedTarget->GetLevel()) > CalculateSpellEffectValue(SpellEffectIndex(i), expectedTarget))
6836  return SPELL_FAILED_HIGHLEVEL;
6837 
6838  if (expectedTarget->GetOwner())
6839  return expectedTarget->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED) ? SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_IS_PLAYER_CONTROLLED : SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_CHARMED;
6840  }
6841  break;
6842  }
6843  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_CHARM:
6844  {
6845  if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_DISMISS_PET_FIRST) && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_caster->HasCharm())
6846  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_CHARM;
6847 
6848  if (m_caster->HasCharmer())
6849  return SPELL_FAILED_CHARMED;
6850 
6851  if (expectedTarget) // target may not be known at CheckCast time - TODO: add support for these checks on CheckTarget
6852  {
6853  if (expectedTarget == m_caster)
6854  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6855 
6856  if (expectedTarget->HasCharmer())
6857  return SPELL_FAILED_CHARMED;
6858 
6859  if (int32(expectedTarget->GetLevel()) > CalculateSpellEffectValue(SpellEffectIndex(i), expectedTarget))
6860  return SPELL_FAILED_HIGHLEVEL;
6861 
6862  if (expectedTarget->GetOwner())
6863  return expectedTarget->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED) ? SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_IS_PLAYER_CONTROLLED : SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_CHARMED;
6864  }
6865  break;
6866  }
6867  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS_PET:
6868  {
6869  if (!m_trueCaster->IsPlayer())
6870  return SPELL_FAILED_UNKNOWN;
6871 
6872  if (m_caster->HasCharm())
6873  return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_CHARM;
6874 
6875  if (m_caster->HasCharmer())
6876  return SPELL_FAILED_CHARMED;
6877 
6878  Pet* pet = m_caster->GetPet();
6879  if (!pet)
6880  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_PET;
6881 
6882  if (pet->HasCharmer())
6883  return SPELL_FAILED_CHARMED;
6884 
6885  break;
6886  }
6887  case SPELL_AURA_AOE_CHARM:
6888  {
6889  if (m_caster->HasCharmer())
6890  return SPELL_FAILED_CHARMED;
6891 
6892  break;
6893  }
6894  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_CONFUSE:
6895  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_FEAR:
6896  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN:
6897  {
6898  if (expectedTarget)
6899  {
6900  // flying players on mounts are immune to cc
6901  if (expectedTarget->IsMounted() && expectedTarget->IsFlying() && expectedTarget->IsPlayerControlled() && expectedTarget->IsAboveGround())
6902  {
6903  if (m_spellInfo->Mechanic)
6904  return SPELL_FAILED_IMMUNE;
6905 
6906  if (m_spellInfo->EffectMechanic[i])
6907  {
6908  SpellCastResult result = partialApplication(i);
6909  if (result != SPELL_CAST_OK)
6910  return SPELL_FAILED_IMMUNE;
6911  }
6912  }
6913  }
6914  break;
6915  }
6916  case SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED:
6917  {
6918  if (m_caster->IsInWater() && (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || static_cast<Player*>(m_caster)->IsInHighLiquid()))
6919  return SPELL_FAILED_ONLY_ABOVEWATER;
6920 
6921  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && ((Player*)m_caster)->GetTransport())
6922  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_MOUNTS_ALLOWED;
6923 
6924  // Ignore map check if spell have AreaId. AreaId already checked and this prevent special mount spells
6925  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER &&
6926  !m_IsTriggeredSpell &&
6927  !m_spellInfo->AreaGroupId &&
6928  (m_caster->GetMap() && !m_caster->GetMap()->IsMountAllowed()))
6929  {
6930  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_MOUNTS_ALLOWED;
6931  }
6932 
6933  if (m_caster->IsInDisallowedMountForm())
6934  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_SHAPESHIFT;
6935 
6936  break;
6937  }
6938  case SPELL_AURA_RANGED_ATTACK_POWER_ATTACKER_BONUS:
6939  {
6940  if (!expectedTarget)
6941  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_IMPLICIT_TARGETS;
6942 
6943  // can be casted at non-friendly unit or own pet/charm
6944  if (!m_caster->CanAttack(expectedTarget))
6945  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_FRIENDLY;
6946 
6947  break;
6948  }
6949  case SPELL_AURA_FLY:
6950  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_FLIGHT_SPEED_MOUNTED:
6951  {
6952  // not allow cast fly spells if not have req. skills (all spells is self target)
6953  // allow always ghost flight spells
6954  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_caster->IsAlive())
6955  {
6956  if (!((Player*)m_caster)->CanStartFlyInArea(m_caster->GetMapId(), zone, area, m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX7_IGNORES_COLD_WEATHER_FLYING_REQUIREMENT)))
6957  return m_IsTriggeredSpell ? SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT : SPELL_FAILED_NOT_HERE;
6958  }
6959  break;
6960  }
6961  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_MANA_LEECH:
6962  {
6963  if (expectedTarget)
6964  {
6965  if (expectedTarget->GetPowerType() != POWER_MANA)
6966  {
6967  SpellCastResult result = partialApplication(i);
6968  if (result != SPELL_CAST_OK)
6969  return result;
6970  }
6971  }
6972 
6973  break;
6974  }
6975  case SPELL_AURA_CONTROL_VEHICLE:
6976  {
6977  if (m_caster->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED))
6978  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_MOUNTED;
6979 
6980  if (expectedTarget)
6981  {
6982  if (!expectedTarget->IsVehicle())
6983  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6984 
6985  // It is possible to change between vehicles that are boarded on each other
6986  if (m_caster->IsBoarded() && m_caster->GetTransportInfo()->IsOnVehicle())
6987  {
6988  // Check if trying to board a vehicle that is boarded on current transport
6989  bool boardedOnEachOther = m_caster->GetTransportInfo()->HasOnBoard(expectedTarget);
6990  // Check if trying to board a vehicle that has the current transport on board
6991  if (!boardedOnEachOther)
6992  boardedOnEachOther = expectedTarget->GetVehicleInfo()->HasOnBoard(m_caster);
6993 
6994  if (!boardedOnEachOther)
6995  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_ON_TRANSPORT;
6996  }
6997 
6998  if (!expectedTarget->GetVehicleInfo()->CanBoard(m_caster))
6999  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
7000  }
7001  break;
7002  }
7003  case SPELL_AURA_MIRROR_IMAGE:
7004  {
7005  if (expectedTarget)
7006  {
7007  // Target must be creature. TODO: Check if target can also be player
7008  if (expectedTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
7009  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
7010 
7011  if (expectedTarget == m_caster) // Clone self can't be accepted
7012  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
7013 
7014  // It is assumed that target can not be cloned if already cloned by same or other clone auras
7015  if (expectedTarget->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MIRROR_IMAGE))
7016  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
7017  }
7018  break;
7019  }
7020  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_DISARM: // supports partial application
7021  {
7022  if (expectedTarget)
7023  {
7024  // Target must be a weapon wielder
7025  if (!expectedTarget->hasMainhandWeapon())
7026  {
7027  SpellCastResult result = partialApplication(i);
7028  if (result != SPELL_CAST_OK)
7029  return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_NO_WEAPONS;
7030  }
7031  }
7032  break;
7033  }
7034  default:
7035  break;
7036  }
7037  }
7038 
7039  // check trade slot case (last, for allow catch any another cast problems)
7040  if (m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM)
7041  {
7042  if (!m_trueCaster->IsPlayer())
7043  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_TRADING;
7044 
7045  if (TradeSlots(m_targets.getItemTargetGuid().GetRawValue()) != TRADE_SLOT_NONTRADED)
7046  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_NOT_READY;
7047 
7048  // if trade not complete then remember it in trade data
7049  if (TradeData* my_trade = static_cast<Player*>(m_caster)->GetTradeData())
7050  {
7051  if (!my_trade->IsInAcceptProcess())
7052  {
7053  // Spell will be casted at completing the trade. Silently ignore at this place
7054  my_trade->SetSpell(m_spellInfo->Id, m_CastItem);
7055  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
7056  }
7057  }
7058  else
7059  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_TRADING;
7060  }
7061 
7062  if (m_trueCaster->IsPlayer() && m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_NO_ACTIVE_PETS))
7063  {
7064  Player* player = static_cast<Player*>(m_caster);
7065  if (player->GetPetGuid() || player->HasCharm())
7066  {
7067  player->SendPetTameFailure(PETTAME_ANOTHERSUMMONACTIVE);
7068  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
7069  }
7070  SpellCastResult result = Pet::TryLoadFromDB(player);
7071  if (result == SPELL_FAILED_TARGETS_DEAD || result == SPELL_CAST_OK)
7072  {
7073  player->SendPetTameFailure(PETTAME_ANOTHERSUMMONACTIVE);
7074  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
7075  }
7076  }
7077 
7078  // all ok
7079  return OnCheckCast(strict);
7080 }
7081 
7082 SpellCastResult Spell::CheckPetCast(Unit* target)
7083 {
7084  if (!m_caster->IsAlive())
7085  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_DEAD;
7086 
7087  if (m_caster->IsNonMeleeSpellCasted(false) && !m_ignoreConcurrentCasts) // prevent spellcast interruption by another spellcast
7088  return SPELL_FAILED_SPELL_IN_PROGRESS;
7089  if (m_caster->IsInCombat() && IsNonCombatSpell(m_spellInfo))
7090  return SPELL_FAILED_AFFECTING_COMBAT;
7091 
7092  if (m_caster->IsCreature() && (static_cast<Creature*>(m_caster)->IsPet() || m_caster->HasCharmer()))
7093  {
7094  // dead owner (currently only ghouled players can have alive pet casting)
7095  Unit* charmer = m_caster->GetMaster();
7096  if (charmer)
7097  {
7098  Player* pCharmer = charmer->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ? static_cast<Player*>(charmer) : nullptr;
7099  if (!charmer->IsAlive() && (!pCharmer || !pCharmer->IsGhouled()))
7100  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_DEAD;
7101  }
7102 
7103  if (!target && m_targets.getUnitTarget())
7104  target = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
7105 
7106  bool need = false;
7107  bool script = false;
7108  for (unsigned int i : m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA)
7109  {
7110  if (i == TARGET_UNIT_ENEMY ||
7111  i == TARGET_UNIT_FRIEND ||
7112  i == TARGET_UNIT_RAID ||
7113  i == TARGET_UNIT ||
7114  i == TARGET_UNIT_PARTY ||
7115  i == TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_TARGET_POSITION)
7116  {
7117  need = true;
7118  if (!target)
7119  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_IMPLICIT_TARGETS;
7120  break;
7121  }
7122  if (i == TARGET_LOCATION_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER ||
7123  i == TARGET_UNIT_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER)
7124  {
7125  script = true;
7126  }
7127  }
7128  if (need)
7129  m_targets.setUnitTarget(target);
7130  else if (script)
7131  return CheckCast(true);
7132 
7133  Unit* _target = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
7134 
7135  // for target dead/target not valid
7136  if (_target && m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_UNIT)
7137  {
7138  if (_target->IsDead() && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_ALLOW_DEAD_TARGET))
7139  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
7140 
7141  if (IsPositiveSpell(m_spellInfo->Id, m_caster, _target))
7142  {
7143  if (!m_caster->CanAssistSpell(_target, m_spellInfo))
7144  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
7145  }
7146  else
7147  {
7148  bool duelvsplayertar = false;
7149  for (unsigned int j : m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA)
7150  {
7151  // TARGET_UNIT is positive AND negative
7152  duelvsplayertar |= (j == TARGET_UNIT);
7153  }
7154  if (!m_caster->CanAttack(target) && !duelvsplayertar)
7155  {
7156  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
7157  }
7158  }
7159  }
7160  // cooldown
7161  if (!m_caster->IsSpellReady(*m_spellInfo))
7162  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_READY;
7163  }
7164 
7165  return CheckCast(true);
7166 }
7167 
7168 SpellCastResult Spell::CheckCasterAuras(uint32& param1) const
7169 {
7170  if (m_ignoreCasterAuraState)
7171  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7172 
7173  if (!m_trueCaster->IsUnit())
7174  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7175 
7176  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_NOT_AN_ATTACK))
7177  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7178 
7179  // these attributes only show the spell as usable on the client when it has related aura applied
7180  // still they need to be checked against certain mechanics
7181 
7182  // SPELL_ATTR5_USABLE_WHILE_STUNNED by default only MECHANIC_STUN (ie no sleep, knockout, freeze, etc.)
7183  bool usableWhileStunned = m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_ALLOW_WHILE_STUNNED);
7184 
7185  // Pain Suppression (have SPELL_ATTR_EX5_USABLE_WHILE_STUNNED that must be used only with glyph)
7186  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 33206 && !m_caster->HasAura(63248))
7187  usableWhileStunned = false;
7188 
7189  // SPELL_ATTR5_USABLE_WHILE_FEARED by default only fear (ie no horror)
7190  bool usableWhileFeared = m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_ALLOW_WHILE_FLEEING);
7191 
7192  // SPELL_ATTR5_USABLE_WHILE_CONFUSED by default only disorient (ie no polymorph)
7193  bool usableWhileConfused = m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_ALLOW_WHILE_CONFUSED);
7194 
7195  // Check whether the cast should be prevented by any state you might have.
7196  SpellCastResult result = SPELL_CAST_OK;
7197 
7198  // Get unit state
7199  uint32 const unitflag = m_caster->GetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS);
7200 
7201  // this check should only be done when player does cast directly
7202  // (ie not when it's called from a script) Breaks for example PlayerAI when charmed
7203  if (m_clientCast)
7204  if (Unit* charmer = m_caster->GetCharmer())
7205  if (!CheckSpellCancelsCharm(param1))
7206  result = SPELL_FAILED_CHARMED;
7207 
7208  // spell has attribute usable while having a cc state, check if caster has allowed mechanic auras, another mechanic types must prevent cast spell
7209  auto mechanicCheck = [&](AuraType type) -> SpellCastResult
7210  {
7211  bool foundNotMechanic = false;
7212  Unit::AuraList const& auras = m_caster->GetAurasByType(type);
7213  for (Aura const* aura : auras)
7214  {
7215  uint32 const mechanicMask = aura->GetSpellProto()->GetAllEffectsMechanicMask();
7216  if (mechanicMask && !(mechanicMask & GetAllowedMechanicMask(m_spellInfo)))
7217  {
7218  foundNotMechanic = true;
7219 
7220  // fill up aura mechanic info to send client proper error message
7221  param1 = aura->GetSpellProto()->EffectMechanic[aura->GetEffIndex()];
7222  if (!param1)
7223  param1 = aura->GetSpellProto()->Mechanic;
7224 
7225  break;
7226  }
7227  }
7228 
7229  if (foundNotMechanic)
7230  {
7231  switch (type)
7232  {
7233  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN:
7234  return SPELL_FAILED_STUNNED;
7235  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_FEAR:
7236  return SPELL_FAILED_FLEEING;
7237  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_CONFUSE:
7238  return SPELL_FAILED_CONFUSED;
7239  default:
7240  MANGOS_ASSERT(false);
7241  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_KNOWN;
7242  }
7243  }
7244 
7245  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7246  };
7247 
7248  if (unitflag & UNIT_FLAG_STUNNED && !usableWhileStunned && !CheckSpellCancelsStun(param1))
7249  result = SPELL_FAILED_STUNNED;
7250  else if (unitflag & UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED && m_spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_SILENCE && !CheckSpellCancelsSilence(param1))
7251  result = SPELL_FAILED_SILENCED;
7252  else if (unitflag & UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED && m_spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_PACIFY && !CheckSpellCancelsPacify(param1))
7253  result = SPELL_FAILED_PACIFIED;
7254  else if (unitflag & UNIT_FLAG_FLEEING && !usableWhileFeared && !CheckSpellCancelsFear(param1))
7255  result = SPELL_FAILED_FLEEING;
7256  else if (unitflag & UNIT_FLAG_CONFUSED && !usableWhileConfused && !CheckSpellCancelsConfuse(param1))
7257  result = SPELL_FAILED_CONFUSED;
7258 
7259  // Attr must make flag drop spell totally immune from all effects
7260  if (result != SPELL_CAST_OK)
7261  return param1 ? SPELL_FAILED_PREVENTED_BY_MECHANIC : result;
7262 
7263  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7264 }
7265 
7266 bool Spell::CheckSpellCancelsAuraEffect(AuraType auraType, uint32& param1) const
7267 {
7268  Unit* unitCaster = (m_trueCaster->IsGameObject() ? nullptr : m_caster);
7269  if (!unitCaster)
7270  return false;
7271 
7272  // Checking auras is needed now, because you are prevented by some state but the spell grants immunity.
7273  Unit::AuraList const& auraEffects = unitCaster->GetAurasByType(auraType);
7274  if (auraEffects.empty())
7275  return true;
7276 
7277  for (Aura const* aura : auraEffects)
7278  {
7279  SpellEntry const* auraInfo = aura->GetSpellProto();
7280  if (SpellCancelsAuraEffect(m_spellInfo, auraInfo, aura->GetEffIndex()))
7281  continue;
7282 
7283  param1 = auraInfo->EffectMechanic[aura->GetEffIndex()];
7284  if (!param1)
7285  param1 = auraInfo->Mechanic;
7286 
7287  return false;
7288  }
7289 
7290  return true;
7291 }
7292 
7293 bool Spell::CheckSpellCancelsCharm(uint32& param1) const
7294 {
7295  return CheckSpellCancelsAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_MOD_CHARM, param1) &&
7296  CheckSpellCancelsAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_AOE_CHARM, param1) &&
7297  CheckSpellCancelsAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS, param1);
7298 }
7299 
7300 bool Spell::CheckSpellCancelsStun(uint32& param1) const
7301 {
7302  return CheckSpellCancelsAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN, param1) &&
7303  CheckSpellCancelsAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_STRANGULATE, param1);
7304 }
7305 
7306 bool Spell::CheckSpellCancelsSilence(uint32& param1) const
7307 {
7308  return CheckSpellCancelsAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_MOD_SILENCE, param1) &&
7309  CheckSpellCancelsAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_MOD_PACIFY_SILENCE, param1);
7310 }
7311 
7312 bool Spell::CheckSpellCancelsPacify(uint32& param1) const
7313 {
7314  return CheckSpellCancelsAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_MOD_PACIFY, param1) &&
7315  CheckSpellCancelsAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_MOD_PACIFY_SILENCE, param1);
7316 }
7317 
7318 bool Spell::CheckSpellCancelsFear(uint32& param1) const
7319 {
7320  return CheckSpellCancelsAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FEAR, param1);
7321 }
7322 
7323 bool Spell::CheckSpellCancelsConfuse(uint32& param1) const
7324 {
7325  return CheckSpellCancelsAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_MOD_CONFUSE, param1);
7326 }
7327 
7328 bool Spell::CanAutoCast(Unit* target)
7329 {
7330  for (int j = 0; j < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++j)
7331  {
7332  if (m_spellInfo->Effect[j] == SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AURA)
7333  {
7334  if (m_spellInfo->StackAmount <= 1)
7335  {
7336  if (target->HasAura(m_spellInfo->Id, SpellEffectIndex(j)))
7337  return false;
7338  }
7339  else
7340  {
7341  if (Aura* aura = target->GetAura(m_spellInfo->Id, SpellEffectIndex(j)))
7342  if (aura->GetStackAmount() >= m_spellInfo->StackAmount)
7343  return false;
7344  }
7345  }
7346  else if (IsAreaAuraEffect(m_spellInfo->Effect[j]))
7347  {
7348  if (target->HasAura(m_spellInfo->Id, SpellEffectIndex(j)))
7349  return false;
7350  }
7351  }
7352 
7353  SpellCastResult result = CheckPetCast(target);
7354 
7355  if (result == SPELL_CAST_OK || result == SPELL_FAILED_UNIT_NOT_INFRONT)
7356  return true;
7357  return false; // target invalid
7358 }
7359 
7360 std::pair<float, float> Spell::GetMinMaxRange(bool strict)
7361 {
7362  float minRange = 0.0f, maxRange = 0.0f, rangeMod = 0.0f;
7363 
7364  if (strict && IsNextMeleeSwingSpell(m_spellInfo))
7365  return { 0.0f, 100.0f };
7366 
7367  Unit* caster = dynamic_cast<Unit*>(m_trueCaster); // preparation for GO casting
7368 
7369  SpellRangeEntry const* spellRange = sSpellRangeStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->rangeIndex);
7370  if (spellRange)
7371  {
7372  Unit* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
7373  if (spellRange->Flags & SPELL_RANGE_FLAG_MELEE)
7374  {
7375  if (caster)
7376  rangeMod = caster->GetCombinedCombatReach(target ? target : caster, true, 0.f);
7377  }
7378  else
7379  {
7380  float meleeRange = 0.f;
7381  if (spellRange->Flags & SPELL_RANGE_FLAG_RANGED)
7382  {
7383  if (caster)
7384  meleeRange = caster->GetCombinedCombatReach(target ? target : caster, true, 0.f);
7385  }
7386 
7387  bool friendly = target ? m_trueCaster->CanAssistSpell(target, m_spellInfo) : false;
7388  minRange = GetSpellMinRange(spellRange, friendly) + meleeRange;
7389  maxRange = GetSpellMaxRange(spellRange, friendly);
7390 
7391  if (target || m_targets.getCorpseTarget())
7392  {
7393  rangeMod = m_trueCaster->GetCombatReach() + (target ? target->GetCombatReach() : m_trueCaster->GetCombatReach());
7394 
7395  if (minRange > 0.0f && !(spellRange->Flags & SPELL_RANGE_FLAG_RANGED))
7396  minRange += rangeMod;
7397  }
7398  }
7399 
7400  if (target && caster && caster->IsMovingForward() && target->IsMovingForward() && !caster->IsWalking() && !target->IsWalking() &&
7401  ((spellRange->Flags & SPELL_RANGE_FLAG_MELEE) || target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER))
7402  rangeMod += MELEE_LEEWAY;
7403  }
7404 
7405  if (caster)
7406  {
7407  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_USES_RANGED_SLOT) && caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7408  if (Item* ranged = static_cast<Player*>(caster)->GetWeaponForAttack(RANGED_ATTACK))
7409  maxRange *= ranged->GetProto()->RangedModRange * 0.01f;
7410 
7411  if (Player* modOwner = caster->GetSpellModOwner())
7412  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_RANGE, maxRange);
7413  }
7414 
7415  maxRange += rangeMod;
7416 
7417  return { minRange, maxRange };
7418 }
7419 
7420 SpellCastResult Spell::CheckRange(bool strict)
7421 {
7422  // Don't check for instant cast spells
7423  if (!strict && m_casttime == 0)
7424  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7425 
7426  WorldObject* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
7427 
7428  float minRange, maxRange;
7429  std::tie(minRange, maxRange) = GetMinMaxRange(strict);
7430 
7431  // non strict spell tolerance
7432  if (SpellRangeEntry const* spellRange = sSpellRangeStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->rangeIndex))
7433  if ((spellRange->Flags & SPELL_RANGE_FLAG_MELEE) == 0 && !strict)
7434  maxRange += std::min(3.f, maxRange * 0.1f); // 10% but no more than MAX_SPELL_RANGE_TOLERANCE
7435 
7436  if (!target && m_clientCast && HasSpellTarget(m_spellInfo, TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PET))
7437  target = m_caster->GetPet() ? m_caster->GetPet() : m_caster->GetCharm();
7438 
7439  if (target && target != m_trueCaster)
7440  {
7441  // distance from target in checks
7442  float dist = m_trueCaster->GetDistance(target, true, DIST_CALC_NONE); // minRange/maxRange already contain everything
7443  if (dist > maxRange * maxRange)
7444  return SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE;
7445  if (minRange && dist < minRange * minRange)
7446  return SPELL_FAILED_TOO_CLOSE;
7447  if (m_trueCaster->IsPlayer() &&
7448  (m_spellInfo->FacingCasterFlags & SPELL_FACING_FLAG_INFRONT) && !m_trueCaster->HasInArc(target))
7449  return SPELL_FAILED_UNIT_NOT_INFRONT;
7450  }
7451 
7452  if (GameObject* goTarget = m_targets.getGOTarget())
7453  if (!goTarget->IsAtInteractDistance(dynamic_cast<Player*>(m_trueCaster), maxRange)) // only player casts these
7454  return SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE;
7455 
7456  if (m_targets.m_targetMask == TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
7457  {
7458  float dist = m_trueCaster->GetDistance(m_targets.m_destPos.x, m_targets.m_destPos.y, m_targets.m_destPos.z, DIST_CALC_NONE);
7459  if (dist > maxRange * maxRange)
7460  return SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE;
7461  if (minRange && dist < minRange * minRange)
7462  return SPELL_FAILED_TOO_CLOSE;
7463  if (!IsIgnoreLosSpell(m_spellInfo))
7464  if (!m_trueCaster->IsWithinLOS(m_targets.m_destPos.x, m_targets.m_destPos.y, m_targets.m_destPos.z + 1.f))
7465  return SPELL_FAILED_LINE_OF_SIGHT;
7466  }
7467 
7468  if (m_targets.m_targetMask == TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION)
7469  {
7470  float dist = m_trueCaster->GetDistance(m_targets.m_srcPos.x, m_targets.m_srcPos.y, m_targets.m_srcPos.z, DIST_CALC_NONE);
7471  if (dist > maxRange* maxRange)
7472  return SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE;
7473  if (minRange && dist < minRange * minRange)
7474  return SPELL_FAILED_TOO_CLOSE;
7475  if (!IsIgnoreLosSpell(m_spellInfo))
7476  if (!m_trueCaster->IsWithinLOS(m_targets.m_srcPos.x, m_targets.m_srcPos.y, m_targets.m_srcPos.z + 1.f))
7477  return SPELL_FAILED_LINE_OF_SIGHT;
7478  }
7479 
7480  m_maxRange = maxRange; // need to save max range for some calculations
7481 
7482  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7483 }
7484 
7485 int32 Spell::CalculateSpellEffectDamage(Unit* unitTarget, int32 damage)
7486 {
7487  // damage bonus (per damage class)
7488  switch (m_spellInfo->DmgClass)
7489  {
7490  // Melee and Ranged Spells
7491  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED:
7492  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE:
7493  {
7494  // Calculate damage bonus
7495  if (!m_trueCaster->IsGameObject())
7496  damage = m_caster->MeleeDamageBonusDone(unitTarget, damage, m_attackType, m_spellSchoolMask, m_spellInfo, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
7497  damage = unitTarget->MeleeDamageBonusTaken(m_trueCaster->IsGameObject() ? nullptr : m_caster, damage, m_attackType, m_spellSchoolMask, m_spellInfo, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
7498  }
7499  break;
7500  // Magical Attacks
7501  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_NONE:
7502  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC:
7503  {
7504  // Calculate damage bonus
7505  if (!m_trueCaster->IsGameObject())
7506  damage = m_caster->SpellDamageBonusDone(unitTarget, m_spellSchoolMask, m_spellInfo, damage, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
7507  damage = unitTarget->SpellDamageBonusTaken(m_trueCaster->IsGameObject() ? nullptr : m_caster, m_spellSchoolMask, m_spellInfo, damage, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
7508  }
7509  break;
7510  }
7511  return damage;
7512 }
7513 
7514 uint32 Spell::CalculatePowerCost(SpellEntry const* spellInfo, Unit* caster, Spell* spell, Item* castItem, bool finalUse)
7515 {
7516  // item cast not used power
7517  if (castItem)
7518  return 0;
7519 
7520  // Spell drain all exist power on cast (Only paladin lay of Hands)
7521  if (spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_USE_ALL_MANA))
7522  {
7523  // If power type - health drain all
7524  if (spellInfo->powerType == POWER_HEALTH)
7525  return caster->GetHealth();
7526  // Else drain all power
7527  if (spellInfo->powerType < MAX_POWERS)
7528  return caster->GetPower(Powers(spellInfo->powerType));
7529  sLog.outError("Spell::CalculateManaCost: Unknown power type '%d' in spell %d", spellInfo->powerType, spellInfo->Id);
7530  return 0;
7531  }
7532 
7533  // Base powerCost
7534  int32 powerCost = spellInfo->manaCost + spellInfo->manaCostPerlevel * (int32(caster->GetSpellRank(spellInfo)) / 5 - spellInfo->baseLevel);
7535  // PCT cost from total amount
7536  if (spellInfo->ManaCostPercentage)
7537  {
7538  switch (spellInfo->powerType)
7539  {
7540  // health as power used
7541  case POWER_HEALTH:
7542  powerCost += spellInfo->ManaCostPercentage * caster->GetCreateHealth() / 100;
7543  break;
7544  case POWER_MANA:
7545  powerCost += spellInfo->ManaCostPercentage * caster->GetCreateMana() / 100;
7546  break;
7547  case POWER_RAGE:
7548  case POWER_FOCUS:
7549  case POWER_ENERGY:
7550  case POWER_HAPPINESS:
7551  powerCost += spellInfo->ManaCostPercentage * caster->GetMaxPower(Powers(spellInfo->powerType)) / 100;
7552  break;
7553  case POWER_RUNE:
7554  case POWER_RUNIC_POWER:
7555  DEBUG_LOG("Spell::CalculateManaCost: Not implemented yet!");
7556  break;
7557  default:
7558  sLog.outError("Spell::CalculateManaCost: Unknown power type '%d' in spell %d", spellInfo->powerType, spellInfo->Id);
7559  return 0;
7560  }
7561  }
7562  SpellSchools school = GetFirstSchoolInMask(spell ? spell->m_spellSchoolMask : GetSpellSchoolMask(spellInfo));
7563  // Flat mod from caster auras by spell school
7564  powerCost += caster->GetInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_POWER_COST_MODIFIER + school);
7565  // Shiv - costs 20 + weaponSpeed*10 energy (apply only to non-triggered spell with energy cost)
7566  if (spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX4_WEAPON_SPEED_COST_SCALING))
7567  powerCost += caster->GetAttackTime(OFF_ATTACK) / 100;
7568  // Apply cost mod by spell
7569  if (spell)
7570  if (Player* modOwner = caster->GetSpellModOwner())
7571  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_COST, powerCost, finalUse);
7572 
7573  if (spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_SCALES_WITH_CREATURE_LEVEL))
7574  {
7575  GtNPCManaCostScalerEntry const* spellScaler = sGtNPCManaCostScalerStore.LookupEntry(spellInfo->spellLevel - 1);
7576  GtNPCManaCostScalerEntry const* casterScaler = sGtNPCManaCostScalerStore.LookupEntry(caster->GetLevel() - 1);
7577  if (spellScaler && casterScaler)
7578  powerCost *= casterScaler->ratio / spellScaler->ratio;
7579  }
7580 
7581  // PCT mod from user auras by school
7582  powerCost = int32(powerCost * (1.0f + caster->GetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_POWER_COST_MULTIPLIER + school)));
7583  if (powerCost < 0)
7584  powerCost = 0;
7585  return powerCost;
7586 }
7587 
7588 SpellCastResult Spell::CheckPower(bool strict)
7589 {
7590  // item or GO cast does not use power
7591  if (m_CastItem || !m_caster)
7592  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7593 
7594  // Do precise power regen on spell cast
7595  if (m_powerCost > 0 && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7596  {
7597  Player* playerCaster = (Player*)m_caster;
7598  uint32 diff = m_caster->GetRegenTimer();
7599  if (diff >= REGEN_TIME_PRECISE)
7600  playerCaster->RegenerateAll(diff);
7601  }
7602 
7603  m_powerCost = CalculatePowerCost(m_spellInfo, m_caster, this, m_CastItem, !strict);
7604 
7605  // health as power used - need check health amount
7606  if (m_spellInfo->powerType == POWER_HEALTH)
7607  {
7608  if (m_caster->GetHealth() <= m_powerCost)
7609  return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
7610  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7611  }
7612 
7613  // Check valid power type
7614  if (m_spellInfo->powerType >= MAX_POWERS)
7615  {
7616  sLog.outError("Spell::CheckMana: Unknown power type '%d'", m_spellInfo->powerType);
7617  return SPELL_FAILED_UNKNOWN;
7618  }
7619 
7620  // check rune cost only if a spell has PowerType == POWER_RUNE
7621  if (m_spellInfo->powerType == POWER_RUNE)
7622  {
7623  SpellCastResult failReason = CheckOrTakeRunePower(false);
7624  if (failReason != SPELL_CAST_OK)
7625  return failReason;
7626  }
7627 
7628  // Check power amount
7629  Powers powerType = Powers(m_spellInfo->powerType);
7630  if (m_caster->GetPower(powerType) < m_powerCost)
7631  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_POWER;
7632 
7633  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7634 }
7635 
7636 bool Spell::IgnoreItemRequirements() const
7637 {
7638  if (m_channelOnly || m_ignoreCosts)
7639  return true;
7640 
7642  if (m_CastItem && (m_CastItem->GetProto()->Flags & ITEM_FLAG_NO_REAGENT_COST))
7643  return true;
7644 
7645  // Workaround for double shard problem
7646  if (m_IsTriggeredSpell || this->m_spellInfo->Id == 46546)
7647  {
7649  if (Item* targetItem = m_targets.getItemTarget())
7650  if (targetItem->GetOwnerGuid() != m_caster->GetObjectGuid())
7651  return false;
7652 
7655  return !(m_triggeredBySpellInfo && !m_triggeredBySpellInfo->Reagent[0]);
7656  }
7657 
7658  return false;
7659 }
7660 
7661 SpellCastResult Spell::CheckItems()
7662 {
7663  if (!m_trueCaster->IsPlayer())
7664  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7665 
7666  Player* p_caster = static_cast<Player*>(m_caster);
7667  Player* playerTarget = p_caster;
7668  if (Unit* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget())
7669  if (target->IsPlayer())
7670  playerTarget = static_cast<Player*>(target);
7671 
7672  bool isScrollItem = false;
7673  bool isVellumTarget = false;
7674 
7675  // cast item checks
7676  if (m_CastItem)
7677  {
7678  if (m_CastItem->IsInTrade())
7679  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_NOT_FOUND;
7680 
7681  uint32 itemid = m_CastItem->GetEntry();
7682  if (!p_caster->HasItemCount(itemid, 1))
7683  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_NOT_FOUND;
7684 
7685  ItemPrototype const* proto = m_CastItem->GetProto();
7686  if (!proto)
7687  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_NOT_FOUND;
7688 
7689  if (proto->Flags & ITEM_FLAG_NO_REAGENT_COST)
7690  isScrollItem = true;
7691 
7692  for (uint32 i = 0; i < 5; ++i)
7693  if (proto->Spells[i].SpellCharges)
7694  if (m_CastItem->GetSpellCharges(i) == 0)
7695  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_CHARGES_REMAIN;
7696 
7697  // consumable cast item checks
7698  if (proto->Class == ITEM_CLASS_CONSUMABLE)
7699  {
7700  // such items should only fail if there is no suitable effect at all - see Rejuvenation Potions for example
7701  SpellCastResult failReason = SPELL_CAST_OK;
7702  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
7703  {
7704  // skip check, pet not required like checks, and for TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PET m_targets.getUnitTarget() is not the real target but the caster
7705  if (m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[i] == TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PET)
7706  continue;
7707 
7708  Unit* target = m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[i] == TARGET_UNIT_CASTER ? m_caster : m_targets.getUnitTarget();
7709  if (!target)
7710  continue;
7711 
7712  if (m_spellInfo->Effect[i] == SPELL_EFFECT_HEAL)
7713  {
7714  if (target->GetHealth() == target->GetMaxHealth())
7715  {
7716  failReason = SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_AT_FULL_HEALTH;
7717  continue;
7718  }
7719  failReason = SPELL_CAST_OK;
7720  break;
7721  }
7722 
7723  // Mana Potion, Rage Potion, Thistle Tea(Rogue), ...
7724  if (m_spellInfo->Effect[i] == SPELL_EFFECT_ENERGIZE)
7725  {
7726  if (m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[i] < 0 || m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[i] >= MAX_POWERS)
7727  {
7728  failReason = SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_AT_FULL_POWER;
7729  continue;
7730  }
7731 
7732  Powers power = Powers(m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[i]);
7733  if (target->GetPower(power) == target->GetMaxPower(power))
7734  {
7735  failReason = SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_AT_FULL_POWER;
7736  }
7737  else
7738  {
7739  failReason = SPELL_CAST_OK;
7740  break;
7741  }
7742  }
7743  }
7744  if (failReason != SPELL_CAST_OK)
7745  return failReason;
7746  }
7747  }
7748 
7749  // check target item (for triggered case not report error)
7750  if (m_targets.getItemTargetGuid())
7751  {
7752  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7753  return m_IsTriggeredSpell && !(m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM)
7754  ? SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT : SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
7755 
7756  if (!m_targets.getItemTarget())
7757  return m_IsTriggeredSpell && !(m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM)
7758  ? SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT : SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_GONE;
7759 
7760  isVellumTarget = m_targets.getItemTarget()->GetProto()->IsVellum();
7761  if (!m_targets.getItemTarget()->IsFitToSpellRequirements(m_spellInfo))
7762  return m_IsTriggeredSpell && !(m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM)
7763  ? SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT : SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS;
7764 
7765  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_HELD_ITEM_ONLY) && (m_targets.getItemTarget()->GetSlot() < EQUIPMENT_SLOT_MAINHAND || m_targets.getItemTarget()->GetSlot() > EQUIPMENT_SLOT_RANGED))
7766  return m_IsTriggeredSpell && !(m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM)
7767  ? SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT : SPELL_FAILED_MAINHAND_EMPTY;
7768 
7769  // Do not enchant vellum with scroll
7770  if (isVellumTarget && isScrollItem)
7771  return m_IsTriggeredSpell && !(m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM)
7772  ? SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT : SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
7773  }
7774  // if not item target then required item must be equipped (for triggered case not report error)
7775  else
7776  {
7777  uint32 error = SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS;
7778  if (m_caster->IsPlayer() && !static_cast<Player*>(m_caster)->HasItemFitToSpellReqirements(m_spellInfo, nullptr, &error))
7779  return m_IsTriggeredSpell ? SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT : SpellCastResult(error);
7780  }
7781 
7782  // check reagents (ignore triggered spells with reagents processed by original spell) and special reagent ignore case.
7783  if (!IgnoreItemRequirements())
7784  {
7785  if (!p_caster->CanNoReagentCast(m_spellInfo))
7786  {
7787  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_REAGENTS; ++i)
7788  {
7789  if (m_spellInfo->Reagent[i] <= 0)
7790  continue;
7791 
7792  uint32 itemid = m_spellInfo->Reagent[i];
7793  uint32 itemcount = m_spellInfo->ReagentCount[i];
7794 
7795  // if CastItem is also spell reagent
7796  if (m_CastItem && m_CastItem->GetEntry() == itemid)
7797  {
7798  ItemPrototype const* proto = m_CastItem->GetProto();
7799  if (!proto)
7800  return SPELL_FAILED_REAGENTS;
7801  for (int s = 0; s < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SPELLS; ++s)
7802  {
7803  // CastItem will be used up and does not count as reagent
7804  int32 charges = m_CastItem->GetSpellCharges(s);
7805  if (proto->Spells[s].SpellCharges < 0 && abs(charges) < 2)
7806  {
7807  // NOTE: spells that proc and require a reagent shouldn't increment the counter; Example: 52418
7808  if (!itemcount)
7809  ++itemcount;
7810  break;
7811  }
7812  }
7813  }
7814 
7815  if (!p_caster->HasItemCount(itemid, itemcount))
7816  {
7817  m_param1 = itemid;
7818  return SPELL_FAILED_REAGENTS;
7819  }
7820  }
7821  }
7822 
7823  // check totem-item requirements (items presence in inventory)
7824  uint32 totems = MAX_SPELL_TOTEMS;
7825  for (auto i : m_spellInfo->Totem)
7826  {
7827  if (i != 0)
7828  {
7829  if (p_caster->HasItemCount(i, 1))
7830  {
7831  totems -= 1;
7832  }
7833  }
7834  else
7835  totems -= 1;
7836  }
7837 
7838  if (totems != 0)
7839  return SPELL_FAILED_TOTEMS;
7840 
7841  // Check items for TotemCategory (items presence in inventory)
7842  uint32 TotemCategory = MAX_SPELL_TOTEM_CATEGORIES;
7843  for (unsigned int i : m_spellInfo->TotemCategory)
7844  {
7845  if (i != 0)
7846  {
7847  if (p_caster->HasItemTotemCategory(i))
7848  {
7849  TotemCategory -= 1;
7850  }
7851  }
7852  else
7853  TotemCategory -= 1;
7854  }
7855 
7856  if (TotemCategory != 0)
7857  return SPELL_FAILED_TOTEM_CATEGORY;
7858  }
7859 
7860  // special checks for spell effects
7861  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
7862  {
7863  switch (m_spellInfo->Effect[i])
7864  {
7865  case SPELL_EFFECT_CREATE_ITEM:
7866  {
7867  // check requirement at spell end
7868  if (m_spellState == SPELL_STATE_TARGETING)
7869  break;
7870 
7871  if (!m_IsTriggeredSpell && m_spellInfo->EffectItemType[i])
7872  {
7873  // Conjure Mana Gem (skip same or low level ranks for later recharge)
7874  if (i == EFFECT_INDEX_0 && m_spellInfo->Effect[EFFECT_INDEX_1] == SPELL_EFFECT_DUMMY)
7875  {
7876  if (ItemPrototype const* itemProto = ObjectMgr::GetItemPrototype(m_spellInfo->EffectItemType[i]))
7877  {
7878  if (Item* item = p_caster->GetItemByLimitedCategory(itemProto->ItemLimitCategory))
7879  {
7880  if (item->GetProto()->ItemLevel <= itemProto->ItemLevel)
7881  {
7882  if (item->HasMaxCharges())
7883  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_AT_MAX_CHARGES;
7884 
7885  // will recharge in next effect
7886  continue;
7887  }
7888  }
7889  }
7890  }
7891 
7892  ItemPrototype const* itemProto = ObjectMgr::GetItemPrototype(m_spellInfo->EffectItemType[i]);
7893  if (!itemProto)
7894  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_NOT_FOUND; // custom error in case item template is missing
7895  ItemPosCountVec dest;
7896  int32 count = CalculateSpellEffectValue(SpellEffectIndex(i), m_caster);
7897  count = count > itemProto->Stackable ? itemProto->Stackable : count;
7898  InventoryResult msg = playerTarget->CanStoreNewItem(NULL_BAG, NULL_SLOT, dest, m_spellInfo->EffectItemType[i], count);
7899  if (msg != EQUIP_ERR_OK)
7900  {
7901  p_caster->SendEquipError(msg, nullptr, nullptr, m_spellInfo->EffectItemType[i]);
7902  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
7903  }
7904  }
7905  break;
7906  }
7907  case SPELL_EFFECT_RESTORE_ITEM_CHARGES:
7908  {
7909  if (Item* item = p_caster->GetItemByEntry(m_spellInfo->EffectItemType[i]))
7910  if (item->HasMaxCharges())
7911  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_AT_MAX_CHARGES;
7912 
7913  break;
7914  }
7915  case SPELL_EFFECT_ENCHANT_ITEM:
7916  case SPELL_EFFECT_ENCHANT_ITEM_PRISMATIC:
7917  {
7918  Item* targetItem = m_targets.getItemTarget();
7919  if (!targetItem)
7920  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_NOT_FOUND;
7921 
7922  if (targetItem->GetProto()->ItemLevel < m_spellInfo->baseLevel)
7923  return SPELL_FAILED_LOWLEVEL;
7924  // Check if we can store a new scroll, enchanting vellum has implicit SPELL_EFFECT_CREATE_ITEM
7925  if (isVellumTarget && m_spellInfo->EffectItemType[i])
7926  {
7927  ItemPosCountVec dest;
7928  InventoryResult msg = p_caster->CanStoreNewItem(NULL_BAG, NULL_SLOT, dest, m_spellInfo->EffectItemType[i], 1);
7929  if (msg != EQUIP_ERR_OK)
7930  {
7931  p_caster->SendEquipError(msg, nullptr, nullptr);
7932  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
7933  }
7934  }
7935  // Not allow enchant in trade slot for some enchant type
7936  if (targetItem->GetOwner() != m_caster)
7937  {
7938  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_ENCHANT_OWN_ITEM_ONLY))
7939  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_TRADEABLE;
7940 
7941  uint32 enchant_id = m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[i];
7942  SpellItemEnchantmentEntry const* pEnchant = sSpellItemEnchantmentStore.LookupEntry(enchant_id);
7943  if (!pEnchant)
7944  return SPELL_FAILED_ERROR;
7945  if (pEnchant->flags & ENCHANTMENT_SOULBOUND)
7946  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_TRADEABLE;
7947  // cannot replace vellum with scroll in trade slot
7948  if (isVellumTarget)
7949  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_ENCHANT_TRADE_WINDOW;
7950  }
7951  break;
7952  }
7953  case SPELL_EFFECT_ENCHANT_ITEM_TEMPORARY:
7954  {
7955  Item* item = m_targets.getItemTarget();
7956  if (!item)
7957  return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_NOT_FOUND;
7958  // Not allow enchant in trade slot for some enchant type
7959  if (item->GetOwner() != m_caster)
7960  {
7961  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_ENCHANT_OWN_ITEM_ONLY))
7962  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_TRADEABLE;
7963 
7964  uint32 enchant_id = m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[i];
7965  SpellItemEnchantmentEntry const* pEnchant = sSpellItemEnchantmentStore.LookupEntry(enchant_id);
7966  if (!pEnchant)
7967  return SPELL_FAILED_ERROR;
7968  if (pEnchant->flags & ENCHANTMENT_SOULBOUND)
7969  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_TRADEABLE;
7970  }
7971  break;
7972  }
7973  case SPELL_EFFECT_ENCHANT_HELD_ITEM:
7974  // check item existence in effect code (not output errors at offhand hold item effect to main hand for example
7975  break;
7976  case SPELL_EFFECT_DISENCHANT:
7977  {
7978  if (!m_targets.getItemTarget())
7979  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_DISENCHANTED;
7980 
7981  // prevent disenchanting in trade slot
7982  if (m_targets.getItemTarget()->GetOwnerGuid() != m_caster->GetObjectGuid())
7983  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_DISENCHANTED;
7984 
7985  ItemPrototype const* itemProto = m_targets.getItemTarget()->GetProto();
7986  if (!itemProto)
7987  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_DISENCHANTED;
7988 
7989  // must have disenchant loot (other static req. checked at item prototype loading)
7990  if (!itemProto->DisenchantID)
7991  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_DISENCHANTED;
7992 
7993  // 2.0.x addon: Check player enchanting level against the item disenchanting requirements
7994  int32 item_disenchantskilllevel = itemProto->RequiredDisenchantSkill;
7995  if (item_disenchantskilllevel > int32(p_caster->GetSkillValue(SKILL_ENCHANTING)))
7996  return SPELL_FAILED_LOW_CASTLEVEL;
7997  break;
7998  }
7999  case SPELL_EFFECT_PROSPECTING:
8000  {
8001  if (!m_targets.getItemTarget())
8002  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_PROSPECTED;
8003  Item* itemTarget = m_targets.getItemTarget();
8004  // ensure item is a prospectable ore
8005  if (!(itemTarget->GetProto()->Flags & ITEM_FLAG_IS_PROSPECTABLE))
8006  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_PROSPECTED;
8007  // prevent prospecting in trade slot
8008  if (itemTarget->GetOwnerGuid() != m_caster->GetObjectGuid())
8009  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_PROSPECTED;
8010  // already looting it
8011  if (itemTarget->m_loot && itemTarget->HasTemporaryLoot())
8012  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_WHILE_LOOTING;
8013  // Check for enough skill in jewelcrafting
8014  uint32 item_prospectingskilllevel = itemTarget->GetProto()->RequiredSkillRank;
8015  if (item_prospectingskilllevel > p_caster->GetSkillValue(SKILL_JEWELCRAFTING))
8016  return SPELL_FAILED_LOW_CASTLEVEL;
8017  // make sure the player has the required ores in inventory
8018  int32 requiredCount = CalculateSpellEffectValue(SpellEffectIndex(i), m_caster);
8019  if (int32(itemTarget->GetCount()) < requiredCount)
8020  {
8021  m_param1 = itemTarget->GetEntry();
8022  m_param2 = requiredCount - int32(itemTarget->GetCount());
8023  return SPELL_FAILED_NEED_MORE_ITEMS;
8024  }
8025 
8026  if (!LootTemplates_Prospecting.HaveLootFor(m_targets.getItemTargetEntry()))
8027  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_PROSPECTED;
8028 
8029  break;
8030  }
8031  case SPELL_EFFECT_MILLING:
8032  {
8033  if (!m_targets.getItemTarget())
8034  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_MILLED;
8035  Item* itemTarget = m_targets.getItemTarget();
8036  // ensure item is a millable herb
8037  if (!(itemTarget->GetProto()->Flags & ITEM_FLAG_IS_MILLABLE))
8038  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_MILLED;
8039  // prevent milling in trade slot
8040  if (itemTarget->GetOwnerGuid() != m_caster->GetObjectGuid())
8041  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_MILLED;
8042  // Check for enough skill in inscription
8043  uint32 item_millingskilllevel = itemTarget->GetProto()->RequiredSkillRank;
8044  if (item_millingskilllevel > p_caster->GetSkillValue(SKILL_INSCRIPTION))
8045  return SPELL_FAILED_LOW_CASTLEVEL;
8046  // make sure the player has the required herbs in inventory
8047  int32 requiredCount = CalculateSpellEffectValue(SpellEffectIndex(i), m_caster);
8048  if (int32(itemTarget->GetCount()) < requiredCount)
8049  {
8050  m_param1 = itemTarget->GetEntry();
8051  m_param2 = requiredCount - int32(itemTarget->GetCount());
8052  return SPELL_FAILED_NEED_MORE_ITEMS;
8053  }
8054 
8055  if (!LootTemplates_Milling.HaveLootFor(m_targets.getItemTargetEntry()))
8056  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_MILLED;
8057 
8058  break;
8059  }
8060  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_DAMAGE:
8061  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_DAMAGE_NOSCHOOL:
8062  {
8063  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER) return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_NOT_PLAYER;
8064  if (m_attackType != RANGED_ATTACK)
8065  break;
8066  Item* pItem = ((Player*)m_caster)->GetWeaponForAttack(m_attackType, true, false);
8067  if (!pItem)
8068  return SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM;
8069 
8070  switch (pItem->GetProto()->SubClass)
8071  {
8072  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_THROWN:
8073  {
8074  uint32 ammo = pItem->GetEntry();
8075  if (!((Player*)m_caster)->HasItemCount(ammo, 1))
8076  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
8077  }
8078  break;
8079  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_GUN:
8080  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_BOW:
8081  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_CROSSBOW:
8082  {
8083  uint32 ammo = ((Player*)m_caster)->GetUInt32Value(PLAYER_AMMO_ID);
8084  if (!ammo)
8085  {
8086  // Requires No Ammo
8087  if (m_caster->GetDummyAura(46699))
8088  break; // skip other checks
8089 
8090  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
8091  }
8092 
8093  ItemPrototype const* ammoProto = ObjectMgr::GetItemPrototype(ammo);
8094  if (!ammoProto)
8095  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
8096 
8097  if (ammoProto->Class != ITEM_CLASS_PROJECTILE)
8098  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
8099 
8100  // check ammo ws. weapon compatibility
8101  switch (pItem->GetProto()->SubClass)
8102  {
8103  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_BOW:
8104  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_CROSSBOW:
8105  if (ammoProto->SubClass != ITEM_SUBCLASS_ARROW)
8106  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
8107  break;
8108  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_GUN:
8109  if (ammoProto->SubClass != ITEM_SUBCLASS_BULLET)
8110  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
8111  break;
8112  default:
8113  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
8114  }
8115 
8116  if (!((Player*)m_caster)->HasItemCount(ammo, 1))
8117  return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
8118  }
8119  break;
8120  case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_WAND:
8121  break;
8122  default:
8123  break;
8124  }
8125  break;
8126  }
8127  default: break;
8128  }
8129  }
8130 
8131  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
8132 }
8133 
8134 void Spell::Delayed()
8135 {
8136  if (!m_trueCaster->IsPlayer())
8137  return;
8138 
8139  if (m_spellState == SPELL_STATE_TRAVELING)
8140  return; // spell is active and can't be time-backed
8141 
8142  if (isDelayableNoMore()) // Spells may only be delayed twice
8143  return;
8144 
8145  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_NO_PUSHBACK))
8146  return;
8147 
8148  // spells not loosing casting time ( slam, dynamites, bombs.. )
8149  if (!(m_spellInfo->InterruptFlags & SPELL_INTERRUPT_FLAG_DAMAGE_PUSHBACK))
8150  return;
8151 
8152  // check pushback reduce
8153  int32 delaytime = 500; // spellcasting delay is normally 500ms
8154  int32 delayReduce = 100; // must be initialized to 100 for percent modifiers
8155  static_cast<Player*>(m_caster)->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_NOT_LOSE_CASTING_TIME, delayReduce);
8156  delayReduce += m_caster->GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_REDUCE_PUSHBACK) - 100;
8157  if (delayReduce >= 100)
8158  return;
8159 
8160  delaytime = delaytime * (100 - delayReduce) / 100;
8161 
8162  if (int32(m_timer) + delaytime > m_casttime)
8163  {
8164  delaytime = m_casttime - m_timer;
8165  m_timer = m_casttime;
8166  }
8167  else
8168  m_timer += delaytime;
8169 
8170  DETAIL_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "Spell %u partially interrupted for (%d) ms at damage", m_spellInfo->Id, delaytime);
8171 
8172  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELL_DELAYED, 8 + 4);
8173  data << m_caster->GetPackGUID();
8174  data << uint32(delaytime);
8175 
8176  m_caster->SendMessageToSet(data, true);
8177 }
8178 
8179 void Spell::DelayedChannel()
8180 {
8181  if (!m_trueCaster->IsPlayer() || getState() != SPELL_STATE_CHANNELING)
8182  return;
8183 
8184  if (isDelayableNoMore()) // Spells may only be delayed twice
8185  return;
8186 
8187  // check pushback reduce
8188  int32 delaytime = GetSpellDuration(m_spellInfo) * 25 / 100;// channeling delay is normally 25% of its time per hit
8189  int32 delayReduce = 100; // must be initialized to 100 for percent modifiers
8190  static_cast<Player*>(m_caster)->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_NOT_LOSE_CASTING_TIME, delayReduce);
8191  delayReduce += m_caster->GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_REDUCE_PUSHBACK) - 100;
8192  if (delayReduce >= 100)
8193  return;
8194 
8195  delaytime = delaytime * (100 - delayReduce) / 100;
8196 
8197  if (int32(m_timer) < delaytime)
8198  {
8199  delaytime = m_timer;
8200  m_timer = 0;
8201  }
8202  else
8203  m_timer -= delaytime;
8204 
8205  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "Spell %u partially interrupted for %i ms, new duration: %u ms", m_spellInfo->Id, delaytime, m_timer);
8206 
8207  for (TargetList::const_iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
8208  {
8209  if ((*ihit).missCondition == SPELL_MISS_NONE)
8210  {
8211  if (Unit* unit = m_caster->GetObjectGuid() == ihit->targetGUID ? m_caster : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, ihit->targetGUID))
8212  unit->DelaySpellAuraHolder(m_spellInfo->Id, delaytime, m_caster->GetObjectGuid());
8213  }
8214  }
8215 
8216  for (int j = 0; j < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++j)
8217  {
8218  // partially interrupt persistent area auras
8219  if (DynamicObject* dynObj = m_caster->GetDynObject(m_spellInfo->Id, SpellEffectIndex(j)))
8220  dynObj->Delay(delaytime);
8221  }
8222 
8223  SendChannelUpdate(m_timer);
8224 }
8225 
8226 void Spell::UpdateOriginalCasterPointer()
8227 {
8228  if (m_originalCasterGUID == m_trueCaster->GetObjectGuid() && m_trueCaster->IsUnit())
8229  m_originalCaster = static_cast<Unit*>(m_trueCaster);
8230  else if (m_originalCasterGUID.IsGameObject())
8231  {
8232  GameObject* go = m_trueCaster->IsInWorld() ? m_trueCaster->GetMap()->GetGameObject(m_originalCasterGUID) : nullptr;
8233  m_originalCaster = go ? go->GetOwner() : nullptr;
8234  }
8235  else
8236  {
8237  Unit* unit = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_trueCaster, m_originalCasterGUID);
8238  m_originalCaster = unit && unit->IsInWorld() ? unit : nullptr;
8239  }
8240 }
8241 
8242 void Spell::UpdatePointers()
8243 {
8244  UpdateOriginalCasterPointer();
8245 
8246  m_targets.Update(m_trueCaster);
8247 }
8248 
8249 bool Spell::CheckTargetCreatureType(Unit* target, SpellEntry const* spellInfo)
8250 {
8251  uint32 spellCreatureTargetMask = spellInfo->TargetCreatureType;
8252 
8253  // Dismiss Pet, Taming Lesson and Control Robot skipped
8254  if (spellInfo->Id == 2641 || spellInfo->Id == 23356 || spellInfo->Id == 30009)
8255  spellCreatureTargetMask = 0;
8256 
8257  if (spellCreatureTargetMask)
8258  {
8259  uint32 TargetCreatureType = target->GetCreatureTypeMask();
8260 
8261  return !TargetCreatureType || (spellCreatureTargetMask & TargetCreatureType);
8262  }
8263  return true;
8264 }
8265 
8266 CurrentSpellTypes Spell::GetCurrentContainer() const
8267 {
8268  if (IsNextMeleeSwingSpell(m_spellInfo))
8269  return (CURRENT_MELEE_SPELL);
8270  if (IsAutoRepeat())
8271  return (CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL);
8272  if (IsChanneledSpell(m_spellInfo))
8273  return (CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL);
8274  return (CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL);
8275 }
8276 
8277 bool Spell::CheckTarget(Unit* target, SpellEffectIndex eff, bool targetB, CheckException exception) const
8278 {
8279  // Check targets for creature type mask and remove not appropriate (skip explicit self target case, maybe need other explicit targets)
8280  if (exception != EXCEPTION_MAGNET && m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[eff] != TARGET_UNIT_CASTER)
8281  {
8282  if (!CheckTargetCreatureType(target, m_spellInfo))
8283  return false;
8284  }
8285 
8286  WorldObject* affectiveCaster = GetAffectiveCaster();
8287  uint32 targetType;
8288  SpellTargetInfo info;
8289  if (!targetB)
8290  targetType = m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[eff], info = SpellTargetInfoTable[m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[eff]];
8291  else
8292  targetType = m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetB[eff], info = SpellTargetInfoTable[m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetB[eff]];
8293  bool scriptTarget = (info.type == TARGET_TYPE_UNIT && info.filter == TARGET_SCRIPT);
8294 
8295  if (target != affectiveCaster)
8296  {
8297  // Check targets for not_selectable unit flag and remove
8298  // A player can cast spells on his pet (or other controlled unit) though in any state
8299  if ((!affectiveCaster || target->GetMasterGuid() != affectiveCaster->GetObjectGuid()) && !scriptTarget)
8300  {
8301  // unselectable targets skipped in all cases except targets with TARGET_SCRIPT
8302  // vehicle passengers are excepted from this rule
8303  if (!m_ignoreUnselectableTarget && target != m_targets.getUnitTarget() && target->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_UNINTERACTIBLE) &&
8304  (!target->GetTransportInfo() || (target->GetTransportInfo() && !((Unit*)target->GetTransportInfo()->GetTransport())->IsVehicle())))
8305  return false;
8306  }
8307 
8308  // Check player targets and remove if in GM mode or GM invisibility (for not self casting case)
8309  if (target->IsPlayer())
8310  {
8311  if (static_cast<Player*>(target)->GetVisibility() == VISIBILITY_OFF)
8312  return false;
8313 
8314  if (static_cast<Player*>(target)->IsGameMaster() && !IsPositiveEffect(m_spellInfo, eff, affectiveCaster, target))
8315  return false;
8316  }
8317 
8318  if (affectiveCaster && affectiveCaster->IsPlayer())
8319  {
8320  // Do not allow these spells to target creatures not tapped by us (Banish, Polymorph, many quest spells)
8321  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_CANNOT_CAST_ON_TAPPED))
8322  if (Creature const* targetCreature = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(target))
8323  if ((!targetCreature->GetLootRecipientGuid().IsEmpty()) && !targetCreature->IsTappedBy(static_cast<Player*>(affectiveCaster)))
8324  return false;
8325  }
8326  }
8327 
8328  if (!scriptTarget)
8329  {
8330  // Check targets for LOS visibility (except spells without range limitations )
8331  switch (m_spellInfo->Effect[eff])
8332  {
8333  case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_PLAYER: // from anywhere
8334  break;
8335  // fall through
8336  case SPELL_EFFECT_RESURRECT_NEW:
8337  // player far away, maybe his corpse near?
8338  if (target != m_trueCaster && !target->IsWithinLOSInMap(m_trueCaster, true))
8339  {
8340  if (!m_targets.getCorpseTargetGuid())
8341  return false;
8342 
8343  Corpse* corpse = m_trueCaster->GetMap()->GetCorpse(m_targets.getCorpseTargetGuid());
8344  if (!corpse)
8345  return false;
8346 
8347  if (target->GetObjectGuid() != corpse->GetOwnerGuid())
8348  return false;
8349 
8350  if (!corpse->IsWithinLOSInMap(m_trueCaster, true))
8351  return false;
8352  }
8353 
8354  // all ok by some way or another, skip normal check
8355  break;
8356  default: // normal case
8357  bool forceLos = false;
8358  if (target != m_trueCaster && target != m_targets.getUnitTarget())
8359  forceLos = m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_ALWAYS_AOE_LINE_OF_SIGHT);
8360  if (exception != EXCEPTION_MAGNET && (forceLos || !IsIgnoreLosSpellEffect(m_spellInfo, eff)))
8361  {
8362  float x, y, z;
8363  switch (info.los)
8364  {
8365  case TARGET_LOS_DEST:
8366  m_targets.getDestination(x, y, z);
8367  if (!target->IsWithinLOS(x, y, z + target->GetCollisionHeight(), true))
8368  return false;
8369  break;
8370  case TARGET_LOS_SRC:
8371  m_targets.getSource(x, y, z);
8372  if (!target->IsWithinLOS(x, y, z + target->GetCollisionHeight(), true))
8373  return false;
8374  break;
8375  case TARGET_LOS_CASTER:
8376  if (target != m_trueCaster && info.enumerator != TARGET_ENUMERATOR_CHAIN) // chain is checked on FilterTargetMap
8377  {
8378  if (m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[eff] == TARGET_LOCATION_CHANNEL_TARGET_DEST)
8379  {
8380  if (DynamicObject* dynObj = m_caster->GetDynObject(m_triggeredByAuraSpell ? m_triggeredByAuraSpell->Id : m_spellInfo->Id))
8381  if (!target->IsWithinLOSInMap(dynObj, true))
8382  return false;
8383  }
8384  else if (WorldObject* caster = GetCastingObject())
8385  {
8386  if (!target->IsWithinLOSInMap(caster, true))
8387  return false;
8388  }
8389  }
8390  break;
8391  }
8392  }
8393  break;
8394  }
8395 
8396  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_ONLY_ON_GHOSTS) && !target->HasVisFlags(UNIT_VIS_FLAG_GHOST))
8397  return false;
8398 
8399  if (!IsAllowingDeadTarget(m_spellInfo) && !target->IsAlive())
8400  {
8401  if (m_trueCaster->IsPlayer())
8402  if (target != m_trueCaster || !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_ALLOW_CAST_WHILE_DEAD))
8403  return false;
8404 
8405  if (target != m_trueCaster)
8406  if (info.filter == TARGET_HELPFUL)
8407  return false;
8408  }
8409  }
8410 
8411  if (targetType != TARGET_UNIT_CASTER && targetType != TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_PET)
8412  {
8413  if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_CAN_TARGET_UNTARGETABLE) && target->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_UNTARGETABLE))
8414  return false;
8415 
8416  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_ONLY_PEACEFUL_TARGETS) && target->IsInCombat())
8417  return false;
8418  }
8419 
8420  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_NOT_ON_AOE_IMMUNE) || m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_TREAT_AS_AREA_EFFECT)) // rest done in aoe code
8421  if (target->IsAOEImmune())
8422  return false;
8423 
8424  // If spell have ingore CC attr & unit is CC
8425  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_DO_NOT_CHAIN_TO_CROWD_CONTROLLED_TARGETS) && target != m_targets.getUnitTarget() && target->IsCrowdControlled())
8426  return false;
8427 
8428  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_NOT_ON_TRIVIAL) && target->IsTrivialForTarget(m_caster))
8429  return false;
8430 
8431  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER && m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_ONLY_ON_PLAYER)
8432  && targetType != TARGET_UNIT_CASTER)
8433  return false;
8434 
8435  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_NOT_ON_PLAYER) && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
8436  return false;
8437 
8438  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_NOT_ON_PLAYER_CONTROLLED_NPC) && target->IsPlayerControlled() && target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
8439  return false;
8440 
8441  if (m_spellInfo->MaxTargetLevel && target->GetLevel() > m_spellInfo->MaxTargetLevel)
8442  return false;
8443 
8444  return OnCheckTarget(target, eff);
8445 }
8446 
8447 bool Spell::IsNeedSendToClient() const
8448 {
8449  if (m_channelOnly)
8450  return false;
8451 
8452  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX7_ALWAYS_CAST_LOG))
8453  return true;
8454 
8455  return m_spellInfo->SpellVisual[0] || m_spellInfo->SpellVisual[1] || IsChanneledSpell(m_spellInfo) ||
8456  m_spellInfo->speed > 0.0f || (!m_triggeredByAuraSpell && !m_IsTriggeredSpell);
8457 }
8458 
8459 bool Spell::IsTriggeredSpellWithRedundantCastTime() const
8460 {
8461  return m_IsTriggeredSpell && (m_spellInfo->manaCost || m_spellInfo->ManaCostPercentage);
8462 }
8463 
8464 bool Spell::HaveTargetsForEffect(SpellEffectIndex effect) const
8465 {
8466  for (const auto& itr : m_UniqueTargetInfo)
8467  if (itr.effectHitMask & (1 << effect))
8468  return true;
8469 
8470  for (const auto& itr : m_UniqueGOTargetInfo)
8471  if (itr.effectMask & (1 << effect))
8472  return true;
8473 
8474  for (auto itr : m_UniqueItemInfo)
8475  if (itr.effectMask & (1 << effect))
8476  return true;
8477 
8478  return false;
8479 }
8480 
8481 SpellEvent::SpellEvent(Spell* spell) : BasicEvent()
8482 {
8483  m_Spell = spell;
8484 }
8485 
8486 SpellEvent::~SpellEvent()
8487 {
8488  if (m_Spell->getState() != SPELL_STATE_FINISHED)
8489  m_Spell->cancel();
8490 
8491  if (m_Spell->IsDeletable() || World::IsStopped())
8492  {
8493  delete m_Spell;
8494  }
8495  else
8496  {
8497  sLog.outError("~SpellEvent: %s %u tried to delete non-deletable spell %u. Was not deleted, causes memory leak.",
8498  (m_Spell->GetCaster()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ? "Player" : "Creature"), m_Spell->GetCaster()->GetGUIDLow(), m_Spell->m_spellInfo->Id);
8499  }
8500 }
8501 
8502 bool SpellEvent::Execute(uint64 e_time, uint32 p_time)
8503 {
8504  // update spell if it is not finished
8505  if (m_Spell->getState() != SPELL_STATE_FINISHED)
8506  m_Spell->update(p_time);
8507 
8508  // check spell state to process
8509  switch (m_Spell->getState())
8510  {
8511  case SPELL_STATE_FINISHED:
8512  {
8513  // spell was finished, check deletable state
8514  if (m_Spell->IsDeletable())
8515  {
8516  // check, if we do have unfinished triggered spells
8517  return true; // spell is deletable, finish event
8518  }
8519  // event will be re-added automatically at the end of routine)
8520  } break;
8521 
8522  case SPELL_STATE_CHANNELING:
8523  {
8524  // this spell is in channeled state, process it on the next update
8525  // event will be re-added automatically at the end of routine)
8526  } break;
8527 
8528  case SPELL_STATE_TRAVELING:
8529  {
8530  // first, check, if we have just started
8531  if (m_Spell->GetDelayStart() != 0)
8532  {
8533  // no, we aren't, do the typical update
8534  // check, if we have channeled spell on our hands
8535  if (IsChanneledSpell(m_Spell->m_spellInfo))
8536  {
8537  // evented channeled spell is processed separately, casted once after delay, and not destroyed till finish
8538  // check, if we have casting anything else except this channeled spell and autorepeat
8539  if (m_Spell->GetCaster()->IsNonMeleeSpellCasted(false, true, true))
8540  {
8541  // another non-melee non-delayed spell is casted now, abort
8542  m_Spell->cancel();
8543  }
8544  else
8545  {
8546  // do the action (pass spell to channeling state)
8547  m_Spell->handle_immediate();
8548  }
8549  // event will be re-added automatically at the end of routine)
8550  }
8551  else
8552  {
8553  // run the spell handler and think about what we can do next
8554  uint64 t_offset = e_time - m_Spell->GetDelayStart();
8555  uint64 n_offset = m_Spell->handle_delayed(t_offset);
8556  if (n_offset)
8557  {
8558  // re-add us to the queue
8559  m_Spell->GetTrueCaster()->m_events.AddEvent(this, m_Spell->GetDelayStart() + n_offset, false);
8560  return false; // event not complete
8561  }
8562  // event complete
8563  // finish update event will be re-added automatically at the end of routine)
8564  }
8565  }
8566  else
8567  {
8568  // delaying had just started, record the moment
8569  m_Spell->SetDelayStart(e_time);
8570  // re-plan the event for the delay moment
8571  m_Spell->GetTrueCaster()->m_events.AddEvent(this, e_time + m_Spell->GetDelayMoment(), false);
8572  return false; // event not complete
8573  }
8574  } break;
8575 
8576  default:
8577  {
8578  // all other states
8579  // event will be re-added automatically at the end of routine)
8580  } break;
8581  }
8582 
8583  // spell processing not complete, plan event on the next update interval
8584  m_Spell->GetTrueCaster()->m_events.AddEvent(this, e_time + 1, false);
8585  return false; // event not complete
8586 }
8587 
8588 void SpellEvent::Abort(uint64 /*e_time*/)
8589 {
8590  // oops, the spell we try to do is aborted
8591  if (m_Spell->getState() != SPELL_STATE_FINISHED)
8592  m_Spell->cancel();
8593 }
8594 
8595 bool SpellEvent::IsDeletable() const
8596 {
8597  return m_Spell->IsDeletable();
8598 }
8599 
8600 SpellCastResult Spell::CanOpenLock(SpellEffectIndex effIndex, uint32 lockId, SkillType& skillId, int32& reqSkillValue, int32& skillValue)
8601 {
8602  if (!lockId) // possible case for GO and maybe for items.
8603  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
8604 
8605  // Get LockInfo
8606  LockEntry const* lockInfo = sLockStore.LookupEntry(lockId);
8607 
8608  if (!lockInfo)
8609  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
8610 
8611  bool reqKey = false; // some locks not have reqs
8612 
8613  for (int j = 0; j < 8; ++j)
8614  {
8615  switch (lockInfo->Type[j])
8616  {
8617  // check key item (many fit cases can be)
8618  case LOCK_KEY_ITEM:
8619  if (lockInfo->Index[j] && m_CastItem && m_CastItem->GetEntry() == lockInfo->Index[j])
8620  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
8621  reqKey = true;
8622  break;
8623  // check key skill (only single first fit case can be)
8624  case LOCK_KEY_SKILL:
8625  {
8626  reqKey = true;
8627 
8628  // wrong locktype, skip
8629  if (uint32(m_spellInfo->EffectMiscValue[effIndex]) != lockInfo->Index[j])
8630  continue;
8631 
8632  SkillType tempSkillId = SkillByLockType(LockType(lockInfo->Index[j]));
8633  skillId = tempSkillId;
8634 
8635  bool oldCalc = true;
8636  if (tempSkillId == SKILL_NONE) // these must not be carried over to the reference variable - unless more research comes up
8637  {
8638  SkillLineAbilityMapBounds bounds = sSpellMgr.GetSkillLineAbilityMapBoundsBySpellId(m_spellInfo->Id);
8639  if (bounds.first != bounds.second)
8640  {
8641  SkillLineAbilityEntry const* skillInfo = bounds.first->second;
8642  tempSkillId = SkillType(skillInfo->skillId);
8643  oldCalc = false;
8644  }
8645  }
8646 
8647  if (tempSkillId != SKILL_NONE)
8648  {
8649  uint32 spellSkillBonus = 0;
8650  if (oldCalc) // still correct but not usable for spell skill ids
8651  {
8652  // skill bonus provided by casting spell (mostly item spells)
8653  // add the damage modifier from the spell casted (cheat lock / skeleton key etc.) (use m_currentBasePoints, CalculateDamage returns wrong value)
8654  uint32 spellSkillBonus = uint32(m_currentBasePoints[effIndex]);
8655  reqSkillValue = lockInfo->Skill[j];
8656 
8657  // castitem check: rogue using skeleton keys. the skill values should not be added in this case.
8658  skillValue = m_CastItem || !m_trueCaster->IsPlayer() ?
8659  0 : static_cast<Player*>(m_trueCaster)->GetSkillValue(tempSkillId);
8660 
8661  skillValue += spellSkillBonus;
8662  }
8663  else if (lockInfo->Index[j] == LOCKTYPE_DISARM_TRAP)
8664  {
8665  reqSkillValue = INT32_MAX;
8666  if (GameObject* go = m_targets.getGOTarget())
8667  reqSkillValue = go->GetLevel() * 5;
8668  skillValue = CalculateSpellEffectValue(effIndex, nullptr);
8669  }
8670 
8671  if (skillValue < reqSkillValue)
8672  return SPELL_FAILED_LOW_CASTLEVEL;
8673  }
8674 
8675  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
8676  }
8677  }
8678  }
8679 
8680  if (reqKey)
8681  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
8682 
8683  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
8684 }
8685 
8697 void Spell::FillAreaTargets(UnitList& targetUnitMap, float radius, float cone, SpellNotifyPushType pushType, SpellTargets spellTargets, WorldObject* originalCaster /*=nullptr*/)
8698 {
8699  MaNGOS::SpellNotifierCreatureAndPlayer notifier(*this, targetUnitMap, radius, cone, pushType, spellTargets, originalCaster);
8700  Cell::VisitAllObjects(notifier.GetCenterX(), notifier.GetCenterY(), m_trueCaster->GetMap(), notifier, radius);
8701 }
8702 
8703 void Spell::FillRaidOrPartyTargets(UnitList& targetUnitMap, Unit* member, Unit* center, float radius, bool raid, bool withPets, bool withcaster) const
8704 {
8705  Player* pMember = member->GetBeneficiaryPlayer();
8706  Group* pGroup = pMember ? pMember->GetGroup() : nullptr;
8707 
8708  if (pGroup)
8709  {
8710  uint8 subgroup = pMember->GetSubGroup();
8711 
8712  for (GroupReference* itr = pGroup->GetFirstMember(); itr != nullptr; itr = itr->next())
8713  {
8714  Player* Target = itr->getSource();
8715 
8716  // CanAssist check duel and controlled by enemy
8717  if (Target && (raid || subgroup == Target->GetSubGroup())
8718  && m_caster->CanAssistSpell(Target, m_spellInfo))
8719  {
8720  if ((Target == center || center->IsWithinDistInMap(Target, radius)) &&
8721  (withcaster || Target != m_caster))
8722  targetUnitMap.push_back(Target);
8723 
8724  if (withPets)
8725  if (Pet* pet = Target->GetPet())
8726  if ((pet == center || center->IsWithinDistInMap(pet, radius)) &&
8727  (withcaster || pet != m_caster))
8728  targetUnitMap.push_back(pet);
8729  }
8730  }
8731  }
8732  else
8733  {
8734  Unit* ownerOrSelf = pMember ? pMember : member->GetBeneficiary();
8735  if ((ownerOrSelf == center || center->IsWithinDistInMap(ownerOrSelf, radius)) &&
8736  (withcaster || ownerOrSelf != m_caster))
8737  targetUnitMap.push_back(ownerOrSelf);
8738 
8739  if (withPets)
8740  if (Pet* pet = ownerOrSelf->GetPet())
8741  if ((pet == center || center->IsWithinDistInMap(pet, radius)) &&
8742  (withcaster || pet != m_caster))
8743  targetUnitMap.push_back(pet);
8744  }
8745 }
8746 
8747 void Spell::FillRaidOrPartyManaPriorityTargets(UnitList& targetUnitMap, Unit* member, Unit* center, float radius, uint32 count, bool raid, bool withPets, bool withCaster)
8748 {
8749  FillRaidOrPartyTargets(targetUnitMap, member, center, radius, raid, withPets, withCaster);
8750 }
8751
