8752 void Spell::FillRaidOrPartyHealthPriorityTargets(UnitList& targetUnitMap, Unit* member, Unit* center, float radius, uint32 count, bool raid, bool withPets, bool withCaster)
8753 {
8754  FillRaidOrPartyTargets(targetUnitMap, member, center, radius, raid, withPets, withCaster);
8755 }
8756 
8757 WorldObject* Spell::GetAffectiveCasterObject() const
8758 {
8759  if (!m_originalCasterGUID)
8760  return m_trueCaster;
8761 
8762  if (m_originalCasterGUID.IsGameObject() && m_trueCaster->IsInWorld())
8763  return m_trueCaster->IsInWorld() ? m_trueCaster->GetMap()->GetGameObject(m_originalCasterGUID) : nullptr;
8764  else if (m_originalCasterGUID.IsDynamicObject())
8765  return m_trueCaster->IsInWorld() ? m_trueCaster->GetMap()->GetDynamicObject(m_originalCasterGUID) : nullptr;
8766  return m_originalCaster;
8767 }
8768 
8769 Unit* Spell::GetAffectiveCasterOrOwner() const
8770 {
8771  return m_trueCaster->IsUnit() ? m_caster : static_cast<GameObject*>(m_trueCaster)->GetOwner();
8772 }
8773 
8774 WorldObject* Spell::GetCastingObject() const
8775 {
8776  if (m_trueCaster->IsGameObject())
8777  return m_trueCaster;
8778  if (m_originalCasterGUID.IsGameObject())
8779  return m_trueCaster->IsInWorld() ? m_trueCaster->GetMap()->GetGameObject(m_originalCasterGUID) : nullptr;
8780  else if(m_originalCasterGUID.IsDynamicObject())
8781  return m_trueCaster->IsInWorld() ? m_trueCaster->GetMap()->GetDynamicObject(m_originalCasterGUID) : nullptr;
8782 
8783  return m_trueCaster;
8784 }
8785 
8786 float Spell::GetSpellSpeed() const
8787 {
8788  if (m_trueCaster->IsGameObject()) // 4 spells in all of wotlk and doesnt seem like GO casting supports travelling delay from sniffs
8789  return 0.f;
8790  if (IsChanneledSpell(m_spellInfo))
8791  return 0.f;
8792 
8793  if (m_overrideSpeed)
8794  return m_overridenSpeed;
8795 
8796  return m_spellInfo->speed;
8797 }
8798 
8799 bool Spell::IsDelayedSpell() const
8800 {
8801  return GetSpellSpeed() > 0.0f && !IsChanneledSpell(m_spellInfo);
8802 }
8803 
8804 void Spell::ResetEffectDamageAndHeal()
8805 {
8806  m_damage = 0;
8807  m_healing = 0;
8808 }
8809 
8810 bool Spell::CanExecuteTriggersOnHit(uint8 effMask, SpellEntry const* triggeredByAura, bool auraTarget) const
8811 {
8812  bool onlyOnTarget = (triggeredByAura && triggeredByAura->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX4_CLASS_TRIGGER_ONLY_ON_TARGET));
8813  // If triggeredByAura has SPELL_ATTR4_PROC_ONLY_ON_CASTER then it can only proc on a cast spell with TARGET_UNIT_CASTER
8814  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
8815  if ((effMask & (1 << i)) && (!onlyOnTarget || (onlyOnTarget && auraTarget)))
8816  return true;
8817 
8818  return false;
8819 }
8820 
8821 void Spell::ProcSpellAuraTriggers()
8822 {
8823  if (!m_caster)
8824  return;
8825 
8826  Unit::AuraList const& targetTriggers = m_caster->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_ADD_TARGET_TRIGGER);
8827  for (auto targetTrigger : targetTriggers)
8828  {
8829  if (!targetTrigger->isAffectedOnSpell(m_spellInfo))
8830  continue;
8831  for (TargetList::const_iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
8832  {
8833  if (ihit->missCondition == SPELL_MISS_NONE)
8834  {
8835  Unit* target = m_caster->GetObjectGuid() == ihit->targetGUID ? m_caster : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, ihit->targetGUID);
8836  if (!target || !target->IsAlive())
8837  continue;
8838  SpellEntry const* auraSpellInfo = targetTrigger->GetSpellProto();
8839  if (!CanExecuteTriggersOnHit(ihit->effectHitMask, auraSpellInfo, targetTrigger->GetTarget()->GetObjectGuid() == ihit->targetGUID))
8840  continue;
8841  SpellEffectIndex auraSpellIdx = targetTrigger->GetEffIndex();
8842  const uint32 procid = auraSpellInfo->EffectTriggerSpell[auraSpellIdx];
8843  int32 auraBasePoints = targetTrigger->GetBasePoints();
8844  // Calculate chance at that moment (can be depend for example from combo points)
8845  int32 chance = m_caster->CalculateSpellEffectValue(target, auraSpellInfo, auraSpellIdx, &auraBasePoints);
8846  if (roll_chance_i(chance))
8847  {
8848  Spell* spell = new Spell(m_caster, sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(procid), TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, ObjectGuid(), nullptr);
8849  SpellCastTargets targets;
8850  targets.setUnitTarget(target);
8851  spell->SetOverridenSpeed(GetSpellSpeed());
8852  spell->SpellStart(&targets, targetTrigger);
8853  }
8854  }
8855  }
8856  }
8857 }
8858 
8859 void Spell::SelectMountByAreaAndSkill(Unit* target, SpellEntry const* parentSpell, uint32 spellId75, uint32 spellId150, uint32 spellId225, uint32 spellId300, uint32 spellIdSpecial)
8860 {
8861  if (!target || !target->IsPlayer())
8862  return;
8863 
8864  // Prevent stacking of mounts
8865  target->RemoveSpellsCausingAura(SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED);
8866  uint16 skillval = ((Player*)target)->GetSkillValue(SKILL_RIDING);
8867  if (!skillval)
8868  return;
8869 
8870  if (skillval >= 225 && (spellId300 > 0 || spellId225 > 0))
8871  {
8872  uint32 spellid = skillval >= 300 ? spellId300 : spellId225;
8873  SpellEntry const* pSpell = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellid);
8874  if (!pSpell)
8875  {
8876  sLog.outError("SelectMountByAreaAndSkill: unknown spell id %i by caster: %s", spellid, target->GetGuidStr().c_str());
8877  return;
8878  }
8879 
8880  // zone check
8881  uint32 zone, area;
8882  target->GetZoneAndAreaId(zone, area);
8883 
8884  SpellCastResult locRes = sSpellMgr.GetSpellAllowedInLocationError(pSpell, target->GetMapId(), zone, area, target->GetBeneficiaryPlayer());
8885  if (locRes != SPELL_CAST_OK || !((Player*)target)->CanStartFlyInArea(target->GetMapId(), zone, area, pSpell->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX7_IGNORES_COLD_WEATHER_FLYING_REQUIREMENT)))
8886  target->CastSpell(target, spellId150, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, ObjectGuid(), parentSpell);
8887  else if (spellIdSpecial > 0)
8888  {
8889  for (PlayerSpellMap::const_iterator iter = ((Player*)target)->GetSpellMap().begin(); iter != ((Player*)target)->GetSpellMap().end(); ++iter)
8890  {
8891  if (iter->second.state != PLAYERSPELL_REMOVED)
8892  {
8893  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(iter->first);
8894  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
8895  {
8896  if (spellInfo->EffectApplyAuraName[i] == SPELL_AURA_MOD_FLIGHT_SPEED_MOUNTED)
8897  {
8898  int32 mountSpeed = spellInfo->CalculateSimpleValue(SpellEffectIndex(i));
8899 
8900  // speed higher than 280 replace it
8901  if (mountSpeed > 280)
8902  {
8903  target->CastSpell(target, spellIdSpecial, TRIGGERED_NONE, nullptr, nullptr, ObjectGuid(), parentSpell);
8904  return;
8905  }
8906  }
8907  }
8908  }
8909  }
8910  target->CastSpell(target, pSpell, TRIGGERED_NONE, nullptr, nullptr, ObjectGuid(), parentSpell);
8911  }
8912  else
8913  target->CastSpell(target, pSpell, TRIGGERED_NONE, nullptr, nullptr, ObjectGuid(), parentSpell);
8914  }
8915  else if (skillval >= 150 && spellId150 > 0)
8916  target->CastSpell(target, spellId150, TRIGGERED_NONE, nullptr, nullptr, ObjectGuid(), parentSpell);
8917  else if (spellId75 > 0)
8918  target->CastSpell(target, spellId75, TRIGGERED_NONE, nullptr, nullptr, ObjectGuid(), parentSpell);
8919 }
8920 
8921 bool Spell::IsInterruptible() const
8922 {
8923  return (m_spellInfo->InterruptFlags & SPELL_INTERRUPT_FLAG_COMBAT) && m_spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_SILENCE && CanBeInterrupted();
8924 }
8925 
8926 void Spell::RegisterAuraProc(Aura* aura)
8927 {
8928  m_procOnceHolder.insert(aura);
8929 }
8930 
8931 bool Spell::IsAuraProcced(Aura* aura)
8932 {
8933  return m_procOnceHolder.find(aura) != m_procOnceHolder.end();
8934 }
8935 
8936 void Spell::ClearCastItem()
8937 {
8938  if (m_CastItem == m_targets.getItemTarget())
8939  m_targets.setItemTarget(nullptr);
8940 
8941  m_CastItem = nullptr;
8942 }
8943 
8944 void Spell::GetSpellRangeAndRadius(SpellEffectIndex effIndex, float& radius, bool targetB, uint32& EffectChainTarget)
8945 {
8946  if (m_spellInfo->EffectRadiusIndex[effIndex])
8947  radius = GetSpellRadius(sSpellRadiusStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->EffectRadiusIndex[effIndex]));
8948  else
8949  radius = GetSpellMaxRange(sSpellRangeStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->rangeIndex));
8950 
8951  uint32 targetMode;
8952  if (!targetB)
8953  targetMode = m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[effIndex];
8954  else
8955  targetMode = m_spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetB[effIndex];
8956  SpellTargetInfo& data = SpellTargetInfoTable[targetMode];
8957  if (radius == 50000.f) // safety against bad data
8958  {
8959  if (data.filter != TARGET_SCRIPT)
8960  {
8961  switch (data.type)
8962  {
8963  case TARGET_TYPE_LOCATION_DEST:
8964  case TARGET_TYPE_LOCATION_TRAJ:
8965  if (data.filter == TARGET_SCRIPT) // TODO: Fix this whole shebang
8966  radius = 100.f;
8967  else
8968  radius = 3.0f;
8969  break;
8970  case TARGET_TYPE_UNIT:
8971  case TARGET_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT:
8972  if (data.enumerator == TARGET_ENUMERATOR_CHAIN || data.enumerator == TARGET_ENUMERATOR_AOE || data.enumerator == TARGET_ENUMERATOR_CONE)
8973  radius = 200.f;
8974  break;
8975  default: break;
8976  }
8977  }
8978  }
8979  else if (radius == 0.f && data.type == TARGET_TYPE_LOCATION_DEST)
8980  {
8981  switch (targetMode) // TODO: move this to SQL
8982  {
8983  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_FRONT_RIGHT:
8984  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_BACK_RIGHT:
8985  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_BACK_LEFT:
8986  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_FRONT_LEFT:
8987  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_FRONT:
8988  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_BACK:
8989  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_LEFT:
8990  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_RIGHT:
8991  if (radius == 0.f && m_spellInfo->EffectRadiusIndex[effIndex] != 36) // All shaman totems have 0 radius - need to override with proper value
8992  radius = 2.f;
8993  break;
8994  }
8995  }
8996 
8997  if (Unit* realCaster = GetAffectiveCaster())
8998  {
8999  if (Player* modOwner = realCaster->GetSpellModOwner())
9000  {
9001  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_RADIUS, radius);
9002  if (!targetB)
9003  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_JUMP_TARGETS, EffectChainTarget);
9004  }
9005  }
9006 
9007  // AOE leeway - 2f when caster is moving
9008  if (radius != 50000.f && m_caster && m_caster->IsMoving() && !m_caster->IsWalking())
9009  radius += AOE_LEEWAY;
9010 
9011  switch (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
9012  {
9013  case SPELLFAMILY_PALADIN:
9014  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 20424) // Seal of Command (2 more target for single targeted spell)
9015  {
9016  // overwrite EffectChainTarget for non single target spell
9017  if (Spell* currSpell = m_caster->GetCurrentSpell(CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL))
9018  if (currSpell->m_spellInfo->MaxAffectedTargets > 0 ||
9019  currSpell->m_spellInfo->EffectChainTarget[EFFECT_INDEX_0] > 0 ||
9020  currSpell->m_spellInfo->EffectChainTarget[EFFECT_INDEX_1] > 0 ||
9021  currSpell->m_spellInfo->EffectChainTarget[EFFECT_INDEX_2] > 0)
9022  EffectChainTarget = 0; // no chain targets
9023  }
9024  break;
9025  }
9026 
9027  // custom radius cases
9028  switch (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
9029  {
9030  case SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC:
9031  {
9032  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
9033  {
9034  case 28241: // Poison (Naxxramas, Grobbulus Cloud)
9035  case 54363: // Poison (Naxxramas, Grobbulus Cloud) (H)
9036  {
9037  uint32 auraId = (m_spellInfo->Id == 28241 ? 28158 : 54362);
9038  if (SpellAuraHolder* auraHolder = m_caster->GetSpellAuraHolder(auraId))
9039  radius = 0.5f * (60000 - auraHolder->GetAuraDuration()) * 0.001f;
9040  break;
9041  }
9042  case 36374: // Summon Smoke Beacon
9043  {
9044  if (effIndex == EFFECT_INDEX_0)
9045  radius = INTERACTION_DISTANCE;
9046  break;
9047  }
9048  case 30915: // Poison - Broggok
9049  case 38463:
9050  {
9051  if (SpellAuraHolder* auraHolder = m_caster->GetSpellAuraHolder(GetTriggeredByAuraSpellInfo()->Id))
9052  radius = (60000 - auraHolder->GetAuraDuration()) * 0.0002f;
9053  break;
9054  }
9055  case 54643: // Teleport (Strand of the Ancients)
9056  case 66550: // Teleport (Isle of Conquest)
9057  case 66630: // Alliance Gunship Portal (Isle of Conquest)
9058  case 66637: // Horde Gunship Portal (Isle of Conquest)
9059  case 66899: // Gunship Portal Click (Isle of Conquest)
9060  radius = DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_BGARENAS;
9061  break;
9062  case 66881: // Slime Pool (ToCrusader, Acidmaw & Dreadscale)
9063  case 67638: // Slime Pool (ToCrusader, Acidmaw & Dreadscale) (Mode 1)
9064  case 67639: // Slime Pool (ToCrusader, Acidmaw & Dreadscale) (Mode 2)
9065  case 67640: // Slime Pool (ToCrusader, Acidmaw & Dreadscale) (Mode 3)
9066  if (SpellAuraHolder* auraHolder = m_caster->GetSpellAuraHolder(66882))
9067  radius = 0.5f * (60000 - auraHolder->GetAuraDuration()) * 0.001f;
9068  break;
9069  case 56438: // Arcane Overload
9070  if (Unit* realCaster = GetAffectiveCaster())
9071  radius = radius * realCaster->GetObjectScale();
9072  break;
9073  case 42442: // Vengeance Landing Cannonfire
9074  radius = MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE;
9075  break;
9076  case 50790: // Summon Iron Dwarf (Halls of Stone, Sjonnir) - only target A
9077  case 50791: // Summon Iron Dwarf (Halls of Stone, Sjonnir) - only target A
9078  case 50793: // Summon Iron Trogg (Halls of Stone, Sjonnir) - only target A
9079  case 50794: // Summon Iron Trogg (Halls of Stone, Sjonnir) - only target A
9080  case 50802: // Summon Malformed Ooze (Halls of Stone, Sjonnir) - only target A
9081  case 50803: // Summon Malformed Ooze (Halls of Stone, Sjonnir) - only target A
9082  case 50825: // Summon Earthen Dwarf (Halls of Stone, Sjonnir) - only target A
9083  case 50826: // Summon Earthen Dwarf (Halls of Stone, Sjonnir) - only target A
9084  case 56429: // Summon Arcane Bomb (Eye of Eternity, Malygos) - only target A
9085  if (targetB)
9086  break;
9087  case 69057: // Bone Spike Graveyard (Icecrown Citadel, Lord Marrowgar encounter, 10N)
9088  case 70826: // Bone Spike Graveyard (Icecrown Citadel, Lord Marrowgar encounter, 25N)
9089  case 72088: // Bone Spike Graveyard (Icecrown Citadel, Lord Marrowgar encounter, 10H)
9090  case 72089: // Bone Spike Graveyard (Icecrown Citadel, Lord Marrowgar encounter, 25H)
9091  case 73142: // Bone Spike Graveyard (during Bone Storm) (Icecrown Citadel, Lord Marrowgar encounter, 10N)
9092  case 73143: // Bone Spike Graveyard (during Bone Storm) (Icecrown Citadel, Lord Marrowgar encounter, 25N)
9093  case 73144: // Bone Spike Graveyard (during Bone Storm) (Icecrown Citadel, Lord Marrowgar encounter, 10H)
9094  case 73145: // Bone Spike Graveyard (during Bone Storm) (Icecrown Citadel, Lord Marrowgar encounter, 25H)
9095  case 72350: // Fury of Frostmourne
9096  case 72351: // Fury of Frostmourne
9097  case 72706: // Achievement Check
9098  case 72830: // Achievement Check
9099  radius = DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_INSTANCE;
9100  break;
9101  case 43486: // Summon Amani'shi Warriors
9102  case 43487: // Summon Amani Eagle
9103  case 43962: // Summon Amani'shi Hatcher
9104  case 45340:
9105  {
9106  if (!targetB)
9107  radius = 250.f;
9108  break;
9109  }
9110  default:
9111  break;
9112  case 59464: // Hurl Boulder
9113  radius = 100.f;
9114  break;
9115  case 49554: // Summon Injured Soldier
9116  radius = 100.f;
9117  break;
9118  }
9119  break;
9120  }
9121  case SPELLFAMILY_DRUID:
9122  {
9123  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
9124  {
9125  case 49376: // Feral Charge - Cat
9126  // No default radius for this spell, so we need to use the contact distance
9127  radius = CONTACT_DISTANCE;
9128  break;
9129  }
9130  }
9131  default:
9132  break;
9133  }
9134 
9135  OnRadiusCalculate(effIndex, targetB, radius);
9136 }
9137 
9138 float Spell::GetCone()
9139 {
9140  if (SpellCone const* coneData = sSpellCones.LookupEntry<SpellCone>(sSpellMgr.GetFirstSpellInChain(m_spellInfo->Id)))
9141  return G3D::toRadians(coneData->coneAngle);
9142 
9143  return M_PI_F / 3.f; // 60 degrees is default
9144 }
9145 
9146 void Spell::ProcReflectProcs(TargetInfo& targetInfo)
9147 {
9148  if (!m_caster)
9149  return;
9150 
9151  Unit* target = m_caster->GetObjectGuid() == targetInfo.targetGUID ? m_caster : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_trueCaster, targetInfo.targetGUID);
9152  if (!target)
9153  return;
9154 
9155  // Victim reflects, apply reflect procs
9156  Unit::ProcDamageAndSpell(ProcSystemArguments(m_caster, target, PROC_FLAG_NONE, PROC_FLAG_TAKE_HARMFUL_SPELL, PROC_EX_REFLECT, 1, BASE_ATTACK, m_spellInfo));
9157  if (targetInfo.reflectResult == SPELL_MISS_REFLECT)
9158  // Apply reflect procs on self
9159  Unit::ProcDamageAndSpell(ProcSystemArguments(m_caster, m_caster, PROC_FLAG_NONE, PROC_FLAG_TAKE_HARMFUL_SPELL, PROC_EX_REFLECT, 1, BASE_ATTACK, m_spellInfo));
9160 }
9161 
9162 void Spell::FilterTargetMap(UnitList& filterUnitList, SpellTargetFilterScheme scheme, uint32 chainTargetCount)
9163 {
9164  switch (scheme)
9165  {
9166  case SCHEME_RANDOM:
9167  {
9168  if (m_affectedTargetCount && filterUnitList.size() > m_affectedTargetCount)
9169  {
9170  // remove random units from the map
9171  while (filterUnitList.size() > m_affectedTargetCount)
9172  {
9173  uint32 poz = urand(0, filterUnitList.size() - 1);
9174  auto itr = filterUnitList.begin();
9175  std::advance(itr, poz);
9176  itr = filterUnitList.erase(itr);
9177  }
9178  }
9179  break;
9180  }
9181  case SCHEME_CLOSEST:
9182  {
9183  if (m_affectedTargetCount && filterUnitList.size() > m_affectedTargetCount)
9184  {
9185  filterUnitList.sort(TargetDistanceOrderNear(m_trueCaster));
9186  filterUnitList.resize(m_affectedTargetCount);
9187  }
9188  break;
9189  }
9190  case SCHEME_FURTHEST:
9191  {
9192  if (m_affectedTargetCount && filterUnitList.size() > m_affectedTargetCount)
9193  {
9194  filterUnitList.sort(TargetDistanceOrderFarAway(m_trueCaster));
9195  filterUnitList.resize(m_affectedTargetCount);
9196  }
9197  break;
9198  }
9199  case SCHEME_HIGHEST_HP:
9200  {
9201  // Returns the target with the highest HP in melee range
9202  Unit* hatedTarget = nullptr;
9203  uint32 maxHP = 0;
9204  for (auto& unit : filterUnitList)
9205  {
9206  if (m_caster->CanReachWithMeleeAttack(unit))
9207  {
9208  if (unit->GetHealth() > maxHP)
9209  {
9210  maxHP = unit->GetHealth();
9211  hatedTarget = unit;
9212  }
9213  }
9214  }
9215  if (!hatedTarget)
9216  return;
9217 
9218  filterUnitList.clear();
9219  filterUnitList.push_back(hatedTarget);
9220  break;
9221  }
9222  case SCHEME_RANDOM_CHAIN:
9223  {
9224  Unit* unitTarget = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
9225  if (filterUnitList.empty() || filterUnitList.front() != unitTarget)
9226  break;
9227  if (chainTargetCount > 1 && filterUnitList.size() > chainTargetCount)
9228  {
9229  // remove random units from the map
9230  while (filterUnitList.size() > chainTargetCount)
9231  {
9232  uint32 poz = urand(1, filterUnitList.size() - 1);
9233  auto itr = filterUnitList.begin();
9234  std::advance(itr, poz);
9235  itr = filterUnitList.erase(itr);
9236  }
9237  }
9238  break;
9239  }
9240  case SCHEME_CLOSEST_CHAIN:
9241  {
9242  Unit* unitTarget = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
9243  if (filterUnitList.empty() || filterUnitList.front() != unitTarget)
9244  break;
9245  UnitList newList;
9246  newList.push_back(unitTarget);
9247  filterUnitList.pop_front();
9248  filterUnitList.sort(TargetDistanceOrderNear(unitTarget));
9249  Unit* prev = unitTarget;
9250  UnitList::iterator next = filterUnitList.begin();
9251  chainTargetCount -= 1; // unit target is one
9252 
9253  while (chainTargetCount && next != filterUnitList.end())
9254  {
9255  if (prev->GetDistance(*next, true, DIST_CALC_NONE) > m_jumpRadius * m_jumpRadius)
9256  break;
9257 
9258  if (!prev->IsWithinLOSInMap(*next, true))
9259  {
9260  ++next;
9261  continue;
9262  }
9263  prev = *next;
9264  newList.push_back(prev);
9265  filterUnitList.erase(next);
9266  filterUnitList.sort(TargetDistanceOrderNear(prev));
9267  next = filterUnitList.begin();
9268 
9269  --chainTargetCount;
9270  }
9271  std::swap(filterUnitList, newList);
9272  break;
9273  }
9274  case SCHEME_LOWEST_HP_CHAIN:
9275  {
9276  Unit* unitTarget = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
9277  if (filterUnitList.empty() || filterUnitList.front() != unitTarget)
9278  break;
9279  UnitList newList;
9280  newList.push_back(unitTarget);
9281  bool isInGroup = m_caster->IsInGroup(unitTarget);
9282  filterUnitList.pop_front();
9283  filterUnitList.sort(LowestHPNearestOrder(unitTarget));
9284  Unit* prev = unitTarget;
9285  UnitList::iterator next = filterUnitList.begin();
9286  chainTargetCount -= 1; // unit target is one
9287 
9288  while (chainTargetCount && next != filterUnitList.end())
9289  {
9290  // since we do not iterate through closest but through HP, we must check all units
9291  if (prev->GetDistance(*next, true, DIST_CALC_NONE) > m_jumpRadius * m_jumpRadius)
9292  {
9293  ++next;
9294  continue;
9295  }
9296 
9297  if (!prev->IsWithinLOSInMap(*next, true))
9298  {
9299  ++next;
9300  continue;
9301  }
9302 
9303  if (isInGroup && !m_caster->IsInGroup(*next))
9304  {
9305  ++next;
9306  continue;
9307  }
9308 
9309  prev = *next;
9310  newList.push_back(prev);
9311  filterUnitList.erase(next);
9312  filterUnitList.sort(LowestHPNearestOrder(prev));
9313  next = filterUnitList.begin();
9314 
9315  --chainTargetCount;
9316  }
9317  std::swap(filterUnitList, newList);
9318  break;
9319  }
9320  case SCHEME_PRIORITIZE_HEALTH:
9321  {
9322  PrioritizeHealthUnitQueue healthQueue;
9323  for (Unit* unit : filterUnitList)
9324  if (!unit->IsDead())
9325  healthQueue.push(PrioritizeHealthUnitWraper(unit));
9326 
9327  filterUnitList.clear();
9328  while (!healthQueue.empty() && filterUnitList.size() < m_affectedTargetCount)
9329  {
9330  filterUnitList.push_back(healthQueue.top().getUnit());
9331  healthQueue.pop();
9332  }
9333  break;
9334  }
9335  case SCHEME_PRIORITIZE_MANA:
9336  {
9337  PrioritizeManaUnitQueue manaUsers;
9338  for (Unit* unit : filterUnitList)
9339  if (unit->GetPowerType() == POWER_MANA && !unit->IsDead())
9340  manaUsers.push(PrioritizeManaUnitWraper(unit));
9341 
9342  filterUnitList.clear();
9343  while (!manaUsers.empty() && filterUnitList.size() < m_affectedTargetCount)
9344  {
9345  filterUnitList.push_back(manaUsers.top().getUnit());
9346  manaUsers.pop();
9347  }
9348  break;
9349  }
9350  }
9351 }
9352 
9353 void Spell::FillFromTargetFlags(TempTargetingData& targetingData, SpellEffectIndex effIdx)
9354 {
9355  if (m_spellInfo->Targets & (TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_ALLY | TARGET_FLAG_UNIT | TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_ENEMY))
9356  {
9357  if (Unit* unit = m_targets.getUnitTarget())
9358  targetingData.data[effIdx].tmpUnitList[false].push_back(unit);
9359  }
9360  else if (m_spellInfo->Targets & (TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_ENEMY | TARGET_FLAG_CORPSE_ALLY))
9361  {
9362  if (Unit* unit = m_targets.getUnitTarget())
9363  targetingData.data[effIdx].tmpUnitList[false].push_back(unit);
9364  else if (m_targets.getCorpseTargetGuid())
9365  {
9366  if (Corpse* corpse = m_targets.getCorpseTarget())
9367  targetingData.data[effIdx].tempCorpseList.push_back(corpse);
9368  }
9369  }
9370  else if (m_spellInfo->Targets & (TARGET_FLAG_ITEM | TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM))
9371  {
9372  if (Item* item = m_targets.getItemTarget())
9373  targetingData.data[effIdx].tempItemList.push_back(item);
9374  }
9375  else if (m_spellInfo->Targets & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
9376  {
9377  if ((m_targets.m_targetMask & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION) == 0)
9378  {
9379  sLog.outError("No destination for spell with flag TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION, spell ID: %u", m_spellInfo->Id); // should never occur
9380  if (WorldObject* caster = GetCastingObject())
9381  m_targets.setDestination(caster->GetPositionX(), caster->GetPositionY(), caster->GetPositionZ());
9382  }
9383  }
9384 }
9385 
9386 bool Spell::IsEffectWithImplementedMultiplier(uint32 effectId) const
9387 {
9388  // TODO: extend this for all effects that do damage and healing
9389  switch (effectId)
9390  {
9391  case SPELL_EFFECT_SCHOOL_DAMAGE:
9392  case SPELL_EFFECT_HEAL:
9393  case SPELL_EFFECT_POWER_BURN:
9394  case SPELL_EFFECT_HEAL_MECHANICAL:
9395  case SPELL_EFFECT_HEAL_PCT:
9396  // weapon based
9397  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_DAMAGE_NOSCHOOL:
9398  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_PERCENT_DAMAGE:
9399  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_DAMAGE:
9400  case SPELL_EFFECT_NORMALIZED_WEAPON_DMG:
9401  return true;
9402  default:
9403  return false;
9404  }
9405 }
9406 
9407 void Spell::StopCast(SpellCastResult castResult)
9408 {
9409  SendCastResult(castResult);
9410  SendInterrupted(castResult);
9411  finish(false);
9412  m_trueCaster->DecreaseCastCounter();
9413  SetExecutedCurrently(false);
9414 }
9415 
9416 void Spell::SetOverridenSpeed(float newSpeed)
9417 {
9418  m_overrideSpeed = true;
9419  m_overridenSpeed = newSpeed;
9420 }
9421 
9422 void Spell::OnInit()
9423 {
9424  if (SpellScript* script = GetSpellScript())
9425  script->OnInit(this);
9426 }
9427 
9428 void Spell::OnSuccessfulStart()
9429 {
9430  if (SpellScript* script = GetSpellScript())
9431  script->OnSuccessfulStart(this);
9432 }
9433 
9434 void Spell::OnSuccessfulFinish()
9435 {
9436  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
9437  {
9438  case 32053: // Soul Charge - drop either stack or charge
9439  case 32054:
9440  case 32057:
9441  {
9442  uint32 parentSpell;
9443  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
9444  {
9445  case 32053: parentSpell = 32052; break;
9446  case 32054: parentSpell = 32045; break;
9447  case 32057: parentSpell = 32051; break;
9448  }
9449  m_caster->RemoveAuraStack(parentSpell);
9450  break;
9451  }
9452  case 40870: // Fatal Attraction - Mother Shahraz
9453  {
9454  if (m_scriptValue == 0) // noone was hit
9455  m_caster->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(41001);
9456  break;
9457  }
9458  default:
9459  if (SpellScript* script = GetSpellScript())
9460  script->OnSuccessfulFinish(this);
9461  break;
9462  }
9463 }
9464 
9465 SpellCastResult Spell::OnCheckCast(bool strict)
9466 {
9467  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
9468  {
9469  case 47871: // Health Stone
9470  case 47878:
9471  case 27230:
9472  case 11730:
9473  case 11729:
9474  case 6202:
9475  case 6201:
9476  case 5699:
9477  {
9478  // check if we already have a healthstone
9479  uint32 itemType = GetUsableHealthStoneItemType(m_caster);
9480  if (itemType && m_caster->IsPlayer() && ((Player*)m_caster)->GetItemCount(itemType) > 0)
9481  {
9482  ItemPrototype const* proto = sObjectMgr.GetItemPrototype(itemType);
9483  if (proto && proto->ItemLimitCategory)
9484  m_param1 = proto->ItemLimitCategory;
9485  return SPELL_FAILED_TOO_MANY_OF_ITEM;
9486  }
9487  break;
9488  }
9489  case 7914: // Capture Spirit
9490  {
9491  if (ObjectGuid target = m_targets.getUnitTargetGuid()) // can be cast only on these targets
9492  if (target.GetEntry() != 4663 && target.GetEntry() != 4664 && target.GetEntry() != 4665 && target.GetEntry() != 4666 && target.GetEntry() != 4667
9493  && target.GetEntry() != 4668 && target.GetEntry() != 4705 && target.GetEntry() != 13019)
9494  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
9495  break;
9496  }
9497  case 12699: // Summon Screecher Spirit
9498  {
9499  Unit* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
9500  if (!target || !target->IsCreature() || static_cast<Creature*>(target)->HasBeenHitBySpell(m_spellInfo->Id))
9501  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
9502  if (!strict)
9503  {
9504  static_cast<Creature*>(target)->RegisterHitBySpell(m_spellInfo->Id);
9505  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
9506  }
9507  break;
9508  }
9509  case 30077: // Carinda's Retribution
9510  if (ObjectGuid target = m_targets.getUnitTargetGuid())
9511  if (target.GetEntry() != 17226)
9512  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
9513  break;
9514  case 31958: // Fire Bomb Halaa - Must be Taxi Flying
9515  if (!m_caster->IsTaxiFlying())
9516  return SPELL_FAILED_ONLY_MOUNTED;
9517  break;
9518  case 35244: // Choking Vines - should not go through on target with Choking Wound
9519  {
9520  Unit* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
9521  if (!target || target->HasAura(35247))
9522  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
9523  break;
9524  }
9525  case 36867: // Creature - Summon Event Ethereal
9526  if (m_caster->GetMap()->SpawnedCountForEntry(21445) >= 1 || m_caster->GetMap()->SpawnedCountForEntry(22285) >= 1)
9527  return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
9528  break;
9529  case 37390: // Oscillating Frequency Scanner
9530  if (m_caster->HasAura(37407))
9531  return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_HERE;
9532  break;
9533  case 38170: // Spin Nether-weather Vane
9534  if (!m_caster->HasAura(37968))
9535  return SPELL_FAILED_FIZZLE;
9536  break;
9537  case 40157: // Spirit Lance - Teron Gorefiend - can only be used on spirits
9538  if (ObjectGuid target = m_targets.getUnitTargetGuid())
9539  if (target.GetEntry() != 23111)
9540  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
9541  break;
9542  case 40742: // Booterang - Must have aura Defiant And Enraged or Lazy and Good for Nothing
9543  {
9544  Unit* target = m_targets.getUnitTarget();
9545  if (!target || (!target->HasAura(40732) && !target->HasAura(40735)))
9546  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
9547  break;
9548  }
9549  case 40856: // Wrangling rope - should only be usable on aether rays
9550  if (ObjectGuid target = m_targets.getUnitTargetGuid())
9551  if (target.GetEntry() != 22181)
9552  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
9553  break;
9554  case 43732: // Remove Amani Curse - should only be usable on Forest Frog
9555  if (ObjectGuid target = m_targets.getUnitTargetGuid())
9556  if (target.GetEntry() != 24396)
9557  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
9558  break;
9559  case 42489:
9560  if (ObjectGuid target = m_targets.getUnitTargetGuid())
9561  if (target.GetEntry() != 4393 && target.GetEntry() != 4394)
9562  return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
9563  break;
9564  default:
9565  if (SpellScript* script = GetSpellScript())
9566  return script->OnCheckCast(this, strict);
9567  break;
9568  }
9569 
9570  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
9571 }
9572 
9573 void Spell::OnEffectExecute(SpellEffectIndex effIndex)
9574 {
9575  if (SpellScript* script = GetSpellScript())
9576  script->OnEffectExecute(this, effIndex);
9577 }
9578 
9579 void Spell::OnRadiusCalculate(SpellEffectIndex effIndex, bool targetB, float& radius)
9580 {
9581  if (SpellScript* script = GetSpellScript())
9582  script->OnRadiusCalculate(this, effIndex, targetB, radius);
9583 }
9584 
9585 void Spell::OnDestTarget() // TODO
9586 {
9587  if (SpellScript* script = GetSpellScript())
9588  script->OnDestTarget(this);
9589 }
9590 
9591 bool Spell::OnCheckTarget(GameObject* target, SpellEffectIndex eff) const
9592 {
9593  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
9594  {
9595  case 38054: // Random rocket missile
9596  if (target->GetLootState() == GO_ACTIVATED) // can only hit unused ones
9597  return false;
9598  break;
9599  default:
9600  if (SpellScript* script = GetSpellScript())
9601  return script->OnCheckTarget(this, target, eff);
9602  break;
9603  }
9604  return true;
9605 }
9606 
9607 bool Spell::OnCheckTarget(Unit* target, SpellEffectIndex eff) const
9608 {
9609  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
9610  {
9611  case 5246: // Intimidating Shout
9612  if (eff != EFFECT_INDEX_0 && target == m_targets.getUnitTarget())
9613  return false;
9614  break;
9615  case 9082: // Create Containment Coffer
9616  if (!target->HasAura(9032))
9617  return false;
9618  break;
9619  case 14297: // Shadow Storm (exclude targets below 25 yards and above 40 yards. Max value is handled by spell effect radius)
9620  case 26546:
9621  case 26555:
9622  {
9623  float x, y, z;
9624  m_caster->GetPosition(x, y, z);
9625  if (target->GetDistance(x, y, z, DIST_CALC_COMBAT_REACH) < 25.f)
9626  return false;
9627  break;
9628  }
9629  case 16807: // Mass Teleport
9630  if (target->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED)) // spell targets only creatures
9631  return false;
9632  break;
9633  // Exceptions for Nefarian class calls
9634  // as it is not possible to filter out targets based on their class from data in spells template (like spell family masks for example)
9635  case 23397: // Berserk
9636  if (target->getClass() != CLASS_WARRIOR)
9637  return false;
9638  break;
9639  case 23398: // Involuntary Transformation
9640  if (target->getClass() != CLASS_DRUID)
9641  return false;
9642  break;
9643  case 23401: // Corrupted Healing
9644  if (target->getClass() != CLASS_PRIEST)
9645  return false;
9646  break;
9647  case 23410: // Wild Magic
9648  if (target->getClass() != CLASS_MAGE)
9649  return false;
9650  break;
9651  case 23414: // Paralyze
9652  if (target->getClass() != CLASS_ROGUE)
9653  return false;
9654  break;
9655  case 23418: // Siphon Blessing
9656  if (target->getClass() != CLASS_PALADIN)
9657  return false;
9658  break;
9659  case 23425: // Corrupted Totems
9660  if (target->getClass() != CLASS_SHAMAN)
9661  return false;
9662  break;
9663  case 23427: // Summon Infernals
9664  if (target->getClass() != CLASS_WARLOCK)
9665  return false;
9666  break;
9667  case 23436: // Corrupted Weapon
9668  if (target->getClass() != CLASS_HUNTER)
9669  return false;
9670  break;
9671  case 25676: // Drain Mana
9672  case 25754:
9673  case 26457:
9674  case 26559:
9675  if (target->GetPowerType() != POWER_MANA)
9676  return false;
9677  break;
9678  case 28062: // Positive Charge
9679  if (!target->HasAura(29660)) // Only deal damage if target has Negative Charge
9680  return false;
9681  break;
9682  case 28085: // Negative Charge
9683  if (!target->HasAura(29659)) // Only deal damage if target has Positive Charge
9684  return false;
9685  break;
9686  case 29511:
9687  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && target == m_caster->GetVictim())
9688  return false;
9689  break;
9690  case 30835: // Infernal Relay - Malchezaar - must only hit unused infernals
9691  {
9692  Creature* creature = nullptr;
9693  MaNGOS::NearestCreatureEntryWithLiveStateInObjectRangeCheck creature_check(*target, 17646, true, false, 2.0f, true);
9694  MaNGOS::CreatureLastSearcher<MaNGOS::NearestCreatureEntryWithLiveStateInObjectRangeCheck> searcher(creature, creature_check);
9695  Cell::VisitGridObjects(target, searcher, 2.0f);
9696  if (creature)
9697  if (target->GetPositionX() == creature->GetPositionX() && target->GetPositionY() == creature->GetPositionY())
9698  return false;
9699  break;
9700  }
9701  case 32124: // Cant hit players
9702  case 33512: // Kazzak's Assault - likely should not hit players
9703  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
9704  return false;
9705  break;
9706  case 36819: // Always should hit main tank, no clue why rigged as AOE
9707  if (m_caster->GetVictim() && target != m_caster->GetVictim())
9708  return false;
9709  break;
9710  case 37144: // Move - Chess event
9711  case 37146:
9712  case 37148:
9713  case 37151:
9714  case 37152:
9715  case 37153:
9716  if (target->HasAura(39400))
9717  return false;
9718  break;
9719  case 37433: // Spout (The Lurker Below), only players affected if its not in water
9720  if (target->IsInWater() && (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || static_cast<Player*>(target)->IsInHighLiquid()))
9721  return false;
9722  break;
9723  case 37868: // Arcano-Scorp Control
9724  case 37893:
9725  case 37895:
9726  if (target->HasAura(m_spellInfo->Id)) // scorp already possessed cannot be repossessed by a diff player TODO: Check on retail
9727  return false;
9728  break;
9729  case 37918: // Arcano-pince
9730  case 37919: // Arcano-dismantle
9731  {
9732  if (target->HasAura(37917) || m_caster == target) // Can't target targets with Arcano-Cloak or self (no attribute)
9733  return false;
9734  break;
9735  }
9736  case 38782: // Druid Signal
9737  if (target->HasAura(38776) || target->HasAura(39158)) // Don't target druids that have already been summoned by another player
9738  return false;
9739  break;
9740  case 39090: // Positive Charge
9741  if (!target->HasAura(39091)) // Only deal damage if target has Negative Charge
9742  return false;
9743  break;
9744  case 39093: // Negative Charge
9745  if (!target->HasAura(39088)) // Only deal damage if target has Positive Charge
9746  return false;
9747  break;
9748  case 39095: // Amplify Damage - weird logic confirmed on retail
9749  if (m_caster->getThreatManager().getThreatList().size() >= 2 && target == m_caster->GetVictim())
9750  return false;
9751  break;
9752  case 39365: // Thundering Storm - only hits 25-100yd range targets
9753  {
9754  float dist = sqrt(target->GetDistance(m_caster->GetPositionX(), m_caster->GetPositionY(), m_caster->GetPositionZ(), DIST_CALC_NONE));
9755  if (dist < 25.f || dist > 100.f)
9756  return false;
9757  break;
9758  }
9759  case 39921: // Vimgol Pentagram Beam
9760  {
9761  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT || target->GetEntry() != 23040 || m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT || m_caster->GetEntry() != 23040)
9762  return false;
9763 
9764  uint8 pBunnyId = m_caster->AI()->GetScriptData();
9765 
9766  std::list<Creature*> creatureList;
9767  MaNGOS::AllCreaturesOfEntryInRangeCheck check(target, 23040, 60.f);
9768  MaNGOS::CreatureListSearcher<MaNGOS::AllCreaturesOfEntryInRangeCheck> searcher(creatureList, check);
9769  Cell::VisitGridObjects(target, searcher, 60.f);
9770 
9771  for (auto& creature : creatureList)
9772  {
9773  // Check that both have AI() before accessing
9774  if (creature->AI() && target->AI() &&
9775  creature->AI()->GetScriptData() == target->AI()->GetScriptData())
9776  pBunnyId = creature->AI()->GetScriptData();
9777  }
9778 
9779  PlayerList playerList;
9780  MaNGOS::AnyPlayerInObjectRangeCheck checkPlayer(target, 4.f);
9781  MaNGOS::PlayerListSearcher<MaNGOS::AnyPlayerInObjectRangeCheck> playerSearcher(playerList, checkPlayer);
9782  Cell::VisitWorldObjects(target, playerSearcher, 4.f);
9783  for (auto& player : playerList)
9784  {
9785  switch (pBunnyId)
9786  {
9787  case 0:
9788  {
9789  if (player->HasAura(39834)) return true;
9790  break;
9791  }
9792  case 1:
9793  {
9794  if (player->HasAura(39851)) return true;
9795  break;
9796  }
9797  case 2:
9798  {
9799  if (player->HasAura(39852)) return true;
9800  break;
9801  }
9802  case 3:
9803  {
9804  if (player->HasAura(39853)) return true;
9805  break;
9806  }
9807  case 4:
9808  {
9809  if (player->HasAura(39854)) return true;
9810  break;
9811  }
9812  }
9813  }
9814  return false;
9815  }
9816  case 30769: // Pick Red Riding Hood
9817  case 30843: // Enfeeble
9818  case 36797: // Mind Control (Kael'thas)
9819  case 40243: // Crushing Shadows - Teron Gorefiend
9820  case 41376: // Spite
9821  case 43550: // Mind Control - Malacrass
9822  case 62166: // Stone Grip
9823  case 63981: // Stone Grip (h)
9824  case 69674: // Mutated Infection (10n)
9825  case 71224: // Mutated Infection (25n)
9826  case 73022: // Mutated Infection (10h)
9827  case 73023: // Mutated Infection (25h)
9828  if (m_caster->GetVictim() == target)
9829  return false;
9830  break;
9831  case 40175: // Spirit Chains - Teron Gorefiend
9832  case 40314: // Spirit Volley - Teron Gorefiend
9833  if (target->GetEntry() != 23111) // can only hit Shadowy Constructs
9834  return false;
9835  break;
9836  case 44659: // Destroy All Spirits - Teron Gorefiend
9837  if (target->GetEntry() != 23109) // can only hit Vengeful Spirits
9838  return false;
9839  break;
9840  case 40618: // Insignificance
9841  if (target->HasAura(40603)) // Taunt Gurtogg
9842  return false;
9843  break;
9844  case 40693: // Illidan - Cage Trap
9845  if (target->HasAura(40409)) // Maiev is down - trap should fail
9846  return false;
9847  break;
9848  case 40722: // Will of the Arakkoa God - Terokk
9849  if (target->HasAura(40726)) // Chosen One
9850  return false;
9851  break;
9852  case 40834: // Agonizing Flames
9853  if (m_caster->CanReachWithMeleeAttack(target))
9854  return false;
9855  break;
9856  case 40869: // Fatal Attraction - Mother Shahraz - ignore tanks - those which have Saber Lash
9857  if (target->HasAura(43690)) // Saber Lash
9858  return false;
9859  break;
9860  case 40870: // Fatal Attraction - tick - Mother Shahraz
9861  if (!target->HasAura(41001)) // Fatal Attraction Aura
9862  return false;
9863  break;
9864  case 43657: // Electrical Storm - Akil'zon
9865  if (target->HasAura(44007)) // Electrical Storm - Safe within eye
9866  return false;
9867  break;
9868  case 39992: // Needle Spine Targeting - Najentus
9869  if (target->HasAura(39837)) // Impaling Spine - skip
9870  return false;
9871  break;
9872  case 68921: // Soulstorm (FoS), only targets farer than 10 away
9873  case 69049: // Soulstorm - = -
9874  if (m_caster->IsWithinDist(target, 10.0f, false))
9875  return false;
9876  break;
9877  default:
9878  if (SpellScript* script = GetSpellScript())
9879  return script->OnCheckTarget(this, target, eff);
9880  break;
9881  }
9882 
9883  return true;
9884 }
9885 
9886 void Spell::OnCast()
9887 {
9888  if (SpellScript* script = GetSpellScript())
9889  return script->OnCast(this);
9890 }
9891 
9892 void Spell::OnHit(SpellMissInfo missInfo)
9893 {
9894  if (SpellScript* script = GetSpellScript())
9895  return script->OnHit(this, missInfo);
9896 }
9897 
9898 void Spell::OnAfterHit()
9899 {
9900  if (SpellScript* script = GetSpellScript())
9901  return script->OnAfterHit(this);
9902 }
9903 
9904 void Spell::OnSummon(GameObject* summon)
9905 {
9906  if (SpellScript* script = GetSpellScript())
9907  return script->OnSummon(this, summon);
9908 }
9909 
9910 void Spell::OnSummon(Creature* summon)
9911 {
9912  if (SpellScript* script = GetSpellScript())
9913  return script->OnSummon(this, summon);
9914 }
9915 
9916 uint32 Spell::GetPhaseMaskOverride()
9917 {
9918  if (SpellScript* script = GetSpellScript())
9919  return script->GetPhaseMaskOverride(this);
9920 
9921  return 1;
9922 }
9923 
9924 void Spell::SetTotalTargetValueModifier(float modifier)
9925 {
9926  m_damage = float(m_damage) * modifier;
9927 }
9928 
9929 SpellModRAII::SpellModRAII(Spell* spell, Player* modOwner, bool success, bool onlySave) : m_spell(spell), m_modOwner(modOwner), m_success(success), m_onlySave(onlySave)
9930 {
9931  if (m_modOwner && !modOwner->GetSpellModSpell()) // only if first spell in depth
9932  m_modOwner->SetSpellModSpell(spell);
9933 }
9934 
9935 SpellModRAII::~SpellModRAII()
9936 {
9937  if (m_modOwner && m_modOwner->GetSpellModSpell() == m_spell) // only if this spell is toplevel
9938  {
9939  if (!m_onlySave)
9940  {
9941  if (m_success)
9942  m_modOwner->RemoveSpellMods(m_spell->m_usedAuraCharges);
9943  else
9944  m_modOwner->ResetSpellModsDueToCanceledSpell(m_spell->m_usedAuraCharges);
9945  }
9946  m_modOwner->SetSpellModSpell(nullptr);
9947  }
9948 }
9949 
9950 SpellCastResult Spell::CheckVehicle(Unit const* caster, SpellEntry const& spellInfo)
9951 {
9952  // All creatures should be able to cast as passengers freely, restriction and attribute are only for players
9953  if (caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
9954  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
9955 
9956  VehicleInfo* vehicle = nullptr;
9957  if (caster->GetTransportInfo())
9958  if (caster->GetTransportInfo()->GetTransport()->IsUnit())
9959  vehicle = static_cast<Unit*>(caster->GetTransportInfo()->GetTransport())->GetVehicleInfo();
9960  if (vehicle)
9961  {
9962  uint16 checkMask = 0;
9963  for (uint8 effIdx = 0; effIdx < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++effIdx)
9964  {
9965  if (spellInfo.EffectApplyAuraName[effIdx] == SPELL_AURA_MOD_SHAPESHIFT)
9966  {
9967  SpellShapeshiftFormEntry const* shapeShiftEntry = sSpellShapeshiftFormStore.LookupEntry(spellInfo.EffectMiscValue[effIdx]);
9968  if (shapeShiftEntry && (shapeShiftEntry->flags1 & 1) == 0) // unk flag
9969  checkMask |= SEAT_FLAG_UNCONTROLLED;
9970  break;
9971  }
9972  }
9973 
9974  if (IsSpellHaveAura(&spellInfo, SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED))
9975  checkMask |= SEAT_FLAG_CAN_CAST_MOUNT_SPELL;
9976 
9977  if (!checkMask)
9978  checkMask = SEAT_FLAG_CAN_ATTACK;
9979 
9980  VehicleSeatEntry const* vehicleSeat = vehicle->GetSeatForPassenger(caster);
9981  if (!spellInfo.HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_ALLOW_WHILE_RIDING_VEHICLE) && !spellInfo.HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_ALLOW_WHILE_MOUNTED)
9982  && (vehicleSeat->m_flags & checkMask) != checkMask)
9983  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_DO_THAT_RIGHT_NOW;
9984 
9985  // Can only summon uncontrolled minions/guardians when on controlled vehicle
9986  if (vehicleSeat->m_flags & (SEAT_FLAG_CAN_CONTROL | SEAT_FLAG_UNK25))
9987  {
9988  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
9989  {
9990  if (spellInfo.Effect[i] != SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON)
9991  continue;
9992 
9993  SummonPropertiesEntry const* props = sSummonPropertiesStore.LookupEntry(spellInfo.EffectMiscValueB[i]);
9994  if (props && props->Group != SUMMON_PROP_GROUP_WILD)
9995  return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_DO_THAT_RIGHT_NOW;
9996  }
9997  }
9998  }
9999 
10000  return SPELL_CAST_OK;
10001 }
